name: Tivoli Hotel
address: Arni Magnussons Gade 2, 1577 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Featuring a sauna, a swimming pool and free wireless internet access in all areas, Tivoli Hotel Copenhagen is situated in Copenhagen and offers trendy accommodation. It features city views and 4-star rooms. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the lounge bar. For those travelling with children Tivoli Hotel Copenhagen offers babysitting/child services, a playground and a kids club. This hotel provides rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and a laptop safe. Tivoli Hotel boasts convenient dining options, including international and local cuisines at Tivoli Brasserie and local food at MASH Penthouse. Each evening, guests are able to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Tivoli Hotel is close to shops, dining and Copenhagen's nightlife. It is also within walking distance of the Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek, Daemonen and Tivoli Gardens.Revato

name: Scandic Spectrum
description: Within a 20-minute stroll from Copenhagen Central Station, Scandic Spectrum provides guests with a convenient base when visiting Copenhagen. It is conveniently located in the city centre. Deluxe on-site facilities include a sauna and a swimming pool. Wi-Fi is also available. The rooms are air conditioned and include bottled water. Copenhagen's attractions, such as the Black Diamond and the Royal Danish Library, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Christiansborg Palace, Kobenhavns Radhus and Tivoli Gardens are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Scandic Sydhavnen
description: Situated only a five-minute stroll from Sydhavn Railway Station, Scandic Sydhavnen offers guests an ideal base while visiting Copenhagen. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel features comfortable 4-star rooms and a bar. There are a variety of amenities at Scandic Sydhavnen that guests can enjoy, including a sauna, free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. The hotel's amenities, such as business centre and photocopier, kids club and playground, and honeymoon suites make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms at Scandic Sydhavnen feature a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. They provide an alarm clock, heating and ironing facilities. Those staying at Scandic Sydhavnen can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Copenhagen Airport is around a 15-minute car trip from the hotel and Enghave Railway Station is within walking distance. It is also a brief car ride from Tivoli Gardens, University of Copenhagen and Nyhavn.Revato

name: Scandic Sluseholmen
description: Just 500 metres from Sydhavnen Harbour, Scandic Sluseholmen offers room service, satellite TV and free WiFi. All rooms at Scandic Sluseholmen have multi-channel TVs, spacious work areas. Some provide city and harbour views. The Bar offers snacks and drinks, occasional piano music and live sport on flat-screen TVs. Restaurant Elements serves a popular breakfast buffet that includes fresh fruit and healthy, homemade bread. Copenhagen city centre is 5 km from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Nimb Hotel
description: Located in Copenhagen’s famous Tivoli Gardens, this stylish boutique hotel is housed in an impressive Moorish-style building. It offers on-site dining and designer rooms with flat-screen TVs and park views. Elegant rooms with antique furniture and four-poster beds are featured in all Nimb Hotel rooms. Each bathroom has a double sink and shower. Luxury toiletries and guest bathrobes are also included. Selected rooms feature a fireplace and a free-standing bathtub. The restaurant Nimb Brasserie offer Tivoli Gardens views. Guests can enjoy seasonal Scandinavian dishes and French cuisine. Grilled delicacies with an Asian touch are available at Bar'n'Grill. Featuring décor by Hans J Wegner, the bar serves afternoon tea and great coffee in the daylight hours. When the clock strikes 17, the talented bartenders mix splendid cocktails in the historic ballroom complete with chandeliers and a log fire. Nimb Hotel can help arrange private limousine service to and from Copenhagen Airport, which is 8 km away.

name: Cph Hotel
description: Next to the trendy Kødbyen district, CPH Hotel is less than 1 km from City Hall Square. All rooms have cable TV and free WiFi. The Scandinavian-style rooms at CPH Hotel have wooden floors and light, spacious bathrooms with hair dryers. Room furnishings include a work desk and an armchair. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the outdoor terrace during the summer months. Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station are a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is 20 minutes from the hotel by train.

name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Helnan Marselis Hotel
description: Overlooking Aarhus Bay and the Kattegat Sea, this hotel has a fitness area, sauna, small indoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Helnan Marselis Hotels rooms are located in the main building or in an annex. Each has a TV and private bathroom. Tivoli Friheden amusement park is 2.2 km away. Helnan Marselis Hotel is 15 minutes walk from Marselisborg Castle and 10 minutes drive from Aarhus city centre.

name: Comwell Roskilde
description: Boasting views of the Roskilde Fjord, Comwell Roskilde offers free parking and rooms with cable TV and WiFi access. Roskilde city centre is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Seasonal dishes based on fresh produce accompanied by selected wines are served at Comwell Roskilde’s restaurant. Drinks are available in the hotel bar, featuring a terrace with fjord views. Leisure facilities include table football, billiards and a fitness room. The area offers great opportunities for jogging and bicycling. The property has several cosy terraces, pavilions and patios. A bus stop with connections to Roskilde city centre is situated 500 metres away. The Viking Ship Museum is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Scandic Odense
description: Scandic Odense offers 4-star accommodation in Odense. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. It is pet-friendly and has free private parking on site for those with a car. The rooms at Scandic Odense offer a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All provide a radio, a telephone and ironing facilities. The cosy in-house restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner each day, providing an enjoyable dining experience not far from the rooms and everything the hotel has on offer. Scandic Odense provides an ideal place to explore the Montergarden, University of Southern Denmark and Odense Cathedral, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Guests are able to discover the district using the hotel's hire bikes.Revato

name: Kompas Hotel Aalborg
description: Brand new rooms in the heart of Aalborg You could hardly wish for a better location in Aalborg - whether you are on an extended weekend, city break, business trip or something else entirely. Kompas Hotel, BW Signature Collection is a charming hotel, centrally located in relation to Aalborg's new and exciting waterfront with Musikkens Hus, and the cozy pedestrian streets and vibrant life of the North Jutland capital are just around the corner. You must experience the newly renovated waterfront with world-class architecture, cozy parks, gourmet restaurants in former warehouses while enjoying the view of the Limfjord. Shopping opportunities are plentiful in Aalborg, where one of the pedestrian streets is only 5 minutes away from the hotel on foot. So, explore Aalborg, where you'll always find new places, different experiences, exciting stories and true city vibes. The capital of North Jutland is a gem that never disappoints and an ideal destination for a mini-break or a weekend break.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Scheelsminde
description: This quiet, family-owned property, set in a country house from the early 1800s, is 5 minutes’ drive from Aalborg Train Station. It offers a gourmet restaurant, wellness centre and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Tea/coffee facilities, cable TV channels and desks are standard at Hotel Scheelsminde. Blackout curtains and a private bathroom with shower are also included. Restaurant Scheelsminde’s seasonal menu offers classic Danish and international dishes from Monday until Saturday. Guests can relax on the terrace or play boules in the garden. The wellness centre features a swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. Kunsten Museum of Modern Art is a 10-minute drive from Hotel Scheelsminde. Mariendals Mølle Bus Stop is just around the corner from the hotel.

name: Color Hotel Skagen
description: Color Hotel Skagen is 5 minutes’ walk from Frederikshavnsvej Train Station. It offers fine dining and free private parking. Leisure options include a sauna and outdoor pool and spa. Skagen town centre is 2 km away. Color Hotel Skagen’s rooms and apartments features cable TV and modern bathrooms. Some options include kitchen facilities and a dining area. The in-house restaurant uses fresh, seasonal ingredients in its dishes. Other facilities include a billiards table, a petanque court, table tennis, darts and a small playroom for younger kids. The 14th-century, sand-engulfed Buried Church is a 3-minute drive from Color Skagen Hotel.

name: Skagen Strand Hotel Og Feriecenter
description: Right by Hulsig Station and 800 metres from Skagen Beach, this resort offers an indoor water park and free sports centre. Each apartment has a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and a private south-facing terrace with garden furniture. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s apartments have a seating area and a private bathroom. All are equipped with a TV and a CD player. Some houses has a washing machine if not there are public washing facilities. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s water park includes a 48-metre water slide and sauna facilities. The sports centre features a gym and tennis, mini golf and badminton courts. Children can enjoy access to several playgrounds and play areas on site. Guests have free access to all facilities. The resort’s restaurant serves international and Danish cuisine. Free public parking spaces are found nearby.

name: Hotel Marina
description: This hotel is next to Grenå Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from Kattegatcentret Oceanarium. It offers free sauna and indoor pool access, plus free Wi-Fi. Satellite TV and minibars are standard at Hotel Marina. Some rooms have a seating area and work desk. Facilities include a children's playground and activity centre with billiards and table tennis options. Staff can recommend walking trails and jogging tracks in the nearby forest. Parking is free at Hotel Marina. Guests can drive to Djurs Sommerland Theme Park, 25 minutes away.

name: Harbour Living by Jutlandia
address: Hotel Jutlandia, Havnepladsen 1, 9900 Frederikshavn, North Jutland
description: With a 24-hour reception, this hotel is located 300 metres from the Frederikshavn Ferry Terminal and offers accommodation in central Frederikshavn. There is a fitness centre on site as well as free WiFi throughout the hotel. At Harbour Living by Jutlandia, guests can enjoy food and refreshments at the in-house restaurant and bar. Guests can also use a shared kitchen for an additional surcharge, and there is a 24-hour front reception and tour desk on site. Billiards and darts are also offered for leisure. Skagen is 40 km from Outlet Hotel Frederikshavn, while Hirtshals is 49 km from the property. The Frederikshavn Train Station is within a 10-minute walk.

name: Benniksgaard Hotel
description: Situated at the highest point in Rinkenæs by Flensburg Firth – with Benniksgaard Golf Course as its closest neighbour – the four star Benniksgaard Hotel, BW Signature Collection boasts views of unparalleled beauty. Benniksgaard takes its name from a family farm dating all the way back to 1393. Today, Benniksgaard is privately owned and run as a hotel. All the buildings have undergone a comprehensive and painstaking renovation. The rustic style, exposed beams and bright colours create an airy, inviting atmosphere. The old chicken house has been transformed into Restaurant Pejsestuen, the longest wing into a hotel wing with 31 rooms – and the old farmhouse from 1782 into fourteen stunning spacious rooms and suites. With its squinting walls, sash windows and creaking floors, the listed farmhouse is a constant reminder of bygone times. The first floor staircase is a particularly interesting relic, and indeed, its narrow steps have been a constant feature of the farmhouse. The old grain stores and a recently added wing are home to several function and conference rooms, while the wing formerly occupied by agricultural machinery now houses BenniksgaardButik shop, offering a wide range of items to suit all tastes.bestwestern.com

name: A Hotels
description: Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, A Hotels offers accommodation in Glostrup, 10 km from Copenhagen. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free private parking is available on site. Brøndby Stadium is 4 km away. The rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area for your convenience. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the hotel. Copenhagen Zoo is 7 km away from A Hotels. Glostrup Train Station is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Kastrup Airport, 21 km from A Hotels.

name: Hotel Kirstine
description: This hotel is 500 metres from Næstved Train Station. Free wired internet, tea/coffee facilities and cable TV are standard room features. Facilities include a sun terrace and a restaurant. Hotel Kirstine’s à la carte restaurant focuses on traditional Danish cuisine. Vegetarian dishes and children's meals are also available. It has a cosy, open fireplace during winter. Staff can help arrange canoeing trips on the Suså River. Free parking is offered at the hotel as well as two charging stations for electric cars (plug 16A CEE). BonBon Land Amusement Park is a 15-minute drive from Kirstine Hotel. Other area activities include golfing, as well as swimming at Karrebæksminde Beach, 10 km away.

name: Comwell Kolding
description: Set beside Marielund Forest, just 1 km from Kolding Train Station, this hotel offers free WiFi. Comwell Kolding’s bright rooms have large windows, as well as a desk and a flat-screen TV. The hotel has a sauna and indoor pool. Other leisure options include billiards, table tennis and a summertime children’s playroom. Comwell Kolding’s restaurant offers seasonal menus, while Jes or No Bar provides light meals. The nearby forest provides nice hiking and jogging opportunities. A bus stop with connections to Kolding is 50 metres away.

name: Scandic Olympic
description: Located amongst a range of popular tourist hot spots, boutiques and dining options, Scandic Olympic is ideal for guests wanting to discover Esbjerg and its surroundings. Guests can also enjoy free internet access. The hotel's professional staff are available to assist around the clock, and an express check-in facility provides extra convenience. It is dog-friendly and provides private parking on site for guests with a car. The rooms at Scandic Olympic are comfortable with facilities including an en suite. They feature a flat-screen TV, an in-room closet and a desk. The hotel features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Esbjerg Airport is around a 20-minute car trip from Scandic Olympic and Esbjerg Station is within walking distance. Fano is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Golf Hotel Viborg
address: Hans Tausens Allé 2, 8800 Viborg, Central Jutland
description: Golf Hotel Viborg enjoys a tranquil setting by Søndersø Lake, a 10-minute walk from Viborg Cathedral. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Golf Hotel Viborg include an electric kettle, work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Many rooms offer lake views and are furnished with classic Chesterfield furniture. Danish cuisine is available at Restaurant Brænderigaarden and Restaurant Golf Salonen. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Drinks are available in the bar. The hotel have all facilities to both relax and do execierces, with outdoor and indoor swimming pool. The Spa offers Sauna, Steambath, outdoor spa for up to 10 people and cold shock pool. And a new Fitness Center is also available. The staff can help arrange green fees on local golf courses. The 27-hole Viborg Golf Course is a 7-minute drive away. The Skovgaard Museum is located 650 metres away.

name: Comwell Borupgaard
description: Set in a North Zealand manor house, this hotel is within 10 minutes’ drive of Helsingør. It offers a large spa, gourmet cuisine and a gym. Comwell Borupgaard’s bright rooms include cable TV channels. All have a modern bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi access is available in the lobby. The in-house restaurant serves Danish and international cuisine based on fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Drinks, snacks and light dishes are available in the bar. Entrance to the spa and treatments can be booked and paid at the front desk. Featuring 14 treatment rooms, Comwell’s spa offers a variety of bookable treatments and massages. Guests can also take a stroll in the park surrounding the hotel, and Snekkersten Beach is only a 15-minute walk away. Snekkersten Train Station is 2 minutes’ walk from Comwell Borupgaard.

name: Hotel Legoland
description: This family-friendly hotel features free gym access. It has a private entrance to the popular Legoland® Billund Theme Park, open between the end of March until October. Rooms include free WiFi, flat-screen TVs and Lego gifts for all children. The colourful rooms of Hotel Legoland® include a tea/coffee maker and a child-friendly bathroom. Many rooms offer great views of the theme park, while some also include themed décor with play tables and Lego bricks. On-site children’s facilities include a playroom, playground as well as numerous activities. There is also a shop with the most recent Lego products. The hotel is only 800 metres from Lalandia Water Park, and Billund Airport is less than 10 minutes’ drive away. Free parking is possible at Hotel Legoland®.

name: Sdr. Omme Kro & Hotel
description: When you stay at Sdr. Omme Kro & Hotel in Sonder Omme, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Skovsnogen Artspace and Grindsted Kirke. Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Trinity Hotel & Konference Center
address: Gl. Faergevej 30, Snoghoj, 7000 Fredericia, South Denmark
description: Trinity is located 10 minutes' drive from Fredericia and has a view of green areas by the Old Little Belt Bridge, and direct access to wonderful trails and nature experiences. All rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with a shower and tea and coffee making facilities. Restaurant Lillebælt is known for its high gastronomic level. The hotel's chefs work from modern Nordic cuisine, delicious, energizing and nutritious food prepared from fresh seasonal ingredients and according to the best traditions of the profession. The entire area around Fredericia and Lillebælt offers a myriad of exciting experiences and activities. Visit Visit Fredericia's website, where there is plenty of inspiration and practical information.

name: Danninghus
description: No description found

name: Comwell Kongebrogaarden
description: Comwell Kongebrogaarden Hotel overlooks the Lillebælt Strait, 5 minutes’ drive from Middelfart and Snoghøj. It offers an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. All rooms have a private balcony or shared terrace. Flat-screen TVs, tea/coffee making facilities and seating areas are found in each room. Relaxation options include a lounge with a fireplace and a large, sea-view terrace. The in-house restaurant serves Danish and international dishes. Comwell Kongebrogaarden is situated next to a large marina. The green surroundings of Kongebroskoven Deer Park are ideal for walks. There are 16 golf courses within a 1-hour drive of the hotel.

name: Comwell Sorø
description: Set amongst central Zealand’s scenic and peaceful countryside is this hotel. It offers views of the surrounding greenery and Lake Pedersborg, a 5-minute walk away. Guest rooms at Comwell Sorø are classically decorated in a cosy style with carpeting. Each has a work desk and a TV. The in-house Restaurant Solaris with its panoramic views serves a varied, seasonal menu. Guests at Sorø Comwell can enjoy billiards, darts and other games. Bicycles can also be rented on site. Sorø’s town centre is about 2 km away. Sorø Golf Club is 15 minutes’ drive away. On-site parking spaces are available at the hotel.

name: Montra Skaga Hotel
description: Skaga Hotel is conveniently located just 100 metres from Nordsøen Oceanarium. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with free WiFi. Color Line Ferry Terminal is just 500 metres away, while Fjord Line and Smyril Line Ferry Terminals are 1.5 km away. All rooms at Hotel Skaga have a TV, a seating area and a work desk. The rooms come with a bathroom and shower. Guests can enjoy a game of table tennis or pool in the games room or relax in the sauna. The Panorama Restaurant offers a buffet breakfast, à la carte dishes, daily specials and a children's menu. Drinks are available in the cosy lounge area. Lilleheden Train Station is a 3-minute walk away. Hirtshals Golf Club is 4 km from the hotel.

name: Ocean Drive Ibiza
address: Port Deportivo Marina Botafoch,66, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Ibiza is inspired by South Beach and decorated in a Miami art-deco style. The hotel is even more impressive at night, when it is lit by blue neon lights and visible across Ibiza's bay. The rooms have a minimalistic, exclusive design style. All include free WiFi. The hotel's rooftop terrace, the Sky Bar, allows you to take in the outstanding view of the Mediterranean Sea, the castle and the old town of Ibiza directly opposite the private harbour of Marina Botafoch. The ideal spot for those looking to enjoy the islands famous nightlife, it lies just a short distance from clubs such as Pachá, Lío and Chinois. Meanwhile, during the day, spend your time relaxing on the golden sands of Talamanca Beach, a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Torre Del Mar
address: Calle Carlos Roman Ferrer, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Torre del Mar Hotel, on Ibiza’s Playa d'en Bossa Beach, features an outdoor pool, and spa. There is free WiFi, and most rooms have sea or mountain views. The air-conditioned, bright rooms with modern décor feature a private balcony, flat-screen satellite TV, and a free safe. There is a free minibar, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Torre del Mar spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Massage service and treatments are available for a surcharge. The hotel also offers a 24-hour gym and billiards. The Excellence Terrace features Balinese beds, hammocks and an exterior hot tub. Regional and international cuisine is served in the hotel buffet restaurant, open for breakfast and for dinner. 24-hour room service is available, and packed lunches can be requested. At Bar Sa Punta del Dalt you can enjoy drinks and cocktails and Restobar Miramar serves Mediterranean food and drinks throughout the day. Torre del Mar has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Free parking is available on-site, and Ibiza Town is a 5-minute drive away.

name: W Ibiza
address: Carrer Ricardo Curtoys Gotarredona, 37, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Much anticipated and off the beaten track, W Ibiza luxury beach hotel strikes a pose on the palm-fringed, sand-drenched beachfront of Santa Eulalia. The seasonal escape mixes the parallel realities of Ibiza with a magnetic pull that turns up the sass. This is where you get to stay and play with a brand that was made for the White Isle. Sun-kissed and diverse, Ibiza is more than an island, it’s a brand. This is where flower power meets club culture and myths, legends and nature amplify the compulsive, enigmatic spirit. As the third largest town, Santa Eulalia totally owns its relaxed pace and cosmopolitan attitude. Offering up a heady mix of local art galleries, trendy boutiques and amazing dining, alongside gorgeous beaches and dive-deep sea. Just 21km from Ibiza Airport, you can style it out among the chic marina and hotspots in no time. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Hotel Anfora Ibiza
address: Calle Cardona 9, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set just 100 metres from Es Canar Beach, Hotel Anfora Ibiza features terraces, swimming pools and an outdoor spa and fitness area. There is also an on-site restaurant. Air-conditioned rooms are spacious and bright, and include a TV, safe, hairdryer and free WiFi. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet, and both international and local cuisine. Guests will also find a pool bar serving cocktails, and a lounge bar. Hotel Anfora Ibiza has courtesy rooms where you can shower on check-out day and leave luggage. Punta Arabi Hippy Market is 850 metres while Chirincana Bar is just 100 metres from the hotel. Sant Eulalia can be reached in a 10-minute drive, while Ibiza Airport is 45 minutes away by car.

name: Iberostar Santa Eulalia - Adults Only
address: Calle Mestral, 42, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eulália del Río, Iberostar Selection Santa Eulalia Ibiza is just 20 metres from S’Argamassa Beach. This hotel is for adults only and offers an outdoor pool and a terrace with sun loungers. The rooms feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace and most have views of the sea, outdoor pool or gardens. Es Vedra terrace bar offers daily shows, music and entertainment in the evening. The centre of Santa Eulália del Río is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Es Canar is 1 km away and Ibiza Old Town is 15 km away.

name: Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Playa den Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Set on Playa d’en Bossa Beach, the adults-only Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel features a spa and 3 outdoor pools with large sun beds. Guests enjoy free entrance to live DJ performances hosted by the hotel. The minimalist rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a 42-inch plasma TV and iPod docking station. They also feature a furnished terrace. The Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel is made up of 2 separate buildings. The Ushuaia Club houses the bedrooms and hosts the hotel's famous parties. The exclusive Ushuaia Tower offers 24-hour room service, an outdoor pool, Balinese beds and a poolside cocktail bar. The hotel offers the Minami Japanese fusion restaurant with a Zen garden, as well as a Beach Club restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine. The property's Montauk Steak House restaurant specialises in steaks and other grilled meats. The hotel is 2 km from Ibiza Airport and 3 km from Ibiza Old Town. It is located directly opposite Hi Ibiza. Check the hotel's app for available services.

name: Hipotels Playa De Palma Palace
address: 7600 Avd. Fra Joan Llabres Playa De Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa features a garden, a terrace, an outdoor pool and a spa centre. There is free WiFi throughout. All rooms are spacious and have a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some feature a seating area and views of the sea or the pool. The spa offers a range of beauty treatments, a hamman and a sauna for an extra cost. There is also a free hot tub and a fitness centre. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.6 km from Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa, while Playa de Palma Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma
address: Avenida Fra Joan Llabrés, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. This modern hotel is 2 km from Aqualand El Arenal. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for cycling lovers and the hotel has bicycles for rent. Car hire is available as well. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service. You can drive to both Puerto Portals and Puerto Adriano within 15 minutes.

name: Helios Mallorca Hotel & Apartments
address: Carrer de la Carabela, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set within gardens, Helios Mallorca is located just off Palma Beach and offers rooms with air conditioning and a balcony. The outdoor pool is surrounded by a sun terrace. Hotel Helios Mallorca includes an indoor swimming pool. Mini golf and table tennis facilities are also available, and the hotel provides entertainment every day. This charming hotel is well equipped to welcome cycling lovers. It offers a large garage for bicycles as well as an area to clean them. The buffet restaurant includes live cooking and serves a choice of regional and international dishes. During summer months, guests can enjoy drinks and snacks on the outdoor terrace. Helios Hotel Mallorca sits next to Palma Aquarium. Buses leave from outside the hotel, with routes to Palma City Centre and Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Meliá Calviá Beach
address: Calle Violeta 1, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering impressive sea views from its setting, the stylish beachfront hotel Meliá Calviá Beach features 3 outdoor swimming pools, 1 heated indoor pool and direct access to the beach. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a balcony. Rooms are decorated in an elegant, contemporary style. All accommodation offers satellite TV and a minibar. Rooms overlook the sea, gardens or pool area. The hotel features spacious terraces with sea and pool view, as well as 2 restaurants - a la carte and buffet style - offering international cuisine. There is also a pool bar and a lounge bar with a wide range of snacks and drinks. Set in attractive gardens, Meliá Calviá Beach has a large sun terrace with loungers. The hotel offers a lagoon-style pool, one pool for kids, one exclusive pool for the Level Clients and one indoor pool. There is a daily entertainment programme for adults and children, and guests can also relax at the YHI Spa. Meliá Calviá Beach also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This service includes, among others, private reception space, express check-in and check-out, access to a private pool, free usage of superior amenities, pillow menu and a la carte breakfast service in the room. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Magalluf and there is a selection of golf courses within 5 km of the hotel. Palma and its airport can be reached in 25 minutes, by car.

name: Castillo Hotel Son Vida, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Mallorca
address: Carrer Raixa 2, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: As of 2022, we invite you to discover our refurbished Rooms & Suites, inspired by Mallorca´s indigenous charms and treasures. An Adults Only 16+ hotel, with captivating panoramic views towards the bay of Palma, Castillo Hotel Son Vida embodies the alluring lifestyle of its affluent neighborhood. Combining an enriching heritage with thoughtful service, the sophisticated ambience extends throughout 164 guestrooms and suites. Surrounded by three excellent golf courses and featuring outdoor swimming pools for unequalled recreation, the 5-star luxury hotel also offers prime downtime at Castillo Hotel Son Vida Spa, including a 24-hour fitness center. A dining destination on its own, an inspired range of restaurants, make the most of the unsurpassed vistas, from fine dining El Castell to the chic Pool Bar. Our meeting rooms boasting natural day light, create the perfect setting for corporate and social events.Marriott

name: Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma - Adults Only
address: Avenida America 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only is set in Playa de Palma. The hotel has a spa centre and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hair dryer. Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only features free WiFi throughout the property. The property has 3 on-site restaurants; an Asian-fusion restaurant, Bistro restaurant, and a Buffet restaurant. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bike storage is available for a cost. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.8 km from Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only, while Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Please note that dress code allowed in buffet is shorts. (No swimsuit, no tank tops, no flip-flops) and A la carte restaurants: long pants.

name: Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa
address: C/ Ramal Ca Na Gabriela, 4, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from the beach of Bahía de Palma, this attractive hotel features a large outdoor pool and luxurious spa. The suites feature a seating area and small kitchenette. The spa at Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa includes a hydromassage indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage and aromatherapy treatments are available. A buffet breakfast is served at Playa de Palma. In the evenings guests can enjoy international and Majorcan cuisine. There is also a poolside snack bar. The city of Palma is 15 km away. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are both within a 20-minute drive.

name: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá
address: Avenida Joan Miro 21, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá has an ideal location in central Palma, offering views of its marina, just 100 metres away. This hotel features parking and indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Many of the rooms at Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá offer views of Palma Bay. They come with flat-screen TVs, satellite channels and a CD player. A bathrobe and slippers are also included. Air conditioning or heating is featured in the rooms according to the season. The Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá’s Marivent restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and La Terraza del Victoria Restaurant serves dinners. The cocktail bar has a terrace offering views of the marina and the Cathedral. The hotel also has a bicycle center with safety hooks for bicycles and professional tools. Bellver Castle and the entrance to the surrounding park are approximately 500 metres from the Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá. There are a number of bars and clubs within a short walk of the hotel.

name: Convent de la Missio - Adults Only
address: Carrer De La Missio, 7a, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in the old monastery Convent de la Missió dating from the 17th century, this modern and chic hotel boasts an excellent location in the centre of historic Palma. Visit the beautiful, historical old town of Palma on foot from this hotel. You can stroll through the narrow streets surrounding the hotel and relax in the gardened patios. At the end of a busy days sightseeing in Palma, you can unwind in the sauna or by sitting in the cool of the interior patio. The hotel is located in the centre of Palma, allowing you to easily get to numerous bars, restaurants and the lively nightlife of the Majorcan capital.

name: Iberostar Bahia de Palma - Adults Only
address: Carrer Marbella, 32, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located only 20 metres from a long sandy beach, Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only features a rooftop terrace with an infinity pool and sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only is a hotel for adults only and is equipped to help you relax. Enjoy the excellent facilities offered by the hotel, including the Sensations Spa, the swimming pool and wellness area. This is also an ideal place to participate in sporting activities, such as cycling. "The Origin Beach Soul" À la carte restaurant is not included in any accommodation meal plan. The hotel is 11 km from Palma, the capital of the island of Majorca. The airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Hotel Vista Odin
address: C/ Mar De Aral 13, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Playa de Palma, Hotel Vista Odin features a tour desk and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge. The property is located 2.3 km from Palma Aquarium. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms at Hotel Vista Odin include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Hotel Vista Odin offers an outdoor pool. Playa de Palma Beach is 600 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Hotel Hospes Maricel & Spa
description: Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa is an impressive hotel located just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca. Featuring both modern, 16th and 17th-century architecture, it has an amazing seafront infinity pool and a well-equipped spa. The hotel is made up of the original mansion and a modern annexe building with contemporary décor and exposed stone walls, located on second sea line. You can access the property's private stone caves, some of which have been converted into seafront massage rooms. The Bodyna Spa at Hospes Maricel y Spa includes indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a terrace, garden, a gym, and massage services are available. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some have a private pool. The hotel’s Maricel Restaurant offers traditional Mallorcan food and a range of quality local wines. At the bar you can enjoy a cocktail accompanied by live jazz. Breakfast can be also served on the Mediterranean-style terrace which overlooks the sea. Hospes Maricel y Spa has a private jetty where guests arriving by sea can moor a boat, and Calanova Sailing Club is 30 metres away. There is a golf course 500 metres away, and you can drive to Palma Airport in 15 minutes.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma
description: Set on the beachfront, Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma is located near nightlife and just 5 minutes' drive from Palma Airport. It features a swimming pool and sun loungers. Free premium high-speed WiFi is available. Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma offers fully equipped rooms, each one with a satellite TV, minibar and private balcony. The hotel offers 2 restaurants, one buffet-style and one á la carte. There is also an on-site bar, Bar Mar Blau, and a poolside bar. Guests will also be able to enjoy the Sensations Spa. There is also a fitness area and 8 golf courses near by. On the rooftop terrace, guest over 16 years of age staying in the Star Prestige rooms have access to an exclusive solarium with an infinity pool and sun loungers. The hotel is set 15 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma.

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Iberostar Cristina
address: Calle Bartomeu Xamena, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star Iberostar Cristina offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Majorca. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, free welcome drink, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include dart board, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. For reliable service and professional staff, Iberostar Cristina caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Aubamar Suites & Spa
address: Calle Misión de San Diego 17, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Aubamar Suites & Spa features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Aubamar Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a sauna, and a hot tub, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de Palma Beach, and Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Aubamar Suites & Spa.

name: Melia Palma Bay
address: Calle Felicia Fuster 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a roof-top terrace with sea views and an outdoor pool, Melia Palma Bay offers accommodation next to Palma Convention Centre. Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 350 metres away. Rooms are bright and feature Scandinavian-style dècor. All have satellite TV and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. There is also a fitness centre at the property. Parking is available on site for an extra charge. Palma Yacht Club is 2.1 km from Melia Palma Bay, while Cala Major Beach is 5 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Hotel Boutique Minister
address: Paseo La Playa 12, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on Playa D'en Repic Beach in Port de Soller, Hotel Boutique Minister, a four-star superior hotel, offers a year-round outdoor heated pool, sun terrace and views of the sea. Guests have free spa access. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel Minister features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and windsurfing. You will find the Sierra de Tramuntana Mountains, a UNESCO world heritage site beside the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 27 km from the property; and free private parking is provided.

name: Melia Cala d'Or Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Portinatx, 16-18, Cala d'Or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Meliá Cala d'Or offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi throughout the hotel. Located in Cala d'Or, this property is just minutes from the center of Cala d'Or, Cala Gran and Cala Ferrera, You can have a meal at Restaurant Es Llaüt, Sa Pastera, or Salon Wistaria. There is an outdoor pool with a whirlpool and a children's pool surrounded by gardens. This elegant hotel has a central sun terrace and gardens. Rooms feature elegant Mediterranean design and include air condition and free WiFi. In addition, the junior suites have a kitchen and lounge. Es Llaüt is open for breakfast and evening for dinner with local and international cuisine. In Sa Pastera Bar, located poolside, you can enjoy all day drinks and snacks at noon. In addition, during the summer months, it is open at night so they can enjoy a wonderful dinner in a quiet and perfect environment. At the spa, you can enjoy the heated pool, spa bath, sauna, steam bath and bithermal shower and gym. We also have massages and beauty treatments. Room rates include free access to the spa and gym.

name: Aparthotel Tropicana
description: Tropicana Hotel features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Cala Millor. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Tropicana Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Tropicana Hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Cala Millor Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 69 km from Tropicana Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Sóller - Adults Only
description: Enjoying an unbeatable location overlooking Majorca's Puerto de Soller Bay, Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller, part of the Designhotels, offers a heated outdoor pool, a spa and free bikes. Rooms at this hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some have coffee and tea making facilities and a sofa. All have private bathrooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller is well situated for outdoor activities, including sailing, diving and snorkelling. Yoga classes are also available on site. Palma de Mallorca is 40 minutes' drive away and Palma Airport is 37 km away.

name: Secrets Mallorca Villamil Resort & Spa Only Adults
description: Housed in a stately building with gardens, the charming Secrets Mallorca Villamil is located on Peguera Beach. It features cycling facilities, an outdoor heated swimming pool, a spa with sauna, steam bath, hot tub and sensation showers (all spa services for an extra cost) Rooms offer city views of Paguera, views to the garden or the sea. They include free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and minibar. The World Café offers a buffet with a selection of international cuisine made with fresh, seasonal produce. There is a daily breakfast buffet and in summer guests can have breakfast on the terrace overlooking the sea. The Olio Restaurant is located by the pool and serves local dishes such as rice, fresh fish and other snacks. Open in the evening, Seaside Grill Restaurant offers beautiful sea views and serves Mediterranean cuisine. You can also enjoy a drink and live music in Piano and Sky Bar. The hotel also has a gym and free parking for bikes. Massages are available for an extra cost and Pilates and Stretching classes are also available for free. Once a week in summer, the hotel organizes a free boat trip for hotel guests. The Secrets Mallorca Villamil is the official hotel of the Triathlon Challenge Paguera Mallorca. The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: -access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, -exclusive concierge service, -selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, among other special advantages. Nicely located, Secret Mallorca Villamil is 3 km from Golf de Andratx; and you can drive to both Golf de Santa Ponsa and Bendinat Golf Club within 15 minutes by car.

name: Portblue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Alcudia - Pto Pollensa Km 2, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa, 5 km from Alcudia, offers extensive sports facilities, including 3 swimming pools, a tennis court and watersports centre. Please note that the spa is available at an extra cost. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony overlooking the gardens or sea. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The property's spacious, airy rooms are decorated in soft colours. They all include a fridge, a laptop safe and a seating area with sofa. The hotel’s wellness centre has a spa bath (with an extra cost), Turkish bath (with an extra cost) and a gym (free of charge). Beauty treatments (with an extra cost) and massages (with an extra cost) are also available. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa has à la carte and buffet restaurants, as well as 4 bars, including a bar with nightly music. There is also a minimarket and gift shop. PortBlue Club Pollentia Resort & Spa is located on the seafront in Majorca’s Pollensa Bay next to Can Cap de Bou Beach. Puerto Pollensa is within 5 km, while the S'Albufera Nature Reserve is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa
description: Located just a short walk to the Can Picafort beach, surrounded by gardens lays this complex made up of the hotel and apartments with free spa access and free WiFi. The complex offers guests all they need for a fun filled, enjoyable family holiday, including; 2 large swimming pools with children’s pool, mini-club and children’s playground, entertainment programmes, a free Spa & Wellness centre, Conference room for up to 40 people and a sports centre. Alcudia is 12 km away and Palma de Mallorca is 50 km from Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 50 minutes' drive away.

name: Hotel Florida Magaluf - Adults Only
description: Adults-only Hotel Florida Universal sits in Bay of Magalluf, Majorca, close to the nightlife and about 10 minutes’ walk from Palma Nova Beach. It has a swimming pool with sea views. The rooms at Florida Hotel Magalluf have a balcony, TV and private bathroom with bath. Next to the outdoor pool is a sun terrace with free loungers. The air-conditioned dining room offers a buffet dinner. During the summer the hotel has a lunchtime barbecue on the terrace. Hotel Florida Magalluf is a short walk from lively beaches and discos, bars, nightclubs and restaurants offering fun into the early hours. The city of Palma de Mallorca is about 10 km away.

name: Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only
description: Set overlooking Costa d’en Blanes Beach and Punta Portals Marina, Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) is a well-equipped complex featuring an outdoor swimming pool and restaurant. The Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) features brightly decorated double bedrooms and suites with balconies. Suites and Junior Suites have living areas with satellite TV. A safety deposit box is available. The à la carte restaurant at Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) serves a selection of international cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink by the pool, or in the lounge bar with live music some days a week. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange car rental and provide information on Portals Nous and the surrounding area. There is also an airport shuttle service to Palma, 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous
description: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous is located within Mallorca’s Bendinat Golf Course, 5 km from Palma. It offers a free spa, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free WiFi. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous has colonial-style décor, with African influences. It is surrounded by extensive gardens and terraces, ideal for relaxing. The spa features 2 saunas, a Turkish bath, sunbeds and experience showers. Treatments are available for an extra charge. Overlooking the golf course or swimming pool, each room has flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a seating area. A bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer are included in the bathroom. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous Resort’s restaurants serve gourmet international and Mediterranean-style cuisine. There is also a poolside bar. Free private parking is offered at the Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous. Palma and the Porti Pi Shopping Centre can be reached in 10 minutes by car or bus.

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: Sol Guadalupe
address: Crta. La Porrasa, 4 - Calvia Beach, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Guadalupe is 200 metres from Mallorca’s Magalluf Beach, and offers a 24-hour self-service kitchen for families with babies. It features a large lagoon-style pool with hot tub, indoor pool and 2 children's pools. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a small fridge. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms come with a spacious terrace overlooking the pool, mountains or sea. Sol Guadalupe restaurant offers buffet meals and show cooking in the dining room, which is air-conditioned in summer. There is also an Italian corner and a poolside snack bar. A daytime and evening entertainment programme is provided, including fitness sessions, Tai-chi and yoga. Children have their own playground and mini club. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge. Aquapark is 2 km away and Poniente Golf Club is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Reservations include a free Sol Katmandu Fun Pass with discounts at the Katmandu Theme Park and the Wave House.

name: Aparthotel Alcudia Garden
address: Avinguda De La Platja, 1, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 80 m from the magnificent, spacious and sandy Alcudia Bay Beach, the hotel offers an ideal location for a relaxing holiday, with 2 swimming pools and 8000m² of beautiful gardens. Enjoy a fun-filled break for all the family at the Alcudia Garden Aparthotel, whose spacious, air-conditioned accommodation has a balcony where you can soak up the sun. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Relax in the sauna and hot tub, or spend the time swimming in the sea or the hotel’s pools. Choose from activities including free-of-charge sports such as archery, table tennis and aerobics, or visit the Alcudia Garden’s fitness centre. At night, enjoy performances and shows, including live music in the summer. There is a bar by the pool. Children can have fun at the playground, in the children’s pool, and with the entertainment programme led by the hotel’s monitors. There is also a mini-club for kids aged 4-12. The Aparthotel Alcudia Garden is also set close to s’Albufera, the top Natural Park in the Balearic Islands. You can explore the natural surroundings with a bike rented at the hotel, or head to the cosmopolitan Puerto del Alcudia for a range of activities.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
description: Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status. All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available. Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
description: Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace. Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Seventy Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, Seventy Barcelona is within walking distance of Passeig de Gracia and offers a swimming pool and a sauna. It is steps from Avinguda Diagonal, restaurants and nightlife options. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Amenities include free wireless internet and a coffee bar. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a coffee maker and a flat-screen TV. They provide a private bathroom, an in-room safe and heating. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Barcelona's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Seventy Barcelona, with La Pedrera Casa Mila only a few minutes away. Casa Lleo Morera, the Casa Batllo and Carrer Gran de Gracia are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Intercontinental Barcelona, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Barcelona is the perfect base for enjoying all the culture the city offers. Elegant interiors and sophisticated design details matched with unparalleled hospitality. Nestled in the heart of Montjuic, we are the closest hotel to the stadium. Easily connected to the airport and walking distance to city center Enjoy a drink in our signature bar Gebre, dine at our exclusive Quirat restaurant or take in the magnificent views from our 173 Rooftop Terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel
description: Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel is conveniently located in Barcelona’s Plaza Europa Square, next to the Fira Convention Centre Comprised two 110 meter towers joined by a spectacular panoramic restaurant and a terrace-vantage point with views over the city of W.Architecturally the Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel, highlights a vertical garden oasis of palm trees and lush vegetation. All 357 bedrooms are designed with a two-toned chromatic effect in mind. The hotel has 11 module-based meeting rooms. our Palmer restaurant, Oasis and El Cel are perfect for Business travellers, and couples taking a weekend break in beautiful Barcelona. Marriott Bonvoy guests who book direct receive complimentary WIFI for the duration of stay.Marriott

name: H10 Marina Barcelona
description: H10 Marina Hotel Barcelona is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It offers a gym, spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooftop pool and sun terrace offer fantastic city and sea views. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel H10 Marina Barcelona feature parquet floors and satellite TV. They have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s Dionissos restaurant serves à la carte and tapas meals, and room service is available. Bar La Llum offers an extensive wine list. Access to the H10 Marina’s spa is available for an extra cost. It features a sauna, steam baths and an indoor pool. Massage and beauty services are also available. Bogatell Beach, where you can find many beach bars and restaurants, is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. It is 200 metres to Bogatell Metro, which connects you with central Barcelona in 10 minutes. There is a tour desk and you can hire a car or bicycle. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are offered.

name: Alexandre Hotel Fira Congress
address: C/ de Jose Agustín Goytisolo, 9-11, 08908 L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Catalonia
description: This modern hotel in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a free shuttle service and an executive floor. It features 4-star rooms with views of the city. This contemporary hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Hotel Fira Congress Barcelona offers 160 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Also available are a mini bar, an in-room safe and slippers. Hotel Fira Congress Barcelona is within a 20-minute car trip of Barcelona El Prat Airport and La Rambla. Camp Nou, Placa de Catalunya and Palau de la Musica Catalana are only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Miramar Barcelona
description: Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona. Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design. Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins. The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes. Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub. The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

name: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
description: Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site. Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site. Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Claris Hotel & Spa Gl
description: Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection. Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door. The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork. The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce. The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
description: Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area. Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection. A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

name: Ohla Eixample
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service. Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available. The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar. Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request. Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

name: Acevi Villarroel
description: Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV. Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available for an extra charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace. Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
description: Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium. The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning. Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities. The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available. Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel
description: Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from the hotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
address: Carrer de Deu i Mata 69-99, 08029 Barcelona
description: Created by Pritzker prize-winning architect Rafael Moneo, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza exudes calm elegance. A 15-minute drive from the city center, it is situated in the Les Corts financial district of Barcelona. This is the perfect choice for business travelers, with the Axa Auditorium right next door. Landmarks, such as the FC Barcelona Camp Nou is also close by. NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has 308 rooms, including 7 Junior Suites and 1 Suite. Each has flat-screen TVs, a Nespresso machine and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy contemporary design with polished wood, glass and large windows, along with modern comforts, such as a rain-effect shower and a pillow menu. Breakfast will be the perfect start to your day with a large spread of options, including eggs prepared-to-order and gluten-free dishes. Lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at GoXO Restaurant and accompanied by a cocktail. Enjoy these on a beautiful terrace. For business travelers, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza is the perfect choice, with 11 rooms holding up to 800 guests. To unwind, head to the outdoor 7th floor pool or visit the fitness center and the spa.NH Hoteles

name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
description: Occidental Barcelona 1929 is situated in Barcelona and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Placa d'Espanya. There are a range of facilities available to guests of the hotel, such as a seasonal swimming pool, a coffee bar and meeting rooms.
