Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. Occidental Barcelona 1929 has 152 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Barcelona's attractions, such as Magic Fountain of Montjuic, are within easy walking distance of Occidental Barcelona 1929. Espanya Metro Station is right next door, connecting guests with the local area.Revato

name: Catalonia Mikado
description: This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi. The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops. The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina. Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

name: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
description: Situated in Barcelona’s modernist district on Passeig de Gràcia, Sir Victor's rooms and suites are inspired by the Catalonian lifestyle of sun, sea, and style. A state-of-the-art spa, two restaurants, a speakeasy-style bar, two meeting rooms, a library, and a sensational rooftop pool and terrace bar overlooking major historic buildings round out offerings that attract locals and travelers alike. The rooms are designed with an emphasis on comfort and nature, while the artwork features local standouts, such as Antoni Muntadas and Alfons Borrell.Marriott

name: W Barcelona
description: Step inside. See for yourself. Designed by world-renowned architect Ricardo Bofill, W Barcelona sets the scene for a spectacular stay. W Barcelona is a luxury hotel offering a combination of luxury and comfort in each of its 473 fabulous guestrooms and suites. This 5-star hotel is located on the beachfront along the famous Barceloneta Boardwalk. Each guest room and suite provide panoramic views over the Mediterranean Sea and the city of Barcelona.Marriott

name: Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid
description: Less than 1 km from Mercado San Miguel and a 13-minute walk from Puerta de Toledo, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, spa and free WiFi is available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. The units at Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid have air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid is located in Plaza Mayor, while Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 13.8 km away.

name: Hotel Villa Real, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
description: Set in the cultural heart of Madrid, this luxury hotel has a fine art collection and each elegant room has an LCD TV. Hotel Villa Real is located in the Triangle of Art. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is just 150 metres away. The Puerta del Sol, Plaza Cibeles and the Retiro Park are also nearby. Hotel Villa Real is considered a classic among Madrid’s luxury hotels, decorated with wood and marble. The art collection includes Roman mosaics and Greek ceramics, some from the 3rd Century BC. Rooms at the hotel are soundproofed, and have a laptop safe and a minibar. Some rooms have a sofa or a balcony. The hotel’s East 47 restaurant serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails. The Property is also Dog Friendly.

name: Hotel Urban, a member of Design Hotels
description: This boutique hotel houses a permanent display of art from Papua New Guinea. Hotel Urban has a small rooftop swimming pool and a terrace open in summer, and a cocktail bar. The hotel has beautiful design, and facilities include a gym. The hotel features a gastronomic restaurant: CEBO, with Michelin-starred duet Javier Sanz and Juan Sahuquillo (Oba-) as main chefs. There is also a cocktail-bar on the roof-top terrace "La terraza del Urban", and Cocktail Bar Glass by Sips with barista made cocktails. The décor of the hotel and the rooms includes special lighting, natural wood and stone and Oriental art. All rooms are soundproofed and offer free wired internet, a flat-screen TV and a ChromeCast. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Gallery is 200 metres away. Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s main square, is just 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Princesa Plaza Madrid
description: Princesa Plaza is situated in the west of Madrid, in the Argüelles District. Some of the elegant rooms at the hotel feature a large reproduction of a famous painting from the Museo del Prado. The hotel comes with the Holiday Gym fitness centre, featuring a small indoor pool where aquagym classes are organised. The pool is available for guests over 16. Complimentary fitness classes are offerred, as well as cardiovascular equipment. Rooms at the Princesa are spacious with large windows and come with a seating area. They have satellite TV and air conditioning. Princesa Plaza is close to Plaza España Square, Gran Via Avenue and the Royal Palace. It offers car rental and currency exchange services. The tour desk can provide useful information on the surrounding area. The hotel also gives information about a company that organizes shuttle service at an extra cost.

name: Vp Plaza España Design
description: Located in Gran Via, in Madrid city centre, VP Plaza España Design offers 5-star accommodation with parking, a wellness centre. All rooms in this stylish hotel offer an exclusive décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free WiFi, and a desk with a coffee machine, and a private bathroom with shower and bath tub, including free high-end toiletries and bathrobe. Some rooms include a terrace. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast, or have a meal at Botania, the Mediterranean restaurant located on-site. Guests can also relax after work at the Ginkgo Sky Bar, enjoying the stunning view of Madrid City. VP Plaza España Design offers 1400 square metres of meeting and conference-rooms, as well as green areas and parking. Shops, bars, and public transport can be found within 2-minute walking distance. Metro station Plaza de España is 1-minute walk away, while the Royal Palace or the Almudena Cathedral are 700 metres away from the property. Train Station Principe Pío is 700 metres from the VP Plaza España, while Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 14 km away. Biloba Spa of the hotel: SPA access is reserved for adults and children 13 years old and above. Children must be accompanied by and adult. The cost per entry is 10 EUR, with exceptions for Junior Suite and Presidential Suite guests. Seasonal Pool is temporarily closed.

name: H10 Puerta de Alcalá
description: Situated amongst well-known tourist attractions, shops and eateries, H10 Puerta de Alcala is ideal for guests wishing to discover Madrid and its surroundings. It also offers a coffee bar, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. For trendy travellers a cocktail bar provides a happy setting for an after-meal drink. H10 Puerta de Alcala features 138 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, an in-room safe and a private bathroom are also provided. H10 Puerta de Alcala houses La Galeria, which serves breakfast and presents guests with everything they need for an enjoyable night within the hotel. Lunch, afternoon tea and dinner are served daily at Lobby Bar El Mirador. Madrid's attractions, such as the National Archaeological Museum of Spain, the Monument to Alfonso XII and the Puerta de Alcala, are easily accessible on foot from H10 Puerta de Alcala. Principe de Vergara Metro Station is only a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Ocean Drive Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 700 metres from Gran Via, Ocean Drive Madrid features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Gran Via Metro Station. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ocean Drive Madrid rooms include bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Ocean Drive Madrid include Plaza de España Metro Station, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and Temple of Debod. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Melia Madrid Princesa
description: With views of the Royal Palace, Meliá Princesa is a hotel located in Madrid, 8 minutes’ walk from Plaza España and Gran Via. It offers a gym. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Free access to heated indoor pool for guests. The elegant rooms at the Meliá Madrid Princesa include a safe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The upper floors of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms, with panoramic views over the city or the mountains as well as specific superior services and facilities such as a wellness area. Guests can enjoy elegant and spacious rooms with pillow menu, private check-in and check-out space, Nespresso space with biodegradable coffee capsules, concierge service, a private area with drinks and snacks, private show cooking, and press in the lounge, among others. Mosaico à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine using traditional cooking recipes and seasonal products. Guests can also enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast. Complimentary coffee is offered in the early morning from 05:00 to 07:00. There is also a bar integrated in the reception and a 24-hour room service. Oeste Park and the beautiful Debod Temple are 7 minutes’ walk from the Meliá Princesa. Ventura Rodríguez Metro Station, located next to the hotel, provides links to the centre of town in around 10 minutes.

name: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía
description: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Madrid. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Pestana CR7 Gran Vía Madrid can enjoy breakfast on the outdoor terrace, try an authentic Neapolitan pizza or enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views of Madrid. The accommodation offers a terrace and is the only rooftop with multiple heights and 360° views of Madrid. Popular points of interest near Pestana CR7 Gran Vía include Gran Via, Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria
address: Avenida de la Capital de Espana 10, 28042 Madrid
description: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria is in front of the Palacio de Congresos and just a few steps from IFEMA - Feria de Madrid. Its strategic location makes it perfect for a trip to the capital for business or pleasure. Enjoy its leisure spaces, like the terrace or pool, the excellent cuisine of the restaurant El Patio or Cosmopolitan Bar's special cocktails. Book and toast with us at this upscale hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Garden Inn Malaga
description: Settle into a comfortable and spacious guest room or suite at this Malaga hotel, equipped with everything you need to relax and stay productive. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi at the well-lit, ergonomic desk. Feel at home with a mini-refrigerator, adjustable air-conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities, and a spacious bathroom with complimentary toiletries. Browse Freeview channels on the flat-screen TV, and get a great night's sleep in the plush bed, which is dressed in clean, crisp linens. Host your next corporate event or social function at this Malaga hotel with 300 sq. m. meeting space, including a divisible ballroom - ideal for important business meetings, stylish cocktail receptions and unforgettable weddings for up to 250 people. Find everything you need to stay productive in the 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Make the most of your leisure time at this welcoming new hotel in Malaga. Exercise with the latest cardio and resistance equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or plunge into the sparkling outdoor pool. Dine on Spanish specialties and international favorites in the relaxed Garden Grille restaurant. Unwind in our stylish Lounge, or enjoy a selection of cocktails, beers, wines and light bites on the sunny outdoor terrace. Buy snacks, drinks and sundries at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry®, or order something tasty and convenient from our room service menu.Hilton

name: Vincci Seleccion Posada Del Patio
address: Pasillo Santa Isabel No. 7, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Posada del Patio is 5-star hotel, situated in the centre of Málaga, with a rooftop swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. It features a fascinating exhibition of historic objects. All rooms come with welcome products, a safe and a flat-screen TV. They feature a contemporary design and include a modern bathroom. Vincci Selección Posada del Patio also offers the exclusive Essence experience, with rooms located separately on an independent floor. Some of the services offered for these rooms include a daily bottled water, national and international daily press, and a private terrace. Snacks and beverages are also available. Important archaeological remains have been found beneath the Vincci Selección Posada del Patio. These include part of the city's Arabic walls, which guests can visit from the hotel. Restaurante Entremuros serves nouvelle mediterranean cuisine. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The hotel also has a stylish bar. The Posada del Patio is just 10 minutes’ walk from the AVE high-speed Train Station. The Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are 500 metres away.

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: Barceló Margaritas
address: Avenida Gran Canaria, 38, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Barceló Margaritas hotel (formerly Occidental Margaritas) is located in Playa del Inglés, one of the most famous tourist areas in the south of the island of Gran Canaria. A free shuttle bus to Playa del Inglés and the Maspalomas Dunes is offered by the hotel. Renovated in winter 2021, the Barceló Margaritas Hotel is characterized by its wide range of services and numerous facilities: a renovated lobby with reception, two pools, one of which is a completely new family pool with swimming lanes, 2 pool bars, a nudist roof terrace, a completely renovated buffet restaurant with various themed areas, lifts and free WIFI. Its 322 modern and bright rooms are designed to give our guests an unforgettable vacation. They have air conditioning, satellite TV with flat screen, safe and minibar for a fee, balcony, fully equipped bathroom with rain shower. In the hotel you will also enjoy a day and night animation program, as well as a fitness center, and a new and complete open-air Margaritas Crossfit for functional and high-performance training with a personal trainer. We offer a diverse and varied animation program for children from 4 to 12 years in our mini club and playground. With the All-Inclusive and All-Inclusive Plus programs, guests can enjoy exclusive services. Additional services: • WIFI FREE •Currency Exchange • Car rental (for a fee) • Bicycle rental (for a fee) • Doctor (for a fee and on request) • Laundry (for a fee)Official Hotel Information

name: Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey
address: Calle Doctor Jose Naveiras, 38, 38004 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: This stylish, urban hotel with a spa is located in a colonial-style building. Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey offers spacious rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar’s smart rooms feature hardwood floors and a modern décor. In-room amenities include satellite TV and a mini bar. Some rooms have a balcony with city views and a private bathroom including a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer. Los Menceyes restaurant at Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey serves a variety of local dishes. It is open for breakfast and dinner. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s Bar Casino or in the lobby bar. The hotel is situated in a quiet residential area, just 50 metres from García Sanabria Park. It is just 5 minutes’ drive from the ferry port with regular crossings to the other islands. Tenerife North Airport is 14 km away. There are several bus stops within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Private parking is available at a location nearby for an additional cost.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Vanilla Garden Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avda. Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 5, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Vanilla Garden Hotel is located in Playa de las Americas. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, electric kettle, and a balcony. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower. A safe is available for an extra charge. There are a buffet restaurant and a bar. Guests can enjoy a taste of French cuisine at the a-la-carte restaurant Chez Damien. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. Veronicas Strip is a 3-minute walk from Vanilla Garden Hotel, while Siam Park is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Mar
address: Avenida de El Castillo, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Quality and comfort with a Canary Island soulThe Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa hotel is built on Caleta de Fuste Beach. Basking in the tranquillity of the bay it offers the perfect destination for unwinding with the family. Its proximity to the marina also makes El Castillo a great place to discover new sports and leisure.It has 462 rooms that are spacious and full of natural light in a modern functional style. The rooms are also fully equipped so that guests have everything they need to enjoy their holiday to the full. Parents have the tranquillity of taking their children to the modern childrens miniclub that has a pirate theme or to the magnificent theatre with daily shows. Couples and groups of friends can enjoy the endless variety of water sports and outdoor activities on offer as well as the hotel restaurants bars and its famous thalassotherapy centre unique in Fuerteventura where they can have the latest type of treatments. The Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is designed so that its guests can discover new experiences while they enjoy the beautiful surroundings peaceful beaches and welcoming locals or while they simply sit back and enjoy their holiday in this privileged location.Barcelo.com

name: Gold by Marina - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Estados Unidos, 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Gold Playa del Ingles - Adults Only is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés. This modern hotel has a spacious pool area with stylish design, 2 pools, a hot tub and lots of loungers. The air-conditioned rooms at this adults-only hotel feature cool, white décor with turquoise details. Each one has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a mini-kitchenette with a hob, microwave and toaster. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace, and some have sea views. The hotel's restaurant serves an extensive daily buffet breakfast until 12:00. You can enjoy lunch by the pool, and the bar serves cocktails. The hotel's large Planetarium chill-out area with suspended orbs hanging from the ceiling and is a great place to relax with a cocktail. The lively Yumbo Shopping Centre is just 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. You can walk to Maspalomas Sand Dunes in around 10 minutes.

name: H10 Taburiente Playa
address: Calle de Los Cancajos, 36, 38712 Breña Baja, La Palma
description: Hotel Taburiente Playa is 300 metres from Los Carcajos Beach, on La Palma’s east coast. It offers 3 outdoor pools and free parking, as well as a sauna and tennis courts. All air-conditioned rooms at H10 Taburiente Playa have a private balcony and satellite TV. A safe is available for an extra charge. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers show cooking and serves international food. There are also 3 bars, including a poolside snack bar and a salon bar with live music. Room service and packed lunches are available. The coastline around the hotel is popular for scuba diving, and there is a diving centre next door. You can drive to La Palma Airport and Santa Cruz de La Palma, the island’s capital, in 10 minutes.

name: Barceló Tenerife
address: Avd. Grenamora, No. 1, Urb. San Blas, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Tenerife has 331 fully equipped rooms; a buffet restaurant; La Proa gourmet restaurant; four bars and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; handball and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness areaBarcelo.com

name: Iberostar Selection Anthelia
description: Stop at Hotel Iberostar Anthelia to discover the wonders of Tenerife. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, 24-hour front desk. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of dart board, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, hot spring bath. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Tenerife, Hotel Iberostar Anthelia will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Iberostar Bouganville Playa
address: Calle San Eugenio Dominguez, 23, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz De Tenerife, Spain, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Iberostar Bouganville Playa is situated on the seafront promenade of San Eugenio, just 200 metres from the Playa del Bobo Beach. Rooms enjoy sea views from their private terrace. Free premium high speed WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel features 3 outdoor pools surrounded by a sun terrace with loungers. It also includes a gym. Diving and snorkelling are popular in the area. The main restaurant at Iberostar Bouganville Playa serves traditional Canarian and international cuisine. The hotel also features a pool bar. Puerto Colón Marina is located nearby where guests can enjoy boat trips and fishing excursions. The nearest golf course is 3 km away. There is free limited public parking nearby.

name: Iberostar Selection Sábila - Adults Only
description: Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only is located on Fañabe Beach on Tenerife’s Costa Adeje. It has large gardens. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All rooms at Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only come with a balcony, as well as a private bathroom with hairdryer. There is also satellite TV in each room. Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant as well as a selection of bars. These include the lobby bar with terrace and a poolside bar serving snacks and drinks. Guest will find a gourmet market on-site offering a unique gastronomic experience enlivened with music. The hotel offers a gym and the Spa Sensations offers a spa circuit and health and beauty treatments. The hotel is just 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto Colón, an area full of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Tenerife South Airport is a 20-minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Barceló Corralejo Sands
description: Offering an outdoor pool, children’s pool and sun terrace, Barceló Corralejo Sands is situated in central Corralejo, 600 metres from Corralejo Beach. The property offers 2 on-site restaurants and a spa. The spa offers a variety of treatments, an indoor pool with water jets, Turkish baths and sensation showers. There is also an on-site fitness centre. As well as the main restaurant, there is a poolside restaurant for snacks, and another bar with evening entertainment. The hotel also has a children’s mini club. Each modern, air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with free toiletries. Barceló Corralejo Sands features free WiFi throughout. Corralejo Port, with ferry services to Lanzarote and Lobos Island, is a 5-minute drive from the property. Corralejo Dunes are also a 5-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 40 km from Barceló Corralejo Sands.

name: Gara Suites Golf & Spa
description: Located in Playa de las Americas, 1 km from Siam Park, Gara Suites Golf & Spa offers amenities including an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Offering a garden, the property is located within 1.3 km of Piramide de Arona convention centre. The tour desk is available to assist guests in planning their days out. Featuring a terrace, all guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves a variety of Mediterranean dishes. Gara Suites Golf & Spa offers a children's playground. Speaking German and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Safari Shopping Centre is a 16-minute walk from the accommodation, while Chayofa is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 14 km from the property.

name: Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park
description: This beachfront hotel is situated a short walk from the bay of Playa Flamingo, enjoying impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean around Lanzarote. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Rooms at Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park feature a TV and the bathroom includes free toiletries. Beach towels, bathrobe and slippers, a Nespresso Coffee machine, kettle and free safe are provided in the Star Prestige rooms. This hotel features 4 outdoor swimming pools for adults and 3 for children. There is a free gym and sun terrace with sun loungers. The spa, available for a surcharge, includes a sauna, a hammam and a hot tub. Timanfaya National Park is 20 km from Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park, and a 30-minute drive will take you to Lanzarote Airport.

name: Iberostar Grand Salomé - Adults Only
description: These luxury suites on the Costa Adeje all have a balcony and a hot tub. Grand Hotel Salomé has a Spa Sensations, wellness centre and a modern gym. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. This boutique hotel has a large outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by a sun terrace and a pool bar. There is also a tennis court. The Grand Hotel Salomé has a huge outdoor relaxation area, with armchairs and sea views. The hotel restaurant also has a terrace with sea views. The hotel is set between Duque and Fañabé Beach in Tenerife. The area is ideal for diving, golf and windsurfing. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a bathrobe. 50 meters from the beach. Costa Adeje all have a balcony OR TERRACE and a hot tub. This boutique hotel features a large outdoor pool AND INFINITY POOL.

name: Barceló Santiago - Adults Only
address: Calle La Hondura, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: The hotel is situated in the area of South Tenerife that has the most beautiful landscapes with unique views of the island of La Gomera and the cliffs of Los Gigantes. Recently renovated this unique and attractive hotel has a wide variety of facilities for your complete relaxation. Enjoy large and comfortable rooms with sea views its 3 swimming pools one of them heated its spa and direct access to the beach from the hotel only 200 m away. In addition lovers of good food will enjoy the hotels fabulous cuisine ranging from the most traditional to the most international of cooking.Barcelo.com

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje
description: Set in Adeje, 600 metres from Playa Las Salinas, Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are an ATM and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje features some units with sea views, and each room includes a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, darts and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. Playa del Puertito is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Playa El Pinque is a 14-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 27 km from Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje.

name: Paradise Park Fun Lifestyle Hotel
description: Paradise Park Fun Lifestyle Hotel is ubicated in Los Cristianos in the south east end of the island of Tenerife, very close to Costa Adeje and Playa de las Americas. These are three of the most recognized touristic areas and is known for its excellence, pleasure ant entertainment is guaranteed. It has also become a reference for family tourism thanks to our facilities. If you are looking for a family hotel in Tenerife where you can enjoy a family vacation to the fullest. Despite being an unrestricted hotel for adults only, among the hotel facilities you will find Adults Only spaces where you can enjoy the tranquility, comfort and relaxation so characteristic of an adults only hotel in Tenerife.FarePortal

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: Hotel Melia Bilbao
description: Next to the Bilbao Estuary and just a few metres from the iconic Guggenheim Museum and the Euskalduna Palace, our 5-star hotel is the ideal place to relax and savour true Basque gastronomy. A modern hotel, designed by the prestigious architect Ricardo Legorreta and paying homage to the work of the Basque sculptor Eduardo Chillida. Travel to Bilbao and live a comprehensive experience. Meliá Bilbao, with its elegant avant-garde architecture, provides comfortable rooms and suites with fantastic views. Enjoy the Aizian Restaurant serving the most delicious classics of Basque cuisine with local and organic produce, and end your day in our Wellness Centre equipped with a gym, sauna and semi-covered swimming pool with heated water and mountain views. And if you are travelling for work, you can hold all kinds of meetings and events in our meeting rooms."

name: Occidental Bilbao
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Bilbao is an urban hotel designed to provide maximum comfort. The strategic location of the hotel just a few minutes from the historic centre makes it the perfect base for visiting the main tourist attractions. It has good transport links with the airport and train station. Its 200 modern rooms have been designed to ensure that you have the most comfortable stay. For those seeking tranquillity the hotel offers an exclusive Spa area and a heated indoor pool extra charge. Whats more the hotel offers meeting rooms for holding events and conferences. The Occidental Bilbao hotel is the perfect place to discover the impressive modern architecture of Bilbao and of course its delicious local cuisine. This Basque city offers an array of cultural activities streets full of charm and the biggest indoor market in Europe the Mercado de la Ribera.Tourism Registry HBI00337Barcelo.com

name: Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao
address: Gran Vía de Don Diego López de Haro, 73, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set in Bilbao, 600 metres from San Mamés Metro Station, Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from San Mamés Stadium. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao provides some units that feature a balcony, and each room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. The hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao include Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora - Adults Only
address: Calle La Costa, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: This adults-only oceanfront complex offers a personalised butler service in all rooms. The outdoor pool has Balinese beds and hydromassage loungers. Each room has a private terrace with ocean or garden views. The Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora is an exclusive private area of the Gran Melia Palacio de Isora. Guests have access to all hotel facilities, including a wide range of international restaurants, 8 bars, including a beach bar, a lagoon-style infinity pool, sun terrace and tennis courts. Each spacious, elegant room at the Red Level comes with a coffee machine, an iPod dock and free WiFi. Bathrooms include a hydromassage shower and an over-sized bath tub. The exclusive Red Level lounge offers free tea and coffee all day. It also includes a poolside bar service and a business centre. There is direct access to Alcalà Beach from the hotel. 40 minutes’ drive from Las Cañadas del Teide National Park, and 35 minutes from Tenerife Reina Sofia Airport. The centre of Alcalá is a 10-minute walk away. Please note that all guests at this hotel must be 16 years old or older.

name: Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje
description: Located on Duque Beach, Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje overlooks the island of La Gomera. Set around 2 outdoor swimming pools, this luxurious hotel offers a spa and rooms with balconies. The Gran Tacande has bright, attractive décor and spacious rooms. with views of the surrounding mountains or the hotel gardens. Some also have sea views. Gold Level rooms feature access to San Sebastian Exclusive Plaza private area, including an infinity pool and a whirlpool with 8 seats. The Zurrón Buffet Restaurant serves International and themed cuisine, while the Bocana Beach Club specialises in Mediterranean dishes. Both have terraces offering ocean views. The Gran Tacande also has a cocktail bar on the rooftop, the Azotea Sunset Bar. The hotel's spa offers hydrotherapy, massage and a range of beauty treatments with an extra cost. There is also a gym with free access and a hairdresser’s. The surrounding Playa de Fañabe resort has a selection of shops and bars. Costa Adeje Golf Resort is 15 minutes’ drive from the Gran Tacande.

name: Labranda Suites Costa Adeje
description: LABRANDA Suites Costa Adeje is located in a coastal area that bears the same name and is one of the main tourist spots on the island of Tenerife, next to Playa de Las Américas-Los Cristianos and Puerto de la Cruz in the Spanish Canary Islands. Very close to the hotel is the Blue Flag beach of Playa Fañabé where guests can enjoy various aquatic activities. The hotel is also near several shops and restaurants for families, couples, groups of friends or solo travelers to explore. Rooms at LABRANDA Suites Costa Adeje are distributed in two areas: Family and Only Adults. Each has been designed for a specific type of traveler. Therefore, guests with families have their section and adult only type travelers have their own. The space for families has facilities that entertain both adults and children. Amenities for children include a play area, splash park, pool and sports area. The hotel also has a stage where family and kid friendly entertainment can be enjoyed. This portion of the hotel is also home to the Meepo Club, Kids & Teens Club and includes amusement arcade room. The adults only section seeks to provide this distinct group of guests with a truly relaxed vacation. Amongst the unique facilities in this section is a well-structured outdoor space with Balinese beds, a solarium and pool. This section also offers a more refined food & beverage proposition to suit this consumer segment. The adults-only rooftop area provides guests with an exclusive space that includes showers and a bar service from where they can enjoy magnificent sunsetsOfficial Hotel Information

name: Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife
address: Avenida JM Galván Bello, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Situated in San Miguel de Abona, 1.5 km from Playa de San Blas, Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife include Playa Grande, Playa San Miguel de Abona and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Oceano Health Spa Hotel
address: Calle Océano Pacifico 1, 38240 Punta del Hidalgo, Tenerife
description: Just 1 km from the centre of the peaceful fishing village of Punta del Hidalgo, OCEANO Hotel Health Spa features an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a medical spa. The hotel is surrounded by a garden with palm trees, and the Anaga Mountains. You can enjoy fantastic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Mount Teide from the balconies of the studios and apartments. All have a fully-equipped kitchen. The hotel’s spa and F.X.Mayr Centre offer a professional team of doctors and therapists to help you relax and rejuvenate. Treatments include osteopathy, massages, shiatsu and natural cosmetics, with many taking advantage of the natural healing powers of seawater (in the heated saltwater swimming pools). There is also a gym designed for low-stress workouts. You will find shops and restaurants in Punta del Hidalgo, and staff are happy to give you more information about sights and activities in the surrounding area, including guided visits and historic walks. Santa Cruz de Tenerife Ferry Terminal is about 30 km away.

name: Hotel Hacienda Del Conde a Meliá Collection Hotel
address: Paseo Severiano Ballesteros, Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi, 3 restaurants and 2 pools, Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only is a luxury hotel located in Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife. This adults-only property has a spa centre and hot tub. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a furnished terrace, flat-screen TV with international channels, seating area with a sofa, and walk-in closet. The luxurious bathroom comes with a bath, walk-in shower, hairdryer, VIP toiletries, and double vanities. The property has an 18-hole golf course, designed by Severiano Ballesteros, as well as a free fitness centre and banquet rooms. The spa includes a thermal circuit, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free parking is provided. Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only offers bike parking, wash station, bicycle workshop and personalised cycling routes. Tenerife South Airport is 70 km from Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only.

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Sh Valencia Palace
address: Avenida Paseo De La Alameda 32, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi. SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away. There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Melia Valencia
description: This modern Melia hotel is next to Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos Congress Centre and 5 km from the AVE Train Station. Beniferri Metro Station is just 400 metres away. The spacious rooms feature contemporary design and offer spectacular views and a 49' flat-screen satellite TV. All are air conditioned and have free WiFi and modern bathrooms. The hotel has a play area for children. Meeting rooms are available. Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level rooms and exclusive services, such as a private check-in and check-out area, exclusive buffet breakfast, daily snacks and drinks in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities in the hotel. city. Manises International Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive from the Melia Valencia. The hotel's Socarrat restaurant specializes in Valencian paellas, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. The Oval Bar has a small snack and drink menu for every hour of the day.

name: AZZ Valencia Táctica
description: Located just 10 minutes’ drive from Valencia’s Congress Centre, Hotel Táctica provides air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. The rooms at the Táctica feature parquet floors. Each one has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s cafeteria serves drinks and snacks. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The hotel offers a charging station for electric vehicles, available for an extra charge. The Recinto Ferial de Valencia Exhibition Centre and Heron City Shopping Centre are within 2 km of the property. The hotel is 7 minutes’ drive from Valencia Airport and 15 minutes from central Valencia.

name: Hospes Palau de La Mar
address: Avenida de Navarro Reverter, 14, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Hospes Palau de La Mar features a striking lobby, a spa and restaurant. Located in Valencia's Eixample Noble district, it is a 15-minute walk from the city's AVE Railway Station. The Hospes Palau de la Mar has elegant, modern rooms with queen-size beds and marble bathrooms. Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. These include an interior patio. Traditional recipes using local produce and fresh fish are available at the gourmet restaurant. The Palau de la Mar’s Spa has 3 massage and treatment rooms. A hot tub, a sauna and a Turkish bath are also included. There is also a small gym. Valencia’s cathedral and surrounding old town are within 10 minutes' walk of the Hospes Palau, while the City of Arts and Sciences is 2 km away. There is also easy access to the Lonja, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Hotel Albufera
address: Plaza Alqueria de La Culla, 1, 46910 Valencia, Valencia
description: Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and an indoor pool. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a ballroom. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.#Optional fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for buffet breakfast: EUR 8 per person (approximately) Airport shuttle fee: EUR 57 per vehicle (roundtrip) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Policies: Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 1000, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. One child 3 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Tourism Certified (Spain). Instructions: Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property Guests booked in Half Board or Full Board rate plans do not receive drinks with their meals. Additional fees apply. Special instructions: This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Minimum age: 18. Check in from: 4:00 PM. Check in to: midnight. Check out: 12:00 PM. House Rule: Children welcome. House Rule: No pets. House Rule: No smoking.Expedia

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: Mercure Algeciras
description: The Mercure Algeciras hotel is located 5 minutes from the center of Algeciras, the city's port and Rinconcillo beach, 20 minutes from Sotogrande and 30 minutes from Tarifa. Its 73 modern and sophisticated rooms are equipped with all the necessary comforts to make sure you enjoy an unforgettable stay: Free WIFI, fitness center and classes, restaurant with indoor courtyard, buffet breakfast and bar/cafe. Ideal for visiting Los Alcornocales Natural Park or beaches like the one in Getares.accorhotels.com

name: Odyssey Rooms
description: Situated in Alicante, 200 metres from Postiguet Beach and 400 metres from the centre, Odyssey Rooms Alicante features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a rooftop pool. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and a bath or shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city or quiet street views. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at Odyssey Rooms Alicante. The wellness area at the accommodation is comprised of a public bath, a solarium and an open-air bath. A bicycle rental service is available at Odyssey Rooms Alicante. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Alicante Train Station, Alicante Museum of Contemporary Art and Explanada de España. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 17 km from Odyssey Rooms Alicante.

name: Hospes Amerigo
description: With beautiful views of Alicante Cathedral and Santa Bárbara Castle, Hospes Amerigo’s free rooftop spa features a sauna, pool and gym. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. This elegant design hotel is set in a 19th-century Dominican Convent in Alicante’s old town, 300 metres from Postiguet Beach. Hospes Amerigo is within 50 metres of the cathedral and Alicante Town Hall. Stylish room at Hospes Amerigo have high ceilings and large windows. Some rooms feature abstract silk paintings. In summer, guests can enjoy the views from the rooftop lounge bar, situated next to the open-air pool.

name: Hotel Suites del Mar by Melia
description: Suites del Mar by Melia is part of Spa Porta Maris Hotel complex. There is free WiFi, and free use of the Sanarium Circuit and Non-heated outdoor pool on the 1st floor with fantastic views. Its junior suites are elegant and have a furnished terrace with superb views over the Marina or the sea.They have seasonal heating and air conditioning (centralized system). There are 2 Smart TVs with USB input. The modern bathroom comes with free toiletries, a shower, a double washbasin, a magnifying mirror, and a hairdryer. There is also a bathtub near the bed Discover The Socarrat restaurant where you can taste a wide variety of rice dishes as well as tapas and local gourmet dishes. With a privileged location and fantastic sea views, enjoy the finest cocktail options as well as our full breakfast buffet served at “Socarrat” breakfast room, both with fantastic sea views. The junior suites are 300 metres from Alicante’s central Explanada Avenue.The hotel offers therapeutic massage services and a new urban spa at a special price for guests staying. On-site parking is available for a supplement.

name: Eurostars Palacio Buenavista
description: Eurostarts Palacio Buenavista has been beautifully integrated into a 16th century palace. It is located in Buenavista, only a 5-minute drive from the centre of Toledo. There is free Wi-Fi in reception. It is a pleasure to stroll through the elegant gardens around the hotel. The rooms are fully-equipped, the hotel boasts outstanding Spa facilities for an extra cost, and an open-air swimming pool should you wish to sunbathe. There are also 14 modern function rooms for meetings and a wide culinary offering of traditional Spanish cuisine in the restaurant. Visit local vineyards to sample regional flavours. You cannot miss the opportunity to visit this Unesco World Heritage site, an ideal place for relaxation.

name: Alma Pamplona
description: Alma Pamplona features a spa with an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and gym. This modern design hotel includes elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi and a large flat-screen TV. Hotel Alma Pamplona Muga De Beloso has a peaceful setting in Navarra, with wonderful mountain views. The hotel is near San Juan de Dios Hospital, just 2km from central Pamplona. This historic city is famous for its San Fermin Festival. The Alma Pamplona has a stylish restaurant and a bar. The 24-hour reception can arrange airport transfers and car rental. There is free private parking on site. Guests can also rent bicycles to explore the countryside. Rooms at the hotel are spacious and bright, with climate control and a minibar. The private bathrooms are decorated in neutral colours and include a selection of toiletries.

name: Hospes Palacio del Bailio
address: Calle Ramirez De Las Casas Deza, 10-12, 14001 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: This 5-star hotel occupies a 16th-Century palace in the heart of the ancient city of Córdoba. It has an outdoor pool set in pretty gardens. The elegant rooms of the Hospes Palacio del Bailio fuse past and present. Some include original wall paintings, and all have flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Rich materials such leather and velvet are used throughout the hotel. The bathrooms are particularly luxurious. The Palacio del Bailio offers plenty of space to relax. You can unwind in the flower garden or on the sun terrace surrounded by orange trees. Alternatively, you can enjoy a range of treatments at the hotel's exclusive Bodyna Spa. The hotel's restaurant, Arbequina, offers a mix of Spanish and Asian cuisine. The hotel is located 1 km from Cordoba Mosque-Cathedral, the third largest Mosque in the world and a World Heritage Site.

name: Eurostars Sitges
address: Av. Cami De Miralpeix, 12, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean sea and the Terramar Golf Club, Eurostars Sitges is 2 km from the beach in Sitges. Free WiFi and free parking are available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a private terrace with views, a flat-screen TV, a laptop safe, a minibar, a tea/coffee maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The property provides restaurants, bars, a chill-out lounge and a boutique restaurant. Guests can enjoy à la carte fine wine, dining, snacks and cocktails. Eurostars Sitges offers a wellness centre with a spa, an indoor pool, a hot tub, a sauna and a steam bath for an extra charge. Therapies and beauty treatments are also available. A 24-hour reception and a tour desk services are provided at the property. Guests have free access to the 24-hour fitness room. Sitges centre is 3.5 km away from the property. Guest can reach Eurostars Sitges within 25 minutes by train from Barcelona International Airport and within 50 minutes from Barcelona city centre.

name: Hotel M.A. Sevilla Congresos
description: Located next to Seville’s Fibes Exhibition Centre, M.A. Hotel Sevilla Congresos features a restaurant and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Sevilla Airport is 4 km away. All air-conditioned rooms in this hotel have satellite TV, safe, and minibar, plus a private bathroom with a bath and shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. The property´s reception is open 24 hours a day, and it offers a concierge service. There is also a business centre and free daily newspapers are available. M.A. Hotel Sevilla Congresos is a 10-minute drive from Santa Justa AVE Railway Station. The historic city centre, where you can find Plaza España Square and Sevilla Cathedral, is 6 km from the property.

name: Wellington Hotel & Spa Madrid
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, the elegant Wellington Hotel in Madrid’s Salamanca district is just 100 metres from Retiro Park. It has a spa with sensation showers and a hot tub, available for an extra charge. The air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms at the Wellington all have free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safety deposit box. The marble bathrooms have bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms include a Nespresso® coffee machine and electric kettle. The hotel has a free, well-equipped fitness area with a range of cardio equipment. There is also a sun terrace with loungers. The hotel’s renowned Kabuki restaurant offers delicious sushi while Goizeko Wellington restaurant offers gourmet Basque cuisine. There is also a coffee shop and an English bar. On the 7th floor, guests will find the Wellington Club, a private lounge area with a terrace and stunning views of the city. This exclusive lounge includes an complete library with a seating area, hi-speed WiFi service, and a 60-inch flat-screen TV.There is also a snack bar room with unlimited food and drinks. A select cigar menu is available. This hotel is just 5 minutes’ walk from the boutiques of Paseo de la Castellana, and Prado and Thyssen Bornemisza museums are within 6 minutes by car. Retiro Metro Station is just 250 metres away. The property offers an airport shuttle for a surcharge.

name: H10 Porto Poniente
description: Located next to the seafront promenade at Poniente Beach in Benidorm, the H10 Porto Poniente offers 2 plunge pools with sea views. The on-site adults-only Despacio Spa Centre includes a heated swimming pool and a gym. Its elegant rooms are bright and air-conditioned. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. There is free WiFi available throughout. The hotel also features the Tortuga Restaurant and the Marea Alta Rooftop Bar offering sea views. There are 3 meeting rooms, all with natural light. Private parking with an electric vehicle charging point, including Tesla, can be arranged at an extra charge. Register number HA-1539

name: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center
address: Ctra. Arcos, km. 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is part of the Barceló Montecastillo Hotel & Golf Resort, near the Jerez Formula 1 Track and 5 minutes’ drive from Jerez Airport. It features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a spa. The large, bright rooms at the Jerez Montecastillo come with their own private balcony, as well as air conditioning. Facilities at the Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center include tennis courts and a fitness centre, available for an extra charge. The modern spa at Barcelo Montecastillo has a hot tub, a sauna, Turkish baths and a hydrotherapy circuit. There is also an 18-hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. Access to both the spa and the golf course also carry an additional cost. Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast at El Lagar restaurant, which also serves lunch and dinner. Swimming pools and catering services are shared with another hotel located in the resort. These facilities are located 200 metres from Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center. Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is well located for the A-4 and the A-382 Motorways. The city of Jerez can be reached in 5 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa
description: Set in large gardens, 5 minutes' drive from central Toledo, Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa offers free Wi-Fi, a paying spa, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each room has a private balcony. All rooms at the Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa are air conditioned and spacious. They have wooden floors, a 43-inch flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa Hotel has a buffet restaurant and an à la carte restaurant, offering seasonal dishes. There is also a poolside bar, a disco and a children’s play area. Available for a supplement, the spa contains a hydrothermal circuit with contrast showers, a sauna and an ice fountain. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa is located 5-minute drive from Toledo’s old town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Buses to the town centre stop 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Higueron Hotel Malaga, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Located in one of the most exclusive areas of Málaga, Higuerón Hotel Málaga, CURIO Collection by Hilton is a benchmark in exclusivity, a resort where luxury finds its maximum expression and excellence takes on a new meaning. A journey through the most cultural, culinary and artistic aspects of Málaga. 290 bedrooms and suites carefully designed to cover the most demanding needs of guests. Including the new suites in which exclusivity becomes the norm, opening up a world of disconnection, such as our Picasso Suites, duplex rooms with outdoor jacuzzi, solarium and Balinese beds. An unforgettable experience in our prestigious sport club, 24-hour gymnasium & our renowned NagomiSpa. 6 restaurants, which take diners on a trip around the world. A journey that begins with the local flavours of the area at Chupadeo and continues at MED. A culture based on flavour, starting at exclusive Sollo Restaurant, awarded a Michelin star. A strategic location with direct access to the beach thanks to our curious tram, which will also take you to the train station, from where you can travel to Málaga International Airport and the provincial capital city centre in just a few minutes.Official Hotel Information

name: URH Sitges Playa
description: All rooms at the URH Sitges Playa have a private balcony and air conditioning. All include a spacious and elegant bathroom, safe, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Amanit Restaurant offers a unique fusion, the best of Balinese and Mediterranean food facing the sea. The URH Sitges Playa has a fitness center and a massage area (subject to availability and upon request). It also offers airport shuttle service and private covered parking for a daily fee.

name: Meliá Sitges
description: Melia Sitges is set in a quiet area of Sitges, just 3 minutes’ walk from Balmins and Aiguadolç beaches. The hotel features a stylish garden with an outdoor pool, and a restaurant with a terrace. The Meliá Sitges is 5 minutes’ walk from Aiguadolç Marina and 15 minutes’ walk from the lively town centre. It is a 20-minute walk to the train station, which connects you with central Barcelona in just 40 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá feature modern, minimalist decor. Each one has a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The Bistrot Saffron restaurant serves modern Mediterranean food. There is also a stylish cocktail bar with modern seats in the garden.

name: Hotel Sunway Playa Golf & Spa Sitges
address: Paseo Marítimo De Sitges 92-94, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: This hotel is just 20 metres from Sitges Beach and next to Terramar Golf Course. It offers free bicycle rental, 2 pools and accommodation with free Wi-Fi, private balconies and fantastic views. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Playa Golf and SPA have tiled floors and satellite TV. The apartments have modern kitchens with a hob, microwave and washing machine. The Playa Golf has its own supermarket, and there is also a fitness centre and a games room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. The Sunway Playa Golf and Spa has a spa and it offers a hamman, sauna and massages at an extra cost and an indoor pool with a hot tub free of charge. The Sunway Playa Golf and SPA complex has 3 restaurants offering a range of Mediterranean dishes. There is also a bar offering views over the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can use the hotel's free bicycles (subject to availability) to explore Sitges, with the town centre a 10-minute ride away. Barcelona can be reached easily by car, via the C32 motorway, or by train from Sitges station.

name: Hotel MIM Sitges
description: Just 120 metres from Sitges Beach, Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa features a spa and a rooftop seasonal pool. Its stylish rooms have contemporary décor and some offer sea views. Each spacious room at Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa has air conditioning, a TV and minibar. The hotel provides beach towels for a refundable deposit. The hotel restaurant serves a range of both local and international cuisine. The rooftop sky bar offers sea and mountain views. Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa's Spa features a sauna, steam bath, sensation showers, leisure pool and heated beds where you can access with special discount. There is a 24 hour gym with free access for all guests. Sitges’ seafront promenade is just a few metres from the hotel. The town’s railway station is a 10-minute walk away and here you will find regular trains to Barcelona, 40 km away.

name: Catalonia Hispalis
description: Catalonia Hispalis offers good-value accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access. This modern hotel is near to Seville Airport, and has good access to the historic city centre. The hotel has air-conditioned rooms with exterior views, free Wi-Fi and interactive satellite TV. The en suite bathroom has a hairdryer. The Catalonia Hispalis has a restaurant, serving international cuisine. There is also a café-bar. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Hispalis Hotel is next to the E-5 motorway and there is a bus stop to central Seville directly opposite the hotel. Santa Justa Train Station and the Fibes Convention Centre are just 2 km away.

name: Mama Shelter Roma
description: Mama Shelter Roma is your home away from home in the heart of Rome. Our neighbourhood hotel is nested a few steps away from the Vatican treasures. Whether you are here for work or play, local or just passing through the capital, Mama Roma will look afteryou. With cutting edge design elements, Mama Shelter Roma houses 217 bedrooms. With several private atelier style meeting rooms, bars and restaurants, a rooftop with a solarium, outdoor Garden Bar and a pool, Mama Roma will both spoil and inspire you.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's
description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's is on the historic Via Aurelia Antica, 5 km from the Vatican and very close to the lush Villa Pamphili Park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This Crowne Plaza is surrounded by its private park. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. The spa is free for all guests as well as the 2 tennis courts and the outdoor swimming pool, open during the summer and featuring a pool bar. There is also a free fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Rooms are spacious and come with modern furnishings. The buffet breakfast is American-style. The restaurant is open all day long and serves delicious, Italian cuisine. During summer meals are served on the terrace. There is also a business centre. Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's offers free parking. A scheduled transfer service to/from Rome Fiumicino Airport is arranged on request, at extra costs. Buses stop outside the hotel and there is a taxi station on site.

name: The Hub Hotel
description: The Hub Hotel offers a free panoramic fitness centre, indoor swimming pool and a free shuttle to Molino Dorino Metro Station. The property is 10 minutes’ drive from both the A4 and A8 motorways. During trade shows, a free shuttle to Rho Exhibition Centre is available upon reservation. Rooms feature minimalist and essential décor. They come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a tea/coffee maker. The bathroom includes a hairdryer. Hotel Hub offers free WiFi throughout the property, as well as a free internet point with computers. It also has a stylish lounge bar and a gourmet restaurant.

name: NH Collection Milano Citylife
description: As its name suggests, the four-star NH Collection Milano CityLife is located in the desirable and trendy CityLife area of Milan. As a result, it’s nestled between skyscrapers, luxurious residences and high-end shopping malls. Plus, it’s only 100 meters away from the nearest metro station, which puts Milan’s top sights in easy reach. Set within an old church, the hotel expertly blends old and new, with original features sitting alongside new installations. Here, old columns and ornate features meet a panoramic rooftop pool. The hotel offers 185 guest rooms and suites. Finished in a modern style, several of these spaces also benefit from terraces or city views. In addition, guests also have access to a well-equipped gym, a rooftop pool and a beautiful terrace. At mealtimes, guests can enjoy the food at the hotel’s restaurant. Freshly-prepared breakfasts are served in the morning, and famous dishes and innovative gourmet creations take center stage in the evening. Plus, the hotel also benefits from two bars with extensive wine and cocktail lists, including a stunning rooftop bar by the pool. Events, meetings and weddings can be held in the hotel’s well-appointed event spaces, and the largest of these can seat up to 520 guests.NH Hoteles

name: Novotel Milano Linate Aeroporto
description: The Novotel Milano Linate is a 4-star hotel near the airport, Tangenziale Est and Rogoredo station. Accessible by car, it offers a parking for a fee, shuttle to/from the airport and car docking stations. Free WIFI and swimming pool, business center with bright rooms for hybrid meetings and coworking spaces, and a large outdoor garden.accorhotels.com

name: Bulgari Hotel Milano
address: Via Privata Fratelli Gabba 7b, 20121 Milan, Milano
description: Bulgari Hotel Milano is probably the most refined and exclusive establishment in Milan, a boutique property adjacent to the most important shopping street, Via Montenapoleone. The comfortable rooms overlook the Bulgari's magical garden and the neighbouring Botanical Gardens. Enjoy a blend of modern designs with high technology features. A wonderful spa with an indoor swimming pool is the ideal to unwind after a busy day in Milan. Glass mosaics, gold and emerald green design and special lighting effects, enhance the relaxing atmosphere of the spa. At the heart of the Bulgari Hotel Milano, the extensive bar faces out to the gardens, with the restaurant stepped right behind. Spend pleasant moments in the establishment's most sociable area. Spacious and wide, refined and friendly, here you can enjoy wines, cocktails and fresh Italian cuisine with a cosmopolitan clientèle.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Venice Mestre San Giuliano
description: A convenient base on the mainland of Venice, the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Mestre offers modern accommodations within easy reach of the airport, motorways and the many islands of Venice. This hotel is ideal for guests with a cruise or flight leaving from Venice, or who prefer to leave the crowds behind after a day of exploring the city. Private transfers are available, and guests can catch a ten-minute bus ride to Venice at the station across the street. Rooms are spacious, tastefully decorated and fully equipped with modern conveniences. Enjoy the outdoor pool, modern fitness room and on-site restaurant with terrace seating and a selection of fine wines.Official Hotel Information

name: Voco Venice Mestre - The Quid
description: voco® Venice Mestre - The Quid is a short distance from the Veneto Region’s main airports, Marco Polo (VCE) and Treviso (TSF). Ideally located just two minutes’ drive from the A4 motorway it has great access to Venice Island and Mestre city centre, and some of Venice’s key business hubs including the Commercial AEV Terraglio area and the Venice Exhibition Centre. From AM to PM, you’ll have the space you need to relax, socialise, and enjoy yourself. Active your body by working out in your room or in our gym and then spend some well-deserved me time in rooms with cosy bedding. With event and meeting spaces for up to 260 people ideal for any occasion, make your mark with the help of our warm and welcoming hosts. We serve international and local Italian specialities and drinks in our restaurant and bar to ensure that your lunches or dinners are a roaring success and something to remember during your stay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center
address: Via Antonello da Messina 45, Aci Castello, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: Where You Want to Be. Blue skies and smiling faces greet you at the Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center, located on the breathtaking Cyclops Coast. Stroll across the street to the rocky beach and admire beautiful views. Visit Catania's celebrated sites, just 6 miles away and explore the rich history of Acireale and Taormina, at the foot of Mount Etna. This place offers the perfect combination of local hospitality, art and enviroinment. At the fON Art Gallery, art reigns supreme thanks to the great job of Fondazione Oelle. Fully accessible to all, even people with reduced mobility, the hotel offers 166 guest rooms and suites and all the amenities to enjoy your sicilian journey. After a full day, recharge in the fitness center, in the tennis court, in the wellness and beauty area of Arantia Rubra, take a dip by the pool or by the sea deck or dine surrounded by lemon trees sitting on the Chef's Table of our Horto Vegetable Garden for a unique taste experienceMarriott

name: Palazzo Tirso Cagliari MGallery
description: Palazzo Tirso Cagliari. Refined 5 star hotel, with 85 rooms, 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 1 Spa by l Occitane, 1 gym and 3 meeting rooms. Do not miss the view from its rooftop of the medieval city and the Gulf of Angels. In front of the marina, close to the cit y center, starting point to visit the main tourist attractions. A 10-minute drive will take you to the famous Poetto Beach.accorhotels.com

name: Ville Sull'Arno
description: Ville Sull'Arno offers accommodation in Florence, right on the banks of the river Arno. It features a restaurant and a free wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms here will provide you with a minibar, satellite channels and cable channels. All include an electric kettle and a private bathroom with slippers. Some have river views. The restaurant serves traditional Tuscan cuisine with a modern twist. It has rustic décor and some tables come with panoramic views. At Ville Sull'Arno you will find free bikes. Other facilities offered include a free shuttle service to/from Florence, ticket service and luggage storage.
