The hotel is 2.3 km from Piazza della Signoria, 2.9 km from Santa Maria Novella and 2.4 km from Palazzo Vecchio. Guglielmo Marconi Airport is 85 km away.

name: Plaza Hotel Lucchesi
address: Lungarno Della Zecca Vecchia 38, 50122 Florence, Tuscany
description: Beautifully positioned on the banks of the Arno River, the Hotel Plaza Lucchesi has 10 suite rooms and 82 rooms. The fully renovated hotel offers its guests an exclusive rooftopbar and pool with a breathtaking view of the city, as well as restaurant, bar and guest service desk. Parking availble on site.iHotelier/iStay

name: Grand Hotel Des Iles Borromees
description: This majestic property in Art Nouveau style includes indoor and outdoor swimming pools and a spa. It is on the shores of Lake Maggiore in Stresa, opposite the Borromean Islands. Grand Hotel des Iles Borromées & SPA offers elegant rooms with LCD TV and marble bathroom with spa bath. Some rooms have views of the garden and the Alps, some overlook the lake and the islands. The Grand Hotel's wellness centre is complete with indoor swimming pool, hot tubs and saunas. Beauty treatments and massages are available. The restaurant serves regional cuisine, and guests can dine on the terrace in summer. The hotel also has a stylish piano bar. Breakfast is a generous buffet, served daily. The hotel is located on the central Corso Umberto I promenade. Free parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Sirius
description: The Sirius is a small hotel in a quiet location, 1 km from the centre of Taormina and the pedestrian area of Corso Umberto, full of shops and restaurants. It features charming views of the local bays, and offers a free shuttle service to some beaches. All rooms at the Sirius Hotel offer air conditioning and satellite TV with Sky channels from April to October. Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel for free. The hotel's panoramic restaurant serves excellent Sicilian and international cuisine. The beautiful beaches of Mazzarò and Isola Bella can be reached in 15 minutes. The cable-car station is only 200 meters away from Hotel Sirius. During summer the hotel may only be bookable for long stays of 3 or more nights.

name: Imperiale Palace Hotel
address: Via Pagana, 19, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: An elegant, 19th-century villa, lush gardens, a private beach, and a spectacular view across the bay, these are just some of the reasons to choose Imperiale Palace Hotel. Once the residence of a noble family, this impressive villa has now been turned into a luxury hotel. It has a panoramic location in Santa Margherita Ligure, 5 km from Portofino and 3 km from Rapallo. Your room comes with air conditioning and Satellite TV, and some have a beautiful sea view. Throughout the summer you can relax on the private beach or at the sea-water pool with sunbathing terrace. You will also find a fitness centre, which includes a Turkish bath and a massage room. The Imperiale Palace features modern conference facilities with a maximum capacity of 200. The restaurant with sea-view terrace provides a special setting for a candlelit meal. In summer, lunch is served on the beach in the form of a rich buffet of local specialities and fresh fish.

name: Brach Paris
description: Brach Paris is set in the 16th arr. of Paris within easy reach of the Eiffel Tower and Trocadéro. This Parisian 5-star hotel features a fitness club with pools, sauna, hammam and massage rooms, as well as a barber shop. Guests can participate in group fitness classes free of charge and private coaching is available for a fee. The bright and spacious rooms and suites are fully equipped with high quality sound system and soundproofing. They feature tailor-made toiletries, high quality bedding, a dressing room and an elegant desk. Some rooms and suites offer a terrace and views over Paris and Haussmanian facades. Brach Paris offers breakfast each morning. The restaurant proposes healthy dishes inspired by Mediterranean cuisine à la carte 7 days a week, all day long. Guests can also taste some pastries created by Yann Brys, Meilleur Ouvrier de France (winner of a prestigious award in France) from the pastry shop and late-night cocktails. The reception is available 24/7 with a large terrace located on the first floor. Brach also offers private limousine services, valet parking and a concierge service who can arrange a variety of services throughout Paris. Other facilities include a business center and 24-hour room service. The nearest airport is Paris Orly Airport, at 21 km from Brach Paris. Charles de Gaulle Airport is 30 km away.

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Belfry Spa by Ligne St Barth
address: 66 Rue De La Grotte, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 50 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day on the slopes, you can enjoy recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a sauna. This Belle Époque hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and bike storage. You'll be on the slopes in no time with the ski shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Belfry Spa by Ligne St Barth in Lourdes, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 15-minute walk of Basilica of Our Lady of the Rosary and Lourdes Wax Museum. This 5-star hotel is 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Basilica of the Immaculate Conception and 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Massabielle Grotto. Dining For lunch or dinner, stop by Hotel Belfry, a restaurant that specializes in Italian cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
address: 320 Avenue Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, (Gps address: 256 Av Perouse), (Gps address: 256 Av Perouse), 13100 Aix-en-Provence, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Located in the heart of the city, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel is a 5-star haven for business and leisure travel. Unwind amid beautifully appointed rooms and suites with contemporary amenities and distinctive décor, inspired by the symbols of Provence. Savor distinctive cuisine from our talented chefs, who creates a gourmet rendezvous in the restaurant Atmosph'R, the lounge bar l'Avant Scène and our seasonal garden terrace restaurant and bar le "Palm's", just facing the outdoor heated pool. Celebrate and create any kind of events with 800 square metres of sophisticated meeting rooms, sun-kissed terraces with the last technology. Explore some of the most compelling attractions in France, energize in our fitness center and refresh in our sparkling pool. After a full day of business or sightseeing, find your balance with a massage, beauty treatment or wellness therapy at our spa. Designed as a genuine art gallery, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel is the perfect home base for your visit to France.Marriott

name: Chateau de Challanges
description: Château de Challanges is a renovated 19th century country house set in 7 hectares of forest. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, just 2 minutes from the A6 leading to the south of France. The guest rooms and suites at Château de Challanges are elegant in style and offer high ceilings. Some have a private balcony and some are decorated in an original style according to their historical name. Breakfast is served in the bright breakfast room or on the terrace overlooking the grounds. Guests may have a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include bicycle rental and Beaune is a 15-minute ride away. The chateau also has a conference room with a stucco ceiling, free Wi-Fi access and private parking on site.

name: Best Western Premier Hotel de la Paix
description: The Best Western Premier® Hotel de la Paix is located in the heart of Reims, in an exceptional setting, a stone's throw from the Cathedral, the Conference Centre, and shops. Our establishment, which combines modernity and cultural heritage, possesses soundproof and air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The hotel also features a bar with a private terrace and an indoor swimming pool and the onsite Restaurant Cafe De La Paix which offers seafood & fish specialties as well as menus that vary according to the season. Parking arrangements must be made prior to arrival. Extra fee will apply.bestwestern.com

name: Heliopic Hotel & Spa
address: 50 Place de l'Aiguille du Midi, 74400 Chamonix, Haute-Savoie
description: Set in Chamonix-Mont-Blanc, Hôtel L'Heliopic Sweet and Spa features a 500-m2 Spa, ice cave, indoor swimming pool, Two Hammams and sauna. Guests can buy ski passes, rent ski equipment from the on-site shop and enjoy direct access to the L’Aiguille du Midi Cable Car. Children up to 13 years old are allowed to visit the spa accompanied by an adult every day from 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Offering free WiFi and a balcony with mountain views, the guest rooms come with an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, bathtub and slippers and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Every morning, breakfast at Hôtel L'Heliopic Sweet and Spa can be enjoyed in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests can sample local gastronomic cuisine at the restaurant Akashon, awarded with a Michelin Bib Gourmand. They can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the terrace. Beauty treatments can be arranged at an extra cost and guests can also relax by the fireplace in the relaxation area. Chamonix Train Station is a 10-minute walk away and free public bus services can transport guests to the slopes. The nearest ski lifts are 1 km away at Le Brevent.

name: Château de Perreux, The Originals Collection
description: See hotel page In the Indre-et-Loire department, in Nazelles-Negron, near Amboise, Olivier Fructus welcomes you to his hotel Chteau de Perreux, The Originals Collection. This 19th century castle, nestled in a 4-hectare park, is home to 11 elegant and comfortable rooms and suites. With its swimming pool, huge park and fixed price menu, this hotel is an invitation to disconnect, relax and enjoy the art of living in the Loire Valley.iHotelier/iStay

name: Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port
address: Quai Louis Prunier, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: The Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port is a renovated hotel that is ideal for work and leisure trips. To help you relax, our hotel in La Rochelle has a pool with a large terrace, a bar and panoramic restaurant, Gaée, which has a view of the old port and La Rochelle's towers. Guests can enjoy a tasty breakfast and innovative menu that showcases regional maritime dishes combined with fresh and local products.accorhotels.com

name: Château de Bellefontaine
description: Located 800 metres from central Bayeux and its cathedral, this 18th-century mansion offers guest rooms and a traditional restaurant open for dinner upon reservation. The park has a tennis court and a pond, and is planted with 200-year-old trees. Each room is individually decorated and feature a minibar, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower. Some rooms have a seating area. Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning at the Château de Bellefontaine. A continental breakfast can also be delivered to your room at a reduced rate. After breakfast, you can use the computer with internet access in the lounge, which also features a fireplace. Bayeux Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and free public parking is available on site.

name: Le Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: 3 Rue Lafaurie De Monbadon, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Located at the heart of Bordeaux’s historic centre, Le Boutique Hotel is an 18th-century town house surrounding a lush, green courtyard. It offers a 140 m² terrace shaded by a 100-year-old chestnut tree, a Rooftop, a 2.5x7m half indoor swimming pool, a sauna and hammam. The air-conditioned rooms and apartments at Le Boutique Hotel feature an LCD satellite TV, and a Nespresso coffee machine. A continental breakfast is served every morning. On sunny days, guests can enjoy a drink from the wine bar on the terrace while using the Wi-Fi access. Place Gambetta is 1 minute walk from the hotel and Quai Louis XVIII is 850 metres away. Guests benefit from a reduction at the public parking situated 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Ermitage De Corton
address: Route De Dijon D974 Chorey, 21200 Beaune, Bourgogne
description: The Ermitage de Corton is located in the Chorey-les-Beaune countryside and features an outdoor swimming pool. Guest rooms at the Ermitage de Corton are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can enjoy regional cuisine prepared with seasonal produce, at the Ermitage’s restaurant. There is also a bistro which opens onto a panoramic terrace. The Ermitage de Corton is located on the border between the famous Côte de Beaune and Côte de Nuits and guests can explore the nearby vineyards. Free private parking is available on site and it is secured during the night.

name: Chateau d'Audrieu
description: Gaiety and elegance are the two words which automatically spring to mind to describe this magnificent 18th-century chateau, a listed building set amongst exquisite French gardens and parkland. Ever since becoming a hotel in 1976, Audrieu is a fine example of good taste and the symbol of the French art of living. Period fireplaces and furniture give a personal touch to this ancestral home. Stay in one of its suites and rooms, some of them with original wainscoting, and enjoy a combination of luxury, space and comfort. Treat yourself to superb, innovative cuisine in the gastronomic restaurant. For your utmost pleasure, the hotel also boasts a design bar serving light dishes as well as salted or sweet "croques en bouche" to go with your drink, served inside or on the terrace. Unwind in the hotel's charming gardens or take a dip in the heated outdoor swimming pool. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: InterContinental Bordeaux - Le Grand Hotel
address: 2-5 Place de la Comédie, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Nostalgic French decor and UNESCO World Heritage architecture set the scene for your stay at InterContinental Bordeaux – Le Grand Hotel. We have 13 elegant meeting rooms, Le Bordeaux restaurant, a bar, a rooftop and a gourmet restaurant inspired by Gordon Ramsay. You can also relax in the indoor swimming pool or book a massage in the Guerlain Spa.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Crowne Plaza Montpellier - Corum
description: Elevate your stay at Crowne Plaza® Montpellier - Corum. Conveniently located at Montpellier's most prominent venue,  Corum Montpellier, our hotel provides the perfect place for business and leisure travellers. Explore Montpellier attractions near our hotel, such as Place de la Comedie, Opera Comedie, and Cathedral St-Pierre . Discover fun things to do at the Historical Centre, Faculty of Medicine , Arc De Triomphe , and the Fabre Museum. Relax and stay productive in our modern rooms with plush bedding, your own workspace, and high-end  amenities. Plan your meetings in our flexible event space, enjoy casual dining at Maxens or savour a drink by the pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel de la Cite Carcassonne - MGallery Collection
address: Place Auguste Pierre Pont, 11000 Carcassonne, Aude
description: The 5-star Hotel de la Cité is a jewel in the MGallery collection, a magical 19th-century neo-Gothic masterpiece in medieval Carcassonne. There are 46 rooms and 13 suites, an outdoor pool and a shaded park. This is a hotel where hospitality goes hand in hand with exclusive gourmet cuisine by our chef Jérôme Ryon in the Barbacane restaurant, along with superb views from the terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Villa Maïa
address: 8 Rue du Professeur Pierre Marion, 69005 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Located on Fourvière Hill in Lyon and offering panoramic views over the city, Villa Maïa features an indoor heated swimming pool, a hot tub, a steam room and a fitness room. The indoor pool offers views of the garden which was designed by the landscaper Louis Benech. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and valet parking is available on site. The property is a 10-minute walk from the old town and a 5-minute walk from The Ancient Theatre of Fourvière. All rooms, suites and apartments are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV. A courtesy minibar is offered in each room. Certain rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, entirely made of Carrara marble, where you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. The toiletries were created especially for Villa Maïa with the scent of garden flowers. A buffet or continental breakfast is offered every morning and includes organic jam, eggs from local farms, crepes, waffles, pancakes and French toast. Gluten-free products are available. The continental breakfast can also be served in the guest rooms. Room service is available 24/7 and you will find a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service at the property. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. The property is in partnership with the 1-star Michelin Têtedoie restaurant, located a 1-minute walk away, and guests can reserve a table directly at Villa Maïa. The Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is 400 metres from Villa Maïa, while Place des Terreaux is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 20 km from the property. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property. Villa Maïa has a partnership with the 1 star restaurant Michelin Têtedoie, which is 1 minute walk away, and can book a table for you.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
address: 33 Avenue du Petit Port, 74000 Annecy, Haute-Savoie
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy. The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost. Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost. Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire Hotel & Spa
description: Set in 5-hectare park with vineyards and Olive trees, Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire is a hotel decorated in an elegant style. The property was built in the 18th property and includes spa facilities as well as 2 swimming pools. The rooms and suites at Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire have a minibar, an LCD TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A kettle is available in the rooms. A gourmet-style restaurant is available on site and offers meals made with seasonal and local products. A homemade buffet breakfast is also available daily and you can enjoy a drink at the bar. Children under the age of 8 benefit from free breakfast. Other facilities are available such as a sun terrace, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access, available throughout. The spa facilities include a steam bath, a sauna and a fitness centre. The hotel is situated 10 km from Sainte-Victoire Mountain and 6 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence. There is free, private car park on site which does not require reservation. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Le Hameau Albert 1er
description: This hotel is located in Chamonix Mont-Blanc and provides a free shuttle service to the ski slopes. It offers indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and wellness centre and free Wi-Fi. The property is divided into 2 buildings, L'Albert 1er and La Ferme. Each cosy room at Le Hameau Albert 1er has a private bathroom, satellite TV and includes bathrobes and slippers. The hotels has a gastronomic restaurant which serves traditional cuisine and a restaurant serving traditional Savoyard specialties. The hotel also offers a wine cellar and a bar. The wellness centre includes a hammam, hot tub, sauna and various massage and body treatments. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Chamonix SNCF train station and free private parking is available.

name: L'Impérial Palace
address: Allée de l'Impérial, Annecy, Franceee de L' Imperial 39, Annecy, Haute-Savoie
description: Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided. Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room. The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast. The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre. Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: Hotel de Bourgtheroulde Autograph Collection
address: 15 Place de la Pucelle, 76000 Rouen, Normandy
description: The Hotel de Bourgtheroulde and Spa is a 15th century listed historic property in the heart of the ancient capital of Normandy, Rouen, home of the Vikings in France, fiefdom of William the conqueror, Henry II Plantagenet, Richard the Lion Heart and the site of the burning of Joan of Arc.This boutique hotel features a 700sqm Spa and houses an indoor 18/9m swimming pool, steam bath, sauna, gym and 8 treatment rooms.A fine dining restaurant, a bar in the atrium or the historic courtyard complete the experience.5 function rooms for up to 300, extensive public areas, a perfect location in the city center, 5mn walk from the railway station, the Cathedral, Museum and all places of interest in the historic area Rouen is one hour from Paris on the way to Dday beaches and Mont St Michel, on the main motorway from the Chunnel to the south of France and at the heart of the Impressionists favourite sites.Monet and Pissaro painted extensively in Rouen and around.Marriott

name: Hotel Chateau De La Tour
address: 10 Avenue Font de Veyre, 06150 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 33 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hotel Chateau De La Tour in Cannes, you'll be near the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Cannes Harbour and Promenade de la Croisette. This 4-star hotel is 1.9 mi (3 km) from Palace of Festivals and Conferences and 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from Sophia Antipolis. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between November 1 and April 1. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.95 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 17 for adults and EUR 9 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 130 per vehicle (roundtrip, maximum occupancy 1) Secured self parking fee: EUR 20 per day Pet fee: EUR 10 per pet, per day Service animals are exempt from fees Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 10.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Le Provençal
address: Rue du Petit Barail, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Hôtel Le Provençal is just a 5-minute walk away from the Bordeaux Congress Centre, Bordeaux Exhibition Centre and Matmut Atlantique Stadium. It offers free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and an on-site restaurant. The rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. Each room is equipped with free WiFi, air-conditioning and a TV with cable channels. Guests may enjoy a breakfast buffet with homemade pastries every morning, and until 11:00 on Saturdays and Sundays. The hotel restaurant is open for lunch and dinner by reservation, offering a buffet and à la carte dining options. A 2-minute walk from Parc des Expositions Line C tram stop, the Hôtel Le Provençal is 6 km away from the Bordeaux city centre. A casino, bowling alley and a large shopping centre are located 800 metres away.

name: Novotel Bordeaux Lac
address: Avenue Jean Gabriel Domergue, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: The NOVOTEL Bordeaux Lac offers you a chance to unwind. Enjoy the terrace, the lake view and the heated pool, just minutes from the historic center of Bordeaux. Try our restaurant menu's homemade cuisine made from local produce. Keep the family entertained with our children's area. For business travelers, our hotel is close to the city's business hubs, and has 11 meeting rooms and a coworking space.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Nice
description: Featuring a private beach and free Wi-Fi, Radisson Blu Hotel Nice is situated in Nice and offers modern accommodation. It features panoramic sea views and 4-star rooms. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of Hotel Radisson Blu Nice, including express check-in/check-out, free shuttle service and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. It also has a gym with a swimming pool. The rooms at Radisson Blu are air-conditioned and include converters/voltage adaptors, an in-room safe and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's living area. During their stay at Radisson Blu Hotel, guests can dine at Calade rooftop restaurant and relax with a drink at Lobby Bar 223. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Radisson Nice provides on-site parking for guests with a car. Promenade des Anglais is a short drive away.Revato

name: Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice
description: Located in Nice's City Centre, Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice is a 4-star hotel just 600 metres from the Promenade des Anglais. The seasonal rooftop swimming pool and hot tub offer panoramic mountain and city views. The spa features a hammam and guests also have free access to the fitness centre and the sauna. The air-conditioned, non-smoking guest rooms and suites are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. All rooms include free WiFi access. Most rooms feature a balcony and some have a spa bath. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks in the bar. A buffet breakfast is also served every morning. With private parking on site for an additional charge, the hotel is just 7 km from Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport. Casino Ruhl is a 3-minute drive away.

name: Boscolo Nice Hôtel & Spa
description: Located in central Nice, this Belle Époque-style hotel features an indoor swimming pool. Guests have free access to the 500m² spa and fitness centre. It also has a billiards hall and is situated under a 10-minute walk from Promenade des Anglais. The hotel is non-smoking throughout. The spacious guest rooms are decorated in shades of white and gold and include air conditioning. They each offer a minibar, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Breakfast is served every morning on the terrace or, with an extra cost, in the comfort of guest rooms. The hotel offers a panoramic rooftop terrace with a heated swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar. The Old Town is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Nice Train Station is 700 metres away. Boscolo Exedra Nice provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk.

name: Intercontinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, An IHG Hotel
description: The epitome of luxury, the InterContinental Marseille-Hotel Dieu is located in Marseille’s historic Panier district. You can enjoy a pastis aperitif on the terrace with views of Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica before dining on Mediterranean dishes in the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. Work out in the fitness room, swim in the indoor pool, or unwind with a treatment in the chic SPA by Clarins. Five minutes’ walk away, boats line the quay of the Vieux-Port, in the heart of the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Demeure Les Mouettes
description: Ideally located in the gulf of Ajaccio, with direct access to a small beach, Hôtel-Demeure Les Mouettes is a charming 19th-century house. Stay in one of the hotel's large rooms, some with terraces providing superb views of the gulf. For your convenience, rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and mini fridges. Take a refreshing dip in the hotel's private pool or in the clear blue waters of the Mediterranean sea before resting in the shade of palm trees. Local cold meats and cheeses are available throughout the day for those wishing to enjoy some of the best local flavours without leaving the hotel's sunny terrace.

name: Hôtel La Pinède
description: La Pinède sits between the sea and mountains, on the Îles Sanguinaires coastal road. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with flat-screen cable TV, free Wi-Fi and private terraces. Guests are invited to relax in one of the loungers by the swimming pool. There is also a business corner with a printer. A breakfast buffet is served every morning in the breakfast room from 06:30. It is made from typical Corsican products. La Pinède works toward protecting the environment by offering organic toiletries, solar panels, water saving devices and a charging station for electric cars. For guests coming by car, free private parking is available.

name: Mercure Ajaccio
description: Located right in the centre of the town with direct access to both the station and the airport, the Mercure Ajaccio offers very comfortable rooms with all amenities, with a view over the pleasure port. To start the day off well, enjoy a delicious breakfas t on the panoramic terrace overlooking the gulf of Ajaccio. Benefiting from a special position, right by the beaches and the Palace of Congresses, this hotel is the right address for business and leisure trips.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Restaurant & Spa L'Ostella
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 52 guestrooms featuring espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bastia? This hotel has facilities measuring 3660 square feet (340 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hôtel Spa Restaurant l'Ostella in Bastia, you'll be in the business district, within a 5-minute drive of L'Arinella Beach and Citadel. This 4-star hotel is 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Bastia Vieux Port Marina and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Church of St-Jean-Baptiste. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Bastia, a bar/lounge which specializes in Mediterranean cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.32 per person, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 22 per person Pet fee: EUR 15 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Rollaway bed fee: EUR 25.0 per day A facilities fee includes use of: sauna The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. The hotel offers cribs for babies up to 3 years old and rollaway beds for children under 13 years old (subject to availability). Children under 16 years old are allowed in the pool and spa 7-10 AM and 1-4 PM and must be accompanied by an adult. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Essential workers only - NO Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Poretta
description: Located in Lucciana, Hotel-Poretta is just a 3-minute drive from the Bastia-Poretta International Airport and a 10-minute drive from the beach. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and offers rooms with loggias. Free WiFi is available throughout. The guest rooms at the Hotel-Poretta feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and large bathrooms. Each is air-conditioned and accessible by a lift. Hotel-Poretta is situated in Lucciana, 20 km from Bastia, which has ferry services to Marseille, Nice, Toulon, Livourne and Gênes.

name: Hotel Castel Brando
description: In the picturesque, seafront village of Erbalunga is the Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa. This authentic 19th century private house sits in its own grounds and offers charming accommodation. The family-owned Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa presents a peaceful backdrop to your Corsican holidays. The rooms are all en suite and propose bright and spacious living spaces. The Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa offers a range of teas, homemade cakes and delicacies. You can enjoy those in the library lounge or, in the summertime, on the shady patio or park planted with 100-year old palm trees and lime trees. Guests can also enjoy some Mediterranean food at the Les Américains restaurant on-site.

name: Hotel Villa Joséphine
description: Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in LʼÎle-Rousse. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. At Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine you will find a restaurant serving French, Mediterranean and local cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around LʼÎle-Rousse, like hiking. Popular points of interest near Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine include Napoleon Beach, Nautique Beach and Caruchettu Beach. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel & Restaurant Les Mouettes
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Belgodere, Hôtel & Restaurant Les Mouettes is within a 10-minute drive of Agriate Desert and Place Paoli. This spa hotel is 5.1 mi (8.3 km) from L'Ile Rousse Beach and 5.2 mi (8.4 km) from Ostriconi Beach. Dining You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Hôtel & Restaurant Les Mouettes, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 0.80 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 17 for adults and EUR 9 for children Pet fee: EUR 15 per pet, per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Lodge De Charme A Cheda
description: Surrounded by a large garden, A Cheda is located at the entrance of Bonifacio. From April to October, guests can make use of the heated outdoor pool and hot tub. Other spa facilities include a sauna and body treatments. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has elegantly and individual decor with exposed beams and stone walls. They are equipped with a terrace overlooking the garden, flat-screen TV with DVD player and free WiFi. A Cheda’s restaurant offers gourmet Mediterranean cuisine made with local products and organic ingredients. Meals can be served in the chic dining area or beside the pool. A cookery workshop with the hotel's chef is available on site. For families with small children, a baby kit can be provided. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the outdoor terrace. Guided tours and boat trips can be organised. The hotel is a 7-minute drive from the Sperone golf course and a 15-minute drive from Figari Sud Airport.

name: Hotel Kasano
description: Set in Calvi, 400 metres from Roncu Beach, KASANO & Spa features views of the sea. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and bar. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Pinède Beach is less than 1 km from KASANO & Spa, while Alga Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Campo di Fiori, Maisons de Charme
address: Route De Pietra Maggiore, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Located 600 metres from Calvi centre, Campo di Fiori, Maisons de Charme provides rooms, villas and studios decorated in an elegant and traditional style and set in a 3000 m2 garden. Guests can relax at the bar, around the barbecue area or in their air-conditioned accommodation. Most accommodation types feature a private terrace and include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All have an equipped kitchenette with a Nespresso coffee machine. A brunch including pasta salad, Corsican jams and French pastries is available at a surcharge and upon request. Guests can also request a typical breakfast and grocers can be found within 200 metres. Other facilities are available such as laundry service, free WiFi access in all areas and a free private car park. The property is located 300 metres from the beach and 600 metres from the harbour.

name: Hôtel le Subrini
address: Place de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Hôtel le Subrini offers a seasonal outdoor pool a 4-minute walk away in another property. It is located on the west coast of Corsica, 500 metres from the beach and has views of Porto Genoese Tower. Each air-conditioned guest room has a sea view and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and free Wi-Fi access. All of the modern rooms have a spacious bathroom including a hairdryer. Guests of Hôtel le Subrini benefit from reduced rates for boat excursions around the UNESCO heritage site of Scandola Nature Reserve, the Calanques de Piana and Girolata village. Free private parking is available on site at Hôtel le Subrini and there is a garage for motorbikes. The harbour is 300 metres away and boat trips can be arranged.

name: Castellu Rossu
description: This Corsican hotel is located in Lucciana, 2 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport and 15 km south from Bastia. It is set in a large park and features a large outdoor pool, a tennis court and free Wi-Fi. The hotel consists of 2 buildings, the Castellu Rossu and the Castellu. Each guest room is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. The rooms also have private bathrooms. Some have a terrace or a balcony with garden views. The Rossu is a 15-minute drive from the sea and 25 km from Saint-Florent. Guests can go golfing 3 km away. For guests coming by car, free private parking is available.

name: Hotel Olmuccio
description: Hotel Olmuccio is located in Olmucciu, 20 km from Porto-Vecchio and 49 km from Bonifacio. The hotel has an outdoor pool, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Each room includes a private bathroom. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 44 km from the property.

name: U Libecciu
address: Route de la Plage, 20248 Macinaggio, Haute-Corse
description: The U Libecciu is a 100 meters away from the beach, and close to the Port de Plaisance and the Marina de Macinaggio, in the north of Cap Corse. The hotel has an outdoor heated swimming pool and offers free internet Wi-Fi connection and a free private secure parking. All the U Libecciu's rooms are functional. They are air conditioned and have a balcony or terrace.

name: Hotel L'Acquale
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the town centre of Calvi and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is 500 metres from the port and 800 metres from the white sandy beach. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms feature a balcony with a view. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel L'Acquale features a lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also order breakfast à la carte. Free, secure, covered parking garage is available on site. The property is 7 km from Calvi Sainte-Catherine Airport.

name: B&B Auberge Belle Terre
address: Rond-point de Lecci - Lieu dit La Croix, 20137 Sainte-Lucie-de-Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located in Lecci, a typical Corsican village, this bed and breakfast features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and a shaded garden with tables and chairs. Beaches are a 10-minute drive away. With a simple but modern décor, each room at Belle Terre is equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries. Linen, towels and daily housekeeping are provided for free. Homemade biscuits are served in the buffet breakfast, which can be also enjoyed on the terrace. Traditional dishes are proposed at the restaurant and fresh bread is taken every day from the bakery located next to the property. Casteddu d’Araghju is 5 km away and Cavu natural pools are 6 km away. Porto-Vecchio is a 15-minute drive away and Figari Sud-Corse Airport is 35 km away. The owner strongly recommends a car and free private parking is possible on site.

name: Confidentiel hôtel
address: 1090 Avenue du Colonel Brooke, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Located between Cannes and Saint-Tropez, Le Confidentiel Hotel is located in the Valescure district of Saint Raphaël and just a 10-minute drive from the beach. The establishment was completely renovated in 2021, the rooms of the Confidentiel Hotel are air-conditioned and equipped with a SmartTV as well as free Wi-Fi, a courtesy tray with coffee, tea, chocolate, safe and mini bar. Each room has a bathroom with a shower and some also have a bathtub. Private and free parking is available in the property. From September 2021, the private SPA of the Confidential Hotel will be open, by reservation and at additional cost. It will have a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna. The restaurant is currently closed due to the sanitary situation, but a catering service is available upon reservation, 24 hours in advance. Guests are invited to enjoy a cocktail at the bar or on the terrace. The outdoor swimming pool open in season. The hotel is also close to the Estérel forest and a golf course.

name: Hôtel Font Mourier
description: Set in a pine forest overlooking the gulf of Saint-Tropez, Hôtel Font Mourier offers free WiFi access, a tennis court and a heated outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has modern décor and a private terrace or garden with a view of the pine forest or the plains of Grimaud. They have a private bathroom with a bath. The restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and a buffet breakfast daily. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or in the garden. Hôtel Font Mourier offers many activities, ranging from water sports, hiking and wine tours. Hôtel Font Mourier is situated only 2 km from the beach at Port Grimaud, 4 km from Saint-Tropez and 6 km from the Pampelonne beaches.

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Hôtel Beau Site - Cap d'Antibes
address: 141 Boulevard John Fitzgerald Kennedy, Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Beau Site is located in a residential area, 3 km from central Antibes and a 5-minute walk from La Garoupe beach. It offers free WiFi access and a pool. Hotel Beau Site’s soundproofed guest rooms are individually decorated and have air conditioning as well as a partial sea view and views of the mountains or the garden. The Beau Site hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. This can be taken in the dining room, on the outdoor terrace, or in the guest room. Guests have exclusive access to the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool. Hotel Beau Site offers bike hire. Paid private parking is available for guests exploring the Cote d’Azur region by car. Cannes is 15 km from the hotel and Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is 14 km away. Juan-les-Pins is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Juana
description: Listed as a historic monument, this 5-star hotel is located in Juan-les-Pins, 260 metres from Belles Rives Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool with solarium, a fitness centre and a sauna. A flat-screen TV, minibar and free WiFi access are just some of the facilities in the air-conditioned rooms. The marble bathrooms include a bathtub and Asprey's toiletries. The balconies offer views of the Mediterranean and the pine grove, and some rooms have views of Juan les Pins. Traditional French cuisine is served at the Bistrot Terrasse restaurant, which is decorated with chandeliers and features local products. Meals can be served on the terrace, under the pine trees, or in the indoor dining area. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in the bar at Hôtel Juana. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Juana Hotel is a 20-minute drive down the coast to Cannes - Mandelieu Airport and an airport shuttle is available upon request and at an additional cost. Private parking and a 24-hour valet service are available on site. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Kube Saint-Tropez
description: Kube Hotel St Tropez is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Saint-Tropez. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kube Hotel St Tropez. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kube Hotel St Tropez.Agoda

name: Hôtel Martinez Cannes
description: Located on the famous La Croisette Boulevard in Cannes, Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is a 5-star hotel featuring a private beach, which is accessible for an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a meal in one of the onsite restaurants or a drink at the Martinez bar. Entirely renovated in May 2018, guest rooms at Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style and feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room features a marble bathroom and some have a private terrace with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Opened in May 2018, the restaurant Le Jardin du Martinez offers seating on a terrace in the shade of palm and cypress trees, and in fine weather guests can enjoy the 1930's themed garden parties hosted at the restaurant. Guests seeking a fine dining experience are invited to dine at the 2 Michelin star La Palme d'Or restaurant, which specialises in cuisine inspired by cinema and offers a view of the Croisette. Located on the beach, the La Plage du Martinez restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with local produce and fresh seafood. The Martinez Bar celebrates the history of the Hotel Martinez and proposes a range of cocktails and gin and tonics, in addition to a nightly live culinary show on the Teppan plancha grill. Spa services such as massages, body treatments and facials are available and guests can exercise in the fitness centre. Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers direct access onto the beach and is within walking distance of the shopping area. With a secure private car park, the hotel also offers valet parking. Nice-Cote-d’Azur Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea, Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes is located on the famous Boulevard La Croisette in Cannes, 110 meters from the Palais des Festivals and the old port. It has a heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a private beach. Guests have free access to the wellness area and the 24-hour gym. The Hotel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms and suites, LCD satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private bathroom. Most have sea views. During your stay at Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes, you can enjoy massages and relaxation therapies at the hotel spa, Spa Diane Barrière, which uses Biologique Recherche products. You can also relax on the hotel terrace or on the private beach, deck chairs can be rented on site. The hotel has 3 restaurants: The traditional French brasserie, Fouquet's, serves a menu created in collaboration with the three-star chef Pierre Gagnaire. Paradiso Nicole & Pierre serves Italian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The BFire by Mauro Colagreco restaurant is located on the private beach. The hotel offers a children's club, Le Studio by Petit VIP, free for children from 4 to 12 years old. The hotel is located just a minute's walk from the beach, 400 meters from Cannes train station and 27 km from Nice airport. Secure private parking is also available at an additional cost. Charging stations for electric cars are available on site. During private events or congresses, the beach may be closed. During this period, customers can access the establishment's partner beaches. Cannes is a dynamic city that hosts a multitude of cultural, professional and festive events throughout the year, which can cause some inconveniences due to the crowds, such as noise or large structures erected in all places, especially on the Croisette and the beach. Prior to arrival, the property encourages guests to check in advance for upcoming events. You can visit the site of the Palais des Festivals or that of the city of Cannes.

name: Lagrange Apart'hotel Les Jardins D'olympie
description: Situated in Antibes, Lagrange Apart'Hôtel Antibes Olympie offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a rooftop pool and an open-air bath. Private parking is available on site. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Lagrange Apart'Hôtel Antibes Olympie offers 4-star accommodation with a solarium. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Palais des Festivals de Cannes is 13 km from the accommodation, while Musee International de la Parfumerie is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 18 km from Lagrange Apart'Hôtel Antibes Olympie.

name: Hotel Cap Estel
description: Located on the Cap and facing the sea, Hotel Cap Estel features luxury accommodation and a private beach. Guests can enjoy the indoor and outdoor swimming pools, the garden and the wellness centre. All rooms offer free WiFi access, a terrace and panoramic views of the sea and the garden. They also feature a minibar with free soft drinks and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms are complete with shower and/or bathtub and toilet. Breakfast is included and the hotel also offers a restaurant and a bar on site. Additional restaurants and bars can be found 2 km from the property. Massages are available upon reservation at an additional cost. Eze Village is 7 km away, Nice is 15 km away and Monaco is 7 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm
description: This hotel is situated beside Central Station, 8 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Town Hall. Guests enjoy free entrance to the gym. The entrance fee for pool and saunas is 200 SEK. Breakfast is free for children under 7 years, while children up to 12 years have a discount. All the air-conditioned guest rooms at Radisson Blu Royal Viking have luxury beds and a bathtub or shower. Each room features a satellite TV and minibar. The in-house restaurant Stockholm Fisk serves internationally inspired cuisine, while HIGH - Cocktail Bar on the 9th floor offers city views. Archipelago boat trips depart from 2 nearby harbours and the Arlanda Express airport train departs from beside the Royal Viking. Drottninggatan shopping street is just a 5-minute walk away and the Old Town is a 15-minute walk away.

name: At Six
description: Located right in the City Centre, steps away from shopping, nightlife, sights and transport, At Six, Ascend Hotel Collection is a perfect base to focus on your Stockholm destination in a whole new way. Elegance with a twist permeates our non-smoking Stockholm hotel, a new kind of exclusive urban lifestyle hotel guests can experience with all senses. We offer modern art and contemporary design by award-winning London-based Universal Design Studio, a vibrant restaurant and bar scene with an outstanding rooftop restaurant and additional amenities like free WiFi, a business center, 12 meeting rooms, gym and spa. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Welcome Hotel Barkarby
description: This good-value hotel is 15 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm city centre. It features free Wi-Fi, in-room flat-screen TVs and gym. For an extra charge, the Welcome SPA offers two outdoor pools, heated to 38 degrees all year, two saunas and a cold bath. Welcome Hotel Barkarby’s popular breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves both Swedish and international cuisine. Parking is free on site. Facilities include a free internet computer and pool table. The Barkarby Shopping Area and Stockholm Quality Outlet are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel, offering 100 shops and outlet stores. Järvafältet Nature Reserve with its walking and jogging trails is 5 minutes’ walk away. Friends Arena is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Clarion Hotel Sea U
description: Clarion Hotel Sea U is the perfect hotel both for your weekend getaway or your company meeting. During your stay you can visit one of our inspiring restaurants, our breathtaking Skybar, or relax on our outdoor terrace with pool and training facilities. You will also find shopping streets, restaurants and the local marina within a 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The hotel is a 3 minute walk away from the central station, where you can access both local and domestic transportation services. In only a 25 minute by car or taxi you will reach Angelholm-Helsingborg Airport for flight connections.Choice Hotels

name: Avalon Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Gothenburg, Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is a short walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, and just a few steps from nearby bars and eateries. The hotel also provides a terrace on its roof equipped with a pool. This 4-star hotel offers porters, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Couples will adore the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a mini bar and a coffee maker. All offer a flat-screen TV, a seating area and slippers. Guests staying at Avalon Hotel Gothenburg can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay nearby when looking for a bite to eat. Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is ideally situated for discovering Gothenburg with Kungsportsavenyn and Nordstan within a 10-minute walk. Gothenburg Cathedral is also only five minutes away.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Panorama, Gothenburg
description: This hotel is 7 minutes’ walk from the Swedish Exhibition Centre and Liseberg Amusement Park. The main shopping street, Avenyn is 1 km away. It offers free WiFi and free access to the relax area. All rooms at Comfort Hotel Panorama are decorated in modern Scandinavian style and some have city views. The hotel's Barception sells food & drinks. Comfort Hotel Panorama has a well-equipped gym that is free for hotel guests and open 24 hours a day.

name: Scandic Segevång
description: Located in Malmo, Scandic Segevang offers complimentary wireless internet and a gym. It also features free bicycle rental. Scandic Segevång offers modern accommodation, and is an ideal base for holiday makers or business travelers alike. The spa and wellness centre provides a chance to get pampered and relax. The rooms at Scandic Segevang are comfortable with facilities including a private bathroom. They feature blackout curtains, ironing facilities and a desk. Scandic Segevång Hotel features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day. There is a range of breakfast options to choose from each day. Scandic Segevang Hotel Malmo is under a 25-minute drive from Malmo Airport. Lund Cathedral, Malmo Arena and Lund University are within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Camp Ripan
description: Surrounded by mountain nature, the family-owned Camp Ripan.is a 10-minute car ride from Kiruna city centre. It offers free WiFi, in-room flat-screen TVs and traditional, seasonal Swedish and Sami food. Parking is free on site. Spread across 3 buildings, Ripan’s cosy, chalet-style rooms have private entrances and bathrooms with showers. Many offer kitchenettes and convenient private ski storage. Restaurant Ripan features local Nordic ingredients including reindeer and fish. The Aurora Spa can be accessed for a surcharge. Ski tracks and hiking trails are right next door. Snowmobiling, ice fishing and dog sledding are popular in winter. Summer leisure options include horse riding, guided city tours and hiking. Camp Ripan is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Clarion Hotel Wisby
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Wisby in Visby, SE near the Visby City Center, Botanical Garden, Gotlands Fornsal museum and the Visby Airport. Amenities at our hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Visby hotels like our Clarion Hotel Wisby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Strand Hotel
description: A first class hotel with a service minded staff and environmental certification. The hotel is located in the middle of the town, near the sea inside the city wall of the World Heritage town of Visby. Beautiful medieval houses and alleys in Visby surround the hotel. The Best Western Strand Hotel is the old Visby Brewery which became a hotel in 1982, from a family owned hotel with 13 rooms to one of the largest hotels in Visby today with 124 rooms and suites. Ferry and airport are within easy reach. Please note: Management reserves the right to refuse to provide accommodation to persons less than 20 years of age if no parents are attending.bestwestern.com

name: First Hotel Kokoloko
description: Located in Visby, 1.3 km from Visby Ferry Terminal, First Hotel Visby has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and 2 barbecue areas, as well as free WiFi. Among the various facilities are a garden and a terrace. The hotel features a hot tub. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms include a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. Almedalen Park is 2 km from First Hotel Visby. The nearest airport is Visby Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Clarion Hotel Winn
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Winn in Gavle, SE near the University College of Gavle, Baltic Sea, Swedish Railway Museum, Mackmyra Whisky distillery and the Valbo Shopping Centre. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, free weekday newspapers, an indoor heated pool, meeting space and a business center with copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Frösö Park Hotel
description: Located on the stunning island of Froson, the Hotel Froso Park, Ascend Hotel Collection, is surrounded by a golf course, as well as outdoor activities like running, cycling, hiking, skiing and snowmobiling. This pet-friendly hotel is also close to Ostersund and all the attractions you will want to check out on your trip, including Winter Park, Moose Garden and the Froso Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant and bar, a hot tub, meeting space, spa facilities, a dance floor, free breakfast, free weekday newspapers, free WiFi and an indoor and outdoor gym and fitness center, to name a few. Guest room amenities include desks and sofa sleepers. Ask about our suites and superior rooms. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: The Lamp Hotel Norrkoping
description: This boutique hotel is housed in a refurbished 18th-century building. Just 50 metres from Norrköping’s main street, Drottninggatan, it features and on-site spa, free WiFi internet access and garden in the summer time. The Lamp Hotel’s modern, guest rooms feature a comfortable seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar are also provided in each room. All bathrooms have underfloor heating and luxurious shower amenities from Babor. Housing Sweden’s largest floor lamp, The Lamp Restaurant serves Asian-Swedish Fusion dishes. In summer, meals can be taken out onto the garden. The Lamp Hotel & Spa is in the heart of central Norrköping. Norrköping Central Station is a 10-minute walk away from the hotel and the Louis De Geer Concert Hall & Congress Centre is 350 metres away. You will find shopping, restaurants and cafés just a few steps from the hotel.

name: Profilhotels Savoy
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Jönköping, with the city right outside the doorstep and Lake Vättern 500 metres away. It offers a popular breakfast buffet, a relaxation area and modern rooms with free WiFi. The individually designed rooms of ProfilHotels Savoy include luxury beds, flat-screen TVs and large bathrooms with underfloor heating. In addition, dumbbells are provided in each room. Guests also have free access to a fitness room with sauna. Brasserie Sofiehof offers Swedish specialities as well as international dishes for lunch and dinner. After-work specials and other events are hosted throughout the year. Free tea and coffee is available in the lobby around the clock. Savoy Hotel’s central location offers easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. The Match Museum is a 10-minute walk away, while Jönköping Central Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away. Elmia Congress Centre is within 10 minutes' drive.

name: Quality Hotel Royal Corner
description: The non-smoking Quality Hotel Royal Corner offers real value for your hard-earned money in the heart of Vaxjo, Sweden near the Vaxjo City Centre, shops, nightlife and attractions like Grand Samarkand shopping mall, the house of Emmigrants, Vaxjo Cathedral, Kingdom of Crystal and Little Rock Lake Zipline. Hold your next work or social event in in one of our 11 meeting rooms, grab breakfast in our La Castellina restaurant and enjoy amenities like free WiFi, free parking, an indoor heated pool, sauna and fitness center. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Hedasen
description: Welcome to the friendly Best Western Hedasen, located by the Sandviken Golf Course, 300 meters from Lake Storsjon and three kilometers from central Sandviken. All rooms have a work desk, an electric kettle and a television with DVD player. DVD films can be borrowed for free at the front desk. The hotel offers and indoor pool, sauna, free parking and free Wi-Fi. Central Sandviken is only 3 kilometers from the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Vadstena Klosterhotell Konferens & Spa
description: Housed in a former monastery from the Middle Ages, this historic hotel is located on Lake Vättern in quaint Vadstena. Guests can relax with in the peaceful settings or at the on-site spa. It features free WiFi and an on-site restaurant. Vadstena Klosterhotell’s classically decorated guest rooms feature cable TV and a separate seating area. Some are located in the monastery building, while others are in a grand 19th-century building. The spa can be accessed for a surcharge and includes hot baths, a sauna, a steam bath and a variety of spa and massage treatments. Guests can also enjoy an outdoor hot tub, a cafe/bar, a relaxation room and a gym. Guests can rent bicycles to explore the neighbouring Vadstena Castle and the town’s idyllic main street. Vadstena Golf Club is 10 minutes’ drive away. Motala Train Station, 17 km away, is the closest stop to the hotel.

name: Billingehus
description: For over fifty years, the iconic hotel has balanced like a monument on Billingen's escarpment. Equal parts of course as the special. Check in with family, love, friends, the training group or why not by yourself, for some well-deserved alone time? Billingehus is the hotel for those looking for warm and welcoming accommodation in Skvde, with closeness to nature and a nice mix of experiences both inside and out.iHotelier/iStay

name: Scandic Elmia
description: This hotel is found next to Elmia Exhibition Centre and Rosenlundsbadet Water Park, 10 minutes’ walk from the shores of Lake Vättern. Sauna, gym and guest bicycles are free. The bright rooms at Scandic Elmia feature wooden floors, modern décor and cable TV and free WiFi is offered throughout the building. The hotel restaurant serves a hearty breakfast buffet. Guests can enjoy an apéritif or after-dinner coffee in the bar. Neighboring area contains multi-sporting arenas such as tennis, bowling, paddle, curling, swimming, football, and ice hockey. Scandic Elmia offers free private parking on site, you need to register your car at check in. 10 minutes’ drive from Jönköping Central Station.

name: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm-Arlanda
address: Kabinvaegen 3, P O Box 103, 190 60 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Set in Arlanda, this modern hotel features valet parking, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Just moments from Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, it offers a stylish stay in a convenient location. Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel provides rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They provide an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel can sample international dishes at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. There are a variety of restaurants and cafés near Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, and Rosersberg is an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Holiday Club Åre
address: Are Strand Box 68, 830 13 Åre, Jamtlands Lan
description: Location This family-friendly Are hotel is located near the airport, within 1 mi (2 km) of Are Beach and Are Ski Resort. Are Cable Car and Are Old Church are also within 10 minutes. Åre Station is only a 4-minute walk. Room All rooms offer free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus room service and flat-screen TVs. Hair dryers, safes, and showers are among the other amenities that guests will find. Amenities Along with 2 restaurants, this smoke-free hotel has an indoor pool and an outdoor pool. Free buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, a health club, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café are onsite.WebBeds

name: Lysebu Hotel
description: Lysebu Hotel is located at Tryvannshøyden Hill above Oslo, 750 metres from the Voksenkollen metro station. It offers excellent dining, free WiFi and free private parking. All rooms at Hotel Lysebu have a work desk, and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms feature a flat-screen TV and views of Sørkedalen Valley and Norefjell Mountain. The in-house restaurant serves Norwegian cuisine and features large panoramic windows and Nordic art on the walls. The restaurant offers a new 5-course menu every week, based upon seasonal ingredients and accompanied with selected wines. During summer, guests can dine out on the terrace. The hotel has a wine cellar and can arrange wine-tasting sessions. Art exhibitions and live music events are sometimes hosted by the hotel. Other facilities include a large garden, an indoor swimming pool and a lounge with fireplace. Popular activities among guests include skiing, hiking and cycling. Oslo city centre is a 40-minute metro ride away.

name: The Thief
description: Featuring rooms with a in-built sound system and private balcony, The Thief is a design boutique hotel on Tjuvholmen in Oslo. The promenade of Aker Brygge is within 5 minutes’ walk. The hotel offers in-room spa treatments, a spa centre and free around-the-clock gym access. Rooms at this stylish hotel feature a Nespresso machine, a mini-bar and a rainforest shower in the private bathroom. The Thief has 24-hour room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The Thief Spa includes a Turkish hamam bath, sauna and swimming pool. Guests can also relax on the chic rooftop terrace and enjoy contemporary Norwegian cuisine at the Thief Food Bar. All guests receive free entry to the Astrup Fearnley Museum of Modern Art, while the hotel is only a 15-minute walk from the centre of Oslo and the National Gallery. The nearest bus stop is at Vika Atrium 400 metres away, and the National Theatre train station 1.5 km away provides links to Oslo Gardermoen Airport.

name: Soria Moria Hotell
description: Just 4 minutes’ drive from Holmenkollen Ski Jump, this hotel is 900 metres from Voksenkollen Metro Station. It offers free WiFi, along with free access to the gym. Renovated in 2013, all rooms at Soria Moria Hotell include a flat-screen TV, minibar and a work desk. Each room has Jensen beds with Egyptian cotton linen. Some rooms offer views over Oslo. Guests can enjoy scenic city views from Soria Moria’s terrace and a seasonal dinner menu of Norwegian cuisine in their restaurant. Free private parking is also available on site. Tryvann Ski Centre and Winter Park is a 5-minute drive away, while central Oslo is 12 km from Soria Moria Hotell og Konferansesenter. Common area activities include hiking and cycling.

name: Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, Oslo
address: Sonja Henies Plass 3 Postboks 9206, Oslo, Oslo
