description: Situated in Oslo, Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel is set amongst a variety of shops and boutiques and is minutes on foot from Bussterminalen Oslo. This stylish hotel is set in the heart of the city. This 4-star hotel provides a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and valet parking. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can recommend places to visit and provide other tourist information. Rooms at Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Oslo provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's seating area. During their stay at Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, Oslo, guests can dine at 34 Restaurant and relax with a drink at Galway Bay. A continental and a buffet breakfast is served each morning. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Oslo's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, with Oslo Cathedral just a short stroll away. It is also within walking distance of Karl Johans gate, Stortinget and the Oslo Opera House.Revato

name: Scandic Kokstad
description: Situated in Bergen, Scandic Kokstad offers contemporary 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna. It also provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free bicycle rental. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Kokstad offer a desk, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all feature ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar.Revato

name: Britannia Hotel
description: Dating back to 1870, this elegant hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Trondheim Central Station. It provides luxury spa facilities and 4 restaurants. Wi-Fi is free. Britannia Hotel’s rooms mix classic décor with modern comforts. All rooms have a writing desk, flat-screen TV and tea/coffee facilities. Guests can enjoy a 24-hour room service. The Britannia Spa & Wellness Centre offers special treatments, massages and saunas. A swimming pool, minerals pool and gym are also found on site. Britannia Hotel is located in the city center in walking distance to shops and restaurants. The 11th-century Nidaros Cathedral is 500 metres away.

name: Scandic Royal Stavanger
description: Situated amongst a variety of tourist attractions, shops and eateries, Scandic Royal Stavanger is ideal for those wanting to explore Stavanger and its surroundings. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Sauna and Gym. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. For an easy and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out feature. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to discover the local nightlife. Those staying at Scandic Royal Stavanger can enjoy the luxurious rooms that offer a mini bar, a private bathroom and converters/voltage adaptors. Hot drinks can be made with the available tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. Those staying at Scandic Royal Stavanger can sit down to a satisfying breakfast each morning at 26 North Restaurant & Social Club, as well as dinner at Roast Restaurant & Bar after a day of sightseeing. Stavanger's attractions, such as Gamle Stavanger, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The Stavanger Maritime Museum is within a 10-minute walk and Stavanger Airport Sola is 20 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: Vestlia Resort
description: Found next to Hardangervidda mountain plateau and only 2 km from Geilo Train Station, this ski-in ski-out hotel offers lodge-style guest rooms, free Wi-Fi and comprehensive spa and fitness facilities. Hotel Vestlia Resort was designed by renowned Norwegian architect Helene Hennie. The charming guest rooms have comfortable, stylish décor and furnishings. Vestlia Resort’s in-house restaurant serves seasonal Norwegian, Italian and French cuisine. Lighter dishes are offered in the cosy café-bar. After-ski drinks can be enjoyed by the open fire at Hunter’s Bar. Vestlia Resort’s spa provides luxury treatments and relaxation facilities. Guests can stay in shape by visiting the fully equipped fitness centre. The family-friendly Geilolia Ski Resort provides a large number of high-quality slopes and cross-country tracks for all skill levels. In the summer, guests can play a round of golf on Vestlia Resort’s 9-hole course, which is found next to the hotel.

name: Scandic Park Sandefjord
description: Scandic Park Sandefjord is situated in Sandefjord and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Rooms at Scandic Park Sandefjord are well-appointed and offer a private bathroom, a telephone and a refrigerator. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Guests staying at Scandic Park Sandefjord can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Scandic Park Sandefjord is within a short walk of the Sandefjord Museum. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Sandefjord Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Sandefjord.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Sogndal
description: The pet-friendly Quality Hotel Sogndal is a modern hotel situated in the center of Sogndal on the Sognefjord. The Jostedalsbreen glacier, Flam Railway and the Naeofjord are nearby. Enjoy hotel amenities like free continental breakfast, restaurants, a bar, a conference center, guest laundry facilities, copy and fax machines, a newsstand, free parking, a currency exchange, a billiard room and plenty more. All guest rooms have TVs. In addition, irons and ironing boards are available at the front desk. Make the Quality Hotel Sogndal your home away from home. We have everything you need to make your stay in the Sogndal an enjoyable one.Choice Hotels

name: Sola Strand Hotel
description: Located a 15-minute drive from Stavanger, this hotel offers direct access to the 2.5 km long Solastranden Beach. It features a popular beach bar, large sun terraces and a modern spa. The bright and airy rooms of Sola Strand Hotel feature modern décor, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Free tea and coffee-making facilities are provided in each room. Large lunch buffets are served at the Montroyal Restaurant, which is set in a refurbished cigar room from an early 1900s cruise ship. Sola Strand’s à la carte restaurant offers seasonal specialities. For relaxation, the Nordsjøbadet Spa offers saunas, a cold water plunge pool and an indoor swimming pool. Treatments include soothing facials and algae body wraps. Guests can try windsurfing or borrow a bicycle on site during summer.

name: Notodden Hotel
description: Situated next to Torvet Main Square in central Notodden, this hotel is only 500 metres from Notodden Train Station. It offers free WiFi in public areas, as well as convenient access to outdoor recreation. All guest rooms at Notodden Hotel have classic décor. Each also has a work desk, cable TV and private bathroom with shower. Seasonal à la carte dishes can be enjoyed at the in-house restaurant. It also has a children’s playroom. The scenic Telemark region offers great opportunities for activities such as cross-country skiing, hiking and canoeing. Only 6 km from Notodden Hotel is Norway’s largest stave church, the 13th-century Heddal.

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Trysil
description: Location Located in the heart of the ski resort area, the hotel offers its guests premier access to 65 ski slopes and 32 lifts, as well as the quaint shops and restaurants of the town centre in Trysil. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 220 accommodation units. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Services such as a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage or car park. Additional services include room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony completes the range of amenities available in most rooms. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a queen-size bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers various options for cooling off on hot days, including a children's pool and an indoor pool. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options available for a fee at the establishment include golf, horse riding, canoeing and bowling. The area around the establishment offers good cross-country skiing opportunities, making it the perfect choice for fans of winter sports. A disco and a kids' club complete the range of options available. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Fleischer's Hotel
description: Housed in a 19th-century building, this hotel lies by Lake Vangsvatnet, next to the Voss Train Station. It offers free Wi-fi, free private parking and a pool area. Each guest room at Fleischers Hotel offer a combination of old-world charm and modern conveniences. Most guest rooms have crystal chandeliers and rich fabrics. Some also have a balcony. Hotel Fleischers’ in-house restaurant serves traditional dishes based on local recipes. The fully licensed bar offers a variety of drinks. Guests can enjoy meals or drinks on the large terrace during nice weather. The wellness area at Fleischers includes a children’s pool, a hot tub and a sauna. A tennis court is also available on site. The surrounding region offers activities such as hiking, fishing, canoeing and skiing.

name: Quality Hotel Grand Kristiansund
description: Situated on the coast of the North Sea, the pet-friendly Quality Hotel Grand Kristiansund provides easy access to many local attractions, events and points of interest. This hotel is close to the Vagen Coastal Heritage Centre, the fishing community of Grip and the Kristiansund-Kvernberget Airport. A variety of shops, eateries and pubs can be found around town. Be sure to visit the Consucen Restaurant and Lounge, located on the premises. Enjoy additional hotel amenities like free breakfast, high-speed Internet, meeting space, copy and fax machines, a currency exchange and more. Guest rooms come with hair dryers and desks. Some rooms have coffee makers. We look forward to seeing you soon.Choice Hotels

name: Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: This 4-star-superior hotel offers 3 restaurants, a spa and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. It is Berlin's tallest hotel and is located directly on Alexanderplatz Square. All rooms and suites at the Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz have marble bathrooms with power showers and heated floors. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hotel. Meals and drinks are available in the Spagos Bar&Lounge, prepared before your eyes in the open kitchen. The Park Inn’s wellness centre includes a sauna, gym and massages. Guests can also relax on the top-floor terrace, which offers great views of central Berlin. The Park Inn by Radisson stands opposite Alexanderplatz Station, which offers bus, tram, underground and S-Bahn rail links to all parts of Berlin. Museum Island and the lively Hackescher Markt area are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Maritim Proarte Hotel Berlin
description: This hotel in central Berlin offers elegant rooms and a spa area with an indoor pool. It is located on Friedrichstrasse shopping street, 300 metres from the underground station. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms and suites of the Maritim proArte Hotel Berlin feature Italian-style furnishings, satellite TV and a laptop safe. WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in the whole hotel. International cuisine as well as typical Berlin food is served in the hotel’s 2 restaurants in a cosy atmosphere. The Checkpoint bar offers an exquisite choice of cocktails, long drinks, high quality spirits as well as burgers, snacks and nibbles. The Maritim’s spa area includes a swimming pool, sauna, steam room and fitness room. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The famous Unter den Linden Boulevard featuring the Brandenburg Gate is just 100 metres away. The UNESCO Museum Island is only 1.5 km from the hotel. Other attractions within walking distance include the Friedrichstadt-Palast, Admiralspalast, Komische Oper, boat tours and Hackescher Markt.

name: So/ Berlin Das Stue
description: The boutique hotel SO/Berlin Das Stue is located in the middle of the embassy district, in the immediate vicinity of the Berlin Zoo. It has a fixed view of the Tiergarten, the zoo and of the Berlin's western and eastern skyline. The listed building of the former Royal Danish Embassy was built in the late 1930s by KaDeWe architect Johann Emil Schaudt.accorhotels.com

name: Pestana Berlin Tiergarten
description: This 4-star-superior hotel is located in the green Tiergarten district, next to the Tiergarten park. Pestana Berlin Tiergarten offers light-flooded rooms with comfortable bedding, a spa with a heated indoor pool and free WiFi in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms of the Pestana Berlin Tiergarten feature natural wooden floorboards, large windows and a modern bathroom with rain shower and branded amenities. Guests also find a complimentary bottle of water in their room as well as a selection of top-quality cushions. Some rooms have a private terrace with panoramic views of the Tiergarten park and the Berlin skyline. The spa at the Pestana Berlin Tiergarten comes with a heated indoor pool, a sauna, a steam room and a fitness room. Massages can be booked. The neighbouring Tiergarten park is ideal for a walk, stroll or jog. The hotel's Atlantis Restaurant has a popular covered terrace and serves a small selection of classical dishes in a soft lighting atmosphere. Drinks and typical Berlin snacks can be enjoyed in the Aqua hotel bar. The Pestana is a 15-minute walk from Berlin Zoo, the KaDeWe Department Store and the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Berlin’s famous number 200 sightseeing bus stops directly in front of the Pestana Tiergarten, offering a direct connection to Potsdamer Platz, the Brandenburg Gate, the historic Unter den Linden boulevard, Alexanderplatz and back to Zoologischer Garten train station.

name: Berlin Marriott Hotel
description: Indulge yourself with a lavish stay in Germany at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. The newly designed rooms of the Berlin Marriott Hotel offer a modern interpretation of the Bauhaus style right in the heart of the dynamic city of Berlin. Experience residential like comfortable guest rooms with novel platform beds as well as innovative technology in the Guest Entertainment System and amenities like energy-saving and particularly hygienic circulating air cooling units. Fuel up with delectable food and the finest of steaks from the Midtown Grill or enjoy delicious hot dogs and a variety of craft beers from The Big Dog. Explore downtown Berlin from our well situated hotel near Potsdamer Platz and Tiergarten park and discover the citys many merits. Our exceptional customizable event spaces and conference rooms are a perfect fit for your meeting or wedding needs. Let us make your stay unforgettable at the Berlin Marriott Hotel. Please note that our services may be limited due to government and hygiene restrictions.Marriott

name: Hotel Adlon Kempinski Berlin
description: The quintessence of luxury lodging, the Adlon is a legendary 5-star hotel situated in Berlin’s Mitte, beside the Brandenburg Gate. State-of-the-art facilities include a double Michelin-star restaurant and a shopping arcade. With such a central location, the Hotel Adlon Kempinski allows direct access to some of Berlin’s main landmarks. The Holocaust Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie and Pariser Platz are all within a 10-minute walk. Rooms have a sophisticated allure thanks to antique furnishings with extravagant twists and marble bathrooms. They are equipped with WiFi, a modern media system and some offer views of the Brandenburg Gate. Sporting and relaxing amenities include a neoclassical indoor pool, an 800m² gym, and a spa with Ayurveda treatments. Wild game specialtities and private dining are all available options.

name: Waldorf Astoria Berlin
description: Waldorf Astoria Berlin welcomes you with modern luxury and unparalleled Waldorf Service. Located in the heart of the prestigious neighbourhoods of Berlin City West, by the luxury shopping district of Kurfürstendamm, this Berlin hotel offers an array of world-famous landmarks and activities to discover within simple walking distance or by the efficient S and U-Bahn transport systems.  Admire incredible panoramic views of the Berlin skyline from every Guest Room, Suite and Apartment in the first luxury hotel in this part of the city. Inspired by the original Waldorf Astoria design, Art Deco features are merged seamlessly with elements of modernity to create a totally unique hotel interior.  Expect the best at our luxury Berlin hotel, including all-day dining at restaurant ROCA, signature drinks and light snacks at 1920s-themed Lang Bar, afternoon tea at the renowned Peacock Alley and high tea at Library Lounge.  Discover serene rejuvenation in the first Guerlain Spa in Germany featuring a wide range of soothing body, face, and massage treatments, an indoor pool, thermal zone and the latest fitness equipment.  For a distinctive event, conference or celebration, consider our versatile second-floor spaces, including a 330 square meter ballroom. The terrace has room for up to 200 guests - its sixth-floor vantage provides views over the rooftops of Berlin. Epic vistas and sophisticated ambience are constant companions at this luxury hotel. Stay and enjoy or stroll over to Kurfuerstendamm, Berlin's legendary shopping boulevard.Official Hotel Information

name: Crowne Plaza Berlin City Centre, An IHG Hotel
description: A business hotel in Berlin city centre with a spa and conference facilities. Crowne Plaza® Berlin - City Ctr Nurnberger Ku'damm hotel is just off the famous Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Nearby U-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten or Wittenbergplatz provide access to Berlin Central Station or the iconic Brandenburg Gate in less than 15 minutes. Our 13 meeting rooms include private boardrooms and a conference centre for 1,000 guests. If you’re hosting an event, the Crowne Plaza Meetings Director can help arrange everything including catering. Delegates travelling by air can be at Berlin Airport (BER) in 40-60 minutes. Take a break at Berlin Zoo or the Haus der Kulturen der Welt arts centre in nearby Tiergarten park, also home to a lakeside beer garden. Ask the concierge for advice on local jogging routes. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Inclusive Wi-Fi as well as Indoor - outdoor parking for a daily fee Our Sleep Advantage® programme offers premium bedding and Quiet Zones for a good night’s sleep. Stay on your toes with a workout at the gym or a few laps in the indoor pool, book a treatment at the spa or wind down in the sauna. The Wilson’s Restaurant (closed until further notice) serves a classic American menu, with terrace dining in good weather. You can meet colleagues for a drink at Kemmons Bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grand Hyatt Berlin
description: This 5-star hotel has a large rooftop spa and pool with spectacular views of Berlin. Located in the lively Potsdamer Platz district, 300 metres from the Sony Center, it also offers stylish restaurants and bars. Grand Hyatt Berlin’s elegant rooms and suites feature 55-inch TVs and hot drinks facilities. The marble bathrooms include flat-screen TVs, and free WiFi. All guests receive a free bottle of mineral water. All guests at the hotel enjoy free access to the Club Olympus Spa & Fitness, which offers great views of the Berlin skyline. Facilities include a pool, spa pool and modern gym, as well as various saunas. Massages and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. International, Asian and seasonal cuisine is served in the Vox Restaurant. During summer months, guests can dine on the Grand Hyatt’s terrace. The Berlin Philharmonic Hall and Tiergarten Park are a 5-minute walk away. The Brandenburg Gate can be reached on foot in less than 15 minutes.

name: Roomers Munich, Autograph Collection
description: Roomers Munich, a unique lifestyle hotel, which sets new standards in the modern luxury hotel industry. Glamorous, electrifying, hedonistic, sensual and luxurious - that's how Roomers feels in the heart of the Westend. Roomers Munich has 280 rooms and suites in intimate and cozy design combined with an award-winning gastronomic concept. The legendary Roomers Bar, RED, the Japanese restaurant IZAKAYA and the unique Roomers Spa by Shan Rahimkhan with Infinity pool and cinema are just a few highlights the hotel has to offer. The 8 flexible event rooms and two large terraces in the courtyard create endless possibilities, whether for barbecues in a relaxed atmosphere, car launches or open-air fashion shows. Roomers Munich - The hotel for those who want to immerse themselves in a new world and enjoy a cosmopolitan lifestyle.Marriott

name: Novotel München City Arnulfpark
description: The Novotel Munich City Arnulfpark hotel welcomes you to the metropolitan city of Munich. You will feel right at home in our centrally located 4-star hotel near Munich main train station and the old town. Our modern, colorful lobby will feel like your second living room. In the evening, enjoy refreshing drinks and delicacies from our wide range at The FLAVE of Munich restaurant and, if you are a little hungrier, you can also enjoy delicious international dishes. A children menu is also available.accorhotels.com

name: The Westin Grand Munich
description: Discover a place in Munich's Arabellapark area where you are given a choice not to just get up, but to rise. The Westin Grand Hotel Munich provides 5 star luxury, inspires you and gives you energy and motivation. The English Garden, one of the largest inner-city parks in the world is just around the corner and the city center of Munich can be reached by direct transport connection in only a few subway minutes. Our rooms and suites, as well as the Westin Club®, offer space for private or business events. The 1,500 sqm Isar Spa serves your personal well-being. Unwind in the indoor pool, the steam bath or in three different saunas. Workout at the WestinWORKOUT® or indulge in a spa treatment. Our congress hotel offers 21 meeting rooms for up to 1,050 people as well as various spacious foyers. Together with our sister hotel Four Points by Sheraton Munich Arabellapark, located opposite, we can host events for up to 1,250 people.Marriott

name: Andaz Munich Schwabinger Tor - a concept by Hyatt
description: This luxury hotel is situated at the Schwabinger Tor in Munich, between the Olympic Stadium and the English Garden. It features a spa, fitness centre and pool area with sundecks and a rooftop bar offering 360° views of the city and towards the Alps. Andaz Munich Schwabinger Tor - a concept by Hyatt provides rooms and suites with sophisticated interior details and inspiring art. Each room offers free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. The Lonely Broccoli restaurant serves traditional Bavarian dishes and specialises in charcoal-grilled and slow-roasted marinated meats. All products used are organic and locally sourced. Guests can also relax in the upscale Biciletta coffee bar, which also serves smoothies, freshly pressed juices, sandwiches, savoury snacks and pastries. Rental bikes are available at the 24-hour reception of the Andaz Munich Schwabinger Tor.

name: Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten Kempinski München
description: Boasting a Finnish sauna and a sauna, Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten Kempinski Munchen is located in Munich and provides traditional accommodation. It is conveniently situated in the city centre. Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten Kempinski München has panoramic city views, plus valet parking, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour room service. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. After a day of exploring the local region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten Kempinski Munich houses Schwarzreiter Tagesbar, which serves lunch and dinner and provides guests with everything they need for an enjoyable evening within the hotel. Guests can also try one of the many bars and cafés nearby. Munich's attractions, such as Munich Residenz, Frauenkirche and Marienplatz, are easily accessible on foot from Kempinski. The surrounding area is also famous for its shopping.Revato

name: Munich Marriott Hotel
description: Brand new designs and preserved traditions. With the reopening of the hotels distinctive lobby area the new Greatroom Bavarian culture and Schwabing architecture, tradition and innovation come together in a natural elegant way. The thoughtfully designed state of the art guest rooms offer perks like authentic Bavarian elements, lush bedding, inviting chaise longue and marble topped desk while the spacious suites are ideal for families or friends. In addition our hotel is pet friendly, we welcome trained pets for a 30 EUR per room per stay fee. Indulge in both international and local cuisine unwind with a workout in the hotel gym, relax with a soothing sauna or take a dip in our pool. The exceptional, customizable meeting rooms offer bright and elegant spaces. On top located next to the English Garden Munich Marriott Hotel is the ideal starting point for exploring the city. Whatever your occasion our newly redesigned hotel is the place to be for unforgettable experiences.Marriott

name: Hotel Bayerischer Hof
description: Offering 5 gourmet restaurants, 6 bars, and an exclusive spa with rooftop pool, this historic 5-star hotel is located directly in Munich’s fashionable shopping district. The luxurious rooms and suites of the Hotel Bayerischer Hof each feature an original design, ranging from cosmopolitan to colonial style. They all provide high-speed WiFi and air conditioning. A complimentary fruit basket and a bottle of mineral water are also included. Hotel Bayerischer Hof’s exclusive Blue Spa offers a spacious sauna area, a gym with scenic city views, and a beauty salon. The unique Cinema Lounge is ideal for company presentations or private celebrations. Dining facilities at the Hotel Bayerischer Hof include the Polynesian-style Trader Vic’s restaurant and the 2-Michelin-star Atelier Restaurant. Fine drinks are available in the famous falk’s Bar, as well as the Blue Spa Bar & Lounge. The hotel is just a 5-minute walk from sights such as the Bavarian State Opera and the Hofbräuhaus Beer Hall. Private parking spaces are available.

name: Rocco Forte The Charles Hotel
description: Overlooking the Old Botanical Garden, this 5-star design hotel in Munich offers an exclusive spa with indoor pool, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi, and an elegant Neo Bistro with terrace and bar. The air-conditioned rooms and suites of the Rocco Forte The Charles Hotel feature a flat-screen TV, a limestone bathroom with a bathtub and a separate walk-in shower. Most of the rooms enjoy views of the city or of the Old Botanical Garden. The spacious spa area at the Charles Hotel includes a pool, sauna, steam room, and a modern gym. A range of beauty treatments can be booked here. Refined specialities with regional and seasonal products are served in the Sophia's Restaurant & Bar. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in the stylish Sophia's Bar or relax in the lobby lounge The Library while enjoying the Afternoon Tea. The Charles Rocco Forte has a private garage. Munich Central Station is only 500 metres away.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Munich
description: Luxurious rooms, and the famous Matsuhisa, Munich restaurant are featured at this 5-star hotel in the heart of Munich's Old Town. It lies in a quiet side street, a 5-minute walk from Marienplatz Square, just around the corner from the Maximilianstraße shopping street and a short walk from all main attractions. Mandarin Oriental, Munich features elegantly appointed rooms and suites that combine Oriental style and German charm. Rooms are spacious and are fitted with Samsung entertainment systems and a free minibar. The marble bathrooms include high-quality toiletries. Matsuhisa, Munich features renowned Japanese-Peruvian cuisine created by celebrity chef Nobu Matsuhisa. The Lounge invites guests to relax with a delicious afternoon tea, cake specialities and all-day dining offering an international cuisine. Guests are welcome to use the terrace with its 360 degree view city view and its delicious summer snacks and drinks. Hotel guests can also take a break in the Turkish steam bath or Finnish sauna as well as get active in the fully-equipped fitness centre. Mandarin Oriental, Munich also has a small exercise room with modern equipment. The famous Hofbrauhaus Brewery and Marienplatz Underground and S-Bahn Train Stations are all within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

name: Hilton Munich Park
description: Stay close to the action while enjoying the peace and quiet of the Hilton Munich Park hotel's tranquil location next to the scenic English Garden. Visit famous Schwabing entertainment district, just next to the hotel, or spend the afternoon in one of Munich's lovely beer gardens, within walking distance of the hotel. Only 30 minutes' drive from the airport, this Munich hotel offers 21 meeting rooms for up to 1020, a business center, Executive Lounge and wireless internet access. Complimentary WiFi is available in the public area of the hotel. Enjoy international specialties from the summer terrace at Tivoli Restaurant, sip a beer in the People's Bar or meet for a coffee in lively People's Lounge Lobby Cafe at this central Munich hotel. Revive your senses with a work out, swim laps of the pool or unwind in the sauna at the hotel's Hilton Fitness & Relaxation area. Play golf, go running alongside Isar River, hire a boat or visit nearby Munich attractions like the Olympic Garden. From Guest Rooms to Executive Rooms, all have a balcony and air-conditioning. Stay in an Executive Room and enjoy access to the 12th-floor Executive Lounge offering sweeping views of Munich.Hilton

name: Le Méridien Hamburg
description: Discover Le Méridien Hamburg, the Design Hotel, and discover the city in completely new ways. Situated on the banks of the Outer Alster Lake in Hamburg's trendy St. Georg district, the city center is just a short boat trip away. Stay at our family friendly hotel and choose from a variety of newly renovated guest rooms with modern designed interiors. Enjoy our on-site Heritage Restaurant and Bar and plan your next event in our meeting space with a spectacular view. Worried about leaving your pet behind? Not to worry! Our hotel is pet friendly. If you are heading to the sea why don't you just book a night or two at Le Méridien Hamburg with its perfect Alster Lake location? Our hotel is also within easy reach of the main station and attractions like Hamburg's historic districts, trade fair grounds, the harbor, the UNESCO world heritage sites Speicherstadt and Kontorhausviertel and the music halls. After a long day take a dip in our indoor pool, work out in our fitness facility or relax at our on-site spa.Marriott

name: Hotel Atlantic Hamburg, Autograph Collection
description: The Hotel Atlantic opened in 1909 as a classic grand hotel for first-class passengers of famous luxury cruise liners. The magnificent building located on the shores of Lake Alster offers 221 rooms, including 32 suites, with timeless elegance and abundant luxury. Three restaurants ranging from casual to gourmet dining feature regional and interantional flavors while the famous Atlantic Bar excites with creative cocktails and elegant Afternoon Tea. Splendid function rooms and graceful salons provide a multi-faceted selection of stylish settings for events with up to 1,200 guests. Also amongst the jewels of this Hamburg landmark is a private cinema.Marriott

name: Grand Elysee Hamburg
description: This 5-star hotel in Hamburg's Rotherbaum district offers free high-speed WiFi, 3 Restaurants, 2 bars, 1 Cafe and a luxurious spa with indoor swimming pool. The Alster Lake and Jungfernstieg shopping district are less than a 15-minute walk away. The bright and spacious rooms at Grand Elysée are elegantly furnished. All rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, satellite sports channels, an entertainment system and a modern bathroom. Guests enjoy a spacious wellness area in the 1000 m² Elyseum Wellness & Spa with an indoor pool, saunas, one hot tube and gym. The Grand Elysée Hamburg offers European specialities in Theo's, Piazza Romana and the Brasserie Flum. Drinks and snacks are also served in the Boulevard Café, Oyster Bar and the Bourbon Street Bar, where live jazz is also played. Hamburg’s CCH Congress Centre and the Dammtor Train Station are 400 metres from the Grand Elysée Hamburg. Grand Elysée Hamburg offers a Boutique called Stilhouse Blocker with exclusive fashion.

name: Maritim Hotel Bremen
description: This Maritim hotel features elegant rooms and a spa with an indoor pool. The 4-star-superior hotel is located next to a large park in central Bremen, and is close to all main tourist attractions in this Hanseatic city. Every room at the Maritim Hotel Bremen has satellite TV channels, and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available for overnight guests. Guests enjoy use of the Maritim Bremen’s spa, with its indoor pool, Finnish sauna and modern fitness room. In the evenings, exotic cocktails are available in the stylish cocktail bar.

name: Le Méridien Stuttgart
description: Renowned for its German wineries, medieval castles and baroque palaces, Stuttgart is a long-time royal residence and home of Mercedes and Porsche, whose museums are fascinating landmarks. In between those cultural hotspots, Le Méridien Stuttgart is located near the city center, the Old Castle and the New Castle. Our family friendly hotel boasts elegant guest rooms and suites, as well as a spacious wellness area featuring an immersive pool, sauna area and a fully equipped gym. The green parklands of the Schlossgarten opposite the hotel is ideal for an iconic stroll or jog. Across the park, Stuttgart's central street, the Koenigstrasse invites guests for shopping and entertainment. Our new restaurant Kleinschmeckerei serves premium cuts of the finest meat. Extensive Brunch buffet on Sundays and creative cocktails at the Bar Lillet complement the hotel's invitation to savor the good life in Stuttgart. Host your next meeting at our business hotel and let our team help you plan your successful event.Marriott

name: Tulip Inn Ludwigshafen City
description: This 4-star hotel is situated in the centre of Ludwigshafen in the scenic Rhineland-Palatinate region. It offers free WiFi and a swimming pool with a sauna and fitness area. Europa Hotel offers traditionally furnished rooms with satellite TV and a work desk. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer. Tasty regional dishes are available in the restaurant, and guests can relax in the bar in the evenings. Europa is just 20 km from the pretty town of Heidelberg. The Rhine-Neckar region is ideal for hiking and cycling tours. Parking is available in the hotel garage or in a parking garage, a 3-minute walk away.

name: Bilderberg Bellevue Hotel Dresden
description: The Bilderberg Bellevue Hotel Dresden amid beautiful gardens on the banks of the River Elbe, directly across the beautiful Augustus Bridge from Dresden's Baroque district. It has a 120 m² pool and a fitness room. The Bilderberg Bellevue Hotel Dresden has modern rooms and exclusive suites, which are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a bathroom. A rich breakfast is served in the Palais Restaurant with terrace. Guests can enjoy cocktails at the Café-Bar Pöppelmann. In summer the Elbsegler-Biergarten is open and offers cool beer and grilled specialities. The Neustädter Markt tram stop is only a 2-minute walk away and offers a direct connection to Dresden's main train station. Sights such as the Frauenkirche church, the Semper Opera or Zwinger Palace are only a few minutes' walk away. In addition, you have a unique view of Dresden's Old Town silhouette from the hotel garden.

name: Maritim Hotel Dresden
description: This hotel is located in the city centre, just a few steps away from the Semper Opera House and Dresden's historic Old Town district. It offers spacious accommodation, a swimming pool and a large terrace along the River Elbe. The elegant, air-conditioned rooms at the Maritim Hotel Dresden feature TV and a safe with laptop charger. WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in the whole hotel. Hotel guests can also use the Maritim Hotel Dresden's modern spa area (for a fee). This has a swimming pool, sauna and steam room. A beauty salon and massage services are also available at a surcharge. From the conservatory restaurant with terrace, offering international and regional dishes, you have views of the Elbe and city centre. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Dresden's numerous sightseeing attractions. The pathway along the Elbe is also popular with hikers and cyclists.

name: Best Western Macrander Hotel Dresden
description: Just travel with us! Centrally located in Dresden Neustadt, the Best Western Macrander Hotel Dresden convinces business and tourist travelers to visit one of the most fascinating cities in Germany. The hotel is for everyone, because the old town, train station, airport, and motorway can be reached quickly, and it is conveniently cheap! Modern and friendly furnished 85 rooms, equipped with individually adjustable air conditioning, bathroom with tub, cosmetic mirror, hair dryer, free Wi-Fi, and coffee and tea making facilities. Start the day with a delicious sandwich or bagel in Stephans Casual Diner or just with a Starbucks® coffee to go. This modern foodie grab & eat concept allows for quick and uncomplicated enjoyment in a lounge atmosphere. In the directly adjacent neighboring hotel, you have as well the possibility to eat an extensive breakfast buffet or to dine in the evening. In addition, here in the ‘’Hechtviertel’’ culinary gourmets but also students with a tight budget will find just the right thing for themselves. Benefit from the neighborhood to our Conference Center Neustadt, 20 meters away. Here you will find ideal conditions for successful meetings, conferences, seminars as well as festivities. 7 multifunctional conference rooms with a capacity for up to 120 people and their own rhetoric studio. In the neighboring hotel, you will find a pool, sauna, and fitness facilities that you are welcome to use (entrance fee may apply).bestwestern.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Dresden
description: Located in the heart of Dresden, the Courtyard Dresden is the perfect hotel to explore the city. It is situated only a couple of minutes from the historic downtown and is easily accessible from public transportation, train station, motorway and the airport. Featuring 121 hotel guest rooms with complimentary sky TV, coffee and tea bar, and free WiFi. It also offers a wide variety of practical services such as a 24h business center. When staying at the Courtyard Dresden make sure to take advantage of the body and soul recreation center with saunas, indoor pool, infrared cabin and 24h gym. For lunch or dinner, join us at stephans restaurant with front cooking station. After a long day, enjoy a cool beer or exotic cocktail in stephans bar and lounge. The Courtyard Dresden is the ideal place to stay when visiting on business or leisure. The hotel also features 7 adjoining meeting rooms, which ensure successful and productive meetings in Dresden.Marriott

name: Hotel Taschenbergpalais Kempinski Dresden
description: The Taschenbergpalais/ originally built in 1705 by August the Strong/ is located on Dresdens theatre square/ in the immediate vicinity of world-famous sights such as the Semper Opera or Church of our Lady Frauenkirche. The 213 elegant rooms and luxurious suites combine modern design elements and baroque elegance. Beyond the variety of four restaurants and bars/ ten elegantly furnished conference and meeting rooms are available with views of the most renowned sights in Dresden.priceline.com

name: Hotel Melchior Park
description: Situated in Würzburg, 2.9 km from Würzburg Cathedral, Hotel Melchior Park features accommodation with a bar and private parking. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and fitness centre, as well as a sauna. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Melchior Park the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German and English. Würzburg Residence with the Court Gardens is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Wuerzburg Central Station is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nuremberg Airport, 100 km from Hotel Melchior Park.

name: Kongresshotel Potsdam am Templiner See
description: Set amid the Pirschheide lakes and woodlands, this 4-star congress hotel is located on the shores of Lake Templiner See, just to the west of Potsdam's town centre. WiFi is provided free of charge. Kongresshotel Potsdam am Templiner See offers well-equipped rooms in 3 futuristic buildings, named after airships originally built in this area. Some rooms are equipped with air conditioning. The hotel is an ideal venue for business events. The unique glass architecture and natural daylight provide ideal conditions for creative thinking. Guests can dine in the hotel's à la carte Lemon restaurant, or in the Zeppelin theme restaurant, but also enjoy a drink in the stylish Blue Sky Bar & Lounge, or in the open-air bar with a view of the lake. The excellent public transport connections from the Kongresshotel am Templiner See mean that you are just 10 minutes from the centre of Potsdam, and 30 minutes from Berlin.

name: Maritim Hotel Ulm
description: This Maritim hotel stands directly beside the River Danube, near Ulm’s old town. It offers elegant rooms with air conditioning, and an indoor pool. All rooms at the Maritim Hotel Ulm have a modern bathroom and satellite TV. Free wired internet is provided in all rooms, and there is free WiFi in the whole hotel. Featuring Ulmer Gulden where you can go for breakfast and for dinner, additionally you can also order food to your room. The Maritim Ulm is connected to the Ulm Congress Centre. The historic Ulm Cathedral and the Donaustadion Stadium are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hyatt Regency Cologne
description: Offering great views of the Cologne Cathedral and gourmet cuisine, this stylish business hotel is located in central Cologne directly beside the River Rhine. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. Featuring a striking façade, the Hyatt Regency Köln has spacious, classical-style rooms and suites with a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee facilities, and a non-complimentary minibar. All include an elegant marble bathroom. The Puls Hyatt Fitness Club includes a 24h gym, as well as an indoor swimming pool, a steam bath and a sauna. Massages are non-complimentary and available upon request. International specialties are served in the Hyatt’s Glashaus restaurant, located in the glass atrium. Its windows provide wonderful views of the Old Town, the cathedral and River Rhine. Fine cocktails and whiskeys are available in the Legends bar with summer terrace. In addition, directly on the adjacent Rhine promenade, you will find the associated restaurants Sticky Fingers, which impresses with street food delicacies, and Grissini, which invites you to enjoy authentic Italian food. Deutzer Freiheit Underground Station is 300 metres from the Hyatt Regency Köln. This is 1 stop from the Kölnmesse Exhibition Centre and 2 stops from the Lanxess Arena. Alternatively, both destinations as well as the cathedral are also within 10 minutes walking distance.

name: H4 Hotel Leipzig
description: The 4 star H4 Leipzig situated nearby the city centre and the fair grounds. Leipzig offers many attractions such as the Monument of the Battle of the Nations - Voelkerdenkmal, the robe house - Gewandhaus, the Nikolai Church, the opera, and much more. Directly next to the hotel, you find Saxonys largest water and fun park called Sachsentherme with complimentary entrance for our hotel guests. The restaurant with winter garden offers German and International Cuisine. Enjoy dancing on Friday or Saturday evening in the dance bar or relax in the cozy bar with a cocktail. The recreation area includes a whirlpool, sauna, solarium, steam bath and fitness corner. Stay connected with free WiFi throughout the hotel. The hotel is in easy walking distance to a shopping mall, and next to a leisure and wellness bath, and a sport centre. Hotel has direct connection to the motorway A14/A9 and the airport. Pet Fee for a daily fee. Breakfast Buffet charge for a nominal fee.Wyndham

name: Hotel Birke - Appartments Waldesruh
description: Featuring free WiFi. Apartments Waldesruh offers pet-friendly accommodation in Kiel. The apartments Waldesruh are 3-stars-standard. Guests can enjoy the bar, restaurant, terrace and spa area at a neighbouring hotel, 50 metres away, There is no lift. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. There is no lift. In the parking area are 3 charging stations for electric cars available for a fee. Bike hire is available at the hotel and the area is popular for cycling. City-Park Kiel is 1.9 km from Apartments Waldesruh, while Sophienhof is 3.7 km from the property. Hamburg Airport is 76 km away.

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Frankfurt Neue Oper
description: Situated a short walk from Frankfurt Central Railway Station, Adina Apartment Hotel Frankfurt Neue Oper offers guests an ideal base while in Frankfurt am Main. This trendy property is set in the heart of the city. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Amenities include free wireless internet, a swimming pool and a sauna. The apartments are air conditioned and offer a private balcony, a refrigerator and a mini bar. They come with a seating area, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. A variety of dining options can also be found in close proximity to the property. Frankfurt am Main's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Adina Apartment Hotel Frankfurt, with the Frankfurt Opera only a short walk away. It is also within walking distance of Frankfurt Stock Exchange, Deutsche Bank and Romer.Revato

name: Kameha Grand Bonn
address: Am Bonner Bogen 1, 53227 Bonn, North Rhine-Westphalia
description: WELCOME TO YOUR LIFESTYLE HOTEL IN BONN!Diversity, Design, Architecture, Spontaneity - The Kameha Grand Bonn stands for lifestyle at all different levels and is the right place for people who share a passion for the extraordinary. In addition, we write the topic of sustainability big! For the Kameha Grand Bonn, environmental responsibility is also part of the company philosophy. Thanks to our geothermal system, the Kameha Grand as a Green Hotel can cover 70 percent of its heating and cooling needs. In the midst of the idyllic and at the same time representative Bonner Bogen, the Kameha Grand Bonn surprises with its imposing architecture and sheer infinite possibilities for development. The Rhenish relaxed vibes, amusement, and naturalness meet bold style.As for stars, the only one we need is the Michelin star, situated at the top of our hotel on the 5th floor in Yunico - Japanese Fine Dining. Our combination of playful design and casual lifestyle makes us simply grand, the Kameha Grand Bonn your favourite place.WELCOME TO YOUR FAVOURITE LOCATION!Architecture, design, furnishings: At the Kameha Grand Bonn everything you see and experience is of first-class quality, but what the heart really desires goes beyond that. It is a sense of awareness which we create for our guests. An experience of serene, intimate, delight, mixed with posh yet relaxed vibes.The Kameha Grand Bonn is your favourite place to unwind and renew your quality of life, a place to let go and be taken care of and for our team at the Kameha Grand Bonn what really matters is the smile, your smile.Our service is informal, relaxed and individual. From shopping to event tickets to the restaurant visit, our guest service team lets their guests play, shares their insider tips and makes your visit a special experience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Reindl's Partenkirchner Hof
description: Just a 3-minute walk from Garmisch-Partenkirchen Train Station and the cable car to Zugspitze Mountain, this hotel features a spa with pool. Reindl’s Partenkirchener Hof includes 3 separate buildings. Rooms feature traditional Bavarian décor or a classic 19th-Century style. Some rooms offer mountain views. The spa area features 2 saunas, 1 steam bath, and a fitness rooml. Guests can also book massages and beauty treatments, or can simply relax in Reindl’s garden. Reindl’s Partenkirchener Hof provides rental bicycles and storage space for ski equipment.

name: Electra Palace Athens
description: With a great location in the centre of Plaka, facing the Acropolis, this 5-star hotel offers personalised service, a beautiful rooftop pool and well-appointed rooms with a buffet breakfast included. Electra Palace Hotel Athens is within walking distance from most of Athens' main attractions. Syntagma Square is less than 5 minutes' walk away and the parliament and shopping districts are nearby. The spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. Thoughtful touches also include bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms offer direct views of the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with Greek Breakfast provided in the dining area. Electra Palace Hotel's rooftop has a lovely pool area and a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The restaurant's terrace looks directly to the Acropolis. The helpful staff at Electra Palace is happy to offer local information and advice. Guests can also make use of the hotel's spa facilities, including an indoor pool and sauna.

name: Athens Marriott Hotel
description: The Athens Marriott hotel is located on the bustling artery of Syngrou Avenue, within walking distance of the Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Centre and the Athenian Riviera.Designed to perfection, our rooms and suites, are outfitted with contemporary decor and plush bedding, spa inspired bathrooms and modern workspaces. M Club rooms afford guests access to the M Club, the perfect space to recharge. Stay active in our well-equipped fitness centre or recharge your body and soul with our signature spa treatments. Take your seat in The Great Room or join us outdoors in the Atrium and relax in to the chic, urban setting. Indulge in Mediterranean flavours at the Made in Athens restaurant and surround yourself with impeccable views on the e&o Athens rooftop while relaxing with a cocktail and savouring delicious fusion cuisine. Do business in style in our sophisticated spaces where our on site planners and culinary team will take your event to the next level, ensuring you a memorable experience.Marriott

name: Semiramis
description: Facing a tranquil green park in the Kifissia area of north Athens, the boutique hotel Semiramis is the creation of designer, Karim Rashid. Member of Design Hotels worldwide, the Semiramis ideally combines design, comfort and functionality. Works from the owner’s extensive art collection including pieces by Jeff Koons, Sue Webster and Tim Noble can be viewed at the Semiramis’ bi-annually rotating exhibition in public hotel spaces. All its guestrooms and public areas carry Rashid's distinctive signature. Light pinks and greens, oranges and subtle yellows are reproduced in walls, floors, furnishings and fittings for an energetic atmosphere. Semiramis' global guests may stay in touch with the world or the office - internet TVs complete with cordless keyboards come as standard. The hotel's two-level restaurant and bar, serve contemporary Greek, European and international flavours. The Semiraris is right on Kefalari Square, 5 minutes from Kifissia. It is 10 minutes from the business centre of Marousi and 30 minutes from the centre of Athens.

name: Divani Palace Acropolis
description: Featuring breathtaking views of the Acropolis from its rooftop terrace, Divani Palace Acropolis offers elegant rooms. It is walking distance from the new Acropolis museum and Herodion theatre. All with private furnished balconies, Divani Palace rooms are decorated in natural colours and feature classic furnishings. They are equipped with a TV with satellite and cable channels, air conditioning and safety box. Most offer spectacular views to the Acropolis and Philopappou Hill. A unique feature of the Divani Palace Acropolis hotel is the ancient ruins of Themistocles wall, discovered in the foundations during construction and tastefully incorporated in the hotel's architectural design. The rooftop restaurant Acropolis Secret is open during the summer season and serves Greek and international dishes. Aspassia, the main restaurant, offers Mediterranean cuisine and American breakfast in a stylish setting. The hotel can arrange a free shuttle bus to Syntagma Square during your stay. The Acropolis Metro Station is within 500 metres, while scenic Plaka is a 10-minute walk away.

name: St George Lycabettus Hotel
description: Nestled against the pine-forested slopes of Lycabettus Hill, the St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel affords breathtaking panoramic views over Athens to the Acropolis and the Saronic Gulf beyond. Guests are also perfectly positioned in the pulsing heart of Athens, just steps away from Kolonakis alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries. Discover our elegant, family-friendly hotel in the center of the city the perfect place to experience all that Athens has to offer!iHotelier/iStay

name: Tharroe Of Mykonos
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Mykonos City, Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, kitchen, postal service, ticket service are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, clothes rack, complimentary tea, linens, sewing kit. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Mykonos has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos
description: Located in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 300 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Kapari Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Korfos is a 16-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Noima Boutique Hotel Mykonos.

name: Semeli Hotel
description: The sophisticated Hotel Semeli is situated in Mykonos town, 500m from Megali Ammos beach. It boasts tastefully decorated accommodation with sea, town or garden views, a sweet-water, heated pool with sun beds and a spa. All rooms or suites at Semeli Hotel Mykonos have a flat screen TV, seating area, marble bathroom and French doors with sea views. Whitewashed walls and a garden with geraniums and bougainvilleas provide the rooms’ exterior setting. Some units have an indoor or an outdoor hot tub. The a la carte restaurant Thioni serves a rich buffet breakfast by the pool. Greek and Italian cuisine is served throughout the day indoors or on the veranda overlooking the sea or the garden. Guests can enjoy cocktails at the hotel's pool bar. Guests can make use of the Semeli Hotel Mykonos gym facilities or relax with a Turkish hammam, or a massage session at the Semeli Spa. A variety of facial and body treatments are available. Within walking distance, guests can reach the centre of Mykonos town where many bars, cafes and restaurants can be found. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel and free private on-site parking is possible.

name: A Hotel Mykonos
description: Set in a quiet countryside area only 15 minutes' walk from Mykonos Town, The A Hotel by Mykonos Arhontiko offers charming accommodation with a swimming pool and hot tub. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and free shuttle service. The tastefully decorated rooms and apartments at the A Hotel come each with a furnished patio overlooking the pool. They are built in traditional Cycladic style, and their facilities include air conditioning, satellite LCD TV and a fridge. A rich breakfast comes with the room served in the restaurant, where lunch and dinner is available for the rest of the day. If you wish, you can just spend a day at the Arhontiko with all amenities available. The swimming pool follows eco-friendly standards for water purification. Next to the pool, you will find the hot tub, as well as wooden deck chairs with mattresses, umbrellas and a pool bar. Staff are readily available for your car/bike rentals, island tours, as well as restaurant reservations, massage appointments and more. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Mykonos Princess Hotel
description: Mykonos Princess is located within walking distance of the sandy Beach of Agios Stefanos. It features a magnificent sea view pool, modern rooms with luxury amenities, and a Greek contemporary restaurant. The rooms of Mykonos Princess all feature free internet access and they each include a satellite LCD TV, a minibar and a safe. Most of the rooms have a furnished sea-view balcony or terrace. The wellness center features a gym. Discover the path to a healthier lifestyle with a variety of wellness services available at Mykonos Princess Wellness Center. Indulge in complete serenity and privacy with a revitalizing massage and experience a unique sense of relaxation. Re-energize mind, body and soul with a wide selection of fitness services and programs that can be customized to address your specific exercise goals. Al a carte breakfast is served daily in the dining and pool area. The hotel’s restaurant serves modern Greek cuisine in a romantic poolside setting. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar with views of Mykonos Town and Delos island Mykonos Airport is 4.8 km from Mykonos Princess. The picturesque town of Mykonos is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Monasty, Thessaloniki, Autograph Collection
description: Elegant and luxurious as a silk thread, MonAsty Thessaloniki located in the heart of the city, connects the vibrant city's entertainment and business life. This tapestry of inspiration reflects in its name, Mon from monastery, and Asty which means city. That heritage acted as a base for the hotel's interior design with unique elements of monastic design, colors and imagery drawn from Byzantine tradition. 100 rooms provide guests an optimal experience of luxury, arched doorways, embossed fonts recall the monastic tradition while art created by local artisans further adds to an exquisite stay. Extraordinary culinary experiences will be offered by the hotel's all-day lounge and rooftop bar with Mediterranean comfort cuisine and exquisite cocktails. MonAsty's facilities provide an exceptional range of choices for business meetings and events with private dining options, lounges, meeting and conference rooms. A fully-equipped fitness center links to the present, empowering guests to experience wellness with comfoMarriott

name: Ambassador Hotel Thessaloniki
description: With a breathtaking view of the city, Ambassador Hotel is located within 5 minutes’ drive from Macedonia Airport and 15 minutes from Thessaloniki’s city centre. It features a lovely pool area. The Ambassador Hotel guest rooms stand out for their great look and modern design, and have adjustable air conditioning, satellite TV, a minibar, and free Wi-Fi. Each features tasteful furnishings, including a desk and a chair. Guests can start their day with a rich breakfast buffet. The Ambassador’s Restaurant - Bar which serves traditional Greek dishes and enjoys views of the city and the Thermaikos Bay. During the summer months, the pool area offers the perfect spot for a romantic dinner.

name: Mediterranean Palace Hotel
description: Strategically positioned in the heart of the commercial and business centre of Thessaloniki, Mediterranean Palace provides 5-star accommodation with magnificent views of the Thermaikos Gulf. The Mediterranean Palace Hotel has 111 rooms and 7 suites, finely equipped with en suite bathroom with toiletries, satellite TV and air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in all rooms and public areas of the hotel. "Cookoo" restaurant is a place of culinary delight, for a coffee or snack break, a relaxed lunch or dinner. "Fellows" Bar is a pleasant place for friendly or professional meetings, cocktails and drinks. Conference facilities are also available in the 7 fully equipped meeting rooms with a capacity of 300 participants. The hotel is located next to the famous historical area of Ladadika within easy access to the shopping centre of Thessaloniki. Nearby attractions include the White Tower, the Archaeological Museum and the Byzantine churches of the city. Underground 24hour guarded parking is available for all hotel guests.

name: The Met Hotel
description: Situated by the waterfront in Thessaloniki’s up-and-coming industrial harbor area, The Met Hotel is a 212-room cultural icon that blurs the lines between art gallery and luxury hotel. Installations by some of the world’s foremost contemporary artists have been handpicked for the hotel. The broader design concept is centered on open spaces and fine-quality materials. The hotel features an indulgent spa, chic dining options and state of the art business conferencing facilities, all supported by outstanding services and meticulous attention to detail.Marriott

name: Hyperion City Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers 4-star accommodation in Chania Town and has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and shared lounge. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 300 metres from Koum Kapi Beach, less than 1 km from Saint Anargyri Church and a 12-minute walk from Archaeological Museum of Chania. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers some rooms with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hyperion City Hotel & Spa. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Greek, local and European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyperion City Hotel & Spa offers a sun terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hyperion City Hotel & Spa include House-Museum of Eleftherios Venizelos, Municipal Art Gallery of Chania and Mitropoleos Square. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Pela Mare Hotel
description: Pela Mare Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Gazi area. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like closet, towels, fireplace, separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, diving, pool (kids), garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Crete Island has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Pela Mare Hotel.Agoda

name: Rethymno Mare Royal & Water Park
description: Just a few metres from Skaleta Beach, Rethymno Mare Royal features a pool with a sun terrace, a bar and a restaurant. Covering a lush 35.000-m2 area, the property also includes a tennis court, a mini market, 2 coference rooms and a games room with billiards. All rooms and suites of Mare Royal open to a balcony overlooking the pool and the Cretan Sea. Fitted with marbled floors and warm colours, each air-conditioned unit features a fridge, a safe and a Samsung Smart IP TV 43". The private bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast with local specialities served daily at Dionysos Restaurant. Drinks and coffees can be enjoyed at the pool bar or the beach bar, while Mediterranean flavours are served at the restaurant. Themed nights with live music are also scheduled regularly. Children can swim safely in their own pool, while there is also animation program, kids’ buffet and a mini club. Sun beds and umbrellas are available by the pool and on the beach. Other facilities include table tennis, darts, volleyball, water polo, boccia. Massage treatments can be arranged upon request, while room service is also available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide car rental and ticket services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Rethymno Mare Royal lies within 11 km from Rethymno Town and Port and 65 km from Heraklion City. The seaside Bali Village with its sandy beach is at 21 km. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Sunny Bay Hotel
description: On the beachfront of Kissamos, Sunny Bay Hotel Hotel offers accommodation with sea or pool views, traditional Cretan cuisine and free WiFi throughout. Kissamos centre is just a short stroll away. Sunny Bay Hotel’s restaurant serves an extensive buffet of local and international dishes during breakfast and dinner. The indoor and pool bars are perfect for drinks. Staff can provide beach umbrellas or arrange bicycle rental. Sunny Bay Hotel features a games area with table tennis and billiards. An on-site store is available for necessities. Each air-conditioned room includes a private balcony with outdoor seating area. Rooms also feature satellite TVs and well-stocked mini bars. Famous Falassarna beach is just 15 km away and the archaeological site of Polyrinia is only a 10-minute drive. Chania Airport is 50 km away.

name: Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso
description: Surrounded by the enchanting scenery of Athens Riviera, with magnificent sea views, Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso features a state-of-the-art thalassotherapy centre. In a majestic environment surrounded by sea, guests enjoy 3 pools, 4 restaurants and a private beach. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso offers luxurious rooms with furnished sea-facing balconies. The elegantly decorated rooms, are fitted with designer fabrics, oak furniture, paintings and all share stunning views to the sea and the pools. At Papaioannou fine-dining restaurant, guests can indulge in a delicious gastronomy with treasures of the sea and culinary plates accompanied by fine wine and an intimate atmosphere just in front of the sea. At Breakfast the extensive buffet includes a great variety of Greek delicacies as well as European favorites and of course fresh fruits and juices. Casual restaurants include Anemos, with buffets and outdoor seating with views to the pool and sea, the bright and contemporary Atlantis Lounge and A&D bar, both offering light snacks, signature cocktails and live music. Meltemi poolside snack bar offers a shaded seating area that overlooks the pools and is open during the summer period. The Awarded Spa, by World Travel Awards 2014, invites guests to experience a completely different programme of rejuvenation and wellbeing with its programs. Facilities include a 270-m² indoor pool, roman baths, 2 saunas, 2 Turkish baths and a variety of more than 100 facial and body therapies. Active guests will enjoy the flood-lit tennis court and jogging route. Watersports at the property's private beach are also available. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso is 18 km from downtown Athens. Glyfada, famous for shopping and night life, is only 5 minutes away by shuttle bus. Glyfada Golf Club is easily reached at 3 km. The hotel has a 250-car garage.

name: Aar Hotel & Spa Ioannina
address: 14th Km Of National Road Athens, Ioánnina
description: Surrounded by lush greenery, the 4-star Aar Hotel & Spa features an indoor heated pool, an outdoor pool and a restaurant. It offers elegant units with autonomous heating. Ioannina City is accessible within a 14-minute drive. Decorated with modern furnishings, all air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Aar Hotel have a flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi. Each comes with a mini fridge and a safety box. Greek and Mediterranean tastes can be enjoyed at the restaurant. Free room service is also provided. A fitness centre, a business centre and banquet facilities are also featured on site. Younger guests can enjoy the children’s pool. A shopping mall is just across the street. The on-site spa center features services including body and beauty treatments. Please note that there are additional charges for the use of hammam and sauna. The ancient theatre of Dodoni is at distance of 6 km, while Vrelli Museum is within 200 metres. Egnatia Odos can be found at a distance of 5 km.

name: The Romanos, a Luxury Collection Resort, Costa Navarino
address: Navarino Dunes, Costa Navarino, Costa Navarino
description: Enjoying a privileged position by the Ionian Sea in Navarino Dunes area of Costa Navarino, the prime sustainable destination in the Mediterranean, The Romanos has been acclaimed as leading resort in Greece with Condé Nast Traveller’s 2022 Readers’ Choice Award in “The best resorts in the world”. The property captures authentic and exceptional qualities of Messinia through its award-winning architecture, combining grand column-lined walkways with elegant, contemporary design, uninterrupted views of the coastline, and a wonderful backdrop of the golf landscape. The Romanos features exquisite guestrooms, while the superb Ionian Exclusive suites and beachfront villas additionally offer anticipatory Butler service and select amenities. Embark on epicurean journeys at elite venues, with fine menus curated by acclaimed chefs, rejuvenate at Anazoe Spa, experience four world-class signature golf courses and the new Mouratoglou Tennis Center, along with an impressive array of sports and authentic experiences.Marriott

name: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel
description: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel welcomes you with spacious accommodation, modern amenities and an exceptional location. You'll find our hotel on the outskirts of Heathrow Airport, just a short distance from nearby attractions including Twickenham Stadium and within easy reach of Central London. Contemporary rooms and suites offer deluxe bedding, free Wi-Fi access, 24-hour room service and stunning views of the airport runway from soundproof windows. Additional perks throughout the hotel include a modern fitness center. We proudly offer several superb dining options - from global dining at Market Garden Restaurant to Starbucks® coffee at Cafe Cha. Those hosting an event near Heathrow will be thrilled with our well-appointed venues, including the pillar-free Westminster Suite - as well as comprehensive planning and catering services, an on-site business center and abundant on-site parking. Whatever brings you to the area, we know you'll enjoy your stay at Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel.Marriott

name: The Savoy
description: The Savoy has been at the forefront of the luxury hotel scene for over 130 years. The hotel 267 rooms and suites celebrate The Savoy dual historical influence with either Edwardian or art deco design, and guests of suites are looked after by the Savoy Butlers. Within The Savoy, guests will also find some of the most well-known restaurants and bars in London. With exceptional service at the heart of everything, a Savoy experience is built on memories created and stories told across the generationsaccorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn London - Kensington High St.
description: The stylish Holiday Inn London Kensington High Street is located in a quiet spot close to the shops of Kensington High Street just a few minutes walk from the nearest tube underground station. Following an extensive multi million pound refurbishment the hotel offers 706 modern guest rooms all equipped with high speed WiFi Internet connection along with a host of other modern amenities and features stylishly and thoughtfully designed, Located in the back of the hotel a stunning private garden awaits you. Or enjoy our Health Club which has a full length swimming pool Whirlpool sauna steam room treatment rooms and a fully equipped gym. Kensington Health Club and Spa provides a great contrast from the hustle and bustle of the city by providing our guests with a luxurious tranquil retreat. We can provide you with an escape from the stress of everyday life and give you your own space where you can listen to your body and indulge accordingly in the great facilities it has to offer. Swimming pool and gym are complimentary and Spa packages are available.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Delta Hotels by Marriott Manchester Airport
address: Hale Road, Hale Barns, Manchester, WA15 8XW
description: Stay in comfort and enjoy a convenient location at Delta Hotels by Marriott Manchester Airport the perfect destination for business trip or leisure stays. Our park and fly hotel is just two miles from Manchester Airport with onsite parking and features two exquisite restaurants, Brasserie Blanc with French fare and San Carlo for Tuscan-inspired dining. Make yourself at home in our spacious, family friendly accommodation complete with pillow top bedding, flat-screen TVs, free WiFi and bedside USB charging. Upgrade for even more amenities including access to our executive lounge. Relax in our spa, take a dip in the indoor pool or keep fit in our fully equipped gym. Those hosting events will appreciate our 954 square meters of versatile space and ease of access to both the airport and the M56. If you are interested in exploring, Manchester city centre and the Cheshire countryside are well within reach. By focusing on the details that truly matter, we can make them perfect.Marriott

name: Citysuites Aparthotel
description: Deansgate is a 2-minute walk away and Manchester Victoria Station is 350 metres away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The building has swimming pool, gym and hot tub available for guests to use. The accommodation is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There is a seating and/or dining area in all units. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A toaster and coffee machine are also offered. Towels and bed linen are featured, and all apartments are serviced on a weekly basis. Embankment Kitchen is open daily from 07:00 serving breakfast, coffee and pressed juices. Manchester Cathedral is a 3-minute walk from CitySuites, while the Manchester Central Convention Complex is 0.7 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Manchester Airport, 9.8 miles from CitySuites.

name: Citysuites Two Aparthotel
description: Situated in Manchester, 500 metres from Chetham's Library and less than 1 km from the centre, CitySuites Two Aparthotel features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A Full English/Irish, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The restaurant at the aparthotel specialises in British, French and Italian cuisine. At CitySuites Two Aparthotel guests are welcome to take advantage of an indoor pool. The accommodation features amenities such as an on-site business centre, hot tub and steam room. Popular points of interest near CitySuites Two Aparthotel include Manchester Arena, John Rylands Library and Opera House Manchester. The nearest airport is Manchester Airport, 16 km from the aparthotel.

name: The Niu Loom
description: Located in Manchester, 2.1 km from Manchester Arena, the niu Loom provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Chetham's Library. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At the niu Loom every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Languages spoken at the reception include English and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.
