Greater Manchester Police Museum is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while John Rylands Library is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Manchester Airport, 18 km from the niu Loom.

name: Norton House Hotel & Spa
description: Set in a Victorian mansion in 55 acres of grounds, Norton House features a luxury spa, award-winning restaurant and boutique rooms with free internet. Edinburgh is a 20-minute drive, and Edinburgh Airport is 3 miles away. The 4-star bedrooms at Norton House Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh each have a modern bathroom with free toiletries and fluffy bathrobes. All rooms have a satellite TV/DVD player and a minibar. Guests can relax in the sauna, steam room or hydrotherapy pool in the luxurious spa. The health club also has a swimming pool with feature fountains, a fully equipped gym and treatment rooms. The Brasserie offers traditional British cuisine, and The Glass Lounge serves classic cocktails and afternoon teas. Set in leafy grounds, Norton House Hotel is just off the junction of M8 and M9 motorways. Free on-site parking is available, and Edinburgh Castle can be reached in 20 minutes by car. Please note all children must be accompanied by a parent or guardian over 18 years of age and Children's swim times apply and differ during holiday time. Please contact the hotel for more information.

name: Sheraton Grand Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh
description: Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage city centre is best explored on foot and the Sheraton Grand is ideally located to discover its outstanding history and architectural beauty. Our 5-star luxury spa hotel has all the amenities you need. Wake up refreshed in our dreamily comfortable Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience™ beds and enjoy inspiring views of Edinburgh Castle from our Castle View Rooms & Suites. Spend your day exploring the Royal Mile or browsing the shops on George Street before escaping to Scotland's most renowned urban thermal spa experience, One Spa. Unwind in our iconic rooftop Hydropool to start your journey to wellbeing and rejuvenation. Find inner calm in our Thermal Suite, an unrivalled range of uplifting water, salt and heat experiences designed to help you rebalance and refresh your body and mind. Put your relaxation above everything else at Edinburgh’s ultimate spa. Stay in a Club & Spa Room for complimentary spa access & evening drinks and canapés in our Club Lounge.Marriott

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Edinburgh City Centre
address: 80 High Street The Royal Mile, Edinburgh, EH1 1TH
description: Radisson Blu Hotel, Edinburgh City Centre features a spa/ fitness centre, bar and bedrooms with free Wi-Fi. Waverley train station is just a 5-minute walk away. Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries. Rooms also feature a TV with satellite channels, and a work area. The hotel features an indoor heated swimming pool, a sauna and a fully equipped fitness suite. There is a 24-hour front desk and business centre. Itchycoo Bar and Kitchen overlooks the Royal Mile, and serves a varied and seasonal menu. There is also a restaurant, offering traditional Scottish breakfast. Just a 10-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle, Radisson Blu Hotel, Edinburgh City Centre is 500 meters away from lively Princes Street. Holyrood Park and Palace are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Delta Hotels by Marriott Edinburgh
description: Whether traveling to Edinburgh for work or vacation you’ll enjoy the 4-star comfort and excellent service of the Delta Hotels by Marriott Edinburgh. We are ideally located two miles from Edinburgh Airport and only 15 minutes from the historic city centre. On-site parking and public transport links via bus, tram and rail make it easy to explore the city from our hotel. Our deluxe double/double rooms are perfect for families and our Suites are ideal for anyone who needs extra living space. Relax in our heated indoor pool or maintain your fitness regime in our gym. Start or end your day in Edinburgh in Cast Iron Grill or enjoy light bites and drinks in Brew Bar.Marriott

name: Radisson RED Glasgow
address: Finnieston Quay; 25 Tunnel Street, Glasgow, G3 8HL
description: Radisson RED hotel in Glagsow features 174 rooms, 3 event and games studios, Glasgow’s first official rooftop bar, a fitness room and 76 car parking spaces. The property is located 200 yards from The Hydro, and is a 4-minute walk from the SECC. All rooms at Radisson RED Glasgow are equipped with a flat-screen TV and seating areas, wall art and a private bathroom. Rooms with a view such as the Glasgow skyline, SEC campus and the river are available. The Sweet Suite also features a pool table, private kitchen and living area. The OUIBar + KTCHN is open all day and features food, craft beer, cocktails and a pool table. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of Glasgow as well as bar snacks and drinks at the hotel's Red Sky Bar. Additional facilities include 3 events and games studios. The OUIBar + KTCHN is the hotels food, drink and social hub. Guests can enjoy cocktails or craft beers over a game of pool or while watching TV in the snug. Head upstairs later to watch the sunset over the River Clyde and Glasgow at the hotels RED Sky Bar. Guests can sample the bar's cocktail menu, share tapas and enjoy music from local DJs. Located in the West End adjacent to the SSE Hydro, SEC Armadillo and SEC Centre, Radisson RED Hotel, Glasgow is only 1.5 miles from Buchanan Street. Glasgow Airport is 8 miles from the property, and the nearest rail station is Exhibition Centre, a 7-minute walk away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Glasgow Westerwood Spa & Golf Resort
description: Welcome to DoubleTree by Hilton Glasgow Westerwood Spa and Golf Resort. Our contemporary property is set within acres of wooded countryside overlooked by the beautiful Campsie Hills, yet offers quick and easy motorway access to Glasgow, Stirling and Edinburgh. With luxurious leisure facilities, first-class dining, flexible conference spaces and an 18-hole golf course designed by Seve Ballesteros, we’re the perfect venue for weddings, corporate events, and weekend retreats. Unwind in one of our spacious guest rooms and enjoy complimentary high-speed WiFi and a 49-inch HDTV. Upgrade to a suite for a larger TV, separate lounge area and views across the golf course. Our hotel offers an award-winning spa with 10 treatment rooms, an indoor heated pool and extensive gym facilities, so you can relax and recharge throughout your stay. Enjoy award-winning food and service in our a la carte restaurant, Flemings. We offer local Scottish produce and classic dining in a semi-formal but relaxed environment. The Grill Restaurant and Bar is open from noon until 10pm and serves classic British pub favorites, while Flemings Lounge is open from 10.30am for a range of beverages and cocktails throughout the day. Host a meeting or conference in our contemporary hotel. We offer 10 fully flexible meeting rooms catering for over 675 delegates, and all A/V needs can be catered for. Our stunning natural surroundings make us the perfect backdrop for bespoke weddings and events.Hilton

name: Uplawmoor
description: Set in the picturesque hills of Renfrewshire, Uplawmoor Hotel offers rooms with satellite TV. Guests can enjoy traditional Scottish breakfasts cooked to order and an award-winning restaurant. Each room at Uplawmoor features a private bathroom, tea/coffee facilities, and complimentary spring water. Awarded 2 AA rosettes for cuisine, Uplawmoor serves an á la carte and a seasonal menu made from local produce. The lounge bar serves local real ales, and features a relaxing beer garden leading into the village park. Breakfast is served each morning, including Scottish hot porridge, a varied buffet, and a full Scottish breakfast with local black pudding. Located in the tranquil village of Uplawmoor, the hotel is just 25 minutes drive from Glasgow City Centre and Airport, and 15 minutes to Braehead Shopping Centre. It is 30 minutes from Prestwick Airport.

name: Hilton Aberdeen TECA
address: East Burn Road, Stoneywood, Aberdeen, AB21 9FX
description: Ideally located next to Aberdeen International Airport and The Event Complex Aberdeen, Hilton Aberdeen TECA puts you close to some of the biggest events in Scotland. With on-site parking, including coach parking, we are the perfect base to play some of Aberdeen and Shires 55 golf courses. Within 30 minutes of the hotel are Royal Aberdeen, Murcar Links Golf Club, Cruden Bay Golf Club and Trump International. Take a tour of a world renowned whisky distillery on the Whisky Trail or if craft beer is more your thing, we are only 30 minutes from the home of BrewDog and the DogTap. Experience a warm, welcoming stay with outstanding service in our stylish guest rooms or suites. Each air-conditioned accommodation includes a smart HDTV for your entertainment and a mini-fridge to keep drinks cool. Upgrade your room for more space, additional amenities and access to our Executive Lounge, open for drinks and canapes in the evenings. Stay active in our complimentary gym with the latest TechnoGym equipment or relax and unwind in our full-service Devona Spa. Savor local Scottish food and drink in our elegant Quarter House Bar and Grill - open for full Hilton buffet breakfast, a quick bite at lunch time or a dinner to linger over. We have a range of menus including gluten-free and vegan. Please talk to us about any dietary preferences you have. Host your next meeting, conference or social event in one of our 7 event spaces, with natural daylight, blackout blinds, click share facilities and air-conditioning.Hilton

name: Crowne Plaza Liverpool City Centre
description: Crowne Plaza® Liverpool City Centre hotel overlooks the waterfront in the vibrant centre of Liverpool. Guests can park at the hotel for low daily rates in the onsite car park with electric charging point available too. Liverpool Lime Street Station is 10 minutes away. A short stroll down the River Mersey takes you to the iconic Royal Albert Dock with its restaurants, bars, The Beatles Story attraction and Tate Liverpool Art Gallery. When you are done with sightseeing, you can work out in our well-equipped Fitness Centre and relax in our 18-metre swimming pool, spa pool, steam room and sauna. For our corporate guests there is WIFI throughout. The hotel is within walking distance of the Arena and Convention Centre Liverpool and a short drive from events at Anfield Stadium home to Liverpool Football Club. Our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director can help you plan anything from a board meeting to a gala dinner for 480. When work is done, you can enjoy cocktails with colleagues in our sleek Lounge Bar with its dock view terrace. Our lounge menu is ideal for guests on the go. But do take time to enjoy the huge buffet breakfast at The Restaurant. It serves grill-style dinners – ideal for a client entertaining or a romantic meal – and there is 24-hour room service for added convenience. IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Novotel Southampton
description: The 4-star Novotel Southampton is in Southampton City Centre, an ideal base for business or leisure stays overlooking the historic port. The hotel is a short stroll from Southampton Central train station and city attractions, including the Titanic Museum. Get to New Forest National Park or Peppa Pig World in no time, or explore nearby beaches and the waterfront. Whether you're cruising from Southampton, enjoying a weekend break or visiting on business, the Novotel Southampton helps you feel at home.accorhotels.com

name: Meon Valley Hotel, Golf & Country Club
description: Set in 225 wooded acres, this secluded hotel has a pool, a spa and a gym, with good motorway access. There is a championship golf course and tennis courts. Unlimited free WiFi access is available in public areas. Meon Valley Hotel, Golf & Country Club hotel has a spa bath, a steam room and a sauna. There is a golf academy with a covered driving range and team-building activities. Meon Valley Hotel, Golf & Country Club rooms have 32-inch flat-screen Freeview TVs and views of the golf course or garden. Guests can relax in The lounge bar and dine in the Restaurant.

name: Voco Oxford Thames
description: You’ll find voco® Oxford Thames Hotel on the banks of the River Thames. Here, with us, you can enjoy a slice of the Oxfordshire countryside with fresh air and plenty of space. Being only three miles from the historic city of Oxford you can explore the Historical Museums, our recommendations are Ashmolean Museum, Pitt Rivers and Bodleian Libraries. Not forgetting the world famous Oxford University, made up of 38 independent colleges including the magnificent Christ Church. Why not book yourself in for a guided tour at the Oxford Castle and Prison immerse yourself in hundreds of years about the Castle’s past. Looking for something fun, punting is a truly timeless tradition in Oxford. Punt down the River Thames and see Oxford in a whole new way. If you are escaping for retail therapy Oxford has everything you need, with the new Westgate shopping centre and independent shops in the 18th century covered market, you can shop until you drop. Explore outside Oxford to Bicester Village a luxury shopping destination home to more than 160 world famous brands. You can not come to Oxfordshire without visiting Blenheim Palace, with 2,000 acres of parkland and the stunning palace to visit you will cherish this experience forever. Something for all the family Cotswold Wildlife Park is a fantastic day out with animals from all around the world, close by to this is the Crocodiles of the World where you can see different crocodile species, fun and learning all day.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: ibis Cardiff Gate - International Business Park
address: Cardiff Gate Business Park, Cardiff, CF23 8RA
description: Whether it's mid-afternoon or well into the wee hours, guests at our pet-friendly hotel enjoy access to a great selection of refreshment options along with a welcoming service. Our bar and restaurant each stay open 24hrs, so pull up a chair for a light lunch, prop up the bar for a well-earned nightcap, or take your time over a lazy dinner.accorhotels.com

name: Canal Court Hotel
description: This fine 4-star hotel with leisure complex is located on Merchants Quay in the city centre, convenient for all the city-centre amenities, pubs bars and restaurants. Canal Court has an award-winning restaurant for à la carte dining, and a carvery and bar snacks are available in Granary Bar. The leisure complex has a swimming pool, gym, sauna and steam room among other facilities - perfect for a few relaxing moments.

name: Hilton Belfast Templepatrick Golf & Country Club
address: Paradise Walk, Castle Upton Estate, Templepatrick, BT39 0DD
description: The Hilton Belfast Templepatrick Golf & Country Club combines convenient location with superb facilities. The 129 guest rooms are each equipped with WiFi access, an LED TV, work desk and in-room safe. All guests enjoy access to our swimming pool and LivingWell Health Club, refurbished in 2014, as well as preferential rates on the championship golf course. Car parking is complimentary for hotel residents. The hotel is located 4 miles from Belfast International Airport and 15 miles from Belfast City Centre. There is ease of access to the various Antrim and Belfast business parks. Enjoy a number of dining options, including 24-hour room service, a lounge bar, Treffner’s Restaurant and Kinahan’s Brasserie.Hilton

name: Hilton Birmingham Metropole
address: Pendigo Way, The Nec Birmingham, Birmingham, B40 1PP
description: With a prime location on the NEC complex, Hilton Birmingham Metropole is a 5-minute walk from Resorts World Arena and entertainment complex and the new Bear Grylls Adventure. Our hotel team aim to create truly unique experiences for every guest, every time. Whether you’re here for business or pleasure, there’s something to suit all needs, from comfortable rooms and suites to our LivingWell Health Club and multiple dining venues.Hilton

name: Aldwark Manor Estate
description: In stunning parkland, close to York, Aldwark Manor Estate is a Victorian manor house that mixes traditional style with modern bedrooms featuring free WiFi. Aldwark Manor is the ideal place to relax after sightseeing in York, Harrogate and the surrounding areas. The lounges have a terrace patio overlooking the gardens and golf course, ideal for a pre-dinner drink. Each room at the property features tea/coffee making facilities, a room service menu and a seating area. The bathrooms feature a walk in shower, and a hairdryer. Our brand new golf course is now open too, having undergone an exciting new refurbishment! Spa and Leisure - We are closing “Reflections” in April 2024 but have deep cleansed so guests can swim/gym and relax through the summer. Treatment products are ESPA, and the full range can be viewed on our website for pre-booking. Children swim times are 8am until 10am and 4pm until 6pm throughout the week. **Road Closure Notice** From 17th April 2023 until February 2024, Aldwark toll bridge will be closed due to essential maintenance. An alternate route to and from the estate may be required. For your sat nav please use postcode YO61 1UF and place ‘no toll roads’ in requirements, Alternatively you contact us at the hotel, and we can provide you with route directions to avoid this closure.

name: The Fellows House Cambridge, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to The Fellows House, Curio Collection by Hilton, an inviting home away from home for those seeking somewhere to eat, drink and stay in style. Set near Cambridge city centre and a short walk from the River Cam and Jesus Green, our hotel is an exclusive destination with an inclusive spirit. We deliver first-class, refined service in beautiful surroundings, defined by a considered approach to suit the way people travel today. Our stylish guest rooms feature elevated design and the latest in-room technology, guaranteeing that your stay will be as comfortable as possible. Our spacious suites include a modern kitchen and for the ultimate stay, upgrade to an executive suite offering 540 sq. ft. of space with a separate lounge and dining area. There is passion in everything we do, from the food we serve and the drinks we pour to the music we play, all with a nod to the creativity of the eminent fellows of Cambridge University. Delight your senses with an inspired dining experience at our signature restaurant and enjoy an array of refreshing drinks, cocktails and delicious snacks at the bar. If you’re on the move, you can grab a freshly made wrap or smoothie from our all-day café. Keep up with your wellness routine by enjoying a workout in the gym, laps in the indoor pool, or simply relax in the sauna and steam room. Our meeting room has direct access to a beautiful enclosed courtyard, making our Cambridge hotel an excellent venue for small meetings.Hilton

name: Best Western Heronston Hotel & Spa
description: The Best Western Heronston Hotel & Spa is a fantastic place to stay near Swansea. The hotel is delightfully located in a semi-rural area, but only half a mile from Bridgend town centre and minutes from Junction 35 of the M4. You'll be near both coast and countryside – but within easy reach of the city too. Our modern, pet-friendly hotel in Bridgend boasts a range of rooms and full leisure facilities, but it's our prime location that really sets us apart. Just minutes away from the Glamorganshire heritage coastline, the vibrant capital of Cardiff and the cosmopolitan coastal city of Swansea, you'll be in a great position to see Wales at its very best. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, there is plenty of opportunity to relax. Our leisure club and spa offer an indoor heated pool, spa treatment rooms, sauna, steam room, spa pool and fully equipped gym. Guests age 16 years and under have special access times between 7 - 9 a.m. and 5 - 7 p.m. The Best Western Heronston Hotel & Spa is also a great place to hold a conference, being halfway between Swansea and Cardiff. We offer a flexible range of conference facilities, and our coordinators are delighted to assist you in organizing your event. The Best Western Heronston Hotel & Spa is close to everything in South Wales and is an ideal place to stay near Swansea. Dogs are only allowed in the guest rooms and lounge area (not areas with food). The property has begun the last phase of its bedroom refurbishment. This should not affect your stay, but we apologize for any inconvenience caused.bestwestern.com

name: Palé Hall
description: On the edge of Snowdonia National Park, Palé Hall 5 red star Relais Chateaux property set in a Victorian manor house hotel with 18 elegant rooms in the main building and 4 garden suites. The individually designed bedrooms at Palé feature stylish décor. Some rooms have seating areas or garden views. Palé Hall offers a Michelen green star restaurant, serving a varied menu including local Welsh produce. The chefs produce dishes with a blend of British and Welsh cuisine. Near Bala in North Wales, Palé Hall hotel is set in 16 acres of tranquil gardens and parkland. Close to the River Dee, local activities include fishing, shooting and horse riding.

name: Château Rhianfa
address: Plas Rhianfa, Glyngarth, Menai Bridge, LL59 5NS
description: No description found

name: Trearddur Bay Hotel
description: Just a few metres from an award-winning Blue Flag beach, the Trearddur Bay Hotel boasts an on-site restaurant and bar and bright, elegant rooms with free WiFi. Some rooms have fabulous sea views and balconies, whilst all include a TV and private bathroom. Some rooms are situated in the gardens of the property. There is no lift at the property and because of the layout of the property some of the rooms are situated further from reception than others. Please contact the hotel directly once you have made your reservation if you require a room close to reception and the team will endavour to assist wherever possible Overlooking the sea, the hotel restaurant offers the finest local produce from Anglesey and North Wales. For a less formal occasion, guests can enjoy bar meals at The Inn at the Bay, and there are facilities for meetings and events in the Penrhos Suite. The hotel is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Holyhead, with its rail station and ferry terminal.

name: Mains of Taymouth Country Estate
description: No description found

name: Isle Of Mull Hotel and Spa
address: Off The A849, Isle of Mull, PA65 6BB
description: Situated on the crescent of Craignure Bay, The Isle of Mull Hotel and Spa has stunning views over to Morvern and the west coast. The main ferry terminal is just a few hundred yards away, with a shoreline path leading to the hotel. Most of the rooms at The Isle of Mull Hotel and Spa have views of the scenic surroundings, and guests can also make use of the extensive leisure facilities and spa. Within the spa is the Rasul mud room, a specialist full-body cleansing treatment. Other spa therapies and beauty treatments are available by appointment. There is an indoor heated swimming pool and a children’s pool which are free to hotel guests. A hot tub, foot spa, sauna and steam room are available at an additional charge (pre booking is required). Dinner and breakfast are served in the Oran-Na-Mara Restaurant. Guests can relax in the Lounge, which looks out on to the gardens and shoreline beyond.

name: Macdonald Aviemore Highland Hotel
description: The 4-star Macdonald Highland Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Aviemore. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, grocery deliveries, taxi service, 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with carpeting, linens, mirror, towels, closet. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Aviemore has to offer by making Macdonald Highland Hotel your base.Agoda

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Kayseri
address: Hunat Mahallesi, Sivas Caddesi No: 24/1, Kayseri 38030
description: Offering an indoor pool and a spa and wellness centre, Radisson Blu Hotel, Kayseri is located in Kayseri. Free WiFi access is available. Facilities include a ski storage and ski pass vendor. The hotel is certified as eco-friendly by Ministry of Culture and Tourism. Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a minibar. There is also an electric kettle. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. You can enjoy mountain view and city view from the room. Extras include satellite channels. At Radisson Blu Hotel, Kayseri you will find a restaurant and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing. The property offers free parking. The hotel is 600 metres from Kayseri Castle, 600 metres from The Church of Saint Gregory The Illuminator and 3.2 km from University of Erciyes. Erciyes Ski Centre is just a 30-minute drive from Radisson Blu Hotel. Kayseri Airport is within 10 km and Nevsehir Airport is 84 km away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Avanos - Cappadocia
address: Yeni Mah. Kizilirmak Cad. No:1, Avanos 50500
description: Ancient culture, modern hotel accommodations The Doubletree by Hilton hotel Avanos - Cappadocia hotel is the perfect Central Anatolian outpost from which to discover the natural beauty and cultural heritage of Turkiye's unique Cappadocia region. From “fairy chimney” hoodoo rock formations to fascinating ancient underground cities, guests at our modern, upscale city center hotel in Avanos district can explore and relax in style. We're only 30 km/19 miles from Nevsehir Airport (NAV), or 90 km/56 mi from Erkilet International Airport (ASR) in Kayseri to the east. A first class hotel in Cappadocia You'll feel right at home in elegant, contemporary guest rooms and suites featuring pampering bath amenities, generous work surfaces, LCD TVs, luxuriant Sweet Dreams® beds and complimentary wireless internet access. Guests at the Doubletree by Hilton hotel in Cappadocia also enjoy many first class hotel amenities such as: • Complimentary onsite self-parking • Lush, beautiful gardens • Indoor and outdoor swimming pools • Health club with sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities • Fitness Center by Precor® • 24-hour Room Service Relax, unwind and take in fantastic views while you dine at our contemporary hotel restaurant or share the day's experience over cocktails in our inviting Lobby Lounge. Start the day right at our extensive Doubletree Breakfast buffet. Enjoy freshly prepared Continental and local dishes for lunch and dinner daily. At the Doubletree, you'll find comfort, convenience and cuisine to suit any taste. Meet at the Doubletree hotel in Cappadocia Our well-appointed Cappadocia hotel provides the ideal venue for dynamic business meetings, seminars, themed gala dinners, awards ceremonies or team building events. Meeting and banquet facilities include the latest technology for total presentation and connectivity solutions. From small meetings to groups of 400, our flexible spaces, elegant ballrooms and variety of outdoor venues offer the perfect backdrop for your important business or social occasion. Experience the magic world of Cappadocia from the Doubletree Visit unique Cappadocia attractions from our well-located hotel in Central Turkiye. See the monastic valleys and painted cave churches at the Göreme Open Air Museum or Zelve, both UNESCO World Heritage sites. Enjoy the nightlife at a traditional Turkish show in Evranos. Take a balloon ride or sample cultural history and thousands of years of architectural wonders in underground cities, rock fortresses and ancient archeological sites. On your next visit to Turkiye, our friendly hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to beautiful Cappadocia with our signature warm Doubletree chocolate chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Limak Lara De Luxe Hotel
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is located in the coastal resort of Lara. It features 4 à la carte restaurants and an expansive spa. All guests are offered special benefits such as complimentary fruit basket and a bottle of wine upon arrival, free ironing service, special offers at SPA and restaurants. The spa at the Limak Lara features a Turkish/steam bath, indoor pools and a hot tub. A range of relaxation therapies are also available, including full-body massages, facials and pedicures. The air-conditioned rooms at the Limak Lara Deluxe Hotel & Resort Antalya have modern furnishings with Turkish influences. They include a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a hot tub and terrace with sea views. Guests will find a complimentary fruit basket in the room upon arrival. Guests can enjoy various international cuisines at the onsite restaurants, including Indian, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Mexican and Turkish. Meals can be enjoyed indoors as well as al fresco. The De Luxe Hotel is only a 10-minute drive from the Antalya city centre and offers free private parking.

name: Ic Hotels Airport
description: IC Hotels Airport is just 800 metres from Antalya Airport. Hotel is designed with every single detail for you to have a peaceful, comfortable stay in a warm environment. All the rooms are decorated with wooden furniture, carpeted floors. Air conditioned rooms also have a work desk, a minibar, satellite LED TV and a bathroom. Free WiFi is also available in all units of the hotel. Guests can enjoy local Turkish dishes as well as international cuisine at Bristol Restaurant. The Last Call Bar offers a variety of refreshing drinks and delicious snacks. IC Hotels Airport offers sports activities, skin and body care services, and massage under the supervision of our professional staff expert in their areas. And also offers a squash court, a fitness centre, a hammam, a sauna and a 681 m² outdoor pool and 252 m² heated indoor pool. Guests can held all kinds of meetings from small gatherings to international seminars, from business meetings to organizations in special meeting rooms. Antalya city centre is 11 km from IC Hotels Airport, and Lara Beach is only 12 km away. Free private parking is available on site. The Hotel also offers free shuttle service to Antalya Airport.

name: Hadrian Gate Hotel
address: Barbaros Mh Hesapçi Sokak No:8, Antalya 07030
description: Hadrian Gate Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Antalya. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Hadrian Gate Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, carpeting, children's high chair, cleaning products. Take a break from a long day and make use of dart board, outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden. For reliable service and professional staff, Hadrian Gate Hotel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isil Club Resort
description: Located in Torba, 10 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking resort features a sauna and nightclub. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for windsurfing and canoeing. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English and Turkish. Bodrum Municipality Bus Station is 8.4 km from DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort, while Bodrum Bar Street is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 33 km from the resort.

name: Degirmenburnu Residence
address: Osman Nuri Bilgin Caddesi No:48, Bodrum 48400
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea, Degirmenburnu Residence is located in Bodrum City. Bodrum Castle is 1.4 km from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units include a seating area and/or balcony. Some units also have a kitchenette, fitted with a dishwasher and oven. Every unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a hair dryer. The apartment offers free private parking on site Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 900 metres from Degirmenburnu Residence Bodrum. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Degirmenburnu Residence.

name: Susona Bodrum, LXR Hotels & Resorts
address: Torba district Kaynar street No15, Bodrum 48420
description: Susona Bodrum lies in the heart of Torba District, Turkiye overlooking the Aegean Sea. The hotel offers on-site dining, meeting space, and a full-service spa. The refined resort also features a tennis court, two pools, and four restaurants and bars. Guests can enjoy a spacious green landscape, coastal views, and a private beach with a sun deck. Find the ultimate relaxation in one of the poolside and beachside cabanas. All rooms are air-conditioned and include free WiFi, a mini-bar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Upgrade to a suite for more space to work and relax. Nearby attractions include wine tasting and vineyard visits, Etrim Carpet Village, the ancient city of Bodrum, and the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus.Hilton

name: Hotel Centro Bodrum
description: Hotel Centro Bodrum is conveniently located in the popular Eskicesme area. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including private beach, outdoor pool, children's playground, pool (kids). Hotel Centro Bodrum is an excellent choice from which to explore Bodrum or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center
address: Silahsor Cad. No: 42 Bomonti Sisli, Istanbul 34381
description: Enjoy contemporary luxury at Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center, the largest of its kind in the city. Located in the central area of Sisli, adjacent to the former Bomonti Beer Factory, which is today’s new entertainment hub, this impressive, 34-story hotel offers easy access to many Istanbul attractions, historical buildings, shopping malls and neighboring business districts. Unwind in an elegant, air-conditioned guest room at this Istanbul hotel with a range of amenities, including ergonomic work areas, WiFi (fee applies) and floor-to-ceiling windows. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for exclusive Executive Lounge access. Gaze upon the Marmara sea from an executive sea view room. With a wealth of flexible meeting spaces, including a grand ballroom with a capacity of 3000, this stunning hotel is perfect for business meetings and glamorous celebrations in Istanbul. A business center offering a range of services and amenities and a professional team of staff are available, to help ensure a truly unforgettable event. Enjoy breathtaking Bosphorus and city views from the rooftop bar Cloud 34, located on the 34th story and dine in style in our all-day dining restaurant, The Globe. Maintain your fitness regime with the very latest exercise equipment in the modern, 24-hour fitness center, soothe tired muscles in the Turkish bath or treat yourself to a luxurious massage in the expansive eforea Spa. Cool down in the indoor or outdoor swimming pools or unwind with a drink at the pool bar as you soak up the Turkish sunshine.Hilton

name: Novotel Istanbul Karakoy
description: Hotel that makes every moment matter. Istanbul offers a wide variety of choices to visitors with its historical background, modern architecture and business opportunities. Novotel Istanbul Bosphorus Hotel has a splendid situation among the most preferred hotels on the European side. Its perfect location in Karaköy, comfortable and stylish rooms, flavors from ethnic to international dishes and modern facilities make our Hotel a highly preferable five-star accommodation venue in Istanbul.accorhotels.com

name: Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus
address: Cihannuma Mh., Saray Cad. No 5, Besiktas, Istanbul 34353
description: Centrally located in the lively Besiktas area, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Bosphorus. Ortakoy, Dolmabahce Palace and Vodafone Stadium are nearby while Zorlu, Kanyon, Metrocity and Ozdilek shopping malls and the Nisantasi district are a short drive away. Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus has everything travelers need including complimentary WiFi, a 24-hour health club with Turkish hammam, two swimming pools, a separate children's pool as well as covered and open clay tennis courts. Conrad Bosphorus Suite Services* feature in-room check-in, a special VIP set up and fresh flowers in the suite. Luxurious bathroom amenities are personalized, and we offer a complimentary ironing service for 3 pieces of clothing. In addition, the services include Executive Lounge access and two hours of complimentary meeting room time for five people, subject to availability. Summit Bar serves fabulous cocktails and offers a 270-degree city view from the terrace. Guests can also enjoy delicious Mediterranean cuisine at Manzara. The hotel has been recognized by World Travel Awards such as 'Türkiye's Leading Business Hotel', 'Türkiye's Leading Conference Hotel', 'Europe's Leading Conference Hotel', and 'World's Leading City Hotel' in 2021. This Conrad hotel features 3,000 sq. m. of function space, a 15th floor Bosphorus Lounge and terraces with a panoramic view. *Service does not apply to Family Suites and Day use suites.Hilton

name: Swissotel Buyuk Efes Izmir
description: Izmir is known as the pearl of the west coastline of Turkey. It is a very popular destination for tourists visiting the Aegean beaches in summer and a commercial and cultural contact zone in autumn, winter, and spring. To cover the accommodation needs of these visitors, Swissotel Büyük Efes Izmir provides all the comfort and luxury expectations. Swissotel Büyük Efes Izmir is a popular venue for small and large-scale events such as meetings, conferences as well as wedding and reception organizations.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Atakum Hotel
address: Yeni Mh. Ataturk Blv No 183 Atakum, Samsun
description: Situated 200 metres from the coast, this hotel offers air-conditioned guestrooms with balconies and views of the Black Sea and Mount Güngörmez. It has a restaurant that serves international cuisine. Rooms at the Grand Atakum Hotel have parquet floors and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area and Baroque décor. In the morning, the Grand serves a buffet breakfast with fresh fruit and pastries. Atakum Hotel also has a café that offers pizza and regional dishes. The Grand Atakum Hotel is located 12 km from the centre of Samsun and is 35 km from the Samsun-Çarşamba Airport. It has an airport transfer service for guests with disabilities available on request and offers free on-site private parking.

name: Hilton Bursa Convention Center & Spa
description: Located close to Bursa city center, historical heritage sites, the business district, and several commercial and industrial parks, the visual striking Hilton Bursa Convention Center & Spa offers splendid views of the majestic Uludag Mountains and is a only short distance from the Intercity Highway, linking the major cities of Ankara, Istanbul and Izmir. Each of the stylish rooms at this contemporary hotel in Bursa are tastefully decorated using a combination of elements from the Ottoman Empire era and contemporary amenities, and feature inspiring views of the Uludag Mountain range. The Hilton Bursa Convention Centre & Spa has extensive banquet and meeting rooms all of which benefit from wireless internet access and the very latest in audio/visual and lighting technology. Hold a grand event in the pillarless, naturally lit 870 sq m ballroom or hold a memorable wedding ceremony or social event in our beautiful outdoor venue. Food lovers at this Bursa hotel will be spoiled for choice. Begin your day with breakfast in the warm and welcoming Brasserie Restaurant, with an all-day dining concept serving delicious and healthy Mediterranean dishes from Turkiye and beyond. Enjoy a pre-dinner cocktail in the stylish Sky Light Bar and marvel at views of Bursa from the Sky Light Restaurant as you enjoy specialities from the tempting international a la carte menu. Keep fit in the complimentary 24-hour Fitness Centre, soak up stunning views of the snowcapped peaks as you swim in the heated indoor swimming pool, or simply indulge yourself with a treatment in our luxury onsite spa with Turkish Hammam. Take a stroll through one of Bursa’s numerous parks and gardens, admire Ottoman Era art in the city's mosques, marvel at Bronze Age artifacts in the archeological museum, or ski at the Uludag Mountains - once known by their ancient name of Mount Olympus - just 45 minutes from the hotel.Hilton

name: NH Collection Prague
description: Set 1.8 km from Vyšehrad, NH Collection Prague in Prague has a fitness centre, as well as a spa and wellness centre with an indoor swimming pool available free of charge. Featuring a terrace, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is located 2.1 km from Charles Bridge. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, buffet and à la carte options. At NH Collection Prague you will find a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The property has a sauna. Guests can also take advantage of the business centre and an ATM machine. Staff at the reception can help guests with any questions that they might have. St. Vitus Cathedral is 2.3 km from the accommodation.

name: Wellness Hotel Step
description: A 5-minute drive from the O2 Arena, Wellness Hotel Step is 5 km from Prague city centre. It features a direct connection to the Step Sports and Wellness Centre. Private paid parking is available at the hotel. Offering city views, Hotel Step’s modern and spacious rooms feature a minibar, satellite TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer. All of the rooms feature air-conditioning. Spa facilities include an indoor pool and various saunas.The Sports Centre includes tennis, squash and badminton courts, a bowling alley, and an indoor golf centre. Most rooms include a combination of complimentary Water World or Sauna World entries. All guests also have a 50% discount on racket sports at the hotel. Free Wi-Fi and wired internet access are available. Czech and international dishes are served in the Galerie Praha, Bohemia and Aroma restaurants. In summer, guests can dine on a terrace. Snacks and drinks are available in the Golf Bar and the Bowling Bar. The Balabenka Tram Stop is just 300 metres away, and the Palmovka Underground Station can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: Hilton Prague
description: Award-winning hotel in the heart of Prague The newly renovated Hilton Prague is truly The Place for Big Imaginations. It combines an ideal location, between the historic Old Town, the vibrant Karlin full of local pubs and trendy hot spots and the business district. All of Prague’s major attractions and shopping centers are within short walking distance and the airport is just a 25 minute drive away. There are a lot of exciting amenities under Hilton Prague’s unique glass roof - newly refurbished guest rooms, excellent restaurants combining the best of the local and international cuisine, vast and flexible meeting space, state-of the art gym and spa, and the urban chic Cloud 9 Sky Bar & Lounge with its stunning views of the city. All this provides you with a great opportunity to experience Prague’s vibrant life while having a comfortable place to stay and enjoy. But don't just take our word for it - plan your stay and experience it yourself. Walking distance to the city centre, 25 minute drive from the airport 791 newly refurbished guest rooms, including two Executive floors Cvent #1 hotel for meetings and events in Europe for second year 3 restaurants and 2 bars including rooftop Cloud 9 Sky Bar & Lounge 5,000 sq. m of flexible functional space 38 versatile meeting rooms, a stylish Ballroom and a Congress HallHilton

name: Clarion Congress Hotel Prague
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the Clarion Congress Hotel Prague in Prague, CZ located near the O2 Arena. Our smoke-free hotel is also near the Prague Castle, Old Town Square, Prague National Theatre opera house and more. Hotel amenities include free full breakfast, free wired and wireless high-speed Internet access, six hotel restaurants, a fitness center and more. All guest rooms offer desks, hair dryers, TVs, safes and more. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Prague hotels like our Clarion Congress Hotel Prague.Choice Hotels

name: Parkhotel and Congress Center Pilsen
address: U Borského parku 31, Pilsen, Plzeň Region
description: The Parkhotel Plzen Congress Center is located close to the beautiful Borský Park, in the southern area of the city of Plzen. You can easily reach the city centre and the commercial district of Borska Pole. Guests have free access to the fitness area and the outdoor swimming pool during summer. Free WiFi is provided in the lobby bar and air conditioning is available in public areas. The meeting rooms have capacity for 10 to 1000 people and feature latest audiovisual equipment. Guests can also play tennis on one of the 11 tennis courts next to the hotel.

name: Maximus Resort
description: Opened in June 2012, Maximus Resort features the Infinit Maximus Wellness and Spa Centre with an aquatic and sauna world including massages, a swimming pool, a hot tub, a steam bath, Kneipp bath and an outdoor cooling pool, all available at a surcharge. Stylishly decorated, most units have a terrace or balcony with views of the surrounding landscape. Each en-suite room comes with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some also have a seating area or a separate living room. The property contains only a 4-star area. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in Maximus Resort. The property’s restaurant serves international cuisine, and also has a garden with barbecue facilities. Boat trips are available at Brno Dam, 200 metres away. There is also the hotel's beach bar Hribek, open from April to September. The Kaskáda Golf Course, a zoo, and the Přístaviště Bus Stop are all with 2 km. Brno city centre, the castles Špilberk and Veveří, and the Villa Tugendhat, which is famous for pioneering modern architecture in Europe, are all within a 15-minute drive. A shuttle service is available free of charge.

name: Brioni Boutique Hotel 4
description: Brioni Boutique Hotel is located in the pedestrian zone, in the heart of Ostrava. It features air-conditioned rooms with a minibar, cable TV and free high speed WiFi of 150 MBit/s. A modern cedar wood sauna, a steam bath a are at guests’ disposal. Brioni Boutique Hotel provides secured parking for guests at an extra charge.

name: Seedamm Plaza
description: Overlooking Lake Zürich, the Seedamm Plaza enjoys a unique location on the shores opposite of the historic city of Rapperswil. It features the Swiss Casino Pfäffikon, in-house restaurants as well as a gym and sauna facilities. Free WiFi is available in the entire building. All en-suite rooms are individually furnished and provide adjustable air-conditioning and a flat-screen satellite TV. Some also boast a terrace and king-size beds. Free mineral water is provided in each room. The restaurants of the Seedamm Plaza serve regional as well as international cuisine. Guests can also dine in the Mediterranean Restaurant Olea or the Kaori, serving sushi and other Japanese specialties. On sunny days, the terrace offers a beautiful view over Lake Zürich and the surrounding mountains. Guests of the Seedamm Plaza can relax in the hotel’s saunas and steam baths or get active in the fitness centre. The nearby St. Gallen and Glarner Alps and Lake Zürich are an ideal starting point for hiking or cycling. In winter, attractions including ski slopes and cross-country ski trails as well as toboggan runs are nearby. The hotel provides a charging station for electric cars (for a fee) and offers free private parking. The city of Zurich is reachable in 30 minutes by car or public transport.

name: Novotel Zurich City West
description: The Novotel Zurich City West is there for you and your family around the clock. Our bar-restaurant The Flave of Zurich serves breakfast and snacks 24 hours and our kitchen offers specialties from all over the world, including vegan dishes. Swim a few laps in the pool or explore Zurich right after your meeting. Prepare for your meetings in elegant Scandinavian-style rooms at comfortable desks.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Spalentor
description: Hotel Spalentor is located opposite the Botanic Gardens, a 5-minute walk from the Old Town of Basel and the University, and offers free bicycles, free WiFi, a fitness area and a quiet garden with a chestnut tree. Each of the spacious rooms features air conditioning, a coffee machine, a large flat-screen TV, a DVD Player and a large choice of free DVDs. There is also a minibar in each room. You can quickly reach the airport, the train stations and the Messe Basel fairgrounds by public transport, which can be used for free during your stay at the Spalentor hotel. The Spalentor Bus Stop is just 30 metres away. Guests can relax in the hotel's own bar or in the hotel´s courtyard, and can get active in the fitness area. Baby seats and cycle helmets for the rental bikes are available as well.

name: La Reserve Geneve Hotel and Spa
description: Surrounded by a beautifully landscaped park of 10 acres, on the shores of Lake Geneva, the luxurious 5-star La Réserve Genève Hotel & Spa offers you indoor and outdoor pools and 4 restaurants and a bar. All rooms in the La Réserve Genève Hotel & Spa feature hardwood floors, luxurious fabrics and are air-conditioned. Free WiFi is also provided. The spa area is spread across 2,500 m² and facilities include a hammam, saunas, steam baths, a fitness centre and 17 treatment rooms. Access to the spa area is not permitted for children under 14 years and a daytime (09:00 to 18:00) childcare centre is available free of charge at the hotel. Indoor swimming-pool is accessible to children every day from 2pm to 4pm. French and Chinese cuisine, as well as light dishes are served in the gourmet restaurants, featuring inviting terraces. A pool-side restaurant Le Lodge operates during the summer months, offering Mediterranean cuisine. For a more relaxed atmosphere, day or night, come and unwind in the Bar-lounge. Les Tuileries Train station is 300 metres away from the hotel and guests can reach the centre of Geneva within a 12-minute train ride. In summer La Réserve also offers a free private boat shuttle to the centre. In addition guests receive the free Geneva City Pass which offers free use of all public transportation in Geneva.

name: Hotel Ambassador
description: Offering free underground parking and free spa facilities, the Hotel Ambassador was renovated by star architect Ali Tayar in 2013, and is situated in a quiet area, 7 minutes by public transport from Bern’s city centre. The public transport links are right in front of the hotel, and WiFi is free. Guests can use the public transports in Bern for free. All rooms at Hotel Ambassador are air-conditioned. They either offer views of the countryside and the Gurten Mountain or Bern's Old Town, with the Federal House of Parliament and the Bern Minster in the background. An American breakfast buffet is served daily and a quick breakfast is possible as well. There are 2 different restaurants: Taishi, which is a Japanese Teppan-Yaki restaurant, and the panoramic Le Pavillon Restaurant, which serves seasonal international cuisine. A hotel bar with a bistro and 8 meeting rooms for up to 250 people are also available. Hotel Ambassador's friendly staff creates an inviting atmosphere for guests and can offer tips on what to do and see during your stay.

name: Holiday Inn Bern - Westside
description: Bern hotel next door to Bernaqua Water Park & Spa in Westside Shopping Centre Holiday Inn® Bern - Westside hotel provides a welcoming base in Westside Shopping and Leisure Centre, surrounded by shopping, dining and entertainment opportunities. With the A1 motorway around the corner, Bern Airport is 25 minutes' drive away. From Bern Bruennen Westside station, opposite the hotel, it's an eight-minute train ride to Bern HBF railway station and the city centre. With the Bern Ticket, which you'll receive upon check-in, you can travel free on public transport and easily reach the UNESCO heritage Old Town. Here, don't miss the iconic Zytglogge clock tower and the brown bears at Baerengraben park. Or visit the Zentrum Paul Klee, 14 minutes' drive from the hotel. Host up to 120 guests in the 11 well-equipped meeting rooms and enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Trade fairs at Bernexpo are just 12 minutes' drive away. This family-friendly hotel offers 144 modern rooms, where kids stay and eat free. Start your day with an American breakfast buffet in the hotel's Bits & Bites brasserie, and enjoy Swiss dishes with a modern twist, or decadent chocolate desserts.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Art Deco Hotel Montana
description: The Art Deco Hotel Montana offer rooms as well as luxurious spa suites with panoramic views of Lake Lucerne, the city and the Alps. All the spacious rooms and suites feature stylish designer furniture, a satellite TV and a Nespresso coffee machine. All lakeside rooms have a balcony. Additionally, to the Art Deco rooms, there are also luxurious Penthouse rooms and suites, on the fifth & sixth floor, featuring panoramic views of Lake Lucerne, the city, and the Alps. They offer lavish, elegant furnishings, the supplementary 5-star service, the private terrace offering breathtaking views and the option of your own outdoor hot tub. The Scala Restaurant offers light Mediterranean cuisine which was awarded 15 Gault-Millau point. It has a terrace with palm tress and panoramic views of the scenic surrounding landscape. The Louis Bar features a huge selection of Scottish Whisky and during summer the Montana Beach Club is an inviting place to spend long evenings. Numerous events take place at the Art Deco Hotel Montana, including jazz jam sessions every Thursday nights in the Louis Bar. The KKL Culture and Convention Centre Lucerne is a 7-minute drive away from the property, while Chapel Bridge is an 8-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, reachable within 67 km.

name: Hotel Hermitage
description: Situated on the shores of Lake Lucerne, the Hermitage stands alone, but is still very close to the busy centre of Lucerne. All the rooms, restaurants and function rooms look out onto the lake and to the mountains beyond. Guests are also welcome to relax on the loungers scattered underneath the trees in the park. Furthermore, the hotel offers you different outdoor activities, a gym and a wellness corner.iHotelier/iStay

name: Park Hotel Vitznau
description: The luxurious Park Hotel Vitznau right at the banks of Lake Lucerne has been entirely renovated in 2012 and 2013 and features its own private beach, 2 restaurants, a large spa area and free garage parking. Each of the suites and residences has been individually designed and offers 24-hour room service, free WiFi, a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a tea maker. Spa facilities include various saunas and steam baths, an ice grotto, a hot tub, as well as indoor and outdoor pools. A wide range of gourmet dishes is served in the 2 restaurants of Park Hotel Vitznau, which have an inviting lake-view terrace. Moreover you can select from fine wines from all over the world stored in 6 wine cellars on site. A free shuttle service to the Rigi Cable Car is provided by the hotel. The Küssnacht Train Station is 13 km and Lucerne is 26 km away.

name: Precise Tale Seehof Davos
description: Precise Tale Seehof Davos is situated on Davos' most famous street, the Promenade, next to the Parsenn Cable Car and with direct access to the ski slopes and hiking trails. Guests benefit from 2 restaurants during summer and 3 restaurant during winter, a spa area, and free WiFi access. The Seehof's dining options include the Panoramarestaurant and the Restaurant Chesa Seehof. During winter, guests can also dine at the Restaurant Fondue Stübli. A rich breakfast buffet is served every morning in the conservatory. All rooms feature a cable TV, a seating area, and a minibar. The large Bella Vita spa area offers 3 treatment rooms offering massages and beauty treatments, a sauna, a steam bath, a bio sauna, a hot tub, and a relaxation area with a fireplace.

name: Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola
description: Right on the shores of Lake Lugano and within walking distance of the Old Town of Lugano, the 5-star Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola is set within a private, subtropical park. The hotel offers an indoor pool, a tennis court, 3 restaurants, and free WiFi. The 2 gourmet restaurants, Le Relais and Gallery Arté al Lago, and the La Rucola offer Mediterranean dishes from the freshest seasonal ingredients and selected wines from the well-stocked cellar. Once the home of a noble Russian family, the impressive mansion was transformed into a hotel in 1885. Rooms and suites in the Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola are individually decorated and have stunning park and/or lake views, a balcony, a terrace or loggia. Bus stops, the boat pier and the funicular to Monte Brè can be found in the immediate vicinity. Several cafés, shops and restaurants can be found in the city centre, only a few steps away.

name: Hotel Splendide Royal
description: Established in 1887, the 5-star Splendide Royal with its turn-of-the-century character is Lugano's most fashionable hotel, located on Lugano's lakeside main street. Free WiFi is available throughout the entirely non-smoking property. With its elegant guest rooms, fine cuisine and a staff of 100 employees who provide meticulous personal service, the Splendide Royal hotel inspires loyalty among its clients. Usually more than half the guests are repeat visitors. The executive chef of the hotel's own restaurant I Due Sud has been rewarded with 1 Michelin star and 16 Gault et Millau points for the cuisine combining traditional flavours from southern Switzerland and southern Italy. This restaurant serves dinner from Tuesdays to Saturdays (reservation highly recommended), while the La Veranda restaurant (14 G&M points) is open daily for lunch and dinner, offering Mediterranean dishes with local and seasonal produce. The on-site Splendide Lifestyle Spa includes a pool, a sun terrace, a gym, as well as various saunas and steam baths. Beauty and cosmetic treatments can be booked. Aperitifs and cocktails, as well as a selection of international hors d'oeuvres and snacks is available in the Belle Epoque bar until 00:30 in the night. You can park your car in the garage or outside on the hotel grounds. The city centre with its boutiques can be reached within a walk of just a few minutes along the lake.

name: Hotel Saratz Pontresina
address: Via da la Staziun 2, 7504 Pontresina, Graubunden
description: Located in Pontresina centre, a 5-minute drive from Saint Moritz´s Train Station, the 4-star Hotel Saratz Pontresina offers elegant accommodation with free WiFi, a 35,000 square-metre park, a luxurious wellness area, 2 sun terraces and various sports facilities. Private parking spaces are available on site for an extra charge. The modern units at the Saratz Pontresina all come with a flat-screen TV and private bathroom facilities. In addition, the junior suites feature a comfortable living area with a sofa and a minibar. The property´s large free wellness area comprises both an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a sauna, a hot tub and a hammam. In addition, a fitness centre is accessible, as well, and a professional massage service can be booked at a surcharge. A scrumptious breakfast buffet is prepared every morning, featuring local cheeses, home-made jams and honeys, fresh croissants and delicious breads and pastries. Dinner can be enjoyed at the in-house Art Nouveau Restaurant or at the vegetarian a la carte Restaurant Giodi Vegetarian and Co; also providing a wide range of local and international wines. The hotel´s sports facilities include a tennis court, mountain bikes and electric bicycles. Guests can also take advantage of a 24-hour reception, a ski and luggage storage room and an airport shuttle service, provided upon surcharge.

name: Hotel Kreuz & Post
description: The suisse tradition Hotel Kreuz & Post Grindelwald enjoys a central location, 15 metres from the Grindelwald Train Station, close to many shops. It offers several restaurant, free WiFi, a wellness area with rooftop terrace and panoramic views of the Alps. All rooms offer panoramic mountain views and come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a radio and a telephone. Slippers and bathrobes are provided as well. In the various restaurants and in the panorama dining room you can enjoy traditional as well as modern cuisine. The Rooftop Wellness features a finish sauna, a salt sauna, low-temperature infrared cabin, a steam bath, a relaxation area with cocoon relax loungers and a foot bath experience, free of use for guests. Children can have fun in the playroom and there is also a library and a bright meeting room.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Davos
description: Hard Rock Hotel Davos enjoys a quiet yet central location, just 100 metres from the Schatzalpbahn Cable Car, 400 metres from the Vaillant Arena ice hockey stadium and a 10-minute walk from Davos-Platz Train Station and the Jakobshorn Cable Car. It offers stylish accommodation with free WiFi, a bar and a restaurant. There is a 1000 m² spa featuring a pool, steam room, kneipp basin and a sauna. There is also a fitness centre. The restaurant, the lobby and the bar are inviting places to spend relaxing hours after a day out in the mountains. Private parking is available on site as well for a fee, subject to availability.

name: Villa Principe Leopoldo
description: Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group can be found amid a large park above Lugano, offering panoramic views of Lake Lugano and the mountains, and featuring leisure, sport and wellness facilities, as well as exquisite dining options. WiFi is available for free. A Member of Relais & Chateaux, Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group is a harmonious blend of Italian charm and Swiss excellence. The historical villa, once a prince's residence, provides views of the lake and the garden, and the nearby park The DOT SPA offers a relaxing ambience made with personalised treatments based on the Villa Principe's own top-quality cosmetic line. Hot tub, sauna and steam bath facilities are also featured. The Principe Leopoldo Restaurant received excellent reviews in the most important international guides. The Piano Bar & Lounge offers an exclusive selection of cocktails and wines, champagne and malt whiskies, all accompanied by live music. A breakfast room is located in each building. The spacious and stylishly decorated guest rooms are all air-conditioned. Bathrobes and slippers can be found in the luxurious bathrooms. Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group is 2 km from the city centre of Lugano. Private outdoor parking is available on site for free. Garage parking is possible at an additional cost. A charging station for electric and Tesla vehicles is available on site.

name: Hotel Garni Chesa Mulin
description: Enjoying a quiet and central position in Pontresina, Hotel Garni Chesa Mulin offers modern rooms, a sauna, a garden, a terrace, and garage parking. Free WiFi is available. The ski lifts can be reached within a 15-minute ride on the ski shuttle. Each room in the Chesa Mulin is individually decorated with Engadine landscape pictures and featuring bright bathrooms. All rooms overlook the Engadine mountains. A rich breakfast buffet with regional products is served every morning. Located at foot of the Piz Palü Mountain, the Chesa Mulin is an ideal base for hiking, cycling and skiing. 180 km of cross-country skiing tracks are available in the area. An access point can be found right next to the house. Guests staying 2 or more nights enjoy free access to the Bellavita adventure bath and spa and free use of public transport in the Upper Engadine.

name: Valsana Hotel Arosa
description: The 4-star Superior Valsana Hotel Arosa enjoys a quiet location in the heart of Arosa at 1800 metres altitude and offers panoramic views of the Obersee lake and the mountains. It offers numerous sports and wellness facilities and free Wi-Fi. The three buildings are constructed to the highest environmental and energy standards and are characterised by state-of-the-art architecture in wood and stone. You can ski right down to the front door of the Valsana Hotel Arosa. The lifts are easily reachable by the local bus. You can also find arcades with a supermarket, sports shop and doctors’ surgeries on the ground floor. On the sun terrace above the arcades, you can enjoy the view of the surrounding mountain landscape from the restaurant with its terrace or from the spacious wellness and spa facilities.

name: Boutique Hotel Bellevue
description: The Boutique Hotel Bellevue on the river Aare is situated near the Interlaken-West train station in the centre of the city, but enjoys a quiet location near the water. All rooms have balconies and a wonderful view of the river and the surrounding mountains. Various restaurants and shops, as well as a jewelry and watches store can be found in the immediate vicinity of Boutique Hotel Bellevue.

name: Waldhotel Doldenhorn
description: The Waldhotel Doldenhorn in Kandersteg welcomes you in its charmingly cosy atmosphere, featuring a fireplace corner, great cuisine and luxurious wellness facilities. René Maeders' kitchen brigade creates inventive dishes and is always ready to accommodate the guest's special wishes. The "Grüne Saal" and the connoisseur restaurant, "Au Gourmet" are the meeting place for fans of special delicacies and selected wines. Choose from nicely furnished and fully equipped rooms or treat yourself to a spacious suite. The great wellness facilities include and indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, various saunas, various massage services and a relaxation room. The property has its own mountain spring water. In summer, a cabriolet is available on request at a surcharge.

name: Bernerhof Swiss Quality Hotel Gstaad
description: Located in Gstaad’s pedestrian zone, this 4-star hotel offers 4 restaurants, a spa area with an indoor pool, and free WiFi. The spacious rooms all have a balcony. Hotel Bernerhof’s elegantly furnished rooms feature a flat-screen TV and a seating area. Bathrooms include a hairdryer, bathrobes, and slippers. Guests of the Bernerhof can dine in the gourmet brasserie "Esprit", the Chinese restaurant "Blun-Chi", the Italian restaurant "Pizza.Basta" and the traditional Swiss restaurant "La Gare". A cigar lounge and a billiard room are also available. Spa facilities include a sauna, a steam bath, and a Kneipp pool. Hiking equipment can be hired free of charge. Free private parking is available at the Bernerhof Hotel. Gstaad Train Station is a 2-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Waldhuus
description: The Hotel Waldhuus is located on the edge of the woods, next to the 18-hole golf course, and offers Grisons-style rooms, fine cuisine, and a large spa area. Its restaurant Waldhuus specialises in Swiss cuisine and is considered to be among the finest in Davos. The 700 m² wellness area offers a large fitness room, a 180m² indoor pool, several sauna facilities, a steam bath, a solarium, massage services as well as a lovingly designed relaxation room. All rooms and suites welcome you with warm inviting tones and feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, coffee machine, and bathroom. Extra-large family rooms, a childcare service, a playroom, a common room for teenagers, a mini golf course, a playground, and many other amenities for younger guests are available at the Hotel Waldhuus. The Kids Club is for children aged between 3 and 10. Cross-country ski runs and hiking trails begin right outside the hotel. In winter, the complimentary shuttle service takes you to the Jakobshorn and Parsenn cable cars.

name: Central Swiss Quality Sporthotel
description: The traditionally furnished yet modernly equipped 4-star Central Sporthotel is located directly below the famous Davos-Platz Promenade shopping street, close to the Schatzalp cable car and within walking distance to the Davos congress centre and the Vaillant Arena. The hotel offers nicely furnished units with balconies and beautiful views, a fitness area with indoor swimming pool and counter-current pool, 2 saunas, a steam bath, a solarium and massage services. The dining room Tobelmühle serves a rich breakfast buffet and a 4-course dinner menu and guests can relax in the hotel lobby or the Central bar. The à-la-carte restaurant "Buendnerstuebli" is a wonderful place to enjoy some typical Swiss specialities as well as international cuisine. Guests can easily walk to the Davos World of Ice adventure playground in winter and the Davos Sports Park with the spa gardens in summer.

name: Alpen Resort Hotel
description: Situated close to the ski lifts in Zermatt, Alpen Resort Hotel features a restaurant, and spacious rooms with cable TV. WiFi in the entire building and transport from Zermatt Train Station from 07:00 o'clock to 21:00 o'clock are both offered for free. There is also an outdoor tennis court on site. Swiss cuisine and a selection of wines are served in the Matterhorn Restaurant. All rooms come with a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. En-suite bathrooms include a hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. Guests can also make use of a ski storage room with a ski boot dryer and personal ski lockers. An Internet corner is available in the lobby. There is a Grill restaurant "Hornox" for meat and vegan dishes.

name: W Verbier
description: Perched in the Swiss Alps at 1,531 meters with direct access to over 400 km of skiing and hiking terrain, W Verbier Retreat mixes urban design with an alpine touch. The 123 rooms and suites, each with fireplace, Signature W bed and private balcony are perfect for an intimate escape after an exhilarating day outside. Our luxury ski hotel offers a wide range of culinary options, including the bistronomic Bô!, the Eat-Hola Tapas Bar and the best mixology at W Living Room. Guests unwind in 1,300 sqm. of Alpine oasis at Away® Spa featuring two pools, 9 treatment rooms, 24/7 FIT gym and facilities. We offer 300 square meters of flexible event space. If you’re looking for more exclusivity, find our luxury residences, featuring 2 to 3 bedrooms, private kitchen, balconies and lounge spaces. The highlight is the easy access to all privileges and facilities of the Hotel right next door. From the W Mountain Concierge to the renowned and exclusive Whatever/Whenever service, W Verbier team is there to make it happen.Marriott

name: ibis Baden Neuenhof
description: Ibis Baden Neuenhof hotel is ideal for arriving by car or train. The train station Baden is 10 min. away by bus, the stop is right in front of the hotel. This non smoking hotel has 100 AC rooms and free WiFi. We serve drinks and snacks. In addition, an underground car park and outdoor parking spaces, as well as charging stations for E-vehicles are available. River Limmat invites you for a walk.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Vienna Waterfront
description: Soak up stunning views of the River Danube from the Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel, located on the waterfront hotel in Vienna. Our Vienna hotel offers a quick underground connection to the city center - 7 minutes. Enjoy the comfort of spacious guest rooms and a sparkling outdoor pool. Sample delicious international and Austrian dishes, prepared with the freshest seasonal ingredients, at the Waterfront restaurant. During the summer months enjoy meals and drinks on the spacious Waterfront terrace. Catch up with friends throughout the day and enjoy a drink or tasty snack in the welcoming Pier 269 Bar and Lounge. Business is a pleasure at the Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel offering a business-service center, an elegant boardroom, nine meeting rooms flooded with natural light and the Grand Waterfront Hall with foyer for events catering up to 600 persons. Enjoy panoramic views of Vienna's skyline in the 8th floor Executive Lounge. All guest rooms at Hilton Vienna Danube Waterfront hotel offer WiFi and a separate working area.Hilton

name: Reinisch Just Rooms
description: Only 4 km away from Vienna Airport, Das Reinisch Just Rooms enjoys a quiet location away from the flight corridors. It offers free WiFi in public areas and free parking on site. The rooms feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, a work desk, and a bathroom with hairdryer. A free bottle of water is provided on arrival. Guests of Das Reinisch Just Rooms can use all facilities at Das Reinisch Business Hotel, 300 metres away. These include a restaurant, a sauna, a fitness room and an infrared cabin. The reception is also located there. The nearest exit of the A4 motorway is 3 km away. The city limits of Vienna are 3.5 km away, and the city centre is 15 km away. An airport shuttle is available at an additional cost.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna, located in four historic 19th-century palaces combines legendary service with Austrian hospitality. The 200 luxurious guest rooms and suites are generously proportioned and stylishly furnished. The Ritz-Carlton Club Lounge on the 7th floor pampers its guests with personalized service as well as five culinary offers per day. The Ritz-Carlton Spa has elegantly appointed treatment suites, an 18m indoor pool and a range of amenities that invite our guests to unique spa experiences. Unique culinary delights await guests at the farm-to-table Dstrikt Steakhouse, during aperitivo time at Pastamara - Bar con Cucina and the elegant hotel bar D-bar. Located on the 8th floor rooftop terrace, the Atmosphere Rooftop Bar offers a breathtaking view over the city. Located in the heart of the city and only a short walk from the city park, the luxury hotel is the perfect starting point to discover Vienna.Marriott

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere provides comfortable 4-star accommodation in Vienna. It has a fitness centre, as well as a sauna, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. The hotel provides luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. It is dog-friendly and has private parking on site for those travelling with a car. The rooms at Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere are air conditioned and soundproofed for guest comfort. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, there is a kitchen that is conveniently equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave and a refrigerator. Those staying at Adina Apartment Hotel Vienna Belvedere can relax at the in-house bar, ideally located for a drink. The hotel is close to Sudtiroler Platz-Hauptbahnhof, making it easy for guests to explore Vienna and its surrounding areas. The Schloss Belvedere and the Osterreichische Galerie Belvedere are a short walk away.Revato

name: das Reinisch business hotel
description: Set in Schwechat, 13 km from Ernst Happel Stadium, Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Offering a bar, the property is located within 14 km of Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Austrian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Belvedere Palace is 15 km from Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant, while Vienna Prater is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Vienna Sporthotel
description: Vienna Sporthotel is set in a quiet neighbourhood in Vienna's 3rd district, with easy access to the A4 and A23 motorways and only a 5-minute underground train ride from the city centre, offering an outdoor pool, tennis courts and a spa area. Free WiFi is available and an underground car park with charging station for e-cars is featured. All spacious and air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, a work desk and flat-screen satellite TV with free pay TV channels. Vienna Sporthotel features a solar-heated outdoor pool (open from May to September), 10 tennis courts (also open from May to September) and a fitness centre and guests can use all free of charge. The spa area is a good place to unwind after a busy day. The Sporthotel also has a restaurant serving international and Italian cuisine, as well as a bar in the lobby. In nice weather, guests can dine outside on the restaurant's terrace. The Schlachthausgasse Underground Station (line U3) can be reached in a 5-minute walk, providing direct connections to the centre. It is a 5-minute walk to the Media Quarter Marx, and just a 2-minute walk to the TownTown Business Park. From April to October, guests can rent motor scooters (Vespa) at the hotel. Guests who requested garage parking can use the e-car charging station free of charge.

name: Hotel Sans Souci Wien
description: Hotel Sans Souci Wien is situated directly opposite the Museum Quarter and a 5-minute walk from the Ringstraße Boulevard in the centre of Vienna.
