The large Sans Souci Spa includes an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. In the Sans Souci Spa, guests can also relax in a sauna, a steam bath, and a relaxing area free of charge. A modern fitness centre with a personal trainer is available as well. The Sans Souci Hotel also features a bar and the Veranda restaurant, where guests can enjoy Austrian and international cuisine. The spacious rooms feature elegant interior design and works by various well-known artists. They are air-conditioned and include parquet floors, a minibar, a flat-screen satellite TV, and an iPod docking station. Bathrooms feature bathrobes, toiletries, and a hairdryer. Public parking is available at the Museum Quarter, with valet parking offered by the hotel. The Volkstheater Underground Station (lines U2 and U3) is just a 2-minute walk away. St. Stephen’s Cathedral can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Schloss Mönchstein Hotel
description: Romantic 5-star superior hotel in Salzburg High above the roofs of Salzburg luxurious residing, delicious dining, celebrating and relaxing take centre stage. The 5-star-superior Hotel Schloss Monchstein in the heart of Salzburg offers its guests genuine exclusiveness: luxuriously furnished rooms and suites with elegant interior, gourmet-restaurant THE GLASS GARDEN, Monchstein SPA for pure wellness delight and breathtaking view to the city of Mozart.iHotelier/iStay

name: Grauer Bär
description: The Hotel Grauer Bär is located in the city centre of Innsbruck, just a 2-minute walk from the historic Old Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a spa area with a panoramic swimming pool on the fifth floor. There are 2 restaurants and a hotel bar. From the breakfast room and the spa area of the Grauer Bär Hotel, you can enjoy panoramic views over the roofs of Innsbruck and the surrounding Tyrolean mountain scenery. The Woodfire restaurant serves steak specialities, including dry aged beef. The reception area has been completely renovated in July 2014.

name: Hotel Gollner
description: Hotel Gollner offers modern, individually designed rooms and apartments in the centre of Graz, only a 2-minute walk from the opera. WiFi access is available free of charge. All rooms at Hotel Gollner are non-smoking and have air conditioning, soundproof windows, cable TV, and a work desk. The rich breakfast buffet is served either in the breakfast room or on the sun terrace. The elegant lobby bar is open 24 hours a day. Many restaurants are only steps away from Hotel Gollner. A parking garage and a parking lot, both under video surveillance, are available.

name: Grandhotel Lienz
address: Fanny Wibmer Pedit Straße 2, 9900 Lienz, Tirol
description: This luxury 5-star hotel offers an exclusive ambience in the heart of the picturesque town of Lienz in East Tyrol, surrounded by the scenic mountains of the Lienz Dolomites. Guests benefit from a large spa area and a gourmet restaurant. The spacious, luxuriously furnished rooms and suites at Grandhotel Lienz Business-Wellness & Gourmet offer mountain or river views, a private lounge, a flat-screen TV, and an elegant bathroom. Free WiFi is provided in all rooms. The 1,400 m² spa area at the Lienz Grandhotel includes the exclusive Private Spa and the Medical Wellness Centre, which offers highly efficient wellness programmes for nutrition, vitality and a healthy lifestyle. A wide range of individually adjusted spa and beauty treatments is also available. The Orangerie restaurant offers international dishes with regional ingredients. Drinks can be enjoyed on the sun terrace overlooking the Isel River. The well-assorted wine cellar offers a unique selection of wines from all over the world.

name: Cesta Grand Aktivhotel & Spa
description: CESTA GRAND - Aktivhotel & Spa is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Bad Gastein. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fireplace, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, linens, locker, mirror. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. CESTA GRAND - Aktivhotel & Spa combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Bad Gastein unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Four Points by Sheraton Panoramahaus Dornbirn
description: Stylish, uncomplicated, refreshing: that’s the Four Points by Sheraton Panoramahaus Hotel Dornbirn. Our team welcomes you to our location high above the city, with a view of the mountains, 162 comfortable rooms and suites, free Wi-Fi, the wellness, fitness and Spa and all the extras which make for a perfect trip. Whether you plan a stroll through the city or a hike in the mountains, a meeting in Dornbirn or a holiday with friends – you’ll find just what you need at our hotel in Vorarlberg.Marriott

name: Das Kaltschmid - Familotel Tirol
description: Located in the pedestrian zone in the centre of Seefeld, DAS Kaltschmid features 2 gourmet restaurants and a large spa area. The indoor pool offers panoramic mountain views. DAS Kaltschmid offers free private parking. Spa facilities include saunas, a steam bath, and a hot tub. There is also a modern gym. Table tennis and billiards can be played at DAS Kaltschmid Since December 2017, The Happy Club kid's club includes extra benefits for children: breakfast, lunch at the Happy Club, cake/ice cream in restaurant "Am Kurpark", dinner and soft drinks, Child care 6 days a week at least 50 hours and Happy performances 6 times a week, Happy SPA with baby pool and children's pool with water slide, There are live music and dance evenings.

name: Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel
description: Directly connected to the Römertherme Spa via a private covered pathway, Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel is a protected historic building that was once a residence of Beethoven. Free WiFi is available on site. The spacious, individually decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bathrobes are at guests' disposal. The rooms and the public areas feature Art Nouveau elements. Guests of the Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel can also relax in the lounge which features an original glass roof.

name: Hotel Saalbacher Hof
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the pedestrian zone of Saalbach, only 50 metres from the ski lifts. It has a large spa area with an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. The Saalbacher Hof’s rooms are furnished in an elegant country style and feature cable TV and a bathroom with bathrobes and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony. The spa area features an indoor pool with a waterfall, 3 saunas, and a relaxation room with water beds. The garden offers panoramic views over Saalbach. The garden offers panoramic views and an outdoor pool. Each week, different courses like herbal salt production, green smoothie workshop, meditation classes, and more are offered. The restaurant serves classic Salzburg cuisine and international dishes, as well as fine wines. The Saalbacher Hof offers daily free admission to its après ski bar and nightclub Castello, with live music (from mid of January) and DJs. A Silvester Gala Dinner is available on 31 December upon prior reservation and at an additional cost. Ski passes are available at the reception. Guests of the Saalbacher Hof receive a 10% reduction at all ski rentals in Saalbach.

name: Thermenhotel Karawankenhof
description: This modern 4-star hotel in Warmbad Villach is directly connected to the Kärnten Therme thermal spa, which offers free admission to guests. The spacious rooms and apartments are air-conditioned and have a balcony or terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available. Thermenhotel Karawankenhof’s bright and elegant rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, a safe, and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. A spa bag with bathrobes, slippers and towels is provided. Apartments also have a kitchen. The restaurant serves dishes from the Alps and the Adriatic region. Children can spend their time in the Croco Club under the supervision of the experienced entertainment staff. The garden includes a sun terrace, and free private parking is available on site. Guests of the Karawankenhof can access the Kärnten Therme daily from 08:00 in the morning, which is 1 hour before it is opened to the public. This includes an indoor pool, a heated outdoor pool, and a wide range of saunas, hot tubs and steam baths. There is also a direct connection to the health therapy section. Guests arriving with children can borrow free of charge equipment such as baby monitor, buggy, bottle warmer and baby backpack. Those with a business schedule have conference facilities at their disposal. Hiking and cycling trails, as well as cross-country ski runs, start at the doorstep. The centre of Villach is just a 5-minute drive or bus ride away. Lake Wörth is a 15-minute drive away, and in winter, the Gerlitzen Ski Area can be reached in a 30-minute drive.

name: Schlosshotel Ischgl
description: Located directly next to the ski slopes of Ischgl, the 5-star superior Schlosshotel Ischgl 5-Sterne Superior offers elegant and spacious rooms, free WiFi, a private ski shop with ski hire, free private parking, an extensive spa area and various à la carte restaurants. The rooms are equipped with timeless and elegant furniture designed by the Italian design label Minotti. All rooms come with a balcony, phone, radio, flat-screen TV with 125 channels, minibar, safe and a Nespresso machine. The Schlossherrnstube Restaurant was awarded 18 points / 4 toques by the Gault Millau gourmet guide. Traditional Austrian cuisine and the finest pizza is served in the Weinstube which was awarded 12 points and 1 toque. Half-board guests can enjoy a 5-course dinner in the hotel's Kristallsaal. Access to the state-of-the-art SCHLOSS SPA is free-of-charge for guests. Guests can benefit from an indoor pool, Finnish sauna, herbal sauna, aroma steam bath, infrared chairs, water beds, a horizontal shower, tea bar and a fitness studio. The Schlosslounge serves extraordinary drinks as well as exquisite types of champagne. The champagne club is famous for its relaxed atmosphere and some of Europe's best DJs.

name: Das Zimmerbräu
address: Markt 89, 5360 Sankt Wolfgang im Salzkammergut, Oberosterreich
description: Situated on the village square in the centre of Sankt Wolfgang, just 50 metres from Lake Wolfgang and 250 metres from its private beach, Hotel Zimmerbräu is set in a historic building, renovated 2011, which was originally a brewery dating back to the 14th century. Free WiFi is available throughout the building. All rooms are equipped with traditional wooden furniture with a modern touch and come with a balcony, a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries, a seating area, and a flat-screen TV. Further amenities include a safety deposit box, tea and coffee making facilities and a fridge. Parking outside costs 8,-€ a day, privat parking garage costs 14,-€ a day, reservation needed.

name: Augarten Art Hotel
description: Built by the famous Austrian architect Günther Domenig, this 4-star superior design hotel is only 1 km away from the centre of Graz. Besides the over 200 pieces of contemporary art, Augarten Art Hotel also offers a 24-hour leisure zone with a sauna, a fitness room and an indoor pool. The modern, air-conditioned rooms provide free WiFi access and are decorated with high-quality artworks. Most rooms have a balcony with views of the courtyard or the Clock Tower. Nespresso coffee machines, a Bose Sound System, and an iPod docking station are available at the 24-hour reception. Augarten Art Hotel also features a 24-hour bar, conference rooms, a sun terrace and an underground car park.

name: Hotel Leonhard
description: The 4-star Hotel Leonhard is situated 500 metres from the gondola to the Saalbach-Hinterglemm Leogang Fieberbrunn ski area and in winter a transfer bus to the Asitz valley station leaves in front of the hotel and is free of charge. Free WiFi is available. All rooms feature cable TV and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. The rooms also feature a balcony or a terrace, providing panoramic mountain views of the surrounding Alpine landscape. For late risers, Hotel Leonhard provides breakfast in bed. You can treat yourself to a tasty meal in the hotel restaurant, followed by a drink at the bar. In summer you can enjoy the views of the mountains while hiking or make excursions to various surrounding sites. There are 2 modern conference rooms, one of which is suitable for up to 100 people and one for 20 people.

name: Elisabethhotel Premium Private Retreat
description: Situated in the centre of Mayrhofen, the newly renovated 4-star superior adult-only ElisabethHotel Premium Private Retreat is a 5-minute walk from the Zillertal 3000 Ski Area. The 1,400 m² spa area includes a sauna, steam bath, and 17-metre indoor pool. The rooms are decorated in modern and elegant Tyrolean style and feature a balcony, a flat-screen TV, a seating area, and a spacious bathroom with bathtub or shower. Slippers and bathrobes are also provided. The ElisabethHotel has a bar with an open fireplace and a restaurant serving local specialities. Buffets and candle-lit dinners with piano music are organised every week. A 5-course menu with salad buffet and a variety of cheese, as well as an afternoon snack are available. Guests can relax on the sun terrace and choose from a selection of beauty treatments. A fitness centre is also on site.

name: Hotel Salzburgerhof
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 69 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day on the slopes, you can relax in one of the 2 spa tubs. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, ski storage, and a fireplace in the lobby. The complimentary ski shuttle makes getting to the slopes a breeze. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Zell am See? This hotel has 753 square feet (70 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Hotel Salzburgerhof places you in the heart of Zell am See, steps from Lake Zell and 2 minutes by foot from Zeller See Beach. This 5-star hotel is 11.2 mi (18 km) from Saalbach-Hinterglemm Ski Resort and 0.2 mi (0.4 km) from Zell am See Leisure Centre. Dining Enjoy a meal at Salzburger Stube or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:30 AM. Renovations The property is closed in November. This tax is adjusted seasonally and might not apply year round. Other exemptions or reductions might apply. name: Hotel Sonnblick
description: This 4-star hotel is situated in the centre of Kaprun, at the foot of the Kitzsteinhorn Glacier Ski Area and just 200 metres from the nearest ski slope. It features a luxurious spa area, a heated outdoor pool, and free WiFi. The elegant rooms at the Sonnblick Hotel include a balcony, a flat-screen cable TV, a bathroom, and wooden floors. Hotel Sonnblick’s spa area features a hot tub, various saunas, a relaxation room with water beds, and an open fireplace. The restaurant serves traditional Austrian cuisine. Breakfast includes sparkling wine and local specialities. A 3 or 5-course dinner is available at an additional cost, and various themed dinners and buffets are offered regularly. Zell am See is 8 km away, and Hohe Tauern National Park can be reached in a 30-minute drive. A bus stop is directly opposite the hotel. In summer, the Zell am See-Kaprun Summer Card is included in the rate. This card comprises many free benefits and discounts, including free use of local cable cars.

name: Krumers Alpin - Your Mountain Oasis
description: Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Seefeld and 150 metres from the Rosshütte cable car, the Krumers Alpin – Your Mountain Oasis is a 4-star superior hotel featuring a renovated 3,500 m² spa area with an all-year 240 m² large indoor and outdoor pool, a ski storage with a ski boot dryer, 4 conference rooms, an underground car park and car ports. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The Krumers Alpin – Your Mountain Oasis includes a large sauna area with a Finnish sauna, a laconium, an aroma-infused steam room, an Alpine herb steam room, an ice room with ice fountain, a tepidarium with heated stone loungers, 2 solariums, and a gym with TechnoGym and Precor equipment and an exercise room. A wide range of massage and beauty treatments is available as well. The spacious rooms include a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, and a bathroom with hairdryer. All rooms include a bag with bathrobes, slippers, and bathing towels. The generous half board includes a breakfast buffet, cakes in the afternoon, a 5-course dinner menu or a choice of dishes or buffet with vegetarian, vegan and allergen-free dishes. The cuisine is a contemporary interpretation of Austrian classics and international favourites. In summer, several hiking and biking trails, including theme trails, such as the Mental Power Trail, e-bike and mountain bike trails and a roller ski trail. Several lakes with public bathing beaches and golf clubs are in the vicinity.

name: Hotel Gruberhof
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 50 individually decorated guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including a seasonal outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and ski storage. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Gruberhof in Innsbruck (Igls), you'll be steps from Wipptal and 3 minutes by foot from Patscherkofel Mountain Bahn. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Olympia Express Gondola and 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Innsbruck Olympic Sliding Center. Dining Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Renovations This property is closed from April 4 2023 to May 25 2023 (dates subject to change). The following facilities or services will be unavailable from September 18 2022 to June 1 2023 (dates subject to change): Swimming pool Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.00 per person, per night. name: Elements Resort Zell am See, BW Signature Collection
description: Mountain, Lake & Glacier await you at Elements Resort, located at the base of the mountain between the glacier and the lake. The beautiful sunny location, fresh air and a wide panoramic view of the Kitzsteinhorn are a permanent respite for the soul. This wonderful location is certainly the best starting point for great holiday moments. Whether climber, cyclist or golfer, the Zell am See - Kaprun region offers the right adventure for all active adventurers. Due to the ideal location of the Elements Resort Zell am See you are able to spend the whole holiday without your car. You can reach almost everything by foot from your Alpine Design apartment, whether lift station, supermarket, restaurant or train stop, everything is within walking distance. The Areit Xpress is only 850m away and is the ideal starting point to the fascinating hiking and skiing area Schmittenhöhe. The Zell am See - Kaprun golf course and the Tauern Spa Kaprun are also just a few minutes away by car. In the alpine design hotel, every little detail has been matched to perfectly combine luxury with comfort. Many of the 56 hotel rooms, apartments and penthouses are equipped with terrace and private sauna. After your skiing, hiking and active adventures, recharge your batteries in the wellness area of the Elements Resort. The in-house wellness area is equipped with a year-round heated outdoor pool, sauna, infrared cabin and relaxation room. If you have any energies left at the end of the day, we recommend going to the modern equipped fitness center. The house also has a ski storage room, where you can store your ski equipment in heated and lockable ski boxes. The aparthotel offers everything for an unforgettable holiday. The in-house Restaurant Elements spoils its guests with culinary specialties and combines Pinzgau's traditional cuisine with contemporary innovations. In this sense, the hotel combines skilfully cosiness with urban lounge flair. The hip resort is guaranteed not to leave much to be desired.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Süd Graz
description: This 4-star design hotel enjoys a quiet location in the south of Graz, only a 20-minute drive from the Old Town. Hotel Süd art offers free WiFi and an indoor pool. The rooms feature a work desk, a minibar, and satellite TV. All rooms and bathrooms were renovated in 2009 and 2010. Some rooms are air-conditioned and feature a laptop-size safe. The spa area can be used free of charge and includes a sauna, an infrared cabin, and a fitness room. Bathrobes are provided free of charge in each of Hotel Süd art’s rooms. A rich and varied breakfast buffet is served every morning. Packed lunches are provided for guests leaving early in the morning. Various drinks are available at the bar, which is open until 22:00. 4 different restaurants are within an 8-minute walk of this bed and breakfast hotel. A private underground car park can be used at a surcharge. Free public parking spaces are available around the hotel. A charging station for electric cars is available at the hotel as well. Hotel Süd art is only 2 km away from the Webling and Seiersberg motorway exits. 2 large shopping centres are directly located at these exits. Graz Airport is 7 km away. The walk to the nearest bus stop connecting to the Old Town, which is 5 km away, takes 2 minutes.

name: Tribe Amsterdam City
description: Tribe Amsterdam City is located in the up-and-coming Amsterdam North. The hotel has been inspired by the designers Feix & Merlin, and is the perfect destination for fun-loving travellers who are eager to discover Amsterdam's underground cultural scene.accorhotels.com

name: Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
description: Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel has a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Badhoevedorp. This 4-star hotel provides a spa experience, with its sauna and spa centre. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a vegetarian or halal breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel. Vondelpark is 8.3 km from the hotel, while Van Gogh Museum is 9.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 3 km from Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel.

name: Steigenberger Airport Hotel Amsterdam
address: Stationsplein Zw 951, CE 1117 Schiphol, North Holland
description: This beautiful 4-star hotel with 440 luxury styled hotel rooms, is located in the non-flying zone and next to the Amsterdam Forest. The complimentary Shuttle Service brings you from-and-to Schiphol Airport in only 8 minutes. Relax (free of charge) in the Lifestyle Club & Active Spa with the most beautiful indoor heated swimming pool, steam bath, sauna, solarium, relaxation area and 24/7 fitness room. The unique Sports & Media Bar (open 7 days per week for lunch, drinks and dinner) offers a wide range of international dishes. While enjoying, you can watch sports events from all over the world displayed on large television screens. In the Trattoria (open Monday-Friday for dinner, as from 18:00 hours) you can enjoy traditional Italian dishes combined with beautiful wines. The most delicious coffees with homemade pastries will be served in our Coffee & Wine Lounge and the most luxury breakfast buffet with a wide range of fresh products will be served in our Patio Restaurant every morning. This hotel is also the perfect location for large international meetings & events. All 15 multifunctional modern conference rooms (with capacity up to 620 persons in Theatre style and all equipped with high-tech facilities) have natural daylight and are located on the ground floor. The large foyer area is accommodated with welcome desks and ideal for stands or coffee breaks.Official Hotel Information

name: Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
address: Schiphol Boulevard 701, 1118 BN Schiphol, North Holland
description: Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol is unlike any other airport hotel. Visionary and inspirational, its breathtaking design redefines what an airport hotel should be. Directly connected to the international airport terminal of Amsterdam Airport Schiphol via a covered walkway, the hotel is an ideal base for guests catching a flight or visiting the cosmopolitan city of Amsterdam. The railway station inside the terminal provides easy access to the city center in just 15 minutes. The stylish guest rooms and suites boast unique diamond-shaped windows, curved walls and Dutch art. Work comfortably at the ergonomic desk, check your emails with complimentary WiFi and refresh in the spacious bathroom. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for Executive Lounge access. Fresh, bold and surprising are worthy descriptions for the modern Bowery Restaurant with three open kitchens offering Asian & Grill dishes and the stylish Axis Lobby & Cocktail Bar with a wide selection of gins and jenevers. Thrive at the 24-hour fitness center, also offering a sauna and steam room. The first and second floors of this hotel function as an extensive meeting and conference center. It offers 1800 sq. m. of naturally lit flexible event space including a grand pillar less ballroom. A 15-minute train ride takes you from the railway station at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol to the heart of Amsterdam, where you'll find famous museums like Rijksmuseum and Hermitage, great nightlife, colorful markets, lots of retail, and dining options. Take a boat tour of the city's meandering canals or visit the historic former brewery at The Heineken Experience. A little farther away, you find Zandvoort with its sandy beaches, trendy beach bars, and family activities. Or visit the Zaanse Schans, Dutch history full of windmills, handicraft shops, and museums. In Spring, the famous Keukenhof, one of the world’s largest flower gardens, is a must see.Hilton

name: Hyatt Regency Amsterdam
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Amsterdam. Those staying at the property can also make use of complimentary wireless internet. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Hyatt Regency Amsterdam, such as fitness classes, meeting rooms and a concierge. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice spot to relax. The rooms at Hyatt Regency Amsterdam are air-conditioned and include a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They all offer an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and an alarm clock. Amsterdam's attractions, including Natura Artis Magistra and Oosterpark, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The Tropenmuseum, the Hermitage Amsterdam and the Portuguese Synagogue are also found within a 20-minute walk away.Revato

name: Hotel Jakarta Amsterdam
description: Hotel Jakarta Amsterdam is a unique sustainable hotel in Amsterdam at the IJ river, at the former location where ships left for Jakarta. Hotel Jakarta offers 200 luxurious rooms with a Indonesian influenced style. The boutique style hotel offers rooms of 30 m2 with an Indonesian twist. Most of the superior rooms feature a balcony, with panoramic views over the river IJ on one side and looking over the central station on the Waterfront side. Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Café Jakarta or get a drink at sky bar Malabar on the 8th and 9th floor. A Breakfast buffet is served each morning at the property and is included in the rates. Relax in the wellness and swimming pool with views off the river IJ. The hotel is located within 1.2 km of the central station. The main shopping area is 1.5 km away, while Dam square and Royal Palace can be found at a distance of 2.1 km.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam - Amstel
address: Joan Muyskenweg 20, 1096 CJ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam - Amstel has opened its doors in October 2018. It offers 4-star accommodation in Amsterdam with fitness facilities and a spa and wellness centre. Centrally located in a prime location in the Oost district. 1.8 km from Amsterdam RAI only a 10-minute ride by metro to Amsterdam city centre. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The rooms vary from 24m2 to 55m2 and are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and air conditioning. The private bathroom features a rain shower and is fitted with free toiletries. Hotel guests can make use of the the spa and wellness centre including infra-red sauna, Turkish steam bath, wax salon, outdoor pool and Rasul bath. The massage services are available for a surcharge. A live cooking breakfast buffet is served every morning at the property. The in-house a la carte restaurant serves international cuisine. Bar Moqum is the hotel bar where you can enjoy a cup of coffee, have a cocktail and eat a curry, burger or salad. Only a 5-minute walk to the metro Overamstel, Amsterdam Arena and Ziggo Dome are 2.9 km from the accommodation. Schiphol Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
description: Thank you for choosing our Ramada hotel. Ramada is a global upper midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless high-speed internet access, meeting rooms, business services, fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an on-site restaurant/ lounge, while other sites offer a complimentary continental breakfast. You do your thing, leave the rest to usWyndham

name: Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
description: Located within 8.4 km of Vondelpark and 9.2 km of Van Gogh Museum in Badhoevedorp, Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and flat-screen TV. Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, private bathroom and a kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a fridge. The aparthotel offers a vegetarian or halal breakfast. The restaurant at Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel serves international cuisine. Guests at the accommodation use the gym or relax in the spa and wellness centre including a sauna, a wellness packages and a steam room. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel can arrange a bicycle rental service. Moco Museum is 9.3 km from the aparthotel, while Leidseplein is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol, 3 km from Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: The Social Hub Amsterdam City
description: The Social Hub Hotel Amsterdam City offers design accommodation within 20 minutes walking distance of the city centre. It is also a 5 minute subway ride to the city centre. Explore the city and its hotspots by foot or public transport, since Metro Station Wibautstraat is right outside the hotel. Several restaurants and clubs in the neighborhood to provide entertainment. Free WiFi is offered. Each room of The Social Hub Hotel Amsterdam City features an en suite. There is a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The gym can be used for free. Extras include communal spaces such as a library, work places and café. The vintage market at Waterlooplein in only 3 minutes away by metro and an 8 minute walk will get you to the up-and-coming Oost (east) where you will find bars and restaurants. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 20 km from The Social Hub Hotel Amsterdam City.

name: Westcord Art Hotel Amsterdam 4
description: The 4-star WestCord Art Hotel is situated on the edge of the historic centre of Amsterdam. A 15-minute walk through the Westerpark will get you to the heart of the city. Guests benefit from free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Parking is available on-site. The modern rooms have air conditioning, lcd TV and a Nespresso coffee machine. All comfortable rooms have artworks above the bed and a bathroom with an extra deep bath or rain shower. There is a terrace with a bar which overlooks the lush grounds.The ART Brasserie offers à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner. Bikes can be rented at the hotel. The hotel is situated 1.5 km from the Westerpark, where restaurants and cultural activities can be found. Business park Westpoort is nearby. The Zaanstraat bus stop is located directly opposite the hotel and offer direct services to the city centre in 5 minutes. The city centre is at 2 km distance and Schiphol Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: ibis Schiphol Amsterdam Airport
description: ibis Schiphol Amsterdam Airport Vibrant economy hotel, open to everyone YOU are welcome! This is a 644 rooms Ibis Schiphol Amsterdam Airport hotel. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to and from Schiphol Airport. It features free fitness, a 24-hour Take Away and an extensive breakfast is served from 04:00hrs until 12:00hrs. Lunch buffet from 12:00hrs until 16:00hrs and dinner from 18:00hrs until 22:00hrs. Our Burger Bar is open from 16:00hrs until 23:00hrs for burgers and drinks. Our Bar opens at 17:accorhotels.com

name: Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel
address: Verlengde van Marwijk Kooystraat 30, 1096 BX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel is just 700m from Amstel Business Park and just over 7km from the city centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and free private parking based on availability. It is also a 15 minutes’ drive to Schiphol Airport. Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel has rooms with free tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar. All rooms include a work desk, a safe and an alarm clock. Various grill specialities are offered for lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or relax in the lounge with comfortable chairs and a flat-screen TV. Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel is a 20-minute walk from Overamstel Metro Station. From here, you can reach Amsterdam Central Station in 20 minutes and the RAI Exhibition Centre in 5 minutes. It is also around 500m from the A10 Ring Road.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Amsterdam Houthavens
description: Welcome to Residence Inn Amsterdam Houthavens, your fully equipped dream apartment. Chic interiors are inspired by Vermeer’s palettes and complimented by striking views over Houthavens harbor. The hotel offers spacious studios and suites that allow you to live as you would at home. Luxurious amenities include fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, cooktop stove, microwave and all plates and utensils. Complimentary continental buffet breakfast with hot items is served daily. The hotel also has an extensive meeting and events spaces, swimming pool and sauna, complimentary Wi-Fi throughout, communal guest lounges and laundry, and 24/7 fitness center and Grab ’n Go Market. We are located in the heart of Amsterdam's design district and connected to Moxy Amsterdam to offer access to a lively bar and outdoor terraces when weather permits.Marriott

name: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam
description: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam is situated along the picturesque Herengracht canal, spanning six 17th and 18th century canal palaces. Located in the in the UNESCO-listed city center, experience our Sincerely Elegant Service to make your stay truly unforgettable. Pamper yourself with personalized treatments at our Guerlain Spa or indulge in all-day dining at Peacock Alley, featuring its renowned Afternoon Tea. For an exceptional culinary experience, savor the exquisite dishes of Two-Michelin-starred restaurant Spectrum. Unwind at our Vault Bar, where expertly crafted cocktails and a cozy ambiance awaits you. For any occasion, our exquisite venues and exceptional service are at your disposal to host a tailored event that exceeds expectations.Hilton

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Oostzaan - Amsterdam
description: Situated in Oostzaan, 10 km from Amsterdam, the new Van der Valk Hotel Oostzaan - Amsterdam offers free private parking and free WiFi. There is a casino on site as well as an à la carte restaurant. Guests can take a refreshing plunge in the heated indoor pool on the 6th floor, where a sauna with panoramic views and a gym are also featured. The hotel boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. All rooms have a walk-in rain shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Superior rooms boast a bubble bath. Each room comes with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and bike rental is available. Enjoy a drink at the hotel bar or relax in the wellness area. Guests can enjoy live cooking on Saturdays and a brunch on Sunday. Zaanse Schans is 10 km away, while Haarlem is 17 km from the property. Amsterdam Central Station is 10.8 km from the accommodation. Dam Square is 12 km km away. Schiphol Airport is 15 km away.

name: The Student Hotel Amsterdam West
address: Van de Sande Bakhuijzenstraat 4, 1061 AZ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Situated only a 10-minute bike ride from the city centre, The Social Hub Amsterdam West offers fully furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi. Metro station Jan van Galenstraat is only 100 metres away with direct links to RAI, Zuid WTC and Bijlmer Arena. Each room at The Social Hub Amsterdam West features an en suite bathroom with a shower or a bath and a toilet. There is a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Tram stop is a 2-minute walk away and offers direct links to Dam Square in 20 minutes and Central Station in 25 minutes. Schiphol Airport is 14 km away. Guests can go relax in the Rembrandtpark, 15 minutes by foot.

name: The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4
address: Jan Van Galenstraat 335, 1061 AZ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Situated in Amsterdam, 3.8 km from Anne Frank House, The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire is available. Leidseplein is 4.3 km from The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star, while Royal Palace Amsterdam is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: WestCord Art Hotel Amsterdam 3 stars
description: The 3-star WestCord Art Hotel is situated on the edge of the historic centre of Amsterdam. A 15-minute walk through the Westerpark will get you to the heart of the city. Guests benefit from free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Parking is available on-site. The modern rooms have air conditioning, lcd TV and a Nespresso coffee machine. All rooms have artworks above the bed and a bathroom with a bath or rain shower. There is a terrace with a bar which overlooks the lush grounds. The ART Brasserie offers à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner. Bikes can be rented at the hotel. The hotel is situated 1.5 km from the Westerpark, where restaurants and cultural activities can be found. Business park Westpoort is nearby. The "Zaanstraat" bus stop is located directly opposite the hotel and offer direct services to the city centre in 5 minutes. The city centre is at 2 km distance and Schiphol Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Amsterdam Id Aparthotel
description: Convenienty situated 200 metres from Amsterdam Sloterdijk Station, Amsterdam ID Aparthotel offers spacious and modern accommodation with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar or on the terrace. Amsterdam’s historic city centre is a 6-minute train ride away. All non-smoking apartments are bright and feature a modern décor with authentic Dutch elements. The apartments at this cash-free property come with a fully equipped kitchen, design furniture and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower. Due to our environmental footprint, our air conditioning works on climate control. Guests are free to use shared facilities such as the lounge area, fitness and a sauna. Other facilities like a bar, secured parking and laundry facilities are offered. Guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Adams ID, the hotel's restaurant. Also available is the playroom with a foosball table, a pool table and a dartboard. Meeting spaces for 8 up to 150 people are also available. Westergasfabriek is 2,7 km from this property. From Amsterdam ID Aparthotel, Schiphol airport and the RAI convention centre are 15 minutes away by train.

name: Mainport Hotel Rotterdam
description: We’re located on the banks of the river Maas, offering sweeping views of the water and skyline. Discover attractions like The Museum Boijmans van Beuningen and Markthal, both less than a kilometer from us. We are next door to the iconic Erasmusbrug, the perfect spot for a Rotterdam sunset. Our hotel has a waterfront terrace and private jetty accessible for water taxi pickups.Hilton

name: Van der Valk Hotel Maastricht
description: This hotel is set on the edge of Maastricht's historic centre, just off the A2 highway. It features fitness facilities, a indoor swimming pool and sauna area and three fine dining restaurants. Parking in front of the hotel is free of charge for guests. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel Van der Valk Maastricht has spacious hotel rooms with a seating area, box-spring beds, flat-screen TV and work desk. Most rooms have a bath and a separate shower, and free toiletries are provided. The hotel offers an à la carte restaurant, a live cooking restaurant and a bar/brasserie. During warmer weather guests can relax on the terrace. Guests also have free access to the luxury wellness centre that includes an indoor swimming pool with built-in whirlpool, 3 saunas, a cooling down area with rain shower and a relax room. The Maastricht Exposition & Congress Centre (MECC) is a 5-minute drive away. The bus stop on the opposite of the hotel offers direct connections to Maastricht Central Station and the city centre.

name: Amrâth Grand Hotel de l'Empereur
description: Would you like to stay in the historical city of Maastricht? Amrth Grand Hotel de l'Empereur offers comfortable rooms and luxurious suites, a restaurant, bar and swimming pool. The simming pool is free of charge for hotel guests. Free high-speed Wi-Fi Internet is available througout the hotel. Car parking is available (charges apply).iHotelier/iStay

name: Novotel Maastricht
description: The Novotel Maastricht team is happy to let you experience how friendly Maastricht people are. Discover the most foreign city in the Netherlands and enjoy all the beauty that this city has to offer! You can walk to the center within 20 minutes on the "Groene Loper" of Maastricht, a new hiking trail which is located next to the hotel. Novotel Maastricht is also an excellent base for exploring other Burgundian regions, such as Valkenburg aan de Geul, but also the Voerstreek and Kanne towards Belgium.accorhotels.com

name: Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne
description: This Premium hotel is located in the charming heart of Eindhoven, opposite the luxury shopping center De Heuvel and the Muziekgebouw. Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne has 320 stylish hotel rooms and 18 multifunctional meeting rooms for all your meetings and conferences in Eindhoven. For your relaxation the Fit and Spa Lounge with the latest fitness equipment, a Finnish sauna, an infrared sauna, a solarium, a swimming pool and the experience shower. Vestdijk47, a contemporary restaurant-lounge-bar concept.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Eindhoven Centre
description: City centre hotel close to Eindhoven train station, with a mini gym and an indoor pool. The central Holiday Inn® Eindhoven hotel is a four-minute walk from Eindhoven train and bus stations. Eindhoven Airport is 20 minutes away by car, and the hotel offers parking for a daily fee. There are six naturally lit meeting rooms including the Plenary Hall with space up to 180 people. Free WiFi is available throughout the building. The High Tech Campus is a 16-minute drive away. It's a 10-minute walk to the Piazza and Heuvel Galerie shopping malls, with a choice of lively bars and restaurants nearby. Eindhoven's design legacy is on show at the Philips Museum, a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while it's an eight-minute bus ride to Van Abbemuseum for modern and contemporary art. Football fans can walk to PSV Eindhoven's home ground in 10 minutes. Modern rooms offer a choice of pillows to ensure a good night's sleep – and kids stay and eat free*. Wake up to a continental breakfast buffet and, later, enjoy a meal in our All Day Dining restaurant. Unwind in the hotel's indoor pool or work out in the 24-hour mini gym, and end the day in Bar the Living.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven
description: Located only 5 minutes’ drive from Eindhoven’s city centre, this hotel offers free parking and free WiFi. An extensive on-site sports centre including an indoor pool as well as fitness facilities are available. The rooms have a modern design and most have large windows opening to the balcony or patio. Some rooms have a spacious seating area and private spa bath facilities. There are 3 restaurants at Van der Valk. Martinus offers an artisan à la carte menu. HET BUFFET offers breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets. Hotel bar OZZO Food & Drinks offers sushi and homemade burgers. The hotel is situated in the lush surroundings of Genneper Park. Eindhoven Airport is 10 minutes away from Van Der Valk by car and the hotel is directly off the A2/A67 highway.

name: Bastion Hotel Eindhoven Waalre
address: Laan Van Diepenvoorde 30, 5582 LA Waalre, Noord-Brabant
description: Set in Eindhoven, 40 km from Toverland, Bastion Hotel Eindhoven Waalre offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Bastion Hotel Eindhoven Waalre every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play billiards at Bastion Hotel Eindhoven Waalre. Brabanthallen Exhibition Centre is 42 km from the hotel, while De Efteling is 49 km away. The nearest airport is Eindhoven Airport, 12 km from Bastion Hotel Eindhoven Waalre.

name: Strandhotel Westduin
description: Only 50 metres from the beach, Strandhotel Westduin offers rooms with a French balcony and terrace. There is free Wi-Fi, paid parking possibilities, an infrared sauna and a garden with sun terrace. Each room is warmly decorated and comes with a Nespresso machine. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning. Restaurant Bij Jules serves international à la carte cuisine and seasonal dishes made from organic products. The bar offers drinks, including cocktails, light meals and snacks throughout the afternoon and evening. Strandhotel Westduin is located next to the dunes and beaches. The centre of Vlissingen is 4.5 km away. Middelburg, featuring sights including Middelburg Abbey, is 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel alongside with Zoutelande, Domburg and Veere.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Hengelo
description: Located in the beatiful area of Twente, the pleasant Van der Valk Hotel Hengelo offers many recreative possibilities and arrangements. A variety of rooms are available. The 10 multifunctional conference rooms are suitable for meetings, presentations, weddings and personnel parties. Guest benefit from free Wi-Fi access. Because of its ideal location next to the highway (A1), Van Der Valk Hotel Hengelo is very well accessible.

name: Bastion Hotel Arnhem
description: Located in Arnhem, 1.1 km from Arnhem Station, Bastion Hotel Arnhem provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Guests can have a drink at the bar. Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Bastion Hotel Arnhem each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. You can play billiards at Bastion Hotel Arnhem. Gelredome is 3.3 km from the hotel, while Burgers' Zoo is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Weeze Airport, 68 km from Bastion Hotel Arnhem.

name: Hotel Grand Canal
description: Hotel Grand Canal is quietly situated in the centre of Delft and yet 150 meters away from Delft’s Central Station, which offers many public transport facilities. All rooms have a homey setting and a view of the canals. You can enjoy an extensive breakfast in the breakfast room before exploring this historic city. This former canal house used to be the city’s prison and even earlier, the storage place for the V.O.C. At 50 metres from the hotel, there is a parking area. Hotel Grand Canal is situated close to the A4 and A13 to Amsterdam, Rotterdam and the Hague. Leiden is a 30 minute drive away.

name: Fletcher Hotel - Restaurant Nieuwegein - Utrecht
description: The 4-star Fletcher Hotel-restaurant Utrecht Nieuwegein is located just off the A2/E25 highway and only 10 km from the lively Utrecht city centre. It features a restaurant with bar, fitness facilities and a swimming pool with sauna. The rooms have modern furnishings and design lighting. They come with a spacious bathroom including a rain shower. Restaurant Zilver offers an extensive menu of meat and fish specialties, all accompanied with a large selection of wines. There is also a bar serving cocktails and light snacks. Nieuwegein's shopping centre and restaurant area is just 900 metres away.

name: Bastion Hotel Nijmegen
description: Located west of the vibrant city centre, near the A73, Bastion Hotel Nijmegen provides easy access in and out of the area and opportunities for countryside walks and cycle rides. Sanadome Nijmegen is located 2 kms from the property, offering wellness facilities. Bastion Hotel Nijmegen offers a 24-hour front office, comfortable rooms and an extensive choice of dishes from the à la carte menu in the atmospheric restaurant. Guests are always welcome in the cosy hotel bar or lounge. The lounge features LCD TV and relaxing lounge chairs. The hotel also offers free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel. In the lobby, there is a computer with internet access, at the guests disposal free of charge.

name: Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin
address: Kon. Astrid Boulevard 5, 2200 AB Noordwijk, Zuid-Holland
description: Facing the beachfront, Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin offers 5-star accommodation in Noordwijk aan Zee and features a fitness centre, garden and shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Noordwijk aan Zee Beach is 200 metres from Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin, while Keukenhof is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Restaurant Oud London
description: Hotel Restaurant Oud London is a 4-star hotel situated in the "Utrechtse Heuvelrug" only 20 minutes’ drive from both Utrecht and Amersfoort. It includes free WiFi and an indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam cabin and gym. Please contact the property for current opening hours. All of the rooms at Hotel Oud London are spacious and feature a seating area and a TV. Some rooms have a balcony. The centre of Zeist is 3.5 km from Oud London. The Utrechtse Heuvelrug Nature Reserve is less than 15 minutes away by car. The hotel offers free public parking on site. Brasserie Restaurant 't VoorHuys offers a casual setting for a cup of coffee with home-made traditional biscuits "kletskoppen", lunch and dinner. You can enjoy freshly made dishes on a daily basis prepared by the kitchen staff. For leisure time, we kindly invite you to sample a glass of fine wine at the bar or on our outdoor terrace. There is also packed lunch service, bike hire and charging points for cars available at the property.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg is located in Tilburg, 2.7 km from Speelland Beekse Bergen and 2.9 km from Safari Beekse Bergen. Among the various facilities are a casino and a garden. Both free WiFi and private parking are accessible at the hotel. All guest rooms in Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg are equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom and a bath, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. The rooms at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. Naturemuseum Brabant is 5 km from the hotel. Eindhoven Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: NH Atlantic Den Haag
description: Set in the middle of the dunes, NH Atlantic Den Haag is located directly on the Kijkduin beach. Scheveningen, a lovely seaside town, and The Hague city center are only a 20-minute drive away. Conveniently, bus number 24 stops nearby and will take you to The Hague, where you can enjoy sights such as the Peace Palace, Madurodam miniature city and bustling squares. There is also a boulevard dotted with international restaurants along the ocean. NH Atlantic Den Haag offers a choice of 152 rooms with balconies. Most have large windows and some offer views of the ocean. The suites have themed designs, decorated in Asian, Mondrian and honeymoon styles. A fresh breakfast is served daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal with an ocean view at the Gusto Restaurant or head to Atlantic Beach right on the ocean. Some nights there is a live DJ, or unwind with a drink at the Sabor bar. For active travelers, NH Atlantic Den Haag offers bike rentals and a gym. There is also a heated indoor pool, solarium. An excellent choice for functions, there are 19 meetings rooms at the hotel. Free Wi-Fi and parking are available.NH Hoteles

name: Landgoed De Wilmersberg
description: Landgoed de Wilmersberg is beautifully located in a stunning green setting in Twente with free private parking. This 4-star hotel includes a wellness centre, a tennis court and an indoor pool. The hotel rooms are decorated in a romantic theme and come with a Nespresso coffee machine. A rural-style breakfast buffet is served daily in the breakfast room. Guests can make use of the extensive wellness facilities which include a sauna, spa bath and steam bath. There is also a beauty centre which offers relaxing treatments and massages. The restaurant serves regional and seasonal cuisine in elegant modern surroundings and features a sommelier and extensive wine menu. During the winter the open fire provides a cosy touch whilst in summer the picturesque terrace offers open-air dining. De Wilmersberg is ideally situated for many walking routes and cycling trails. The centre of Oldenzaal is just over 5 minutes away by car and Hengelo is less than 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Carlton Beach
description: This hotel offers rooms with a balcony only 50 metres from the beach in Scheveningen. Carlton Beach includes wellness facilities and and two restaurants. Carlton Beach features rooms with modern bathrooms with a sliding glass door design. Each of the rooms has a refrigerator with various drinks and has a Nespresso coffee machine. Holland Casino Scheveningen is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the famous pier is only 5 minutes’ away. The centre of Den Haag is a 15-minute tram journey away from the Zwarte Pad tram stop which is 50 metres from Carlton. The wellness facilities at Carlton Beach include an indoor swimming pool with a solarium, steam bath and fitness centre. There are also indoor and outdoor saunas plus guests can enjoy a range of relaxing massages treatments. The Beach Brasserie serves light lunch bites and bar snacks in a casual setting with an open-fire of unique design. International cuisine and organic dishes are served in the Smugglers Grill & Bar.

name: Fletcher Resort-Hotel Zutphen
description: Situated in Zutphen, this 4-star resort has been rewarded for its ecological and social durability. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a TV. Many sports facilities are available, such as tennis courts, squash courts and bowling alleys. The rooms of Fletcher Resort-Hotel Zutphen are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. All rooms have a work desk, a hairdryer, and a luxurious bathroom. Guests can enjoy healthy dishes and excellent wines at stylish restaurant Sense. Located next to the pond there is a lovely terrace, which also has a grill corner. Fletcher Resort-Hotel Zutphen features 7 lighted all-weather and gravel courts, a hall with 4 indoor tennis courts and 4 squash courts. In addition to this, the hotel has 10 bowling alleys, a gym, a pool, and a sauna. The Zutphen railway station is located 3.8 km from Fletcher Resort-Hotel Zutphen, and the St. Walburgis Church is 3 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Karel V
description: Welcome to Grand Hotel Karel V, World Hotel Luxury a historic five-star hotel in the center of Utrecht. Right in the heart of the city, set behind an imposing façade, you will find Utrecht's best-kept secret. Our prestigious hotel is located in a monumental building which used to function as a medieval monastery. This extraordinary location allows you to experience a unique, tailor-made luxury stay with historical charm. Our lush 10,000-square-metre garden offers an oasis of calmness, in which you can relax or can enjoy our terraces. In total, our hotel has 121 rooms, ranging from Comfort rooms to Suites, with beautiful views of the Dom Tower, canals or our courtyard gardens. Our rooms are equipped with all the necessary amenities to ensure that your luxurious stay at our hotel lacks nothing. The importance we attach to sustainability is evident in various ways within both our rooms and entire hotel, which has been awarded Gold Key. Immerse yourself in culinary indulgence at our Michelin starred restaurant, enjoy our sophisticated bistro or relax in our Bar & Lounge. You can also leave all your worries behind in the wellness, complete with an invigorating spa and modern fitness facilities. Whether you would like to dine, stay overnight or host an elegant event: our friendly staff are on hand to make your experience unforgettable. We would like to welcome you into a world where history comes alive and modern luxury surrounds you.bestwestern.com

name: Van der Valk Hotel Heerlen
description: Hotel Heerlen is a luxury 4-star hotel located on the countryside, just 800 metres from the 14th-century Terworm Castle and estate. The property includes an indoor swimming pool and a gym. It also features a wellness area (against a surcharge) with various saunas, an indoor/outdoor relaxation area and an ice lounge. The centre of Heerlen is only a 15-minute walk away. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a bath, shower and toilet. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The modern a la carte restaurant on site serves internationally oriented dishes. Guests can enjoy beverages at the bar. The hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Central Station.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Venlo
description: Van der Valk Hotel Venlo offers free parking and free WiFi throughout the entire hotel. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The spacious hotel rooms have a private bathroom and modern facilities. Van der Valk Hotel Venlo has a children's playground. Because of the hotel's central position to the A67, many of the tourist attractions and cultural sites are easily reached.

name: Alexander Hotel
description: Hotel Alexander is only 200 metres from the beach in Noordwijk aan Zee. It includes free WiFi and the Alexander Beach Club with a panoramic sea-view terrace. Azzuro Wellness Centre is situated next to the hotel and provides free access for guests to an indoor pool plus a Turkish steam bath and whirlpools. The spa offers relaxing treatments including hot stone massage and manicures. There are also tennis and squash courts. Each of the rooms benefits from a balcony and bathrooms including a shower. Alexander Beach Club offers snacks and meals complemented with a refreshing drink. The restaurant at Hotel Alexander serves French cuisine with International influences. The restaurant is open all year round. The main shopping district and entertainment area in Noordwijk aan Zee is less than 200 metres away. Guests can make use of the bicycle rental when exploring the dunes. Amsterdam is a 40-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Hotel de Naaldhof
description: Hotel de Naaldhof is 20 minutes by car from Den Bosch. It features a fine dining restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel de Naaldhof offers standard, luxurious and family rooms. The rooms come equipped with a flat-screen TV. Guests can also enjoy a variety of leisure activities on-site including bowling, paint balling or outdoor laser games. The restaurant serves Dutch cuisine and a variety of choices for breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is a bar for drinks. Eindhoven Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Within 10 minutes you can reach event centre Autotron. It is possible to charge electric cars at the parking space.

name: Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla
address: Boulevard Kukulcan South North Km 12 5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla, a new, urban hotel beside the lagoon in Cancun hotel zone. Enjoy being steps from some of the best shopping brands, restaurants and white sand beaches. We will introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in. At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms are comfortable, modern spaces with the amenities you want, like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, murals from local artists and our exclusively designed Canopy beds. Deluxe rooms feature views of the ocean and double shower, while our suites include a living room, dining area, espresso/bar cart and hanging chair as well as signature Canopy bathrobe. Feel better going forward and fill up your bottles with filtered water on every floor. Welcome the day in the cafe with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine at Azulinda Cafe and Bar or head to the roof to sip cocktails, fresh juices or coffee al fresco. Enjoy the view while working out or relaxing poolside at our rooftop fitness center and outdoor pool. If there is business to be done, settle into our co-working space with comfortable seating and plenty of charging outlets. We also offer three boardrooms for meetings and events, and our beautiful terrace will accommodate up to 36 guests. Enjoy all Hilton Honors benefits at our Energizing hotel.Hilton

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Cancun Cumbres
address: Blvd. Luis Donaldo Colosio Mza 1 SM, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively situated in Cancún, Hampton Inn By Hilton Cancun Cumbres features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. 5.1 km from Cancun Underwater Museum and 7.6 km from Beto Avila Stadium, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 8.3 km from Cancun Government Palace. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. All units have a desk. An American breakfast is available each morning at Hampton Inn By Hilton Cancun Cumbres. With staff speaking English and Spanish, advice is available at the reception. Cancun Bus Station is 8.7 km from the accommodation, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 10 km from Hampton Inn By Hilton Cancun Cumbres.

name: Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun's hotel zone, next to one of the city's most beautiful beaches, this property offers enjoyable facilities and luxurious spa services with great views of Nichupte Lagoon. The family-friendly resort of Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun consists of 3 main buildings, each sheltered by a palapa. Go swimming in the outdoor pool or spend the day at the beach. The hotel offers several eating options, including Argentinian dishes in San Telmo, Trattoria and Pizzeria offering typical Italian classics, Sushi Corner, Cantina offering the Mexican flavour, The Grill to enjoy your meals while also enjoying the outdoor view, a children's option at the Pirate Ship and for the adults La Cevichería, where they can snack and sip a refreshing beverage while watching their kids play. The Deli & Gift Shop is a relaxing corner where guests can enjoy a cup of coffee, a pastry and a good book. The Fiesta Americana's Miiluma Spa offers massage and beauty treatments. There is also a modern gym, and yoga classes are offered.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Cancun Centro
address: Avenida Tulum, MZ 1, Lote 2, SM 12, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: In an atmosphere of classic timeless style right in Cancún’s growing financial and shopping district, step into the serene and safe environment of Four Points by Sheraton Cancún Centro where our guests can enjoy comfortable amenities, relaxing accommodations, and productive workspaces. Our family-friendly hotel in Cancún is conveniently located close to hospitals, specialty clinics, universities, and shopping centers. Seeking an authentic local experience downtown, it is perfect for exploring the local area with passion, just 20 minutes away from the hotel zone and the Caribbean Sea beaches. Our easy interior connection to the awarded in the field of health at Galenia Hospital, find a sanctuary in our large rooms and plush bedding. We pride ourselves on superior service, an inviting atmosphere, and a host of thoughtful amenities created to satisfy the corporate and leisure traveler. Maintain your balance at our 24/7 fitness center, and unwind in our beautiful outdoor pool and pool terrace.Marriott

name: Fiesta Americana Cancun Villas
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km.8.5 Lote 3, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The turquoise color of its tranquil and calm waters, the incredible sunsets and the white sand that surrounds the Mexican-style rooms ensures guests the privacy and comfort they need to share with their families. Fiesta Americana Cancn Villas is situated on Punta Cancn, the heart of the hotel zone, very close to the main shopping malls, restaurants and bars in the city and just a few hours from archeological sites and theme parks. Inside the hotel, you will find a wealth of activities for every member of the family, whether for fun or relaxation. Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 79.88 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Benito Jurez, Quintana Roo (Cancn).iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Warsaw City
description: The Hilton Warsaw City brings a unique style of contemporary living to downtown Warsaw and offers impressive city views. Relax in one of our 314 modern guest rooms and suites, all featuring the latest technology. WiFi is available in every guest and meeting room, usage fees apply. Savor modern Polish and European cuisine in Meza Restaurant or unwind in the Pistaccio Lobby Bar & Lounge and enjoy a light snack or coffee at this Warsaw hotel. We offer the largest conference room in the centre of Warsaw. Do business in the Warsaw Hall or choose one of 12 multi-functional meeting rooms. Work in our business centre and impress clients in our boardroom. Workout in Holmes Place Premium Club & Spa or swim laps of the indoor pool. Children aged 4-16 are welcome at the pool on weekends between 1pm - 4pm when accompanied by an adult. The hotel is located 20-30 minutes from the airport, in the central business and financial area of Warsaw. Explore the Old Town, Warsaw's UNESCO World Heritage monument which is a 25-minute walk from the hotel.Hilton

name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Warsaw
description: Offering a swimming pool, Radisson Collection Hotel, Warsaw is just a 10-minute walk from Warsaw Central Station. Air conditioned rooms with tea and coffee facilities are available. Free WiFi is provided. The spacious and modern rooms at the Radisson Collection come with a safety deposit box and a large work desk. All have a large, modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Radisson Collection Hotel, Warsaw houses the TAGO Restaurant where breakfast buffet is served, and THE SPOT Restaurant and Bar. It's an all-seasons restaurant offering modern cuisine and stylish cocktails. During the summer guests can dine and relax on an outdoor terrace. The hotel is situated just a 10-minute walk from Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre and the Palace of Culture & Science. Warsaw Chopin Airport is just a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Warszawa
description: Hotel Warszawa is a 5-star hotel offering a fitness center, spa and wellness center along with free WIFI. It is situated 700 metres from Parade Square and Holy Cross Church. Providing their guests with a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a sun terrace and a restaurant that serves local cuisine. The rooms in Hotel Warszawa come equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Certain rooms offer a terrace, while all units feature a wardrobe. In this property the guests are served a continental breakfast. They also have an access to a bar. The guests are provided with an access to spa and wellness facilities including a sauna and an indoor pool during their stay at the property. Bike hire and car hire are also available at this accommodation. The area is popular for cycling. Hotel Warszawa is located 800 metres from Palace of Culture & Science, while Zacheta National Art Gallery is less than 1 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Nyx Hotel Warsaw By Leonardo Hotels
description: NYX Hotel Warsaw by Leonardo Hotels features a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Warsaw. This 4-star hotel offers an ATM and a business centre. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NYX Hotel Warsaw by Leonardo Hotels each room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. You can play billiards at the accommodation, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near NYX Hotel Warsaw by Leonardo Hotels include Warsaw Central Railway Station, Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre and Palace of Culture and Science. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Sheraton Grand Krakow
description: A 5-star experience providing guests with Krakow’s best views. Located at the foot of The Royal Wawel Castle, on the banks of the Wisla River, Sheraton Grand Krakow is steps away from Krakow Cathedral, Main Market Square and Kazimierz district, but also close to the shopping areas and Krakow's conference center. Fully renovated Lobby and Atrium will inspire you and the recently opened Anima Restaurant will deliver extraordinary Italian culinary experience. Sport fans can enjoy live transmissions in our SomePlace Else sports bar. Our famous Roof Top Terrace with amazing views is the best place to enjoy refreshing cocktails. Our 232 airy, fully renovated family guest rooms and suites connect with what you love the most: smart TV with a wide range of channels, in-room dining, High-Speed Internet, and the unique comfort of the Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience bed. Swim laps in our heated indoor pool or workout at our Sheraton Fitness. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes pets for a fee.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Krakow
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 300 guestrooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at AC Hotel by Marriott Krakow, you'll be centrally located in Kraków, within a 10-minute drive of Main Market Square and Blonia Park. This 4-star hotel is 9.7 mi (15.7 km) from Wieliczka Salt Mine and 2 mi (3.3 km) from Royal Road. Dining Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at Sobremesa Restaurant, a fine-dining restaurant which features a bar/lounge and a garden view. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately PLN 70 for adults and PLN 70 for children Airport shuttle fee: PLN 120 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 3) Covered self parking fee: PLN 60 per day Rollaway bed fee: PLN 100.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 12:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Parking height restrictions apply Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Social distancing measures are in place Property follows a brand or regulatory agency's sanitization guidelines Commitment to Clean (Marriott) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Guest accommodation is sealed after cleaning Contactless food service / room service is available Food service has been amended for enhanced safety Property follows sanitization practices of COVID-19 Guidelines (CDC)Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Novotel Krakow City West
description: The 4-star Novotel Krakow City West will surprise you with its modern interiors, a renovated fitness centre, a swimming pool and a colorful children zone. Spacious 30-metre rooms, warm colors, super-fast WiFi guarantee a comfortable stay and ideal environment for work. At Novotel we care about your well-being, so the time spent in Novo2 Lounge bar will be the perfect ending of the day.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Gdansk
description: Welcome to the Hilton Gdansk hotel, overlooking the Motlawa River in the heart of the Old Town and just 10 miles from Gdansk Lech Walesa Airport.
