Begin with the highlights of Nagoya's cultural and industrial heritage, excellent shopping and entertainment, as well as exploring the Ise Grand Shrine, the World Heritage sites of Shirakawa-go.Hilton

name: Yokohama Royal Park Hotel
description: Located above the 52nd floor of Yokohama Landmark Tower, all rooms at Yokohama Royal Park Hotel offer free WiFi and views of Yokohama City or the Yokohama Bay Bridge. Guests can take a swim at the indoor pool at the fitness centre with addtional charge, enjoy various cuisines at the 8 dining venues or request soothing massage treatments for an extra cost. Minatomirai Subway Station is a 3-minute walk and JR Sakuragicho Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. All spacious air-conditioned rooms are located between the 52nd and 67th floor, featuring carpeted floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each comes with a minibar and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and nightwear is provided for all guests. The 24-hour front desk provides dry cleaning services, luggage storage and daily newspapers. Guests can use the business centre or make travel arrangements at the concierge desk. Local gifts can be purchased at the hotel’s souvenir shop. Landmark Spa is located on the 49th floor, and above 18 years old guests can use the facilities at a surcharge. There is also a barber and beauty shop, as well as a photo studio at the property. Offering spectacular views from the 68th floor, restaurant Shikitei offers Japanese dishes, and French full courses are served at Le Ciel restaurant. You can enjoy a late-night cocktail with panoramic views of Yokohama Bay at the Sirius Lounge, located on the 70th floor. Royal Park Hotel Yokohama is a 20-minute walk from the Red Brick Warehouse and Yokohama Chinatown. The Pacifico Yokohama convention centre is an 8-minute walk away. Guests can take a 50-minute limousine bus ride to Haneda International Airport or a 2-hour limousine bus ride to Narita International Airport (charges apply).

name: The Yokohama Bay Hotel Tokyu
description: In the heart of the Minato-Mirai area, just a minute's walk from Minato-Mirai Station, The Yokohama Bay Hotel Tokyu offers spacious rooms with a balcony, spectacular views of Minato-Mirai and free WiFi. It features 6 dining options. Concierge services are available. Rooms have a luxurious interior with floor-to-ceiling windows, a seating area and an LCD TV. Amenities include a fridge, a safe and nightwear. Guests sleep in 2 extra -long double beds. Guests at the Tokyu Bay Yokohama can unwind in the sauna or relax with a massage treatment. The hotel offers ticketing services, as well as currency exchange. Facilities include a 24-hour reception, a babysitting centre and a jewellery shop. French cuisine can be enjoyed at restaurant Queen Alice, while Japanese dishes are offered in a serene Japanese-style dining area at Oshima. The hotel also offers a café-restaurant and 2 bars. The Yokohama Bay Hotel Tokyu is located in the Queen's Square Yokohama complex, which includes a concert hall, shops and spacious gardens. It’s directly connected to Minatomirai Subway Station, and only a 30-minute drive from Haneda Airport or a 90-minute drive from Narita Airport.

name: Kobe Portopia Hotel
description: Offering 13 restaurants, cafes and bars and a 24-hour front desk, Kobe Portopia Hotel is conveniently located just a 5-minute walk from Shimin Hiroba Station on the Port Island Line. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. A free shuttle service from JR Sannomiya Station and Shinkobe Station is also available. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and a green tea set. En suite bathrooms come with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath. Portopia Hotel Kobe offers an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a tennis court. In addition, reception services such as a concierge service, currency exchange and luggage storage are also offered. A wide variety of Japanese, French, Chinese and Western cuisines are available at the many restaurants, cafes and bars on site. The Nankin-machi China Town area is a 10-minute train ride away, while Sannomiya Station is a 15-minute shuttle bus ride away. Kobe Kitano Ijinkai-gai can be accessed within a 25-minute train ride. Kansai International Airport is a 65-minute shuttle bus ride away from Sannomiya Station.

name: Hida Hotel Plaza
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Takayama Station, Hida Hotel Plaza boasts a rooftop spa with mountain views, a heated swimming pool and 7 dining options. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests at spa hotel Hida Plaza can recline in spacious indoor and outdoor hot spring baths, a hot tub and a mist sauna. The hotel offers massages, karaoke, and bicycle rental. Hida Plaza’s rooms are elegantly furnished, featuring either a Western or a traditional Japanese decor. Amenities include a plasma TV, a personal safe and a refrigerator. Japanese Restaurant Takumi-Chaya serves delicious local breakfasts and dinners. Plaza Hotel also houses a French Restaurant, a Chinese Restaurant and a night pub. Hida Hotel Plaza is a 13-minute walk from the historical Old Private Houses, and a 20-minute walk from Higashiyama Temple. Hida Folk Village and Hikaru Muserum are a 10-minute drive away, while Miyagawa Morning Market is a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hilton Tokyo Bay
description: Enjoy panoramic ocean views from Hilton Tokyo Bay, the official hotel of Tokyo Disney Resort®. The iconic, crescent-shaped hotel is situated on the eastern shore of Tokyo Bay and is just 20 minutes from Tokyo Station. Enjoy a great family day out at the nearby Tokyo Disneyland® and Tokyo DisneySea®. Soak up the Japanese culture with a visit to the Imperial Palace or Asakusa. Spend the afternoon window shopping at downtown Ginza, Mitsui Outlet Park at Makuhari or one of Tokyo's largest malls, LaLaPort Tokyo Bay - destinations that are sure to delight all shoppers. In the evening, relax and enjoy Shanghai specialties at Dynasty restaurant, one of this Tokyo Bay hotel’s five restaurants and bars. Stay in one of the uniquely styled Tokyo Bay guest rooms. Enjoy the magical fantasy experience at Happy Magic Room or celebrate special occasions at our celebrio rooms. Our 16 elegant function rooms, which overlook the breathtaking Tokyo Bay, are modern and accommodate up to 1,400 guests. Hilton Tokyo Bay is the ideal choice for your next conference, meeting, corporate or wedding event.Hilton

name: Hotel Okura Kobe
description: Hotel Okura Kobe is located on the waterfront, 500 metres from the Motomachi shopping area. Featuring Western-style rooms with free WiFi access, the hotel offers 6 dining options. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a bathtub. Guests can request air-purifiers for in-room use. Guests can work out at the fitness centre, the indoor pool or unwind in the sauna rooms at a surcharge. The hotel also has a seasonal outdoor pool and a tennis court. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Overlooking a Japanese garden, restaurant Yamazato serves regional specialities. Other restaurants offer French cuisines, Western and Chinese food. Hotel Okura Kobe offers a free shuttle service from Sannomiya Station. The hotel is adjacent to Meriken Park and Kobe Port Tower, and a 5-minute walk from Chinatown.

name: The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles
address: 404 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90071
description: Set in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles radiates an elegance that has attracted U.S. Presidents, dignitaries, and beloved stars of TV and film. The hotel welcomes travelers visiting Southern California with a soaring atrium, world class amenities, and an unforgettable experience. Stay on top of your fitness in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and go for a swim in the newly renovated outdoor pool. Indulge in inspiring cuisine at our hotel restaurants including Lakeview Bistro and our award-winning LA Prime steakhouse. Recharge in our well-appointed, pet-friendly rooms and suites. Every room features our Heavenly® Beds, mini-refrigerators, HDTVs, large work desks, free Wi-Fi, and floor-to-ceiling windows with impressive city views. Suites offer separate living rooms, dining/meeting tables, wet bars, and marble bathrooms. With 166,553 sq. ft. of elevated indoor and outdoor venues, event planners can organize anything from lavish weddings to board meetings.Marriott

name: Sofitel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
description: The Sofitel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills is a luxury urban resort hotel & spa featuring a rooftop pool, an outdoor garden patio and a trendy bar with craft cocktails, delicious bar bites and famous daily entertainment from Jazz to Salsa. Ideally located across of the street of L.A. largest shopping mall the Beverly Center, within 2mi of Rodeo Dr, Sunset Blvd, the Grove & the Academy Museum.accorhotels.com

name: W Los Angeles - West Beverly Hills
description: W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills welcomes hotel guests to its urban retreat with personalized service, high-energy interiors and luxury amenities. Stay in the heart of Westwood, LA, steps from UCLA and the Medical Center and minutes from designer boutiques on Rodeo Drive, Santa Monica beaches and West LA museums. Our pet-friendly hotel include suites with cutting-edge technology, flatscreen TVs, mini-bars, mini-refrigerators and indulgent bedding. Business travelers will appreciate large desks and Wi-Fi access. Indulge in steaks as the DJ spins at STK Los Angeles, sample California cuisine by the pool or sip handcrafted cocktails at our Living Room Bar. Relax in our poolside cabanas, take a dip in the WET® outdoor pool or work out in the FIT® gym. Event planners will be wowed by spectacular indoor and outdoor venues, expertly supported by custom catering and state-of-the-art technology. Westwood, Beverly Hills and all of LA await when you book your hotel room at W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills.Marriott

name: Fairmont Century Plaza
address: 2025 Avenue Of The Stars, Los Angeles, CA 90067
description: Los Angeles' famed Century Plaza hotel has returned to center stage following a $2.5B renovation. The property has been completely reimagined with 400 expansive guest rooms featuring private terraces, 63 luxury residences, the 14,000 square-foot Fairmont Spa Century Plaza, Lumière - a French-inspired Brasserie, and 24,000 square-feet of private event space. Born on the former site of a 20th Century Studios backlot in 1966, the Century Plaza has always been at the center of where business meets Hollywood.accorhotels.com

name: The London West Hollywood At Beverly Hills
address: 1020 North San Vicente Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90069
description: Steps from Beverly Hills and Rodeo Drive shopping, this boutique West Hollywood hotel features a rooftop with cabanas and a restaurant that serves a daily complimentary à la carte breakfast menu. Guests can also enjoy the fitness center and multiple dining options on-site. Featuring free WiFi, each air-conditioned suite at The London West Hollywood includes a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Standard suites include an open floor plan with plenty of living space and the hotel also offers 1 to 3-bedroom specialty suites. All suites provide mirrored closets and a vanity, a walk-in shower with 2 shower heads and a soak tub. Most suites also include a balcony with views. Many larger suites also boast completely separate seating areas with wet bars and walk-in closets. The property's complimentary breakfast includes pastries, bagels & lox, cheeses, charcuterie, yogurt parfaits, fresh juices, coffee & tea, cereals, and other seasonal varieties. Guests of The London can choose unique dining options. Boxwood at the London West Hollywood features California cuisine with a menu that includes seasonal, fresh local produce and small plates. The restaurant includes an elegant cocktail bar and an extensive wine list. The Rooftop features outdoor dining and a seasonal menu and serves lunch, dinner and brunch. The London West Hollywood also provides guests with a fitness center. The 24-hour facilities include cardio equipment, Life Fitness machines and an outdoor yoga area. Guests can also visit the on-site salon for hair styling, nail, & makeup services. Cabanas can be rented at the pool area and are equipped with mini-bars. Guests can order from the property bar as well. Beverly Hills and the Beverly Center Mall are 4 minutes’ drive away. The Hollywood Walk of Fame and Melrose Avenue shopping are just 10 minutes’ drive away. West Hollywood is a great choice for travelers interested in nightlife, restaurants, design and clothes shopping.

name: Los Angeles Airport Marriott
address: 5855 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Find inspiration around every corner at Los Angeles Airport Marriott. Located just minutes from Los Angeles International Airport, LAX, with long-term parking and free airport shuttles, our hotel on West Century Blvd was designed to anticipate your every need. Relax and recharge in spacious accommodations with signature amenities, soundproof windows, ample workspaces and premium bedding. Stay near famed Los Angeles attractions such as SoFi Stadium, Hollywood Park and Casino, the Forum, the Coliseum, Manhattan Beach, Kia Forum and more. Start your morning with your favorite drink from Starbucks and take a refreshing dip in our resort-style outdoor pool. Sample delicious fare from Social Market & Eatery, Hangar 18 Bar + Kitchen or JW Steakhouse. Host unforgettable meetings and social affairs in more than 55,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space featuring custom catering and expert planners. Let Los Angeles Airport Marriott set the stage for a comfortable, safe and convenient visit to Los Angeles.Marriott

name: Renaissance Los Angeles Airport Hotel
description: Experience the charm and tranquility of our newly redesigned boutique-style hotel by LAX Airport, providing a relaxing retreat for your stay. Our airport hotel in Los Angeles, with free shuttles and long-term parking, is near Manhattan Beach, SoFi Stadium, The Forum and much more. Relax in urban chic accommodations with plush bedding and deluxe amenities offering views of LAX. All our hotel rooms are dog friendly. Unwind in our trendy lobby or lounge with a signature cocktail and live tunes from local musicians with Evenings at Renaissance. Dig into authentic California cuisine at ICON, An LA Eatery, craft beers at Studio 12 Bar and Lounge, and our new illy Cafe for your morning coffee. Dip your toes in our outdoor pool or workout in our modern fitness center. Meetings, weddings and special celebrations are more than ordinary in our renovated event venues. We look forward to welcoming you into our cosmopolitan oasis, Renaissance Los Angeles Airport Hotel.Marriott

name: Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown
description: At Hotel Indigo® Los Angeles Downtown, you’ll experience the city’s thriving creativity, urban vibe and unique multiculturalism both inside and out. With convenient access to a variety of entertainment, dining and shopping options, including the iconic L.A. Live complex, Crypto.com Arena and The Arts & Jewelry District. Throughout the hotel, you’ll find décor with floral accents that recall La Fiesta de las Flores, an event that has showcased the city’s international melting pot since 1894. With neon lights that mirror world-famous L.A. nightlife, 18 Social features sweeping views of the dazzling lights that illuminate Los Angeles every night. In your room, cityscapes fill the walls, while our spa-style bathrooms were inspired by pre-Hollywood glamour and the jewelry that accessorized Golden Age cinema. No other hotel in Los Angeles provides such an immersive experience. Come and create YOUR LA Story.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Mosaic Hotel - Beverly Hills
address: 125 South Spalding Drive, Los Angeles, CA
description: Mosaic Hotel Los Angeles provides modern 4-star accommodation in Los Angeles. It also offers bicycle rental, a swimming pool and valet parking. The hotel has 49 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a variety of essential facilities to ensure guests have an enjoyable stay. Mosaic Hotel Los Angeles's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and is a suitable place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has to offer. Los Angeles's well-known tourist spots are within close proximity to the hotel, with Rodeo Drive only a short walk away. The Los Angeles County Museum Of Art / LACMA and the Hollywood Walk of Fame can be easily reached by car.Revato

name: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills
address: 465 South La Cienega Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA 90048
description: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills welcomes you with superb service, chic hotel accommodations and inspired amenities. Set the stage for your Los Angeles adventure with a sleek, modern design by Philippe Starck and a rooftop pool deck with stunning city views. Enjoy luxury creature comforts in our pet-friendly rooms and suites with custom-made furnishings and five-star amenities. Seven upscale suite categories offer a variety of layouts including some with outdoor terraces and balconies with city and garden views. Savor lingering sunsets over Beverly Hills while enjoying elevated dining at Vista Rooftop. Pamper yourself at the celestial Ciel Spa at SLS after taking a dip in the rooftop pool or working out in the 24/7 gym. Our indoor and outdoor venues can accommodate everything from grand outdoor weddings to private business dinners. Our five-star hotel is near Rodeo Drive, West Hollywood, the Hollywood Walk of Fame and many other notable Los Angeles and Beverly Hills attractions.Marriott

name: W Hollywood
description: From start to finish, you'll be amazed by W Hollywood. Our hotel in Hollywood, CA, sits right on the lively streets of Hollywood Blvd and puts you at the center of top attractions like Hollywood Pantages Theatre, Hollywood Walk of Fame and the Capitol Records Building. With various eclectic event venues, West Hollywood will be the perfect backdrop for your next social gathering. You'll never have to wander far for good grub with our selection of American cuisine offered at Delphine Eatery and Station Hollywood - two of West Hollywood's finest restaurants in our hotel. The WET Deck is the ideal spot to make a splash in our rooftop pool after a workout in our hotel's fitness center. After an adventurous day, wind down in your hotel suite showcasing rich wood floors and fresh white linens accented with vibrant colors throughout the space. The views of the city lights from any part of our Hollywood Blvd hotel captivate the essence of W Hollywood.Marriott

name: Avalon Hotel Beverly Hills, a Member of Design Hotels
address: 9400 West Olympic Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA 90212
description: Quintessentially L.A; Avalon Hotel Beverly Hills sets the tone for hip repose with a boomerang-shaped pool surrounded by private cabanas—some with sweeping views of the city. Tucked in a secluded residential neighborhood adjacent to Beverly Hills’ world-class restaurants and shops, the hotel was built in 1949 and frequented by the likes of Marilyn Monroe. Thanks to contemporary style icon Kelly Wearstler, the 84 rooms and suites—many with kitchenettes or private patios—still blend Old Hollywood roots with a distinct 1950s vibe. A full-service wellness studio and Viviane Restaurant, under the helm of chef Michael Reed, round out a scene in which one experiences the casual “patio lifestyle” and laidback sophistication that is unique to Southern California.Marriott

name: Kimpton Everly Hotel
description: Kimpton Everly Hotel offers a breath of fresh air among the swirl of hotels in Hollywood. Escape into highly interactive social spaces ranging from the light-filled Jane Q café and buzz-worthy Ever Bar, to a skyline heated pool with private cabana rentals and an outdoor lounge serving cocktails and light bites. When it’s time to retire, you’ll love the happy hues and mellow atmosphere of our guest rooms and suites, the thoughtful amenities that invite comfort and ease, and the fabulous views of the shimmering downtown skyline or the Hollywood Hills.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Courtyard By Marriott Los Angeles Lax/Hawthorne
address: 4427 West El Segundo Boulevard, Hawthorne, CA 90250
description: Journey to relaxation at Courtyard Los Angeles LAX/Hawthorne. Our hotel offers a prime location near the city of El Segundo and an array of attractions. Venture to SpaceX, SoFi Stadium, Manhattan Beach and the Tesla Design Center. When you're ready to retire from adventure, unwind in our modern rooms and suites featuring free WiFi, plush beds and 55-inch flat-screen TVs. Worked up an appetite? Treat your taste buds to delectable American cuisine, evening cocktails and Starbucks coffee at The Bistro. During spare moments, keep up with your exercise routine by swimming laps at our outdoor pool and working out at our 24-hour fitness center. Our business travelers can host presentations, meetings and training seminars at one of our three event spaces. Enhance your corporate function with our customized catering options. Before your stay is complete, kick back with loved ones at our outdoor patio. However you choose to spend your time, travel with confidence at Courtyard Los Angeles LAX/Hawthorne.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Marina del Rey
description: Connected to a Courtyard® hotel, the all-new Residence Inn Marina del Rey offers a unique experience in Marina del Rey, California. The fusion of these two signature Marriott® hotels allows you to take advantage of extra amenities like food & beverage options at Brizo Bar and Restaurant, Sam's Coffee Call and Terrace Deck; plus more event space to accommodate your needs. Set a pace that suits you at our hotel near Venice Beach attractions, businesses and activities. Whether you're in Marina del Rey for a few days, a few weeks or a few months, your daily routine matters. Spacious studios and one-bedroom hotel suites with separate living and sleeping areas offer a comfortable home away from home. A fully equipped kitchen makes dining in a snap, and complimentary Internet connects you to work and the outside world. Our complimentary hot breakfast starts mornings off right, and the hotel fitness center keeps you fit and active. Relax and stay focused and productive at Residence Inn Marina del Rey.Marriott

name: Sunset Marquis
address: 1200 Alta Loma Road, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: The Sunset Marquis Hotel Los Angeles is located in the heart of West Hollywood. Hidden away in a tree lined cul-de-sac, it is just steps from the famed sidewalks of the Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The property features 2 outdoor pools and an on-site restaurant. Villas at the property include unique amenities like private elevators, kitchens,dining rooms, televisions, and living rooms. Suites include similar amenities with toiletries and Bluetooth enabled mobile speakers. There is an on-site bar available at the hotel. There is also a fitness center and spa available on-site. Guests can enjoy the gardens and 24-hour front desk. The property also is home to successful recording studios and an art gallery. The Sunset Strip is less than 0.6 mi from the property, while the Farmer's Market Los Angeles is 1.7 mi away. Dolby Theater and the Hollywood Walk of Fame are 2.3 mi away. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property.

name: Hilton Los Angeles Airport
address: 5711 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: The Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel offers the uncompromising accommodations and services of a luxury hotel. Our property is located just a quarter mile from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in sunny Los Angeles, California. Complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport is available 24-hours a day. The Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel features comfortable elegance that appeals to all types of travelers. The leisure traveler will appreciate: Complimentary shuttle service to and from LAX Airport every 15 minutes, LAX Airport Parking in a covered and secured garage, Shuttle service available to Manhattan Beach, A variety of dining options - The Cafe, The Bistro, Andiamo, Landings Bar and 24-Hour In Room Dining, 1,234 redesigned guestrooms, Wireless Internet access in public areas, Complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center, Outdoor pool and whirlpool, Hertz rental car in the Lobby, Complimentary safety deposit boxes, Same day laundry and dry cleaning. EV Charging Stations are available in both Valet and Self-Parking. If you are traveling on business or planning a meeting, wedding or social event, look no further. Our hotel offers all of the amenities you will need to make your event a success. 25,000 square feet of beautifully renovated meeting space - Including 30 function rooms, 2 boardrooms and La Jolla Ballroom, Meeting incentives you won't want to miss, DS-3 Internet connection giving you a seamless connection at the highest speed available, Fully equipped, 24-hour Business Center, Outdoor space ideal for coffee breaks, receptions and banquets for up to 300 people, On-site Audio and Visual Team, Hospitality desk for immediate assistance with all of your meeting needs, Individual meeting space temperature controls. Of course we realize, nobody wants to be stuck in their hotel room the entire time they are in sunny California so get out and see the sites. We are centrally located to a variety of attractions and destinations but here are just a few to get you started: Grab a towel and head to one of our beautiful beaches - Marina Del Rey, Venice or Santa Monica, What is a trip to Southern California without stopping by to see Donald Duck, Mickey Mouse, Goofy and the gang at Disneyland Park, Get star struck at Universal Studios Hollywood, Hollywood Park where you can visit six different casinos covering three states, See over 300 paintings, 700 sculptures and decorative objects and an ever changing number of photos, drawings and manuscripts at the J. Paul Getty Museum. As one of the world's largest airport hotels, the Hilton Los Angeles Airport's impeccable service belies its size. We host a multilingual staff that will make you feel at home. Our attention to detail, quick responsiveness and "At Your Service" culture will be felt the moment you arrive. Touch down at our luxury destination hotel - It happens at the Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel. Travel should take you places.Hilton

name: Torrance Marriott Redondo Beach
description: Discover the many charms of coastal California at our Torrance, CA, hotel, located just moments from the SoFi Stadium™, scenic beaches and Redondo Beach Pier. Relax in our Redondo Beach, CA, hotel's spacious rooms and suites with plush bedding, sleek marble bathrooms and high-speed Wi-Fi. Many also feature scenic city views. Dine at our hotel near Redondo Beach and enjoy Californian cuisine, cocktails or craft beers at 21 Square Bar + Kitchen, our signature restaurant, or bask in the sunshine by our sparkling indoor/outdoor pool. Host an event in our 26 meeting rooms, ballrooms and outdoor venues, enhanced with thoughtful planning, custom catering and audiovisual services. Don't miss a visit to Long Beach, Redondo, Manhattan and Torrance Beach, all located near our hotel in Torrance, CA. Whether you are visiting Southern California for business or pleasure, we look forward to welcoming you to Torrance Marriott Redondo Beach.Marriott

name: Ayres Hotel Manhattan Beach
description: Welcome to the Ayres Hotel Manhattan Beach/LAX-a gem of the Ayres Hotel Collection. No detail has been overlooked in this first-class, full-service hotel, conveniently located near major corporation, airports and shopping destination. Join Ayres Rewards Today!: Earn free nights fast with Ayres Rewards. You can also choose from gift cards to over 100+ different retailers. With Ayres Hotels, your travel will be truly elevated!iHotelier/iStay

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Los Angeles LAX/Hawthorne
address: 4427 West El Segundo Boulevard, Hawthorne, CA 90250
description: Refresh your travel routine when you stay at the TownePlace Suites Los Angeles LAX Hawthorne. Whether joining us for a few days or a few weeks, you will find the comfort and convenience you crave in California. Our hotel is less than 5 miles from Los Angeles International Airport, so you are never far from your desired destination. Tesla Design Center, SpaceX and SoFi Stadium are also nearby. After a busy day of work or play, settle down in our stylish suites. With fully equipped kitchens and complimentary high-speed WiFi, you will find everything you need to make yourself at home while on the road. Start your day satisfied with our free hot breakfast buffet then relax around our outdoor grill and fire pit in the evening. Looking to stay active, work up a sweat in our 24-hour fitness center, then make a splash in our outdoor pool. From business trips to family vacations, you will find the perfect home base when reserving accommodations at TownePlace Suites Los Angeles LAX Hawthorne.Marriott

name: The Delphi Hotel
address: 550 South Flower Street, Los Angeles, CA 90071
description: Located in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, this iconic and renowned hotel is 4 blocks from the Walt Disney Concert Hall and 5 blocks from the BROAD Museum. The Delphi Hotel offers modern rooms with a glass walk-in shower, mini-bar, and free Wi-Fi. The Delphi Hotel Lounge is open from 7am daily and features unforgetable coffees, teas, and cocktails to tantalize even the most discerning palate. Guests of Downtown The Delphi Hotel can enjoy an outdoor lounge, and gather with others around our secluded outdoor fire pit. Denae's Diner, opening in July 2023, will feature familiar comfort food, elevated in both flavor and presentation, for an unparalleled all-day dining experience. Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art is less than 1 mi from The Delphi Hotel and Dodger Stadium is 3.8 mi away. The hotel is 18 mi from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX).

name: Viceroy Santa Monica
description: Just 16 mi from Los Angeles, Viceroy Santa Monica is ideally located, just steps to the ocean and a short walk to the pier. With many rooms offering panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean, and the balance, of our two-outdoor pools and cabanas. Whether you're looking to relax poolside, lounge in our Pool Cabanas, or enjoy the privacy of our Backyard Cabanas, Viceroy Santa Monica offers the perfect outdoor retreat for families or friends. If venturing is more your style, our bicycle rentals are available for all our registered guests. Santa Monica Place and 3rd Street Promenade are nearby. The Viceroy is 8.7 mi from The Getty Museum. The Hotel is 9 mi from the Los Angeles International Airport.

name: Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City
address: 555 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608-1001
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: LA Hotel Worker Protection Ordinance Fee, LA Tourism Marketing District Assessment, and California Tourism Assessment. FOUR-DIAMOND SERVICE IN THE HEART OF THE ENTERTAINMENT DISTRICT The Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel is a 24-story glistening hotel high on the hilltop located at the main entrance to Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal CityWalk. Our hotel conveys the style and feel of contemporary California living in a relaxed resort setting and adds a host of modern comforts and conveniences. The hotel's ongoing commitment to superior service and exceptional standards of excellence earned us the coveted AAA Four Diamond Award, Smart Meetings Platinum Choice Award and Successful Meetings Pinnacle Award. At the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel, guests can relax in a spacious guestroom with magnificent panoramic views of the Hollywood hills and all the major studios including Universal Studios, Disney Studios, Warner Brothers Studios and NBC Studios to name a few. With stylish furnishings and your comfort in mind, each room is designed with thoughtful business amenities such as high-speed Internet access, two-line phones, safes, and mini-bars. Savor an eclectic blend of culinary delights including California, Continental and Chinese cuisines at our award-winning Cafe Sierra, voted California's Number One Seafood & Prime Rib Buffet. Unwind with a book in our Lobby Lounge while enjoying your favorite cordial or revitalize in our state-of-the-art fitness facility featuring Precor equipment. At the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel, our team is committed to make your stay a memorable one. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Nearby Points of Interest Universal Studios, CityWalk & Gibson Amphitheater - Adjacent, Red Line Train - 0.1 miles, NBC - 0.5 miles, Hollywood and Highland, Dolby Theater - 3 miles, Hollywood Bowl - 2 Miles, CBS Studios - 3 miles, ABC Broadcasting/Disney Studios - 3 miles, NBC Studios - 3 miles, St. Joseph Hospital - 3 miles, Warner Brothers Studios - 3 miles, Walk of Fame - 3 miles, CNN/Turner Broadcasting - 4 miles, Forest Lawn - 4 miles, Equestrian Center - 4 miles, Grauman's Chinese Theater - 3 miles, Gene Autry Western Museum - 5 Miles, Capitol Records - 5 miles, Los Angeles Zoo - 6 miles, Paramount Studios - 5 miles, Melrose Ave - 6 Miles, Nestle Corporation - 8 miles, Dreamworks SKG - 7 miles, Griffith Park Observatory - 7 miles, Staples Center - 10 miles, Los Angeles Convention Center - 11 miles, LA Live & Nokia Theater - 11 miles, Disney Center for the Performing Arts - 10 miles, Rodeo Drive - 15 miles, California Beaches - 21 miles, Queen Mary Long Beach - 35 miles, Six Flags Magic Mountain - 26 miles, Knott's Berry Farm - 31 miles, Disneyland - 36 miles. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Location The Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel is located in the heart of the ''Entertainment District'' of Los Angeles, California at the main entrance to Universal Studios Hollywood, Universal CityWalk and Gibson Amphitheater, two minutes to most of the major Hollywood Studios, five minutes to Hollywood and Highland, Dolby Theater, Hollywood Bowl and Burbank Airport, 10 minutes to Glendale, 15 minutes to Pasadena and Rose Bowl, 20 minutes to Downtown Los Angeles, Los Angeles Convention Center, Staples Center and the new Nokia Theater and LA Live, and 45 minutes to Los Angeles International Airport. Other nearby attractions and hot spots include Griffith Park Observatory, Greek Theater, Autry Western Heritage Museum, Magic Mountain, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills, and the Southern California beaches. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Rooms and Amenities Our spacious guest rooms and nine suites, each with expansive offering panoramic views, make the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City stand above other area hotels. Features include such welcome amenities as high-speed IntHilton

name: Kimpton Hotel Wilshire
description: A boutique slice of heaven along L.A.’s Miracle Mile, Kimpton Hotel Wilshire is urban, modern and stylish. It has everything you could want for a stay in L.A; like a rooftop pool. You’ll have views of the Los Angeles skyline, too, including the iconic Hollywood sign. And the luxe location puts you right in the heart of the action: Beverly Hills, the Sunset Strip, Museum Row and shopper’s mecca The Grove is just minutes away.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hyatt House Lax/Century Blvd
address: 5959 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Located in Los Angeles, 6.6 miles from Venice Beach Boardwalk, Hyatt House LAX Century Blvd provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At Hyatt House LAX Century Blvd every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Hyatt House LAX Century Blvd can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Petersen Automotive Museum is 8.8 miles from the hotel, while Third Street Promenade is 8.9 miles away. The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 0.6 miles from Hyatt House LAX Century Blvd.

name: Le Méridien Delfina Santa Monica
description: Stimulate your passion for discovery at Le Méridien Santa Monica Hotel, a boutique hotel ideally situated near the beach in Santa Monica, CA. Boasting an elevated perch, our luxury hotel overlooks the Pacific Ocean and Santa Monica Mountains from a truly exclusive vantage point. Close to Venice and short walk from the Santa Monica Pier, our hotel invites you to connect, disconnect or simply savor the moment. Your arrival is met with thoughtful hints of hospitality, including two glasses of champagne. Or perhaps a free beach bike is more your speed? A state-of-the-art 24/7 fitness center with Peloton bikes quickens the pulse, while a nap by our heated outdoor pool relaxes and restores the spirit. Stir your evening to life with a drink at Longitude Bar + Restaurant or unwind all night over craft cocktails and California-inspired cuisine in our dining room. Pet-friendly hotel rooms keep you in a laid-back Santa Monica state of mind with their contemporary décor, luxury bedding and interesting pops of color.Marriott

name: Intercontinental Los Angeles Downtown, An IHG Hotel
description: Located in one of the most revered and iconic building on the West Coast — the Wilshire Grand — InterContinental Los Angeles Downtown is renowned for its world-class dining, sublime rooms, and architectural mastery. Arrive through our lavish 70th floor Sky Lobby for breathtaking views of downtown Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Sip crafted cocktails at our rooftop bar and enjoy our proximity to The Grammy Museum, Walt Disney Concert Hall, The Broad Museum, and Universal Studios.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Shore Hotel
description: Located in Santa Monica, The Shore Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Los Angeles (CA). The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, ticket service, 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. Closet, carpeting, slippers, flat screen television, mirror can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of the hot tub, fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool. The Shore Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Los Angeles (CA) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Sunset Tower Hotel
address: 8358 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: The Sunset Tower Hotel hotel is located in West Hollywood on the Sunset Strip, 2.5 mi from the Hollywood Walk of Fame. It features a rooftop pool that provides panoramic city views and a full-service spa. Spacious guest rooms offer free WiFi and floor-to-ceiling windows with views. The modern rooms at Sunset Tower Hotel offer flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, Nespresso coffee machines, & mini-bars.Nightly turndown service includes freshly baked cookies. Guests at The Sunset Tower Hotel can take advantage of the on-site fitness center and the reputable Joanna Vargas Spa. It offers a wide array of skincare and body treatments. The Tower Bar serves California cuisine with French and Italian influence. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of the city or enjoy the restaurant’s outdoor terrace. The poolside dining offers a more casual ambiance for the hotel’s guests. This hotel is 14 minutes' drive from the University of California-Los Angeles and 8 minutes' drive from Los Angeles Country Club. Downtown Los Angeles is 8.1 mi away.

name: Hyatt Place Lax/Century Blvd
address: 5959 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Hyatt Place LAX/Century BLVD has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, a restaurant and bar in Los Angeles. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers free shuttle service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, every room has a closet. The rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at Hyatt Place LAX/Century BLVD have a safety deposit box. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. An American breakfast is available every morning at Hyatt Place LAX/Century BLVD. The hotel offers a hot tub.

name: Kimpton La Peer Hotel
address: 627 La Peer Drive, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Tucked into a sunny, tree-lined street, Kimpton La Peer Hotel delivers luxury in L.A.’s exclusive Design District. From the sculptural walls to a dramatic feather chandelier, the hotel evokes a quintessential West Hollywood style. Located in one of LA most walkable neighborhoods, near Beverly Hills, Kimpton La Peer Hotel features 105 guest rooms and suites, heated pool, more than 8,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space, and Mediterranean fare from one of LA's most well known chefs.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Peninsula Beverly Hills
address: 9882 South Santa Monica Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90212
description: Located in Beverly Hills, this hotel is 12 minutes' walk from shopping on Rodeo Drive. It features gourmet on-site dining options, a full-service spa and spacious guest rooms with flat-screen TVs. Cream colored rooms boast an iPod docking station at Beverly Hills The Peninsula. A refrigerator and mini-bar are available in all rooms. World-class dining for breakfast, lunch and dinner is available at the Belvedere restaurant. The Belvedere is a lively European Brasserie showcasing award-winning cuisine in a warm and inviting environment. The adjacent outdoor terrace space is a destination for al fresco dining under the glittering Beverly Hills evening sky. A large rooftop outdoor pool and a modern gym with personal coaches are available. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Upon check-in guests can enjoy free fresh fruit and a welcome beverage. Shoe shining services are available. The University of California Los Angeles is 2.5 mi from The Peninsula. Universal Studios is 8.3 mi away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Redondo Beach
description: Enjoy a stay in the heart of the Redondo Beach community at Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Redondo Beach. Perfect for visitors to the Space Park, this hotel in Redondo Beach is located in the Northrop Grumman campus. Relax and unwind in a comfortable guest room, equipped with all you need for a productive stay. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi and work in comfort at the desk with ergonomic chair. Order evening room service or stock up on travel necessities, such as snacks and drinks, at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry. At the end of a busy day, sleep soundly in the comfortable Garden Sleep System bed. Start your day with a delicious cooked-to-order breakfast at the Garden Grille restaurant, also open for lunch and dinner. In the evenings, relax with colleagues over drinks in the welcoming bar. Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, unwind in the whirlpool or reinvigorate with a workout in the fitness center, equipped with a range of cardiovascular and weight training equipment. Stay on top of work using the services in the 24-hour business center, including fax, printing and copying. Let our professional team members help plan your next event at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Redondo Beach. With 2,500 sq.ft. of meeting and event space, the hotel can accommodate a banquet for up to 100 guests and also offers a boardroom for intimate meetings of 12.Hilton

name: Hotel Bel-Air - Dorchester Collection
address: 701 Stone Canyon Road, Los Angeles, CA 90077
description: No description found

name: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills
description: Established in 1975 on a palm-lined residential boulevard, L’Ermitage is a discreet, luxurious getaway located a stone’s throw from the beating heart of Beverly Hills. As the first all-suite hotel in the nation, L’Ermitage is committed to offering travelers 5-star service, excellence in hospitality, and spacious accommodations. Our 116 suites preserve the residential elegance of the hotel’s original design while providing guests with a range of spacious layouts and modern appointments. Inside, guests will find luxurious walk-through dressing rooms with ample wardrobe space, full-length triptych mirrors with warm adjustable lighting, and generous vanities that evoke a sense of old Hollywood glamor. We offer flexible check-in and check-out, and ask our guests to provide estimated arrival time so we can accomodate their arrival time request. L'Ermitage has a complimentary car service available to our guests daily in our BMW 5-Series in a 2 mile radius. The property offers charging stations for eco-friendly cars as well as two TESLA charging stations. Guests at the L'Ermitage Beverly Hills can use the modern fitness center or have a drink at the trendy Lounge. Brunch and dinner are served at the hotel's Avec Nous restaurant. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the University of California are within a short drive of L'Ermitage Beverly Hills. The Los Angeles Convention Center is also nearby.

name: Andaz West Hollywood-a concept by Hyatt
address: 8401 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from the Sunset Strip, the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt features onsite dining and a rooftop pool. Rooms feature complimentary nonalcoholic beverages and snacks and free WiFi. A flat-screen TV and an electronics docking station are provided in each room at the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt. Free toiletries and bathrobes are also provided in the modern rooms. RH, the West Hollywood Andaz’s onsite restaurant. features seasonal California cuisine. The restaurant works to highlight “market to table” dishes. RH Bar is a chic evening space serving signature cocktails and appetizers. Guests can enjoy The Sundeck for poolside dining with fresh, light options. A business center and fitness center are available for guest use. The Beverly Plaza is 2 mi away from the hotel. Hollywood is 3.1 mi from the property.

name: Santa Monica Proper Hotel
description: Santa Monica Proper introduces a more laid back kind of luxury to Santa Monica. Here, within walking distance to the beach, each of the 267 guestrooms and spaces successfully harnesses the city’s abundant ocean breezes and natural light, while the interior design pays homage to the organic tones and textures of the local coastline. Santa Monica Proper tempts guests with the only rooftop pool deck on the Westside, a singular vantage point for sunsets over the Pacific that includes a Balearic restaurant, bar, and cabanas, while the landmark Onda restaurant, marks a synergistic collaboration between James Beard award-winning chefs Jessica Koslow and Gabriela Camara. Taking Eastern-inspired wellness as a guide, the hotel’s Surya Spa (opening in winter), presided over by internationally renowned Ayurvedic guru Martha Soffer, offers tailored holistic health programs. Anything less just wouldn't be Proper.Marriott

name: Hyatt Place Lax El Segundo
address: 750 North Nash Street, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Hyatt Place Los Angeles / LAX / El Segundo located 2 mi from Los Angeles International Airport, features an outdoor pool and free WiFi. Guests can make use of the fitness center, 24-hour restaurant and bar. Complimentary breakfast is offered. A 55-inch high definition flat-screen TV with extended film channels is provided in each air-conditioned guest room at Hyatt Place Los Angeles/LAX/El Segundo. Each room includes a sofa bed, a refrigerator and a coffee machine. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hyatt Place Los Angeles / LAX / El Segundo is centrally located in Los Angeles and South Bay corporate offices are minutes away. Top destinations in the city are nearby. Hyatt Place Hotel shuttle from Los Angeles International Airport is available 5:00AM to 10:45PM. Pick-up located on the upper level (Departures). Wait by the RED Hotel Shuttle sign. Please note that the shuttle cannot wait at the designated pick-up, please contact shuttle once you are ready and by the designated pick-up sign. For pick-up requests text/call +1 (949) 201-7665 and provide your name, phone number, number of passengers, and terminal. Shuttle will only accept passengers who text/call once they’re ready for pick-up. Shuttle time is 6am-10:45pm

name: The Beverly Hilton
description: The Beverly Hilton, a Forbes four star hotel, combines the excitement of Old Hollywood with the unparalleled elegance of Beverly Hills. Nestled in the heart of the entertainment capital of the world, we offer our guests the opportunity to become fully immersed in the grandeur of this world-class city. From shopping to dining to entertainment opportunities in the Greater Los Angeles area, we offer our guests easy access to all that they could possibly ask for and more, including: Rodeo Drive - World-famous shops and boutiques, renowned for their exceptional high-end offerings and celebrity clientele. Santa Monica Pier - Extending out over the ocean in beautiful Santa Monica, the Pier offers rides, games, and entertainment fun for the whole family. 3rd Street Promenade - Outdoor shopping and dining exclusively for walkers and located a mere three blocks from Santa Monica’s beaches. Staples Center - The home of the Los Angeles Kings (NHL), the Los Angeles Clippers (NBA), and the Los Angeles Lakers. Grauman's Chinese Theater. The Grove - Outdoor shopping, dining, and entertainment venue: also the home of the Original Los Angeles Farmers' Market. Dodger Stadium, The Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, The Rose Bowl. J. Paul Getty Center - An architecturally stunning museum that rests high above Sunset Boulevard and houses collections by some of the world’s greatest artists. Griffith Park Observatory, Hollywood Sign, Universal Studios.The hotel features 569 luxuriously-appointed guest rooms and suites, each of which offers a unique perspective on this great city. All of our accommodations offer the finest in creature comforts, including: Plasma screen televisions, Bose Wave music systems, Lodgenet high-definition programming, L'Occitane bath amenities, European linens, Access to high-speed Internet and Wi-Fi.At the hotel, we appreciate that no two guests are alike. For that reason, we offer a wide variety of packages suited for all sorts of travelers: Bed and Breakfast, Beverly Hills Romance Package, American Girl Place, Aqua Star Pool Family Fun Package, Rest, Relax, & Rejuvenate Spa Package.We invite our guests to enjoy everything that our hotel has to offer, from dining opportunities to entertainment, and everything in between. We welcome everyone to enjoy casual dining suited for the entire family at CIRCA 55, and also to revel in the atmosphere of Trader Vic's Lounge - the acclaimed Polynesian restaurant and bar - famous for originating the world-famous Mai Tai. At The Beverly Hilton, there is something for everyone. Other hotel features include: The Lobby Lounge, Bar 210/ Plush - Beverly Hills' only lounge and ultra-lounge, Bar 210 offers an experience unlike any other in the Greater Los Angeles area. Aqua Star Spa, The Beverly Hilton Pool - An outdoor oasis, this is the largest heated pool in all of Beverly Hills. Fitness Center by Precor, Denis Bloch Fine Art. Le Chateau - A fine wine retailer specializing in California wines, guests may also schedule wine tasting events. Hours Minutes Seconds - A premier retailer of top-of-the-line timepieces. The Bellezza Salon, Accents Gift Shop, AVT Event Technologies and Business Center, 24-hour automated business center, Midway Car Rental. This hotel offers over 60,000 square feet of meeting space in 22 venues, each with its own distinct personality and atmosphere. Our Events and Catering teams are on-hand to ensure that every event surpasses our guests’ expectations. Our full meeting and event offerings include: Executive Meeting Center - Offering 11 breakout rooms opening onto a single corridor, the EMC allows for smooth transitions from meeting to meeting. It's ideal for groups of 100 or less. International Collection - A unique trio of spaces, the lobby-level International Collection accommodates from 50 to 1400 guests and an array of event functions - all the way to the most complex and media-intensive. Beverly Hills Collection - With 7 meeting spaces and 2 ballrooms.Hilton

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport South
address: 1440 East Imperial Avenue, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Experience the Finest of California and LAX Hotels LAX hotels come no finer than the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South Hotel, located just two miles from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in the quiet community of El Segundo, CA, home to numerous Fortune 500 companies and the heart of Southern California's aerospace community. Guests at our hotel stay in spacious two-room suites and receive a delicious free made-to-order breakfast each morning and hosted beverages and snacks every evening at our Evening Reception. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is ideal for a Southern California vacation with a wide array of local beaches in the surrounding communities: Manhattan Beach, Marina Del Rey, Redondo Beach, Venice Beach, Santa Monica, home of the Third Street Promenade. This all-suite Los Angeles hotel is just minutes from the Los Angeles Air Force Base, as well as the campus of Loyola Marymount University. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is one of the premier Los Angeles vacation hotels with wonderful amenities and an endless variety of surrounding tourist attractions, making this hotel perfect for southern California family vacations! This Los Angeles hotel offers high-speed Internet access throughout, as well as an on-site ATM. A lush tropical atrium and Koi fish, ducks, and turtles in gently flowing waterscapes, combined with the Mediterranean-style architecture, provide the perfect setting for a relaxing LA visit. 1440 bistro & bar, a contemporary twist on American fare, is located in the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South hotel. The lounge features a wide variety of spirits and wine, televisions with sporting events, and a pool table. This Los Angeles hotel is also ideal for business travelers, with its proximity to Los Angeles International Airport, Internet access throughout, and 11 meeting spaces. These spaces can be easily converted for a Southern California wedding, reception, and other special events. In order to stand out among other El Segundo hotels, we offer prime California accommodations with its convenient locale and extensive amenities. Visit one of the exciting Los Angeles tourist attractions in the area: Chinatown, Downtown Los Angeles, Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, The Fashion District of Los Angeles, The Hollywood Walk of Fame, The Los Angeles County Museum of Art, The Paul Getty Museum, The Queen Mary in Long Beach, The Staples Center - home of professional basketball teams, and Universal Studios. The Embassy Suites Hotel Los Angeles - International Airport/South invites you to indulge in this upscale, full-service hotel and all of the extensive services and amenities provided. Make your reservations now to ensure secure online booking at our Best Available Rate, or take advantage of the terrific Southern California vacation deals of our LAX hotel!Hilton

name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience a new level of luxury at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Offering an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, only steps away from the excitement of L.A. LIVE, the Convention Center, Peacock Theatre and Crypto.com Arena, our hotel is ideally suited for both business and leisure travelers. Our hotel rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, a flat-screen TV, an ergonomic workspace and a marble bathroom, and many rooms offer magnificent downtown views. Savor fresh local fare at our on-site restaurants, pamper yourself at our spa or relax by our sparkling outdoor pool. Those seeking a remarkable destination for a business or social event in downtown Los Angeles can take advantage of 135,000 square feet of versatile, contemporary venue space, as well as knowledgeable planning and catering teams. Along with placing you moments from L.A. LIVE, our hotel is convenient to the University of Southern California and Dodger Stadium. Luxury abounds at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE.Marriott

name: Sheraton Universal Hotel
address: 333 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608
description: Find the AAA 4-diamond Sheraton Universal Hotel nestled beneath the Hollywood Hills, minutes from Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal City. Walk to the Red Line metro for easy access to attractions throughout Los Angeles, CA, including the Walk of Fame and TCL Chinese Theatre. Our hotel rooms pay homage to our Hollywood history with a sleek, minimalist ambiance. Recharge with Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience® beds, smart TVs and floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning views of Universal Studios, the San Fernando Valley or the Hollywood Hills. Start your day with breakfast at The California, then ride our free shuttle to Universal Studios Hollywood. After a day in the park, unwind beside our hotel pool or visit In the Mix, our on-site bar serving an extensive selection of drinks. Take in 270-degree views of Hollywood, CA, from the 20-foot windows in the rooftop Starview Room. Whether you're visiting California for a business trip or family vacation, Sheraton Universal Hotel welcomes you.Marriott

name: The Garland
description: Close to Universal City, home of more than 50 shops and restaurants, this hotel in North Hollywood, California offers contemporary amenities such as free wireless internet and an on-site restaurant. An outdoor pool and hot tub is also available to guests. All rooms at The Garland include a private balcony, an LCD flat-screen TV, a refrigerator, and a coffee machine with coffees and teas. Guests at The Garland can work out in the fitness center. There is also an on-site bar available for guests. The Front Yard at The Garland serves Californian cuisine. Guests can also buy a cup of Seattle's Best Coffee at The Front Yard. In the evening, visitors can enjoy a drink on the outdoor patio at the Lobby Bar or the Lounge. Universal Studios Hollywood is 1.1 mi from The Garland, while the Hollywood Sign is 2.8 mi away. The Los Angeles Airport is 25 mi away.

name: Marina del Rey Marriott
address: 4100 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Experience Southern California’s allure at the Marina del Rey Marriott. Overlooking Mother’s Beach, this boutique hotel offers a location that is a perfect balance of relaxation while accessible to the technology and entertainment industries in Playa Vista and Culver City. This dog friendly hotel will allow you and your furry friend to experience the beachside escape that is Marina Del Rey. Indulge in craft cocktails at the Sinder bar and outdoor patio, work out in our Fitness Center, and escape in our new M Club with indoor and outdoor lounges. Take a swim in our pool, cruise the beach on an electric bike, and experience a curated meal in our restaurant. We offer 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, including a rooftop ballroom with views of the marina and Pacific Ocean. At the end of the day, retreat to our modernized guest rooms with private balconies overlooking the marina or Santa Monica. Inspired by local influences, our hotel captivates both business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: Beverly Wilshire, A Four Seasons Hotel
description: Beverly Wilshire, a 4 Seasons Hotel is located across the street from Rodeo Drive. The hotel features a Mediterranean-style pool and hot tub with private cabanas. The property is in a popular location to shop at Rodeo Drive, and is also in close proximity to areas such as Hollywood, Santa Monica, and Venice Beach. Rooms offer a flat-screen cable TV. Free WiFi for 1 device is available in all rooms at the hotel. A DVD player and an iPod docking station are offered and a mini-bar is included. Most rooms boast views of Rodeo Drive or the Hollywood Hills. Guests can relax in The Spa and enjoy massages, facials, and organic treatments using a wide range of products. A fitness center with state-of-the-art gym equipment is on site. Guests can enjoy complimentary fresh fruit, juice, bottled water, and pitchered water with natural fruit at the hotel. Meeting centers are also available. The pool offers cabanas at a surcharge and lunch dining is available at the poolside bar & cafe. Various dining options are available at the Beverly Wilshire. the CUT Lounge, a michelin star-rated steakhouse with a menu created by Wolfgang Puck, features seafood and steakhouse staples with cocktails and rare wines and spirits from around the world in a Mediterranean setting. THE Blvd, a mediterranean restaurant that offers outdoor seating overlooking Rodeo Drive. The Pool Bar and Café offers casual poolside dining, serving sandwiches, Paninis, salads, and desserts. In-room dining is also offered at the property. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art is 15 minutes’ drive from this hotel, while the Sunset Strip is 3 mi away. The Santa Monica Pier is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lax El Segundo
address: 888 North Pacific Coast Highway, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: From the sleek design of our lobby to the vibrantly decorated rooms, Hampton Inn & Suites LAX El Segundo is a great choice for Los Angeles travelers. Be close to aerospace companies, the beach and downtown LA. Our spacious rooms feature free WiFi, a 43-inch HDTV and plenty of plugs to charge your devices. Choose a room with a king or two queen beds. Several corner rooms offer full glass balconies. Upgrade to a suite for extra space, a sofa bed and wet bar. Head to the lobby for free hot breakfast each morning, or grab on of Hampton’s On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. At end of your day, stop by the lobby bar and dine on light fare and drinks. Stay committed to your workout goals in our fitness center and unwind in our indoor pool. Finish that last minute project in our business center which provides access to a computer, faxing and printing capabilities.Hilton

name: Courtyard by Marriott Marina del Rey
address: 4360 Via Marina, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Courtyard Marina del Rey is a bright, modern, new hotel located on the marina in the heart of Marina del Rey. Stay at our hotel to be near popular attractions like the Santa Monica Boardwalk, Venice Fishing Pier and Marina Beach. Our hotel is unique in that it is connected to a Residence Inn® hotel, allowing you to take advantage of extra amenities like guest laundry facilities, a larger fitness center and additional event space. Our state-of-the-art lobby provides greater flexibility and choices for hotel guests. At the center of it all is Brizo Bar & Restaurant, your destination for a great weekend brunch or drinks and dinner in the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces with free Wi-Fi where you can work or relax. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center and outdoor pool will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether visiting our hotel for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard Marina del Rey is sure to be more comfortable, more productive and more enjoyable than ever!Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Los Angeles Gateway - Torrance
description: A Great Hotel for Business or Pleasure in Sunny Los Angeles, CA. The Holiday Inn® Los Angeles Gateway Torrance features deluxe guest rooms and suites including complimentary Wi-Fi, refrigerators, and Keurig coffee makers. Our banquet facilities offer a perfect setting for any business or social event, complete with on-site catering. Located in the Harbor Gateway business district with easy access to I-110, I-405 and 91 freeways you're 15 minutes away from Los Angeles International Airport, Downtown Los Angeles, and LA Live/Convention Center. The Port of LA and Long Beach are also nearby. Business travelers take advantage of being a mile from Honda, and Herbalife. Endless SoCal fun begins as close as South Bay beaches and nearby golf. Create family memories with short drives to Disneyland® Park, Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios, & the world-famous Santa Monica Pier. In the mood for shopping, visit Del Amo Fashion Center or take a day trip to Rodeo Drive. Sports enthusiast enjoys being 2.5 mi. from Dignity Health Sports Park. Catch Lakers, Clippers, Kings game at Staples Center or Dodgers, USC football game at their Stadiums. During downtime, visit our Ginger Lounge, take a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool, or enjoy the peaceful sounds of the lobby's koi pond. Start over by checking out our well-equipped fitness center to start your day refreshed.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Ritz-Carlton Marina del Rey
address: 4375 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Marina del Rey has the distinction of being the closest hotel to the water of any Ritz-Carlton hotel in the US. The hotel is elegantly situated on one of the largest recreational marinas in the world. There are 304 guest rooms and suites which feature luxurious amenities complemented with the legendary service of The Ritz-Carlton. Cast & Plow restaurant offers locally sourced and farm-fresh ingredients paired with craft cocktails and a revered wine list. Unwind at the heated saltwater waterfront pool and whirlpool. Activities include tennis, paddleball, SUP paddleboards, bicycling and skateboarding. Located less than five miles from Los Angeles International Airport and close to Venice Beach, Malibu and Santa Monica, visitors have easy access to the most popular attractions in Southern California including shopping, theatres, theme parks, studio tours, museums and beaches. The hotel is also 20 minutes from the 53-acre Porsche Experience Center which offers eight unique driving modules.Marriott

name: Shutters on the Beach
description: Located directly on the beach, this Santa Monica, California resort features 2 oceanfront restaurants, an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. Providing luxury white linens, every room offers plush bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries at Shutters On The Beach. Styled in hardwood floors with a refined Tibetan rug, each room provides an iPod docking station and a 42-inch flat-screen TV. An in-room library is offered. Select rooms offer a balcony and select rooms offer spacious spa bathtubs. Boasting a panoramic ocean view and an oversize elegant white fireplace, One Pico offers seasonal cuisine on intimate tables with blue plush chairs. The beachfront café, Coast offers a casual atmosphere with a bar and lite bites. Featuring a heated terrace with an ocean view, the Living Room features afternoon tea, cocktails and a full menu of freshly prepared morsels. A poolside outdoor hot tub is offered. Valet parking is provided. A gift shop is also available at Sutter On the Beach Santa Monica. Santa Monica Pier is just 5 minutes’ walk down the beach. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away from Shutters On The Beach.

name: The Maybourne Beverly Hills
address: 225 North Canon Drive, Beverly Hills, CA 90210
description: This Beverly Hills hotel offers a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available and Frette bathrobes are provided. Crypto.Com Arena is a 20 minute drive away. A 42-inch flat-screen satellite TV is included in all guest rooms at The Maybourne Beverly Hills. All guestrooms provide guests with 24/7 access to all of the hotel's amenities and offerings. A seating area is also included and guests can enjoy slippers in the private bathroom. The Terrace, complete with a large outdoor dining patio overlooking Beverly Canon Gardens, serves California-inspired cuisine and guests can enjoy a cocktail at the Maybourne Bar. The on-site spa includes a sauna and a hot tub at no cost. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), the SoFi Stadium and the Hollywood Bowl are a 30 minute drive away.

name: Hyatt House Lax Manhattan Beach
address: 810 South Douglas Street, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: The Hyatt House Los Angeles/LAX/Manhattan Beach is located just four miles from the LAX airport, easy access to I-405 freeway, in the heart of the Rosecrans Corridor. We are conveniently located within walking distance to a variety of fine dining restaurants, shopping centers and beaches. Take a nice drive to the Getty Villa, to see the study of Arts, cultures of ancient Greece, Rome and Etruria. Hotel Check In 3pm.VRBO

name: The Ritz-Carlton Los Angeles
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Set within vibrant downtown surroundings, The Ritz-Carlton, Los Angeles effortlessly embodies the timeless appeal of a legendary city. Located at L.A. LIVE, home to world-class sports and extraordinary live entertainment, our luxury hotel in Los Angeles, CA features a captivating atmosphere shaped by dynamic surroundings. Discover a singular sense of place through luxurious accommodations, dramatic downtown L.A. skyline views, relaxing spa services and imaginative cuisine, all enhanced by unparalleled local access. This is where the free spirit of southern California combines with the discerning sophistication of Los Angeles.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
address: 300 South Doheny Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90048
description: Located in the center of Los Angeles this luxurious, full-service hotel provides rooms with French doors opening to private balconies. This 5-star hotel features a full-service spa and outdoor pool. These air conditioned rooms at the Four Seasons Los Angeles at Beverly Hills offer views of the gardens, Hollywood Hills, Los Angeles or Beverly Hills. They are furnished with a living area and cable TV, a DVD player and iPod docking station. On-site dining provides guests with indoor or outdoor seating options and specializes in Italian cuisine. Cocktails are available at Windows Lounge located in the Four Seasons Los Angeles. Los Angeles Four Seasons at Beverly Hills features a library and gym. Guests can relax in the sauna or use the business center. Rodeo Drive and Melrose Avenue are within walking distance from the Four Seasons at Beverly Hills. Downtown Los Angeles is 11 mi away.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Miami
description: Located above trendy Brickell Avenue, it's here where you will find the best of both big city adventure and tropical paradise, where a two-acre sun-kissed sanctuary overlooks the city's fashionable art, dining, and entertainment scenes all minutes from its doorstep A flat-screen cable TV, marble private bathroom, and a city or bay view are featured in all rooms. Four Seasons Hotel Miami also provides a seating area and desk with ergonomic chair. When guests are not in of the 2 outdoor pools, they can enroll in fitness classes like cycling or yoga. Access to free Wi-Fi, a hot tub, and sauna are provided to all Four Seasons Hotel guests. Edge, Steak & Bar features contemporary American cuisine from locally sourced seafood and vegetables to steaks in a dining room, bar, and outdoor terrace. Bahía offers poolside dining and beverages. Guests will find a variety of boutiques and eateries within 2 miles of the hotel at Bayside Marketplace. American Airlines Arena is 2 miles away.

name: Hilton Miami Dadeland
description: The new Hilton Miami Dadeland is just 13 miles from Miami International Airport and 2 miles from the famous Dadeland Center, Mall and Metro Station. The hotel is conveniently located near Baptist Hospital of Miami as well as South Miami's most popular shopping, dining, and attractions. Downtown Miami, beautiful beaches and neighboring hotspots of Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, Homestead, Key Biscayne and The Keys are all just minutes away. Settle in for a relaxing stay in one of our new upscale guest rooms and suites. Enjoy thoughtful features such as WiFi, LCD TVs, a work desk with ergonomic chair and a coffeemaker. Our suites also include a seating area, some with sofa beds and kitchenettes - ideal for families or extended stays. The hotel also offers Hilton's revolutionary, state-of-the-art Five Feet to Fitness in-room wellness concept, bringing 11 different fitness equipment and accessory options into the guest room. Five Feet to Fitness is perfect for exercise enthusiasts who prefer to work out in private. Furthering the focus on overall wellness for leisure and business travelers, Hilton Miami Dadeland features a health and wellness center with yoga and Pilates classes, a meditation garden, a heated outdoor pool and walking and jogging trails at the property. Hilton Miami Dadeland offers a large meeting and event space in the area, with 10,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor meeting space, including a 6,250-square-foot ballroom with private outdoor patio and dedicated pre-function areas. In addition to the hotel's new farm-to-table restaurant, Hilton Miami Dadeland offers a grab-n-go pantry, Starbucks, a Wall of Water bar with bottled water from around the world and room service.Hilton

name: The Ritz-Carlton Coconut Grove Miami
description: The Ritz-Carlton Coconut Grove, Miami, brings to life the independent and artistic spirit of Miami’s original neighborhood through genuine hospitality with a bohemian flair. Our Coconut Grove luxury hotel is an urban retreat that provides access to a lively community brimming with activity and culture and the privacy and comfort of a boutique hideaway.Marriott

name: Four Points by Sheraton Miami Airport
description: Your stay at Four Points by Sheraton Miami Airport begins virtually the moment your plane touches the ground, thanks to our complimentary shuttle service. Surrounded by many of the city's most prominent shopping destinations, our hotel offers unparalleled access to the Dolphin Mall, CityPlace Doral and the Miami International Mall. When you need a moment to yourself, withdraw into the modern comfort of our spacious accommodations, complete with complimentary Wi-Fi, plush bedding and flat-panel TVs. Whether you want to take a dip in our outdoor pool or lift weights in our 24-hour fitness center, featuring free weights and cardio equipment, you'll never have to let a workout pass you by. Once you've worked up an appetite, head over to our on-site restaurant and bar for an extensive selection of delectable dishes and handcrafted cocktails. Whatever the reason for your travels, allow Four Points by Sheraton Miami Airport to provide the friendly service and thoughtful amenities you deserve.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
address: 3974 Northwest South River Drive, Miami, FL 33142
description: Welcome to Embassy Suites Hotel - Miami International Airport, a proud member of the Florida GREEN Lodging Program. Our Miami Florida airport hotel offers great year round weather and fantastic Summer Family Vacation Packages and Specials. Our Miami airport hotel is conveniently located just a half mile from MIA and we offer complimentary drop-off and pick-up airport shuttle service. Miami has a diverse and rich culture and our hotel is proud to be a part of it. All major Miami attractions are close by our hotel including the Miami Seaquarium, Jungle Island, historic Coral Gables, Miami's trendy South Beach and of course, the Port of Miami for all your cruise departures. Individual Transfers to the Port of Miami are also available for a Nominal Fee. Reserve your seats upon check-in at our Front Desk! Many of our Miami airport hotel guests experience the following attractions during their stay with us: The Port of Miami for all CRUISE departures! Fantastic Miami Shopping Malls, Outdoor Markets and upscale street venues, The best Golf in Florida at Miami Golf Courses, Miami Spa Services In-Suite, Miami Sports Arena's including homes of the Dolphins, Heat and Marlins! The hip sophistication and international flair of South Beach, Miami Museums, the Miami Zoo and Florida National Parks. Our Miami airport hotel has something to offer travelers from around the world. Miami Florida is an international gateway for businesses, health industries, world commerce and has also become a leading destination for the entertainment industry. South Beach is known around the world as a beacon for international musicians, artists and dance companies. South Beach and downtown Miami are home to some of the top clubs, discothèques and art galleries in the world. Below is a list of just some of the major corporations that have made Miami their home base: Lennar Corporation, The University of Miami, Carnival Cruise Lines Corporation, Burger King Corporation, World Fuel Services, Southern Wine & Spirits Corporation. As we mentioned above, you can't beat the weather in Miami. Our average temperature is 75.9 C and although it gets warmer in the summer months, Miami is a lush, tropical paradise at the southern tip of the Florida peninsula with Key Biscayne just a short drive away and Key West just a three hour drive from our hotel. When you need it bad, we've got it good! Welcome to Miami!Hilton

name: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
description: With stunning views of the Miami skyline and Biscayne Bay, this hotel on Brickell Key Island offers luxurious spa services. The Shops at Mary Brickell Village are located just 3117 feet away from the Mandarin Oriental, Miami. A balcony, flat-screen cable TV with a DVD player, and iPod docking station are included in all guest rooms. Guests can enjoy a well-stocked mini-bar, evening turndown service, and marble bathroom with walk-in shower and separate bathtub. Mandarin Oriental, Miami offers an infinity-edge outdoor pool with butler service as well as a state-of-the-art fitness center.
