After a yoga class or personal training session, guests can relax with a massage in the full-service spa. La Mar by Gaston Acurio prepares Peruvian dishes while MO Bar + Lounge paires classic cocktails with a light fare menu. Miami city center is only 3 minutes' drive away from the Mandarin Oriental hotel, and South Beach district is located 6.3 mi away. The Wynwood Arts District is 3.4 mi away, and Coconut Grove is 13 minutes' drive from the property.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Grand Hotel Biscayne Bay
description: The Doubletree Grand Hotel Biscayne Bay is a waterfront luxury full-service condo-hotel in the heart of downtown Miami, Florida and eight miles from Key Biscayne. Our hotel is located within a four-minute walk of the Miami Passport Agency and just one mile away from PortMiami which encompasses some of the most popular cruise ships, including Royal Caribbean, Carnival, and Norwegian Cruise Lines. We are also a favorite Miami hotel for pre-cruise stays out of the PortMiami with our Miami Hotel/Cruise Package. The hotel backyard is the Sea Isle Marina, home to the Miami International Boat Show in February, where guests can enjoy scenic charters of Miami on the Biscayne Lady, Island Queen Cruises, and Pier 5 Fishing. Our hotel is within walking distance of the new Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts of Miami Dade County (featuring the Ziff Opera House and Knight Concert Hall) and is also less than two miles from Miami Brickell Avenue financial district, the fun, food and shops of Bayside Marketplace, Miami Dade Arena, and Miami Beach. World-famous South Beach and the Art Deco Historic District are a short jump over scenic causeways, and Miami International Airport is only 15 minutes away. Our full-service hotel in Biscayne Bay provides value in a tropical oasis of waterfront elegance for south Florida vacations, extended stays, or business travel. Miami Dades Metromover station is very close to our hotel, providing quick, complimentary transportation around the city of Miami, FL. With easy access to I-95 and A1A, all of glorious south Florida - from Key West to Palm Beach - lies within easy reach. Our hotel Features over 6,500 square feet of meeting space, with a Grand Ballroom and terrace overlooking beautiful Biscayne Bay, complimentary wireless Internet in public areas, Olympic size outdoor heated pool, state-of-the-art fitness center - Joe Lupos Fitness Center, tennis courts, Primos Kitchen Bar, Los Gauchitos Argentinean Steakhouse, La Fabourg Deli serving freshly brewed Starbucks coffee daily, Biscayne Lady and Miami Yacht Charters, Concierge Desk, Beauty Salon - Barbra Hair Salon and Spa. Hotel Accommodations: Beautifully adorned guestrooms and suites featuring many rooms with bay/park or garden views, 56 one and two-bedroom fully equipped condo units, Sweet Dreams bedding with pillow top mattresses, down-filled duvets and pillows to please, internet access, marble baths, executive desk with data port and leather swivel chair, coffee maker and complimentary coffee and tea.Hilton

name: The Setai, Miami Beach
description: Located directly on the beach in Miami’s famous Art Deco district, this resort offers yoga and tai-chi classes. Suites are furnished in Asian-style décor. Free WiFi and an iPod docking station are provided in every spacious suite at The Setai, Miami Beach. Rooms are equipped with espresso and coffee facilities along with a mini-bar. Miami Beach Setai features 3 infinity swimming pools and a business center. The on-site spa offers a number of massages and treatments, including a 60-minute Nepalese Body Polish. Concierges are available to provide recommendations. Guests can dine at 4 on-site restaurants including The Setai Grill, an American steakhouse serving Asian-inspired dishes. The Bar & Courtyard offers nightly drinks and snacks. Bayshore Golf Course is 1 mi from the resort. The Setai, Miami Beach is 1 mi from Lummus Park and 1050 feet from Bass Museum of Art.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami/Brickell-Downtown
description: in the center of Miami’s global financial hub. welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites – Miami/Downtown-Brickell, FL. With an unmatched location right in the center of the city’s financial district, not to mention 30+ restaurants, cafés and bars just a few blocks from our Miami hotel, the Hampton Inn & Suites puts you in the middle of it all! Shopping and entertainment is just steps away at the festive Mary Brickell Village. Only half-a-block from our front door is the free Metromover, making it easy to explore all of downtown, including Bayside Marketplace, American Airlines Arena, Adrienne Arsht Center for Performing Arts and more. A short drive takes you to the Port of Miami, Miami Beach, Coconut Grove, Key Biscayne and Miami International Airport. Metrorail is also only a half-block from our front door, giving you easy access to Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, hospitals and more. When you stay with us, you’re choosing a "green" Miami, FL hotel. We’re registered with the U.S. Green Building Council for LEED certification and boast eco-friendly features like a 36,000-gallon cistern to harvest rainwater, an electric car charging facility and more. Visit the Hampton Inn & Suites and experience the center of Miami’s global financial hub.Hilton

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: The Palms Hotel & Spa
description: This oceanfront hotel on Miami Beach has an outdoor pool in a tropical garden setting. Rooms feature Chromecast streaming. Select rooms have a separate seating areas. All rooms at the Palms Hotel & Spa have flat-screen TVs. Guests will find a work desk and ironing facilities, as well as BeeKind® toiletries. Views from the rooms include the hotel gardens, the cityscape or the Atlantic Ocean beaches. The on-site The Palms AVEDA Spa offers a variety of body care services. There’s Wi-Fi in the guest business center and throughout the hotel. Along with the pool, the hotel has a fitness center and is adjacent to the city pedestrian boardwalk. Guests can enjoy al fresco dining at Essensia Restaurant, which features sustainably-sourced ingredients prepared to showcase seasonal favorites. The hotel’s Tiki Bar provides poolside drinks. Guests can also use on-site beach amenities like lounge chairs and towels, along with food and beverage service. The Palms Hotel & Spa is one mile from the Julia Tuttle Causeway on Interstate 195. The Bayshore Municipal Golf Course is 2 miles from the hotel and Miami International Airport is 12 miles away.

name: Element Miami Doral
description: A contemporary haven amid Miami's vibrant cityscape, Element Miami Doral enjoys a prime location near popular South Florida attractions. Stylish studios and suites offer fully-equipped kitchens, pillowtop mattresses, work desks, and much more. Our eco-friendly accommodations provide a tranquil retreat, conveniently situated near US Southern Command and Florida International University, and close to the airport. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast, setting the perfect tone for exploration and relaxation. Discover museums and indulge in shopping sprees at Dolphin Mall and International Mall. Miami's beaches beckon, inviting you to bask in the warm embrace of the ocean. Afterward, cool off with a dip in our outdoor pool. At 107 Steak & Bar, savor delectable cuts of prime beef and fusion cuisine. Elevate your events in versatile spaces, perfect for meetings, weddings, and private parties. Experience the best of Miami at Element Miami Doral, your home base for unforgettable adventures.Marriott

name: The Gabriel Miami Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium internet access: $25 food and beverage credit for use in all hotel outlets: shuttle transfer to the Gabriel South Beach, including beach access and two chairs. Experience the essence of downtown Miami, FL at The Gabriel, Curio Collection by Hilton. Our Biscayne Boulevard hotel puts you in the perfect spot for gorgeous bay views from any of our 85 guest room balconies and the 14th floor pool deck. Kaseya Center, Adrienne Arsht Center, Frost Science Museum, and the Perez Art Museum are less than a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is a short drive to South Beach, Brickell, and the Wynwood Arts and Design district. Conveniently located near Miami International Airport, Port Miami terminal, and public transit, we make getting around a breeze. We also provide valet parking. Sip a signature cocktail from Bella's Bar poolside or try unique cuisine from The Gabriel Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The sophisticated third-floor Library Lounge features refreshments and vibrant books about music, art, film, and culture. Burn calories while gazing out at Biscayne Bay from our 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness facility. We also offer complimentary poolside yoga classes every weekend. All of our guest rooms and suites are spacious and have views through floor-to-ceiling windows and smart tech, including integrated digital media with high-definition sound, internet, and a safe with laptop charging.Hilton

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: Berkeley Shore Hotel
description: The Berkeley offers 96 rooms, gorgeous views, a rooftop pool and many other upscale enhancements. Were also committed to a mission of sustainability and have removed all plastics from our hotel as part of Iberostars Wave of Change initiative.Youll fall in love with the classic Art Deco faade and modern interiors of our South Beach hotel. Experience world-class amenities, impeccable service and spectacular views.iHotelier/iStay

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West hotel is conveniently located near the Miami International Airport. This Hilton Garden Inn hotel is just minutes away from all area major corporations and attractions including the Miami Cruise Port, South Beach and the Art Deco District, Downtown Miami, and the Doral Business Park. Guest rooms have features designed with you in mind, including: Great American Grill serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening room service, 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart, Complimentary airport transportation, The Garden Sleep System bed, with non-allergenic feather pillows and duvet cover, In-room Cuisinart coffee maker, microwave, and mini-refrigerator, 32-inch high-definition, flat-screen TV with premium channels and Lodgenet movies, Complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet with remote printing provided by PrinterOn, in all guestrooms, Flexible workspace with Ergonomic Mirra Desk Chair, USA Today delivered Monday-Friday, Fitness center with cardio equipment, free weights and whirlpool, Outdoor heated pool. The hotel is a place for your events and meetings - Leave the details to the hotel event professionals: Dedicated sales team to focus on the details, Intimate function rooms with state-of-the-art technology, Business center with fax, print, and copying services. The hotel is close to corporations, government facilities, and local attractions, including: 1.5 miles from Cisco Systems, 1 mile from FedEx, 1.5 miles from General Electric, 3 miles from Oracle, 4 miles from 3M, 12 miles to Miami Beach, 9 miles to the Port of Miami. ***** Everything. Right where you need it. *****Hilton

name: Aloft Miami Doral
description: Celebrate open spaces, open thinking, and open expression at Aloft Miami Doral. Discover contemporary hotel rooms with loft-like designs and all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. Our ideal location in Doral grants easy access to notable city destinations, including museums, sun-soaked beaches, and renowned shopping malls like Dolphin Mall and International Mall. As one of the closest hotels to US Southern Command and Florida International University, our prime location grants unparalleled convenience and easy access to both renowned institutions. A short drive from Miami International Airport, our hotel provides a stylish retreat for travelers. Enjoy handcrafted cocktails at WXYZ® Bar, grab snacks from our 24-hour pantry, and unwind at the outdoor patio or refreshing pool. Stay active at our 24-hour fitness center or utilize shared workspaces and room desks. With five event rooms, we can bring your conferences and social gatherings to life. Make every stay memorable at Aloft Miami Doral.Marriott

name: Thesis Hotel Miami
address: 1350 South Dixie Highway, Coral Gables, FL 33146
description: Rethinking the way you experience a hotel stay, Thesis Hotel is bringing lifestyle, comfort, and community together. THesis Hotel Miami is focused on creating an active and engaged space for guests, friends and members of the Coral Gables community to come together. Featuring 245 hotel rooms, two chef-driven restaurants that will transport your taste buds around the globe, community-led inspired events, creative meeting & event spaces including the urban living room, and a rooftop pool serving the latest libations. With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us. AAA 4 Diamond RatediHotelier/iStay

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Element Miami Downtown
description: Settle into the exhilarating style of downtown at Element Miami Brickell. Our extended stay hotel provides an experience unlike any other, meeting all your needs and providing unexpected delights. Sleek suite designs offer cozy accommodations with modern finishes, in-room kitchens, spacious layouts, dynamic skyscraper views, and simplistic, earth-toned colors. In addition to complimentary Rise breakfast and WiFi throughout, our pet-friendly hotel offers a bohemian chic lobby surrounded by incredible views, refreshing outdoor spaces, business center, Motion Fitness Center, impressive rooftop pool, laundry facilities, and 5,000 sq ft of meeting space. Sip a cocktail on the rooftop bar or slip over to the connected AC Hotel to enjoy the AC Kitchen and AC Lounge. Our downtown Miami hotel is located across from Brickell City Centre, near top dining and attractions including Bayfront Park, Port of Miami, and Loan Depot Park, home of the Marlins. Make this extended stay Miami downtown hotel your next destination.Marriott

name: JW Marriott Miami
description: The JW Marriott Miami is located in the heart of Brickell, Miami's hot destination for dining, shopping, and nightlife and is located a short walk away from the popular shopping and entertainment destination, Brickell City Centre. The sophisticated business hotel boasts 296 guest rooms, the latest technology, and over 25,000 sq ft of flexible meeting space. Guests are not far from all that Miami has to offer including the Perez Art Museum, Frost Science Museum, Kaseya Center (home of the Miami Heat), Adrienne Arsht Center, Port of Miami, South Beach, Coral Gables, Coconut Grove and Miami International Airport. The first JW Marriott hotel outside of Washington, DC, the iconic property is complete with a British-styled pub on the lobby level, a casual al fresco restaurant overlooking Brickell Avenue for lunch or dinner and the elegant light-filled Isabela’s for breakfast. Guests will also enjoy the stylish stainless-steel pool on the 7th floor and unwind and relax at the full service Salus Spa.Marriott

name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: AC Hotel By Marriott Miami Dadeland
description: AC Hotel Miami Dadeland offers modern accommodations with timeless European design. Perfectly located next to Dadeland Mall and walking distance to Dadeland South Metro Station. Downtown Dadeland is just a few minutes away and nearby attractions such as Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden, Everglades, and University of Miami. Public spaces feature unique artwork, while guestrooms provide a modern oasis with wood look flooring, complimentary WiFi and 55" HDTV. Take a dip in the outdoor pool and grab a cocktail in the pool deck cocktail lounge featuring our signature AC gin and tonic. The AC Lounge is the place to unwind with carefully crafted cocktails and tapas style bites. If you are looking to hold a event or meeting, our 3,610 sq. ft. of venue space for up to 255 people offers flexible venues and an experienced event staff. Our unbeatable location lets you walk to Dadeland Mall for an lively day of shopping, dining and entertainment. We look forward to providing you excellent service!Marriott

name: Intercontinental Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts and entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. The hotel, which recently completed a $40 million renovation, features 652 newly redefined luxury guest rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Westin Boston Seaport District
description: Whether you're traveling far or planning the staycation of a lifetime, make it count at The Westin Boston Seaport District. A vibrant neighborhood in an iconic city, the Seaport District offers rich history, world-famous attractions, and hidden gems for those who want to take the path less traveled. We are close to family-friendly fun at Boston Children's Museum, stunning exhibits at the Institute of Contemporary Art, and much more. Whatever adventure you choose, come home at the end of the day to stylish accommodations with everything you need to recharge for the next one when you book at our outstanding hotel. When you're not out exploring the city, enjoy our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, plush Heavenly® Beds, full-service on-site Starbucks® and casual dining options.Marriott

name: Seaport Hotel Boston
description: Located on the waterfront in the bustling Seaport District, the AAA Four Diamond Seaport Boston Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with stunning city and harbor views and incredibly convenient access to all major points of interest. Seaport Boston Hotels gracious and accommodating staff provides unparalleled service, and the hotels innovative amenities, including complimentary wireless internet access, service-inclusive policy and complimentary use of Wave Health & Fitness are sure to delight.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport (BOS) is conveniently located 1 mile from Logan Airport, just minutes from downtown Boston. Free 24 hour Airport Shuttle service to airport and Subway/Train Station and daily parking for a fee during your stay. Our tastefully-appointed hotel features modern conveniences suited to the savvy business traveler, along with a great location and amenities to please leisure guests. Spacious new guestrooms boast a long list of guest amenities including Keurig Coffee Makers, generous work surfaces and all rooms are complete with microwaves and refrigerators and Complimentary high-speed internet access. For your convenience, wireless HSIA is available in public areas throughout the hotel. Our guests have full use of our amenities including: indoor heated pool, well-equipped Fitness Center and Hotel features the Garden Grille & Bar on-site as well as many restaurants and retails shops nearby. The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport has 2,100 square feet of flexible meeting and banquet facilities including 500 square feet of pre-function space and separate Boardroom. Hotel also offers state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment, a Business Center, creative on-site catering services and a professional staff to anticipate your needs and flawlessly execute your successful business conference, training seminar, reception, or gala social event. You Can Count on Us! to provide a great value whether you are traveling on business, a vacation, or weekend getaway to Boston, our courteous hotel team looks forward to welcoming you! Guaranteed!Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
description: Our newly renovated all-suite hotel is conveniently located steps away from Fenway Park and is the closest extended-stay hotel to Boston University, Northeastern University, Colleges of the Fenway and the Longwood Medical Center. Enjoy our stunning views overlooking Fenway Park from the only Rooftop Bar in the Fenway neighborhood, making for an ideal starting point before and after a Red Sox game. We are also close to the House of Blues and the all-new MGM Music Hall – both great venues for catching a show! Explore the city of Boston and enjoy some fabulous shopping and dining at the world-famous Newbury Street or at the Prudential and Copley Malls – both just a 20-minute walk away. Stop by the Time Out Market Place and explore dining options from the top chefs in Boston. Alternatively, you can take a bike ride along the Charles River and enjoy the views. Plus, at our hotel near Back Bay Boston, we also have a great indoor swimming pool that is always a big hit for the entire family!Marriott

name: The Charles Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Harvard Square, this luxurious Cambridge hotel combines classic New England style with award-winning dining, elegant guestrooms and 24-hour personalized concierge services. Each of the rooms at The Charles Hotel in Harvard Square offers flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Guests can also enjoy free access to a nearby state-of-the-art fitness center as well as the on-site library and wireless internet access. While staying at the Charles, guests can take advantage of gourmet on-site dining options, such as the vibrant jazz club, the Regattabar. Classic New England cuisine is available at Henrietta's Table and rustic Italian dishes are featured at Benedetto. Popular area attractions, including the famed Harvard University are only moments from the Charles in Harvard Square. A number of charming cafes, shops and restaurants are also easily accessible. Boston city center is a short drive away with on-site car hire services.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
description: Located within steps of the Boston Common and the Public Garden, this Four Seasons has rooms with views of Boston. The hotel has facilities like an indoor pool, fitness center and spa. A flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at the Boston Four Seasons. There are also free toiletries, slippers and a bathrobe in the private bathroom. On-site dining at the Bistro Lounge offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Boston Opera House is 2297 feet from the hotel. The train at Arlington Station is 656 feet away.

name: Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston
description: Featuring a bar, Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston is located in the center of Boston, a 4-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Back Bay, Boston Museum of Fine Arts and Fenway Park. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 5.6 miles from Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston.

name: InterContinental Boston
description: Historic elegance meets modern luxury at the InterContinental Boston. Our waterfront hotel, located on the Boston Harbor, is one of the city's most celebrated hotels in a truly iconic location. Our beautifully redesigned rooms showcase the Boston cityscape with floor to ceiling windows. Whether hosting an event or relaxing in our Spa InterContinental, you will appreciate the close proximity to Boston’s most sought-after landmarks, like the Boston Tea Party & Ships Museum.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Brookline, MA
description: We are about a mile from Fenway Park outside of the Medical Center Area. There are seven bus stops and four light rail stations within a half mile of our hotel. Beth Israel Deaconess and Jamaica Plain VA Medical Centers are within a mile. Take a tour of Harvard University less than 10 minutes away. We provide a shuttle to the Longwood Medical Area.Hilton

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: Located in downtown Boston, this luxury hotel is adjacent to the Prudential Center and 1.8 miles from Fenway Park. It features a seasonal rooftop pool and spacious rooms with a 58-inch flat-screen TV. The Colonnade Hotel is a 7-minute walk from Symphony Hall and across from Prudential Train Station. Harvard Yard and Logan International Airport are both a 15-minute drive away. An iPod docking station is one of the modern amenities in every room at The Colonnade. All rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows and a Keurig coffee maker. Sleek black and white décor and a seating area complete each room. Free access to the state-of-the-art fitness center is provided to all guests. The helpful concierge service can help arrange travel details.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Tulum
address: Crta Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, free WiFi access, and a spa, Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive is located in Akumal, Mexico. A flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, and alarm clock are included in each room. A minibar, refrigerator, and coffee machine are also furnished. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in all private bathrooms. A tennis court and fitness centre are featured at the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive as well as 9 bars and 4 restaurants. A waterpark, nightclub, and adjacent casino are also available for guests to enjoy. Aktun Chen Natural Park is 4.4 km from the hotel, Xcacel Beach is 9.7 km away, and Xel-Há Park is 11 minutes' drive away from the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive.

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Akumal
address: Carretera Chetumal Benito Juarez KM 250, 77719 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and beside a kilometre-long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. the center of Akumal is about 3.5 km away offering a range of shops and entertainment. The turist area of Tulum is about 15 km. Playa del Carmen is 35 km away. Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Both Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 km or within around half an hour of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka'an - Adult Only Hotel
address: Km 250 Carr Federal a Chetumal, 77729 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive is located in the Riviera Maya town of Akumal. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. The accommodation will provide you with air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath and a hairdryer. Extras include a seating area. At Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive you will find a tennis court and a fitness centre Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Xcacel-Xcacelito (5.5 km) and Kantenah Bay (23 km). This resort is 95 km from Cancún International Airport.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Coba
address: Carretera Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and besides a 1 km long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. The center of Akumal is some 3.5 km away and offers a range of shops and numerous restaurants, bars, cafes, and other entertainment venues. The toursitic zone of Tulum is 15 km from the hotel. Playa del Carmen is 35 min away and Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 - 30 min of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Aloft Tulum
address: Av. Coba Sur Mz 5 Lt 1, Smz 1 Region 14, Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Modern spaces and open expression prevail at Aloft Tulum. Our hotel in Tulum, Mexico, offers a wide selection of cutting-edge technology, high-touch amenities, and a perfect location near the city center. We're also just a short drive from stunning Caribbean beaches. Immerse yourself in the local way of life while enjoying the vibrant attractions Tulum has to offer, including the archaeological area, majestic cenotes, pristine beaches, natural reserves and more. Explore a variety of well-regarded restaurants in the area, or stop by W XYZ Restaurant here at the hotel to savor simple dishes with unique twists. Mix, mingle and soak up the jungle views from our rooftop lounge, offering great music and vibes, dining and a variety of cocktails. As the evening draws to a close, you'll find a welcome reprieve from the excitement in our stylish hotel rooms and suites in Tulum, which provide eye-catching designs and perks like complimentary Wi-Fi. Your Mexico adventure awaits at Aloft Tulum Hotel.Marriott

name: Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel
address: Paseo de la Reforma 325, 06500 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Enrich your trip to Zona Rosa. Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel is located on the famed Avenida Paseo de la Reforma only steps away from dynamic shopping, dining and nightlife. Stroll down the avenue to The Angel of Independence and walk a little further for lush greenery at Bosque de Chapultepec. Head in the other direction for Spanish colonial façades at the Historic Center, home to the National Palace, Palacio de Bellas Artes and Metropolitan Cathedral. At our five-star hotel, sit down to a gourmet meal at our Italian restaurant or cocktails at our lounge and lobby bar. To help you recharge, we offer a heated outdoor pool and a Sheraton Fitness center with a sauna, cardio equipment and free weights. As the day winds to a close, slip off to a stylish, pet-friendly hotel room or suite with cityscape views and Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds. Your trip to Zona Rosa, Mexico City, is whatever you make it at Sheraton Mexico City Maria Isabel Hotel.Marriott

name: Doubletree By Hilton Mexico City Santa Fe
address: Calle 3 No. 55 Col. Lomas de Santa Fe, 01219 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Situated next to the Expo-Bancomer Santa Fe Convention Centre, this modern hotel has an indoor pool and gym. The stylish rooms offer flat-screen cable TV and views of the Valley of Mexico. Doubletree By Hilton Mexico City Santa Fe is located opposite Prados de la Montaña Park, in Mexico City’s Santa Fe business district. The historic city centre is a 20-minute drive away Rooms at the hotel have elegant modern décor and include a minibar and a safe. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries. The hotel's Vianda DT restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and local specialities. You can enjoy chill-out music and a full bar service in the Urban Lounge. Staff at the 24-hour reception are happy to provide information about the area. Desierto de Los Leones National Park is less than 6 km from Doubletree By Hilton Mexico City Santa Fe.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Mexico City
address: Paseo De La Reforma 500, 06600 Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Near Chapultepec Park and situated on Paseo de la Reforma in downtown Mexico City, this AAA Five Diamond Award winner hotel offers a full-service spa, an on-site restaurant and contemporary guest rooms with flat-screen TVs. Four Seasons Hotel Mexico D.F. features a well-equipped fitness centre and outdoor pool. After a busy day, guests can relax in the sauna or the hot tub. Additional services, such as a helpful concierge and 24-hour business services, ensure an enjoyable stay. An English-style barbershop, Gentleman's Tonic, is also available. The guest rooms at the Mexico D.F. Four Seasons boast private bars, flat-screen TVs and sitting areas. In the afternoon, guests can relax in the soaking tub or use the in-room wireless internet access for an additional fee. Becco servces Italian cuisine, while Pan Dulce pastry shop combines traditional Mexican bread with French pastries. Guest can order drinks at El Bar or enjoy a Champagne tasting every Wednesday.

name: Fiesta Inn Playa Del Carmen
address: Avenida 10 Esq. Con Calle 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Fiesta Inn continues to evolve, transform, and innovate its Business Class hotel concept. With a fresh, modern image and new facilities, Fiesta Inn Playa del Carmen is the perfect example of business accommodations done right. Designed to encourage creativity and productivity, the hotels spaces are functional yet friendly, allowing guests to be connected while remaining independent. Todays Fiesta Inn is more than simply a hotel; it is a community of professionals who thrive on success.The hotel, located just one street over from the famous Fifth Avenue, offers 129 guest rooms, 24-hour room service, high-speed Internet, fitness center, dry cleaning service, covered parking, and the 360 Lounge which is home to La Isla restaurant, B-On Business Center, and the convenience store and self-service area. Service dogs are permitted. Please note that check-in begins at 3pm, subject to availability. Check-out is at 12pm. Express check-out is recommended.Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of $31.12 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Solidaridad Quintana Roo (Playa del Carmen)iHotelier/iStay

name: Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cun Playa, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba consists of ultra luxurious, fully furnished 3 and 4 bedroom residences provided with the unmatched service and amenities of Fairmont Mayakoba, containing a host of leisure and retail facilities to which Owners will have access. The Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba community is set aside from the hotel, granting additional privacy and exclusivity to its owners.accorhotels.com

name: La Casa de la Playa by Xcaret- All Fun Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel La Casa de la Playa is located in the vicinity of a sandy/rocky beach. The town Playa del Carmen is around 8 km away (Tulum around 50 km, Cancún around 60 km). The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Xplor (approx. 1 km away) and Xenses (approx. 1 km away). For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 55 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a free shuttle. There is also a shuttle to Parks Group Xcaret (for free). Amenities: The 3-storey beach hotel has 63 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, a lift, an air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop as well as a parking area (for free). For the meals, there are 4 restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. Room service and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 3 fresh water pools. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast a la carte. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness and aerobics. Bicycle rental. Spa area, sauna, whirlpool and massages available for a fee. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa, American Express and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
address: Km 18 5 Carretera Transpeninsular Csl-sj, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Covet is our prime location on the beach at Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos. Enjoy easy access from our luxury hotel to the Baja peninsula, downtown San Jose del Cabo and Marina Cabo San Lucas. Our contemporary luxury hotel in San Jose, Los Cabos features rooms and suites with an ideal respite and exquisite designs, luxury beds, marble floors and custom furnishings. Our resort's custom floor plans blur the line between indoor and outdoor spaces. Many rooms boast private entrances with secluded, furnished patios, outdoor showers, private plunge pools and unobstructed views of the beach and Sea of Cortez. Pamper yourself in San Jose del Cabo at our hotel spa after you sample our resort's diverse dining options. Stay fit in our 24-hour fitness center with help from a personal trainer. Then relax in one of two heated infinity pools while the kids enjoy our two heated children's pools. A truly blissful experience awaits you at Solaz.Marriott

name: Los Cabos Golf Resort, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: Via de Carlos Lote #601, 23406 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Los Cabos Golf Resort, Trademark Collection by Wyndham is a 76 room resort located inside of the Cabo San Lucas Country Club golf course. Enjoying a warm welcome. Los Cabos Golf Resort offers putting green on property, fishing and scuba diving activities. Guests will also enjoy an outdoor pool, fitness center, onsite restaurant and bar. Included in the stay guests will enjoy complimentary parking, rooms for up to 10 guests, ideal for family or groups vacations. All rooms include a minibar, kitchen, safety box, balcony, and free WiFi.Wyndham

name: Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Iconic yet innovative, classic yet contemporary, Hilton Los Cabos embodies the evolution of the sophisticated resort experience in Cabo San Lucas. Steps away from the Sea of Cortez in the exclusive Los Cabos corridor, along one of the only swimmable beaches in the region, Hilton Los Cabos offers lush, rich surroundings, anticipatory service, and the perfect blend of relaxation and rejuvenation. With expansive views from oceanfront rooms and suites, some featuring private plunge pools, this is a place for guests to discover authentic Mexico, where elevated dining and wellness options are all flavored with local cultural experiences and an international flair. Here, nothing is scripted: From family fun at the Enclave Beach Club to romantic respites in a seaside cabana, energetic events in our gathering spaces to the prime guestrooms and upgraded amenities of AltaMar, you are free to craft your own signature story.Hilton

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Find your balance among 14 acres of swaying palm trees and fronted by a 410-foot private beach on the Pacific Ocean. The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta offers all this splendor only five minutes from Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport and charming downtown Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Lace up for dining and upscale shops at the marina district across the road. Relax at a beachfront pergola and sparkling pool or book an appointment at our serene spa offering head-to-toe pampering. Our Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, resort hotel features a Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and nearby golf courses. Bright colors and tropical Mexican décor grace every ocean-view hotel room at our resort, and each accommodation includes a private balcony, plush Heavenly® Bed and rejuvenating Heavenly® Bath. Recharge the right way at The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta.Marriott

name: Fiesta Inn Oaxaca
description: Located in the most commercially developed area of the city, opposite the Plaza del Valle shopping center and Plaza Oaxaca, very close to the main tourist attractions such as the Church of Santo Domingo, the Basilica of La Soledad and the Cathedral. Situated fifteen minutes from the historic center and 10 minutes from Benito Jurez Airport.We remind you that the check-in time is from 3:00 PM. Check-out is at 12:00 PM. We suggest you use our express check-out service.iHotelier/iStay

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Puebla Angelópolis
address: Calle Osa Mayor Número 2507, 72190 Puebla City, Puebla
description: Hotel located in the fastest growing area and vanguard of Puebla, Grand Fiesta Americana Puebla Angelpolis stands porser property luxury and exclusivity imposed against the Star of Puebla and Paruqe Linear and next to the most important commercial center of the city Angelpolis. 168 luxurious rooms and modern architecture distributed in 12 levels that allows a panoramic from each of its rooms view. It has a swimming channel and a terrace with the finest details to enjoy a relaxing moment reveling in a striking view.Dear guest: Please be advised, due to the Puebla Marathon, the main avenues of the city will be closed from the night of November 25th until 2:00 p.m. on Sunday, November 26th. We suggest you review alternative routes to and from the hotel in advance. We appreciate your understanding.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tuxtla Gutierrez
address: Boulevard Belisario Dominguez 1641, 29050 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Hilton Garden Inn Tuxtla hotel offers world class service, luxury and convenience to business and leisure travelers in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas. Discover our hotel, perfectly located in Tuxtla’s prime commercial and hotel district, only 10 minutes away from downtown, and 35 minutes away from the International Airport Angel Albino Corzo. In Hilton Garden Inn Tuxtla we provide you with the perfect base for your next business trip. We also offer you a comfortable getaway from work with our outstanding facilities that include an outdoor pool, a bar and a fitness center among others. Our hotel is the perfect place for your next business or vacation trip. This new Tuxtla hotel has 167 beautifully appointed guest rooms with great amenities such as the signature Mirra® Chair, as well as a coffee maker, microwave, mini bar, MP3 alarm clock, complimentary and high-speed Internet access- to stay connected. In addition our Tuxtla hotel offers you a 24-hour business center, Internet access in all public areas and first class on-site catering with varied menus to meet any budget. For some of the best dining in town, visit the hotel’s restaurant. From business meetings and family reunions to sport groups, anniversaries and religious celebrations, no matter the event, you can leave the details to our team who is dedicated to ensure your event is a success. Everything right where you need it.®Hilton

name: Marriott Puebla Hotel Meson del Angel
address: Avenida Hermanos Serdan 807, Fracc. Las Fuentes, 72116 Puebla City, Puebla
description: Transform any stay into a rejuvenating getaway at Marriott Puebla Hotel Meson del Angel. We boast an unrivaled location near some of the city's most prominent destinations such as the Angelópolis Lifestyle Center, FINSA industrial park and downtown Puebla. Following a day of business or adventure, settle into our sophisticated accommodations outfitted with pillowtop mattresses, marble bathrooms and room service. If you're feeling hungry, visit our two restaurants to satisfy your appetite. La Fonda serves delectable Mexican cuisine amidst a rustic ambiance, while Restaurante Prime specializes in decadent steaks. Before your trip concludes, make a splash in our outdoor pool and work up a sweat with an invigorating workout in our fitness center. Need to host a professional or social event? We have you covered with 13 meeting venues boasting full-service catering, professional planners and AV equipment. Let Marriott Puebla Hotel Meson del Angel exceed your expectations while you're in Mexico.Marriott

name: Fiesta Inn Monterrey Tecnologico
address: Avenida Eugenio Garza Sada, 2411, 64700 Monterrey, Nuevo Leon
description: Located next to the Instituto Tecnolgico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey (ITESM), inside of the Paseo Tec plaza which offers numerous restaurant and entertainment options. The hotel is situated close to the Cintermex convention center, 10 minutes from Constitucin Avenue which connects with the highway to Reynosa, and 30 minutes from the international airport.Fiesta Inn Monterrey Tecnolgico is an Eco-friendly hotel, so it is a 100% smoke free hotel.We remind you that the check-in time is from 3:00 PM. Check-out is at 12:00 PM. We suggest you use our express check-out service.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton San Luis Potosi
address: Avenida Real de Lomas No. 1000, 78218 San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí
description: Located in San Luis Potosi, Hilton is housed in a colonial-style building and offers an outdoor heated pool surrounded by gardens. The hotel has 2 restaurants on site. The rooms have elegant décor and feature the Hilton Serenity beds. All rooms and suites have a safe, coffee maker, minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Guests can organize their meetings and gatherings in the meeting rooms at Hilton San Luis Potosi. The property also offers an equipped fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Hilton San Luis Potosi has 2 restaurants on site, a bar and the front desk is available 24 hours a day. Set in Las Lomas area, Hilton San Luis Potosi is 30 minutes’ drive from San Luis Potosi International Airport.

name: Grand Isla Navidad Resort
address: Circuito de Los Marinos, 28830 Manzanillo, Colima
description: This luxury beachfront resort, in Barra de Navidad, features a golf course, gym, spa and 2 outdoor pools, one located on the 10th floor. There are tennis courts and on-site water sports facilities. Free WiFi is included in public areas. Spacious air-conditioned rooms have a terrace with ocean, pool or mountain views. There is a living room with a sofa, cable TV and coffee maker. Rooms have a ceiling fan and private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Grand Isla Navidad Golf & Spa Resort with Marina offers several bars and restaurants. Room service is also available. There is free on-site parking and the hotel has 24-hour reception, as well as a tour desk and concierge service.

name: HILTON GARDEN INN LEON
address: Blvd. Adolfo Lopez Mateos 2126, 37530 León, Guanajuato
description: We’re off Mexico 45, about five minutes from Centro Max mall and 10 minutes from Poliforum exhibition center and Leon Stadium. Shops, including the Mulza Footwear outlet, are within five kilometers. BJX airport and industrial park are 20 kilometers away. Enjoy our La Pica restaurant and free parking and WiFi. Our ballroom has space for 500 people.Hilton

name: Pergola Hotel & Spa
description: The Pergola Hotel & Spa is a 4-Star hotel located in a beautiful residential area, overlooking the quaint village of Mellieha, the popular bay and the sister islands of Gozo and Comino. The hotel is situated just a few metres away from shops, restaurants, bars, banks and only 10 minutes or 1km away from the largest sandy beach on the island; Mellieha Bay. The Pergola offers a range of accommodation from deluxe self-catering apartments to hotel rooms. Some of the apartments enjoy what many consider to be Malta’s best postcard view! The hotel offers free Wi-fi for all to keep connected! Pergola is popular with families and couples who want a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday stress, but yet want to be within easy proximity to the amenities. Buses to Malta’s main tourist attractions including Valletta, Mdina, Blue Grotto, Sliema and St. Julian’s, pass through the village very frequently. The Pergola enjoys ample panoramic sun-terraces, 2 outdoor pools with children’s paddling pools, 2 conference rooms, fitness centre and Jacuzzi. Da Vinci Spa provides an extensive range of health, beauty and well-being treatments at reasonable prices. The bars and restaurants within Pergola all offer variety and promise a different experience and a window into the Mediterranean cuisine. The Cave Bar (seasonal) is the hotel’s signature outlet; a bar into the natural rock that has been not only serving drinks, cocktails and a vast range of snacks but also showing live sports and events from across the globe. Da Ciccio Cucina is the latest addition and has become popular with those loving Italian cuisine whilst the Bonaventura and Al Fresco (seasonal) remain favourites for those preferring the differently daily themed buffets. The PADI dive-centre within the hotel is an another facility that literally gives you access into another world!Official Hotel Information

name: Intercontinental Malta
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: InterContinental Malta has established itself as the Mediterranean’s leading hotel of distinction. Located in the prime area of St. George’s Bay in St. Julian's, just seven kilometres from Valletta. All 481 rooms are elegantly furnished, having all the comforts expected of a luxury hotel. With a variety of restaurants and bars, the hotel offers varied cuisine at all times of the day. The leisure facilities include three pools, a kids club, a Fitness Centre, a spa, a beach club and room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa
description: A warm and genuine welcome awaits you at the Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa. Located in the heart of the business district, the Hotel offers you the opportunity to live and connect with Porto, an Unique, exquisite and authentic destination. Like its wine, a treasure to be slowly appreciated. Enjoy the convenience of being only a short distance away from the city’s rich heritage, where you connect with 800 years of history. Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa offers Unique architecture, light and comfort, together with an unmatching food & beverage experience, 1,750 square meters of flexible state of the art indoor meeting space as well as 4,000 square meters of garden scenario. At The Spa, body and mind find their equilibrium and the ideal escape to the basic pillars of wellbeing: Life balance, Energy, Nutrition and mindfulnessMarriott

name: BessaHotel Baixa
address: Rua Dr. Alves da Veiga, 155, 4000-074 Porto, Porto
description: BessaHotel Baixa is centrally located in Porto, right in the heart of the undefeated city, just a few minutes from City Market Bolhão. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have large terrace-style balconies with views of the city. Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre and therapeutic massages upon request. The wellness area at BessaHotel Baixa is comprised of an indoor pool, a sauna and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Popular points of interest near the hotel include City Market Bolhao, Oporto Coliseum and Douro River. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from BessaHotel Baixa.

name: Pestana Palácio do Freixo, Porto
description: No description found

name: Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace
description: Located a 3-minute walk from Paris Galleries Street, Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace offers 5-star accommodations in Porto and is located in a renovated historic building from 1923. The property has 2 restaurants, a bar, indoor swimming pool and a Spa & Wellness Centre. The hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 400 metres from City Market Bolhao and around 400 metres from Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is available. The property features rooms and suites, all equipped with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower. All units are equipped with a seating area. Buffet breakfast is served every morning at the breakfast room. Le Monumental Café features fish and seafood options, while Le Monument is a gourmet restaurant. There is also the Bar Americain, which also serves snacks. Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna and an indoor pool, hammam and a fitness centre. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. Le Monumental features a library lounge and a comfortable TV room. Popular points of interest near Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace include Oporto Coliseum, Ferreira Borges Market and Soares dos Reis National Museum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 11 km from Maison Albar Hotels Le Monumental Palace.

name: Bfresh Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking
description: Located in Porto, 1.3 km from Music House, BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre, a concierge service and free WiFi. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room comes with a kettle, while certain rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. At BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Boavista Roundabout is 1.3 km from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 13 km from BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Novotel Lisboa
address: Avenida Jose Malhoa 1 1A, 1099-051 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located in central Lisbon, with easy access to transport, the Novotel hotel is convenient for family vacations or business trips. It is located 500 yards from Lisbon Zoo, near the Gulbenkian Foundation. The restaurant and bar are perfect for relaxing and socializing. After a gym workout, why not head to the outdoor pool if the weather is nice? There are also 10 meeting rooms with plenty of natural light.accorhotels.com

name: Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto
address: Rua C, Aeropuerto Internacional De Lisboa, Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located 100 metres from Lisbon International Airport, the new Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel offers a lounge bar and a restaurant on site Each room is air-conditioned and includes a sober décor with bold accents. All rooms come with a mini-bar, a cable flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can wake up to a wholesome breakfast buffet each morning. At Restaurante Colinas de Lisboa, lunch and dinner are served à la carte and include regional and international cuisine. For a pre-dinner drink head to the lounge bar located on the reception floor. At the hotel guests will find the El Spa, a space where guests can break from routine and recharge their batteries in the swimming pools, the hot tub, hydromassage facilities, waterfalls, sauna and Turkish bath. At the gym guests have a full specialist support. The hotel features indoor and outdoor parking, with paid electrical vehicle charging stations. Parque das Nações business district is down the avenue, less than 3 km away from Meliá Lisboa Aeroporto Hotel. The Aeroporto Metro Station is within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Jupiter Lisboa Hotel
address: Avenida da Republica, 46, 1050-195 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located halfway between Saldanha and Campo Pequeno, Jupiter Lisboa is a newly built hotel featuring a panoramic rooftop with 2 outdoor swimming pools as well as a SPA, a Portuguese restaurant and a lobby bar with food and drinks. Preserving its original 1906 architecture, Jupiter Lisboa Hotel’s spacious rooms are decorated with images of Lisbon and are equipped with free WiFi, air conditioning, soundproofing, a flat-screen TV and a work desk. Each private bathroom comes with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site restaurant serves a hot breakfast buffet every morning and includes a varied menu with international and traditional Portuguese dishes. The Lisboa Amada lobby bar has a variety of drinks and snacks. A 24-hour room service is available for guests’ convenience. In the summer time there's also a rooftop bar, available for snacks and drinks. Jupiter Lisboa Hotel’s 24-hour front desk can provide a variety of services including a shuttle service, bicycle and car rental, ticket service, luggage storage and a concierge service. Private underground parking is available, at an extra fee. The hotel has 3 fully equipped meeting rooms. There is a 24-hour fitness centre available, free of charge. The BluSpa at Jupiter Lisboa Hotel, features an indoor treatments pool, sauna, steam bath and a complete massages and treatments menu. These services are not included in the rate. The Baixa Pombalina and Chiado shopping areas are just a 15-minute metro trip away and both Luz and Alvalade Football Stadiums are within 4 km. Lisbon International Airport is 4 km away.

name: Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show
address: Rua Sousa Martins nº 20, 1050-217 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Lisbon. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. Every day, a videomapping show is performed in the interior garden of the hotel. Guests can enjoy this immersive experience of light and colour. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show every room includes bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Miradouro da Senhora do Monte, Dona Maria II National Theatre and Rossio. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 5 km from Lumen Hotel & The Lisbon Light Show.

name: Olissippo Lapa Palace
address: Rua do Pau da Bandeira, 4, 1249-021 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World is situated in Lisbon and offers complimentary wireless internet. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel treats guests to a range of superior amenities and services, including an indoor pool and Lapa Palace Spa. Couples will delight in the hotel's features like vip rooms and massage services. It also has a gym with a swimming pool and cardiovascular equipment. Each room at Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World comes with slippers and a mini bar, and the bathrooms offer bathrobes and hair dryers. They are all soundproofed and include a DVD player, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Each evening, guests are invited to wind down in the lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a variety of popular restaurants and cafés in the local area to discover. Olissippo Lapa Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World is also moments from the area's well-known establishments, and the National Museum of Ancient Art is a 10-minute stroll away. Belem Tower, Jeronimos Monastery and Rossio Square are only a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Moxy Lisbon City
address: Avenida Duque Loule No 2 A 8, 1050-090 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Discover a hotel in the center of Lisbon, with modern design and chic, well-appointed rooms.The spacious lobby with contemporary furnishings is the perfect place to meet and relax. Our "Plug and Meet" areas offer modern ergonomic seating for working and free wifi.At Moxy Lisbon City enjoy our catering service 24/7, we offer a continental breakfast, snacks, an evening bar with typical Portuguese wines and local beers.All Moxy's rooms have 49-inch flat-screen TVs, built-in USB ports and free Wi-Fi.Not to mention our rooftop swimming pool to relax and enjoy the view over Lisbon City or our terrace for a quiet drink after your day of visits.Moxy Lisbon City is the ideal starting point to explore: Belém, Castelo de São Jorge, and all the miradouros one many hills of the city. on foot or by streetcar!We will be happy to advise you on where to go to listen to fado while enjoying some Portuguese tapas and of course the typical bacalhau, and ending with a pastel de nata. Got your tickets!Tight parking on site.Marriott

name: Pestana Palace Lisboa
description: The 5-star Pestana Palace Hotel is a restored 19th-century palace, featuring private parklands and views of the Tagus River. It offers 2 swimming pools, a sauna and wellness centre. Each spacious room is elegantly furnished and fitted with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Many also open onto a furnished balcony with views of the lush garden. Some feature a seating area with a plush sofa. Overlooking the gardens, the chic, sophisticated restaurant at Pestana Palace Hotel & National Monument serves traditional Portuguese dishes. The bar offers a range of snacks and drinks. In the summer months, a poolside restaurant also serves light refreshments. Pestana Palace Hotel & National Monument offers a steam bath and a hot tub. It features a business centre as well. Close attractions include Belém Tower, 3 km away, while Hieronimyte Museum is 2 minutes’ drive from Pestana Palace. As a sustainability measure, the indoor pool's water will only be heated to 26ºC.

name: Lisboa Pessoa Hotel
address: Rua da Oliveira ao Carmo, 8, 1200-309 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Inspired by the life and work of Fernando Pessoa, Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is located in the centre of Lisbon, 200 metres from Chiado. The Hotel features a restaurant with panoramic views, a SPA (16+) and fitness centre, meeting facilities and a library. Free WiFi and paid private parking are available. Lisboa Pessoa Hotel offers a variety of rooms, including interconnecting rooms, rooms with a terrace and stunning views of Lisbon. All rooms have air conditioning, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each bathroom includes free toiletries and a walk-in shower. The reception is available 24 hours. The hotel has free Wi-Fi. Restaurante Mensagem provides an intimate atmosphere with eight niches with a private window and 2 terraces with views of the Portuguese capital. The products are carefully selected by Chef Manuel Ferreira and the dishes are inspired by Portuguese tradition. Lisboa Pessoa Hotel is 200 meters from Rossio and 300 meters from Dona Maria II National Theater. Humberto Delgado Airport is 6 km away.

name: BessaHotel Liberdade
address: Avenida da Liberdade, 29, 1250-139 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: BessaHotel Liberdade is centrally located in Lisbon’s prestigious Avenida da Liberdade, a few minutes’ from Restauradores Square. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have balconies with views of the city. Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre and therapeutic massages upon request. The wellness area at BessaHotel Liberdade is comprised of an indoor pool, a sauna, a Turkish bath and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities. BessaHotel Liberdade is 500 metres from Rossio and 700 metres from the commercial area of Chiado. The Restauradores Metro Station is 300 metres away and Lisbon International Airport is 6 km away.

name: Corinthia Lisbon
address: Avenida Columbano Bordalo Pinheiro, 105, 1099-031 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: The 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon is 150 metres from the Lisbon Zoo Metro Station and a 5-minute metro ride from trendy Avenida da Liberdade. A recent recipient of environmental awards, it features 2 restaurants and the largest spa area in Lisbon. All of the stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon have been tastefully decorated and fitted with cable TVs, as well as free WiFi. Each has a private bathroom with free luxury toiletries. The hotel's Soul Garden - Outdoor Restaurant and Cocktail Bar has a colourful and tranquil ambiance, serving light meals, snacks, refreshing drinks and cocktails. The hotel's main restaurant, is the Erva Restaurant and Bar, which was recently fully renovated. The restaurant is inspired by Lisbon and Portuguese gastronomy, has a relaxed atmosphere and even includes a grill bar area, for live cooking. Guests can relax at the hotel’s large, 3000 m2 luxury spa. It offers massage therapies and beauty treatments, such as mesotherapy and facial treatments as well as an aqua circuit with swimming pools, hot tubs and a fully equipped gym. The ample Sky Lounge is located on the 24th floor and features a 360º view over the city. Here, guests may enjoy using the business centre with free WiFi, reading daily newspapers or magazines, tasting complimentary canapés, as well as soft drinks, coffee and tea throughout the day. The unit is a 15-minute Metro ride from the city’s historical downtown, featuring popular Chiado and Rossio. Lively Bairro Alto’s bars are also at a 15-minute Metro ride. The iconic São Jorge Castle is within 7.5 km. Lisbon’s premier shopping area, Amoreiras is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Lisbon International Airport is a 9-minute drive from Corinthia Hotel Lisbon.

name: NAU Palácio do Governador
address: Rua Bartolomeu Dias, 117, 1400-030 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: NAU Palacio do Governador offers accommodation in Lisbon’s Belem district, 400 metres from the Belem Cultural Centre and the Belem Tower. Featuring a Spa & Wellness centre, the hotel also has an outdoor year-round pool, an indoor pool, free WiFi and private parking available. Guests can find a garden and a terrace at the property. Each room is air conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom and a satellite flat-screen TV. Breakfast is included and guests will find bath robes and slippers in the rooms. A library and a lounge area are also available. A bar where guests can relax at the end of the day and an à la carte restaurant are featured. Alternatively, guests can find restaurants and cafés within 150 metres. The famous Pastéis de Belém café can be found within 1 km. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. Public transport stops can be found within 40 metres. Lisbon’s lively Bairro Alto and the Chiado districts are 7 km from the property. Sintra is 25 km from NAU Palacio do Governador and Cascais is 27 km away. The nearest airport is Lisbon International Airport, 16 km away from NAU Palacio do Governador.

name: Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel
address: Rua De Santa Marta 48, 1150-297 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: Located 80 metres from Avenida da Liberdade, the 4-star Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is 300 meters from Marquês de Pombal Square. This certified eco-hotel has a prime location in Lisbon and features Spa & Wellness area, as well as a gluten-free menu in its Mediterranean-style restaurant. The luxurious rooms of the Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel are decorated according to the principles of Feng Shui. Flat-screen TVs, free WiFi and Nespresso machines are standard in all of the stylish guest rooms. A temple-like atmosphere can be enjoyed at the spa, which includes wet and dry saunas, a soothing hot tub and 6 treatment rooms. For an intense workout, the Hotel also features a gym. Organic, locally sourced ingredients are blended in the Mediterranean dishes of its stylish restaurant. Vegan, vegetarian and lactose-free dishes are included in its extensive menu. The Mediterranean Brasserie offers a range of activities, including show-cooking, workshops and wine tasting. A cosy fireplace, retro décor and a comprehensive cocktail menu are available at the Urban Bar. The Inspira Liberdade Boutique Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Eduardo VII Park and a 15-minutes' walk from historic Rossio.
