Chiado is 2 km away and features a multitude of traditional shops and typical cafés. The lively bars and eateries of Bairro Alto are within a 20-minute walk. The Hotel is 9.3 km from Lisbon International Airport, which is accessible via metro.

name: Convento do Espinheiro, Historic Hotel & Spa
description: Surrounded by 80 000m² of beautiful gardens, this 5-star hotel is 4 km from Évora city centre and housed in a renovated 15th-century convent. It offers a piano bar and free parking. Guest rooms at Convento do Espinheiro are luxuriously furnished, free wifi and coffee machine. Each en suite bathroom offers a bathrobe, slippers and free bathroom amenities. Some rooms have a private terrace. Massage treatments are available at Convento do Espinheiro’s spa. Leisure facilities include a tennis court, indoor and outdoor pools and a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can enjoy cocktails at Convento do Espinheiro Historic Hotel & Spa poolside bar. Restaurant Divinus serves a mix of Mediterranean and Portuguese cuisine. A complimentary wine tasting is available everyday, in the late afternoon. Évora city centre is a 10-minute drive from this luxurious hotel.

name: Penha Longa Resort
address: Estrada da Lagoa Azul, Linho, 2714-511 Sintra, Lisbon District
description: Breaking the lush landscape of Sintra’s rolling green hills Penha Longa Resort is a reminder that true beauty withstands time. The hotel, the only within the natural park, seamlessly incorporates a 14th century monastery and chapel within its luxurious setting. A 27-hole championship golf course is to be both played and admired family-focused activities celebrate nature and tradition; and three of nine dining experiences hold coveted Michelin stars.Marriott

name: Sheraton Cascais Resort
address: Rua Das Palmeiras Lote 5 - Quinta da Marinha, Cascais, Lisbon District
description: Sheraton Cascais Resort has an enviable location on Portugal’s sweeping Atlantic coast just 30 minutes from Lisbon and about a mile from the famous Guincho Beach, one of the best surfing spots in Europe.The Resort, located near the finest golf courses in Portugal, has a fine dining restaurant and bar, a world-class wellness & beauty spa, a health & fitness club and two outdoor swimming pools, overlooking beautifully landscaped gardens. Offering 156 accommodations from Deluxe Rooms to 3 Bedroom Suites that transform our guests experience. A Glass Terrace restaurant with access to the garden provides a welcoming atmosphere. Our luxurious Serenity Spa offers a wide range of wellness and reinvigorating treatments to recharge both body and soul. Evoking tranquility and serenity, the rooms and suites are integrated within the beautiful surroundings and overlook the resort grounds and gardens.Marriott

name: Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the design Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort features an outdoor pool with sun loungers. Guests can relax in the Spa, offering a varied range of treatments and massages. The property comprises an 18-hole golf course and the clubhouse offers a restaurant, 2 bars and bag storage area. With free WiFi access, the spacious and natural-light rooms come with a satellite LCD TV and air conditioning. The typical Portuguese-tile bathroom is equipped with bathrobes and a bath tub. All rooms were decorated by a design studio. Guests will also a find a fitness centre. The unit has views over golf course, Atlantic Ocean and the Óbidos Lagoon. Lisbon's Portela Airport is 1-hour driving distance from Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Melia Ria Hotel & Spa
address: Cais Da Fonte Nova, Lote 5, 3810-200 Aveiro, Aveiro
description: The recently-renovated Meliá Ria is located in the heart of Aveiro, next door to the Aveiro Congress Centre. It features a restaurant, an indoor swimming pool and a spa and wellness centre. All rooms and suites at Hotel Meliá Ria include an en suite bathroom and air conditioning. In addition, every room features an LCD TV, a telephone, a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Buffet breakfast is served each morning with a view over Ria de Aveiro at the elegant restaurant "O Lago". The bars and restaurants of the centre of Aveiro are less than 10 minutes’ walk away. Meliá Ria Hotel and Spa offers access to a modern health club, for an additional charge. It is equipped with a heated pool, a fitness centre and a sauna. Guests can also schedule massages. Meliá Ria is 500 metres from the train station, and 60 minutes’ drive from Oporto Airport. On-site car parking is available.

name: Hotel Grao Vasco
description: Hotel Grão Vasco is situated in a large garden with an oval-shaped swimming pool and well-tended hedges. The restaurant has large windows and overlooks the green lawn. Rooms at Grão Vasco are air-conditioned and offer a satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath and shower. Guests can enjoy the sun on the outdoor terrace or relax under a parasol by the swimming pool. The Fontelo Forest Park, 600 metres away, offers a quiet setting for an afternoon walk. The Grão Vasco restaurant serves a range of regional dishes in a traditional décor with beamed ceilings. Room service is available as well. The Hotel Grão Vasco offers free parking upon availability. Guests are welcome to enjoy swimming in the indoor pool or taking in a workout at the gym. Hotel Grão Vasco is situated in the very centre of Viseu, just next to Rossio where the Town Hall is. Viseu Cathedral is a 7-minute walk away.

name: The Oitavos
address: Rua De Oitavos 1 Quinta Da Marinha, Cascais, Lisbon District
description: The luxurious 5-star Oitavos combines ultramodern design with an untouched natural location within the Sintra-Cascais Natural Park. It features pools, state-of-the art sports facilities, an Equestrian Centre, Helipad and the award-winning Oitavos golf course. All of the elegant lofts and suites are decorated with modern furnishings in white and blue colours. They all feature comfortable extra long beds, 2 flat-screen satellite TVs and a Nespresso coffee machine. The modern bathroom is complemented by a separate dresser. Some have a separate living area, while others have it included in an open plan space that stretches towards the scenic views of the private balcony, that each unit enjoys. Guests can enjoy a selection of contemporary cuisine at the hotel’s in house Ipsylon Lounge restaurant while gazing pool and garden views. Just a short 3-minute walk from the main building is the hotel's other restaurant, Verbasco. With a more relaxed atmosphere, this dining venue specialises in Portuguese dishes and tapas. The bar of The Oitavos serves a wide variety of drinks well into the night. The Oitavos’s full-service spa offers natural and organic treatment products and a holistic approach to wellness. There are 10 massage rooms, while the hot tub and dry and wet saunas further allow guests to have a relaxing body experience. There is a 24-hour fitness centre and regular activities, like yoga and pilates classes. The sports facilities include a Tennis court, Padel, Squash, Group fitness classes, fitness academy and a semi-olimpic indoor pool. The heated (from May to September) outdoor salt-water swimming pool is ideal for guests to relax with a cocktail or refreshing beverage from the bar. The Oitavos Hotel is located 5 km from central Cascais and a 30-minute drive from Sintra, which is famed for its stunning monuments and palaces. Lisbon is a 30-minute drive away as well, featuring iconic areas and sites like Chiado, Bairro Alto and Alfama. The popular Praia do Guincho beach is a mere 5 minutes away by car. A free shuttle service is available during high season between 10:00 and 18:00 upon request and availability. Bicycles are also available at the hotel.

name: Memmo Baleeira Hotel
description: Located in the green surroundings of the Costa Vicentina Natural Park, the Memmo Baleeira offers an outdoor pool with magnificent Atlantic Ocean views and rooms with private balconies. Some of the guest rooms of the Baleeira Hotel offer views of the sea or garden and luxurious Memmo bathroom amenities. Each includes a seating area with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a private balcony. Guests can relax in the spa and enjoy the heated indoor pool, Turkish bath and sauna. Guests can also pamper themselves with various massages. Baleeira has a restaurant called "Fornaria", serving tasty homemade pizzas, cooked in a wood-burning oven. The "Fornaria" offers stunning views of the bay. The historical centre of Sagres is 200 metres away and it takes a 5-minute walk to reach both Tonel and Martinhal Beach. The Fortress of Sagres can be reached in a 5-minute drive. For children the hotel has a Kid’s club. The Memmo Baleeira also offers help in arranging various outdoor activities for its guests, including surfing, diving, biking and golf.

name: Lamego Hotel & Life
address: Rua de S. João- Urbanização de Ortigosa, 5100-183 Lamego, Viseu
description: With its own orchard and vineyard, this 4-star hotel is situated 800 metres from Lamego’s centre. Guests at the Lamego can also savour the local cuisine for lunch and dinner. Leisure options at the Lamego Hotel & Life. Those who would like to stay active can take a walk in the quiet garden. The property features indoor pool, Nordic bath, training room and spa treatments. Located in Quinta da Vista Alegre, the hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from the majestic Lamego Cathedral and 75 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport.

name: Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve
address: Praia da Falesia, P.O. Box 644, 8200 Albufeira, Faro
description: Treat yourself to a matchless vacation at the mesmerizing Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve in Albufeira. This iconic, 5-star cliff-top retreat is located above Portugal's famous beach, Praia da Falésia, and boasts stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. With a Moorish influenced decor, our hotel's newly-renovated guest rooms teem with exquisite, indigenous details, plush beds and spa-inspired bathrooms. Each hotel room boasts a private balcony with views of Algarve's red cliffs overlooking the ocean or beautifully manicured gardens. Our resort's exceptional amenities include a 9- hole golf course, a tennis club, a revitalizing spa, 8 swimming pools, an up-to-date fitness center and a variety of fine dining options. Families love our fantastic kid's facilities including Porto Pirata, the biggest kids club in the region. Whether in Albufeira, Portugal for business or for pleasure, Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve wants to make your stay a flawless 5-star experience.Marriott

name: Intercontinental Budapest, An IHG Hotel
description: Located on the Danube Promenade with stunning views onto the Danube River and the castle district –one of Budapest’s UNESCO world heritage sites – InterContinental Budapest provides the perfect setting to explore the city’ history, the vibrant gastro scene and all the capital has to offer. Our terrace is the place to be seen in summer and our newly opened ARZ Lebanese Restaurant is a great choice to enjoy culinary delights. Additionally, we offer the largest, natural lit ballroom in the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Corinthia Budapest
description: Standing proudly at the heart of grand Budapest, Corinthia occupies a legendary space in Budapest hospitality. Inside walls which have been standing since the late 1800s lies an elegant homage to modern luxury, with a respectful nod to the past round every corner. It is your ideal base from which to explore, with landmarks like Heroes’ Square, Buda Castle and the thermal waters of Széchenyi Baths within easy reach. A warm Corinthia welcome awaits after a day of exploring; sink into the Royal Spa, an art deco masterpiece where modern comforts sit alongside original features, before discovering an unrivalled collection of restaurants and bars including Caviar & Bull, Uncensored and Rickshaw. That’s if you can bear to leave your room of course… each of our accommodations is equipped with every luxury for an unforgettable stay. From the nearby underground and tram stops, guests can easily access all attractions. The Hungexpo Exhibition Centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Danubius Hotel Arena
description: The Danubius Hotel Arena is neighbouring the Laszlo Papp Sport Arena, the SYMA convention center and the famous Puskás Ferenc Stadium. Due to the short distance from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion M2 subway station, every point and train station of the city can be reached within a few minutes. There are parking facilities in front of the hotel both for cars and buses. You can choose from numerous recently refurbished rooms, make use of impressive fitness and conference facilities and plunge into the on-site pool. The newly renovated Oregano restaurant offers you delicious Hungarian and international cuisine. The helpful and friendly staff is always ready to provide you with any information you may need. The city centre is accessible by subway within a 10-minute ride.

name: Four Seasons Gresham Palace
description: Built in 1906 and entirely renovated in 2004, Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace Budapest enjoys an incomparable location in front of the Chain Bridge, offering luxury units, an infinity-edge pool, a fitness room and a restaurant and bar. All rooms and spacious suites offer iPod Docking Station, satellite TV, wired and wireless internet connection and marble-covered bathrooms with a spacious bath or a shower cabin. Most of the suites are provided with a further guest bathroom and some of the rooms also feature a step-out balcony with panoramic views of the Danube River and the Castle Hill. Guests can enjoy dinner or have a drink at the Kollázs Brasserie & Bar, a contemporary European brasserie overlooking the Chain Bridge and the Danube River, which offers creative combinations of the dining experience. Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning on continental basis. Additionally, American breakfast can be requested at an extra cost. The business centre and concierge desk are at your disposal with working stations, a boardroom and scanning and printing facilities. Translating and secretarial services are on request. The Buda Castle and the Matthias Church can be reached within a 15-minute walk, while the St. Stephen's Basilica is just 400 metres from the Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace. Private parking is possible on site and airport shuttle service can be arranged as well.

name: Ensana Thermal Margaret Island
description: Uniquely situated on the quiet and green Margaret Island in the heart of Budapest, the modern Ensana Thermal Margaret Island offers free use of its large spa area, an indoor and an outdoor pool, and free WiFi access. The spa area also includes a fitness centre, and various beauty treatments and massages are offered. In the Platán restaurant with its terrace, you can enjoy gourmet and light cuisine together with magnificent views of the park. The Boróka Bar with a terrace and the Neptun bar at the swimming pool are inviting places to relax. All rooms are air-conditioned and have a balcony. A work desk, satellite TV and bathrobes are also provided.

name: Ensana Grand Margaret Island
description: Built in 1873 on the lush green and quiet Margaret Island in the centre of Budapest, the Ensana Grand Margaret Island offers a spacious spa area with a selection of treatments. A heated underground corridor connects the hotel to the neighbouring Ensana Thermal Margaret Island, which features one of Europe's top health spas. A hot tub, 2 pools, and various saunas and beauty treatments can be enjoyed there. The diagnostic section features various therapeutic treatments. Guests can access the spa area free of charge. The Széchenyi Restaurant offers fine dining with magnificent views of the park. International, domestic and diet cuisine, with a wide selection of Hungary's best wines, are served. Outdoor dining can be enjoyed in summer on the terrace and in the garden. In the evenings, a gypsy orchestra provides entertainment. The classically furnished rooms overlook the Danube or the magnificent park. They are all air-conditioned and have a minibar. The island stretches over 4 km and is protected leafy botanical parkland with ancient trees, a Japanese garden, and a rose garden, an open-air amphitheatre, traversed by walking and jogging tracks. Bicycles, horses, carts and electric buggies can be hired to get around. It is only a 15-minute drive away from the centre of Budapest.

name: Royal Mediterran
description: Offering a private beach area and free bicycles, the Royal Mediterran aparthotel features self-catered accommodation with free WiFi and free access to a spa, right on the shore of Lake Balaton. All units are air-conditioned, fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a shower. The closest restaurant is 800 metres from Royal Mediterran, while a store for groceries can be reached 200 metres further. Private parking is available upon reservation, at a surcharge and a fishing boat can also be rented on site. The property is 800 metres from Galerius Wellness Bath and 1 km from the nearest train station. A bus stop is 150 metres away.

name: Hotel Helikon
description: Located in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Hotel Helikon, Keszthely provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a lake view. Every room includes a safety deposit box and selected rooms are equipped with city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at Hotel Helikon, Keszthely. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving local, international and Hungarian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hotel Helikon, Keszthely offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a spa centre. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Hotel Helikon, Keszthely include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Otp Balatonszemes
description: Set in Balatonszemes, 35 km from Bebo Aquapark, Hotel OTP Balatonszemes offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. 42 km from Bella Stables and Animal Park and 17 km from Balaton Sound, the property features a private beach area, as well as a tennis court. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and hot tub, as well as a bar. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms come with a balcony. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 3-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Be My Lake Festival is 18 km from Hotel OTP Balatonszemes, while Zamardi Adventure Park is 25 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 62 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Marina Port
description: The child-friendly Hotel Marina Port in Balatonkenese is located next to the port and it offers a restaurant, a wellness area and air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available. In the wellness department you can find an indoor pool, a hot tub with panoramic views of the lake, a Finnish sauna, and infrared sauna with salt therapy and with cardio and fitness machines. Children can spend their time in the kids’ pool. The restaurant serves traditional Hungarian dishes on à la carte basis. The closest shop is situated 300 metres away. At the hotel's private beach you can find sunbeds and parasols, a tennis court, football field and a children's playground. The town of Székesfehérvár can be reached in 30 minutes by car. Budapest is 90 km from the Marina Port Hotel.

name: Novotel Szeged
description: Put your bags down in 4-star riverside comfort at Novotel Szeged hotel on the banks of the Tisza, a short walk from the centre. Your airy contemporary room gives you space to stretch out and there are great river and city views from your balcony. Start your day fresh with a delicious buffet breakfast on the river-view terrace at Novotel. The hotel offers rooms with high speed WiFi, restaurant, bar and parking,  suitable  for both leisure and business trips with a modern and calming design.accorhotels.com

name: Pannonia Hotel
description: Situated in the heart of the historic town, this hotel, built in 1893, is the oldest in Sopron. It offers a fusion of traditional and modern hospitality. Free WiFi is provided on-site. Guests can make use of a private garage for an additional fee. The hotel comprises individually furnished rooms with private bathroom. Some are equipped with antique furniture. In summer the hotel opens its terrace and roof-garden with sunbathing terrace. Close to the Austrian border and one hour’s drive from Vienna (70 km), the hotel lies west of Budapest (220 km). During your stay you can explore the old town centre of Sopron, rich in monuments.

name: Onyx Luxury
description: Set in Sárvár in the Vas region, with Nádasdy Castle nearby, Onyx Luxury offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to spa facilities. All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with garden or city views. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. The restaurant at Onyx Luxury specialises in European and Hungarian cuisine. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room. A bicycle rental service is available at Onyx Luxury. Sümeg Castle is 41 km from the aparthotel, while Savaria Museum is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 72 km from Onyx Luxury.

name: Hotel Karos Spa
description: Situated in the heart of Zalakaros amid a scenic garden, the Hotel Karos Spa offers luxurious wellness, health and fitness facilities on 4000 m² including indoor and outdoor pools. All rooms are air-conditioned, have a balcony and offer free WiFi connection. Tasty Hungarian and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the restaurant of the Hotel Karos Spa.

name: Donautica Hotel & Restaurant
description: Featuring a private beach area, Donautica Hotel & Restaurant is located in Fadd-Dombori. A hot tub is available for guests. The in-house restaurant serves European cuisine. At the hotel, all rooms come with a patio with a garden view. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms come with a terrace. At Donautica Hotel & Restaurant all rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Donautica Hotel & Restaurant offers an outdoor pool. Speaking German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Szekszárd is 23 km from the hotel, while Paks is 20 km from the property, both located by the M6 motorway.

name: Ensana Thermal Aqua
description: With a stay at Ensana Thermal Aqua in Heviz, you'll be in a regional park, just a 1-minute walk from Pannonia and 6 minutes by foot from Roman Catholic Church of the Holy Spirit. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.Hotels.com

name: Amberton Hotel Klaipeda
description: The modern 4-star Amberton Hotel Klaipeda is located in the city centre, a 10-minute walk of the Klaipeda Castle and other local attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi in all areas, stylish interiors, entertainment centre. All rooms at the Amberton are bright and come with a minibar, satellite TV and a spacious bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Most rooms have a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Most are air-conditioned. The hotel consists of two parts: rooms with sea view are in the new K-center and the rooms with city view - in the major building. Guests can enjoy a game billiards, work out in the fitness centre or simply relax in the hot tub or sauna, as well as use electric scooters for free. They are also welcome to visit the on-site spa centre and an indoor pool for an additional fee. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for concierge and room services. Guests can visit one of 4 on-site restaurants serving exotic dishes and a wide selection of cocktails, two of which feature a panoramic view of of the city and the sea. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Lobby Bar. Amberton Hotel Klaipeda is situated 1.5 km from city’s railway station and a bus station. Private parking is provided on site. There is also a secured bicycle parking available at a surcharge. Guests staying at Amberton Hotel Klaipeda can also rent electric GoGreen scooters.

name: Gabija Hotel & Spa
description: Located in a beautiful promenade that stretches along the Palanga Botanical Garden, the stylish Hotel Gabija hotel & SPA offers a large wellness centre, a stylish restaurant and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Gabija hotel & SPA Hotel is just 500 metres from Palanga’s white beach and sand dunes. The elegant rooms, which have been decorated with warm colours, include air conditioning and spacious bathrooms. There is an on-site restaurant MEAT Steakhouse, which serves grilled beef and seafood dishes " The large wellness area, which has natural light, includes an indoor swimming pool with underwater stream, a hot tub and a modern gym. Guests can also choose from a wide range of beauty and wellness treatments.

name: Palanga Life Balance Spa Hotel
description: Located 300 metres from the Baltic Sea, this family-owned 5-star hotel offers a luxurious spa centre and water treatments. The Palanga Spa Life Balance Hotel was awarded the Best SPA Hotel in Eastern Europe in the World Spa and Wellness Awards 2018, the most innovative European SPA Hotel at ESPA awards 2018 and the Perfect Wellness Hotel by Perfect SPA 2018 awards. Guests can choose their accommodation from 74 rooms which are different in categories and situated in two different buildings: elegant Luxury building and hype and modern Design building, which is the only hotel in the world that has by 7 degrees deviated floorings. Both buildings have a lounge area with a fireplace. Luxury building has stylish interiors and elegant rooms. All rooms are bright and decorated with teak-wooden furniture and Brazilian walnut doors and floors. Each room has a balcony and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, mini-bar, flat-screen TV. All rooms at Design building are spacious and have a private balcony. Every room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, mini-bar, flat-screen TV. Located in the Design building, wellness center boasts of four different types of baths, including sauna, steam bath, laconium and outdoor wooden Kelo log bathhouse. There are several swimming pools – indoor swimming, indoor hot tub, Roman pool and outdoor hot tub. All pools use mineral water which is extracted from own mineral water bore. Guests can relax in larch therapy room with water beds. Gym is available free of charge. There is also an outdoor swimming pool with pre-heated water available in the summertime. Guests can choose from a wide range of beauty and medical treatments as well as individual programmes available upon request. Rich breakfast and modern European dishes are served at the restaurant located in the Luxury building. There is also a bar to enjoy snacks and drinks, and a lounge room with a fireplace and views of the surrounding park. The Palanga Spa Life Balance Hotel is located at Birute Avenue, just 150 metres away from the Botanical Gardens and the Amber Museum. The popular Basanavičius promenade is only 600 metres away.

name: Venit Mio Hotel
address: Avenida Embaixador Abelardo Bueno 2710, Rio de Janeiro 22775-040
description: Set in Rio de Janeiro, just in front of Barra Olympic Park, Venit Mio Hotel features free WiFi access and private parking. The hotel has an outdoor pool and views of the city, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. All air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, iPod dock and also a coffee machine. Bathrooms are private and equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. At Venit Mio, you will find a 24-hour front desk, spa, sauna and also a business centre. Barra da Tijuca Beach is 8 km from Venit Mio Hotel, while Riocentro Convention Centre is 3 km away. Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 30 km from the property.Read less

name: Venit Barra Hotel
address: Avenida Embaixador Abelardo Bueno 2710, Rio de Janeiro 22775-040
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, Venit Barra Hotel offers accommodation in Barra da TIjuca district, Rio de Janeiro. The hotel offers a spa centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room is fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and Bluetooth speakers. Guests will find a private bathroom with free toiletries. Besides a sun terrace, guests will also be provided with a fitness centre, a sauna and a 24-hour front desk at the property. Barra Olympic Park is 100 metres from Venit Barra Hotel, while Barra da Tijuca Beach is 12 km away. Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 23 km from the property.Read less

name: Hilton Barra Rio de Janeiro
address: 1430 Abelardo Bueno Avenue, Rio de Janeiro 22775-040
description: Ideally located in the dynamic business district of Barra da Tijuca, Hilton Barra Rio de Janeiro hotel is just moments from the Olympic Park. Guests at this contemporary hotel in Rio de Janeiro can enjoy easy access to popular restaurants, lively bars and nightclubs, shopping, and leisure opportunities. Catch a music concert or sporting event at the Jeunesse Arena. Spend the day at Praia do Pepe, a beautiful stretch of beach that is very popular with surfers and kite boarders. Admire stunning views from our Rooftop Bar and Pool. Also delight yourself with a big variety of art throughout the hotel. Organize a business event at this Rio de Janeiro hotel with five versatile meeting spaces. For larger functions, choose one of the hotel's impressive ballrooms. Our dedicated team of event staff will help ensure the success of your conference, training session or wedding reception. Relax and stay productive in a comfortable and elegant guest room or suite, equipped with WiFi and an HDTV. Work out with contemporary exercise equipment in the fitness center, or swim in the sparkling waters of our rooftop pool as you admire wonderful views over the lakes of Barra da Tijuca. Savor tempting Brazilian specialties prepared with seasonal ingredients in our relaxed onsite restaurant and unwind after dinner with a cocktail in the inviting bar.HiltonRead less

name: Slaviero Baía Norte Florianópolis
description: Slaviero Baia Norte Florianópolis is set in a privileged location in the centre of Florianópolis, right in front of North Bay and Hercílio Luz brigde. It has a restaurant, a fitness centre and garden in Florianópolis. This hotel offers, a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. All the rooms at Slaviero Baia Norte Florianópolis come with balcony, air conditioning, flat-screenTV, minibar and safe deposity box. The private bathrrom is fitted with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel also features adult and children swimming pools and business facilities. Slaviero Baia Norte Florianópolis is located 1 km from the Florianópolis Convention Center and 1.5 km from Beira Mar Shopping Mall. Hercílio Luz Airport is 9.5 km away.

name: Slaviero  Ingleses Convention
description: Situated on Praia dos Ingleses, Slaviero Ingleses Convention offers an outside pool with sun loungers, free WiFi and private parking. All the rooms at the hotel are air conditioned and are equipped with a TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests can benefit from an on-site restaurant and a 24-hour front desk. The nearest airport is Hercílio Luz International Airport, 38.5 km from the property.

name: Costao do Santinho Resort
description: This award-winning resort on Florianópolis´s Santinho Beach is surrounded by native forest and archaeological sites. It features 6 restaurants which 5 have all incluvise, and a luxury spa. Sports facilities include swimming pools, and tennis. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The accommodation at Costao do Santinho Resort offers garden views or sea view, TV and ambiance music. Some rooms have a barbecue and all rooms have private parking. A children´s club organizes monitored activities. For guests of all ages, there are visits to the wildlife sanctuary Morro das Aranhas Mount. In addition, the resort hosts performances by popular Brazilian singers. The spa provides several choices for treatments, from detox to talassotherapy. Guests can have a relaxation massage or a hydromassage session. A beauty salon is available too. As for gastronomy, the casual Rancho do Pescador specializes in seafood recipes from the Azores and Santa Catarina, and Nossa Senhora Vitória features an international contemporary menu. Other options include Italian food, Japanese food and barbecue. The Rancho do Pescador is not part of the all inclusive. Costao do Santinho has been awarded as best beach resort in Brazil 7 times

name: Hilton Sao Paulo Morumbi
address: Av. Das Nacoes Unidas 12901, Sao Paulo 04578-000
description: Hilton Morumbi is situated inside the CENU Complex, only a 5-minute walk from Berrini Avenue and WTC Convention Center in São Paulo. The hotel is 600 metres from Berrini Train Station and a 5-minute drive from Morumbi Shopping Mall. The spacious air-conditioned suites and rooms are tastefully furnished with comfortable beds, flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, internet connection,minibar and work desks. The private bathrooms include a shower and a bath tub. Some rooms offer access to the executive lounge, which includes private check-in and check-out, complimentary breakfast, free WiFi and a bar. On its top floor, Hilton São Paulo Morumbi offers a well-equipped gym, where free fitness classes are provided. Guests can enjoy a stunning view of Ponte Estaiada suspension bridge, which can also be admired from most of the guestrooms. Hilton Sao Paulo Morumbi has a 28th floor swimming pool with panoramic views of the skyline and the Estaiada Bridge. The hotel also provides a glamorous spa, where relaxing treatments using natural products from the Amazon forest are offered. Efficient business facilities, meeting rooms, a wine cellar and several dining options are also available in the hotel. The hotel is only 7 km from Congonhas Airport and offers direct access to Nações Unidas Avenue.

name: Mercure Sao Paulo Vila Olimpia
address: Rua Santa Justina 210, Vila Olimpia, Sao Paulo
description: Mercure São Paulo Vila Olímpia offers an authentic experience for your business or leisure stay. Spacious rooms for couples, singles and families, with view, A/C, and free WIFI. Event rooms, pool, sauna, and gym. Some rooms have been converted into offices. The cozy La Forchetta outdoor restaurant includes a vegetable garden for Italian and Brazilian dishes. Enjoy our great wine menu at the bar area.accorhotels.com

name: Melia Brasil 21
address: Shs Quadra 6 - Bloco B, D E F- Asa Sul., Brasilia 70316-000
description: Offering a heated rooftop pool, gym and sauna, Meliá Brasil 21 is located between the Television Tower and Parque da Cidade, in Brasília. For extra care, the Meliá Brasil 21 hotel has a gym with more than 1000 m², for your best comfort. 5-star hotel known for premium service and exclusive amenities. We have room categories that perfectly fit what you are looking for, all have air conditioning, TV with streaming, work desk and minibar. Those who choose to book THE LEVEL room category at the Meliá Brasil 21 Hotel will enjoy a package that includes access to the Exclusive Lounge located on the 2nd floor. This lounge offers special amenities such as private check-in and check-out service, concierge assistance, availability of snacks throughout the day and a daily Happy Hour from 6:30 pm to 9:30 pm, among other benefits. The Norton Restaurant, located on the 2nd floor, specializes in meat and fish, with a wide selection of wines. We have the best location for those coming for work or pleasure, we are 13km from Brasília International Airport, 3.8 km from the National Congress, 600m from Pátio Brasil 21 Shopping, 550m from Venâncio Shopping and 400m from Parque da Cidade.
